273.description: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 5...17 seconds, target ally cannot be the target of enemy spells.
273.concise description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (5...17 seconds.) Target ally cannot be the target of enemy spells.

274.name: Healing Seed
274.description: Enchantment Spell. For 10 seconds, whenever target other ally takes damage, that ally and all adjacent allies gain 3...30 Health.
274.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (10 seconds.) Target and adjacent allies gain 3...30 Health whenever this ally takes damage.

275.name: Mend Condition
275.description: Spell. Remove one condition (Poison, Disease, Blindness, Dazed, Bleeding, Crippled, Burning, Weakness, Cracked Armor, or Deep Wound) from target other ally. If a condition is removed, that ally is healed for 5...70 Health.
275.concise description: Spell. Removes one condition. Removal effect: heals for 5...70.

276.name: Restore Condition
276.description: Elite Spell. Remove all conditions (Poison, Disease, Blindness, Dazed, Bleeding, Crippled, Burning, Weakness, Cracked Armor, and Deep Wound) from target other ally. For each condition removed, that ally is healed for 10...70 Health.
276.concise description: Elite Spell. Removes all conditions. Removal effect: heals for 10...70 for each condition removed.

277.name: Mend Ailment
277.description: Spell. Remove one condition (Poison, Disease, Blindness, Dazed, Bleeding, Crippled, Burning, Weakness, Cracked Armor, or Deep Wound) from target ally. For each remaining Condition, that ally is healed for 5...70 Health.
277.concise description: Spell. Removes a condition. Removal effect: heals for 5...70 for each remaining condition.

278.name: Purge Conditions
278.description: Spell. Remove all conditions (Poison, Disease, Blindness, Dazed, Bleeding, Crippled, Burning, Weakness, Cracked Armor, and Deep Wound) from target ally.

279.name: Divine Healing
279.description: Spell. Heals you and party members within earshot for 15...60 points.
279.concise description: Spell. Heals you and party members within earshot for 15...60.

280.name: Heal Area
280.description: Spell. Heal yourself and all adjacent creatures for 30...180 points.
280.concise description: Spell. Heals you and adjacent allies and foes for 30...180.

281.name: Orison of Healing
281.description: Spell. Heal target ally for 20...70 Health.

282.name: Word of Healing
282.description: Elite Spell. Heal target ally for 5...100 Health. Heal for an additional 30...115 Health if that ally is below 50% Health.
282.concise description: Elite Spell. Heals for 5...100. Heals for 30...115 more if target ally is below 50% Health.

283.name: Dwayna's Kiss
283.description: Spell. Heal target other ally for 15...60 Health and an additional 10...35 Health for each enchantment or hex on that ally.
283.concise description: Spell. Heals for 15...60. Heals for 10...35 more for each enchantment and hex on target ally.

284.name: Divine Boon
284.description: Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, whenever you cast a Protection Prayer should be Protection Prayers [sic] or Divine Favor spell that targets an ally, that ally is healed for 15...60 Health, and you lose 1 Energy.
284.concise description: Enchantment Spell. Whenever you cast a Protection Prayer [sic] or Divine Favor spell on an ally, that ally is healed for 15...60.

285.name: Healing Hands
285.description: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 10 seconds, whenever target ally takes damage, that ally is healed for 5...35 Health.
285.concise description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (10 seconds.) Heals for 5...35 whenever target takes damage.

286.name: Heal Other
286.description: Spell. Heal target other ally for 35...180 Health.

287.name: Heal Party
287.description: Spell. Heal entire party for 30...75 Health.

288.name: Healing Breeze
288.description: Enchantment Spell. For 15 seconds, target ally gains +4...9 Health regeneration.

289.name: Vital Blessing
289.description: Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, target ally has +40...200 maximum Health.

290.name: Mending
290.description: Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, target ally gains +1...4 Health regeneration.

291.name: Live Vicariously
291.description: Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, whenever target ally hits a foe, you gain 2...17 Health.
291.concise description: Enchantment Spell. You gain 2...17 Health whenever target ally hits a foe.

292.name: Infuse Health
292.description: Spell. Lose half your current Health. Target other ally is healed for 100...136% of the amount you lost.
292.concise description: Spell. Heals for 100...136% of half your current Health.

293.name: Signet of Devotion
293.description: Signet. Heal target ally for 14...100 Health.

294.name: Signet of Judgment
294.description: Elite Signet. Target foe is knocked down. That foe and all adjacent foes take 15...75 holy damage.
294.concise description: Elite Signet. Knocks down target. Deals 15...75 holy damage to target and adjacent foes.

295.name: Purge Signet
295.description: Signet. Remove all hexes and conditions from target ally. You lose 10 Energy for each hex and each condition removed.
295.concise description: Signet. Removes all hexes and conditions.

296.name: Bane Signet
296.description: Signet. Target foe takes 26...56 holy damage. If target foe was attacking, that foe is knocked down.
296.concise description: Signet. Deals 26...56 holy damage. Causes knock-down if target foe is attacking.

297.name: Blessed Signet
297.description: Signet. For each enchantment you are maintaining, you gain 3 Energy. You cannot gain more than 3...24 Energy in this way.
297.concise description: Signet. You gain 3 Energy for each enchantment you are maintaining.

298.name: Martyr
298.description: Elite Spell. Transfer all conditions and their remaining durations from your allies to you.
298.concise description: Elite Spell. Transfer all conditions from all allies to you.

299.name: Shielding Hands
299.description: Enchantment Spell. For 8 seconds, damage and life steal received by target ally is reduced by 3...18. When Shielding Hands ends, that ally is healed for 5...50 Health.
299.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (8 seconds.) Reduces incoming damage and life steal by 3...18. End effect: heals for 5...50

300.name: Contemplation of Purity
300.description: Skill. Lose all enchantments. For each one lost, you gain 0...80 Health, lose one hex, and lose one condition (maximum 1...8 hexes and conditions).
300.concise description: Skill. You gain 0...80 Health and lose one hex and one condition for each enchantment on you (maximum 1...8 hexes and conditions).

301.name: Remove Hex
301.description: Spell. Remove a hex from target ally.
301.concise description: Spell. Removes a hex from target ally.

302.name: Smite Hex
302.description: Spell. Remove a hex from target ally. If a hex is removed, foes in the area suffer 10...85 holy damage.
302.concise description: Spell. Removes a hex from target ally. Removal effect: deals 10...85 holy damage to foes in the area of target ally.

303.name: Convert Hexes
303.description: Spell. Remove all hexes from target other ally. For 8...20 seconds, that ally gains +10 armor for each Necromancer hex that was removed.
303.concise description: Spell. Removes all hexes; +10 armor for each Necromancer hex removed (8...20 seconds).

304.name: Light of Dwayna
304.description: Spell. Resurrect all dead party members in the area. They are returned to life with 25% Health and zero Energy.
304.concise description: Spell. Resurrects all dead party members in the area. (25% Health, zero Energy).

305.name: Resurrect
305.description: Spell. Resurrect target party member. Target party member is returned to life with 25% Health and zero Energy.
305.concise description: Spell. Resurrects target party member (25% Health, 0 Energy).

306.name: Rebirth
306.description: Spell. Resurrect target party member. Target party member is returned to life with 25% Health and zero Energy, and is teleported to your current location. All of target's skills are disabled for 10...3 seconds. This spell consumes all of your remaining Energy.
306.concise description: Spell. Resurrects target party member (25% Health, 0 Energy). Teleports target to you.

307.name: Reversal of Fortune
307.description: Enchantment Spell. For 8 seconds, the next time target ally would take damage or life steal, that ally gains that amount of Health instead, maximum 15...80.
307.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (8 seconds.) Converts the next incoming damage or life steal (maximum 15...80) to healing.

308.name: Succor
308.description: Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this Enchantment, target other ally gains +1 Health and +1 Energy regeneration, but you lose 1 Energy each time that ally casts a Spell.
308.concise description: Enchantment Spell. +1 Health regeneration and +1 Energy regeneration.

309.name: Holy Veil
309.description: Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, any hex cast on target ally takes twice as long to cast. When Holy Veil ends, one hex is removed from target ally.
309.concise description: Enchantment Spell. Doubles casting time of hexes cast on target ally. End effect: removes a hex.

310.name: Divine Spirit
310.description: Enchantment Spell. For 1...14 second[s], Monk Spells cost you 5 less Energy to cast. (Minimum cost: 1 Energy.)
310.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (1...14 second[s].) Monk spells cost you 5 less Energy.

311.name: Draw Conditions
311.description: Spell. All negative conditions are transferred from target other ally to yourself. For each condition acquired, you gain 6...26 Health.
311.concise description: Spell. Transfers all conditions from target ally to yourself. Transfer effect: you gain 6...26 Health for each condition.

312.name: Holy Strike
312.description: Skill. Touched target foe takes 10...55 holy damage. If knocked down, your target takes an additional 10...55 holy damage.
312.concise description: Touch Skill. Deals 10...55 holy damage. Deals 10...55 more holy damage if target is knocked down.

313.name: Healing Touch
313.description: Spell. Heal target touched ally for 16...60 Health. Health gain from Divine Favor is doubled for this spell.
313.concise description: Touch Spell. Heals for 16...60. Double Health gain from Divine Favor for this spell.

314.name: Restore Life
314.description: Spell. Touch the body of a fallen party member. Target party member is returned to life with 20...65% Health and 42...90% Energy.
314.concise description: Touch Spell. Resurrects target party member (20...65% Health, 42...90% Energy).

315.name: Vengeance
315.description: Enchantment Spell. Bring target dead party member back to life at full Health and full Energy. For 30 seconds, that party member deals 25% more damage. When this enchantment ends, target party member dies. Deaths while under the effects of this enchantment do not incur a death penalty.
315.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Resurrects target party member (full Health, full Energy). This ally deals 25% more damage and does not incur death penalty.

316.name: "To the Limit!"
316.description: Shout. For each foe within earshot (maximum 1...6), you gain one strike of adrenaline. For 10...20 seconds, your maximum Health is increased by 10...60.
316.concise description: Shout. (10...20 seconds.)  You have +10...60 maximum Health.  Initial effect: you gain one strike of adrenaline for each foe within earshot (maximum 1...6).

317.name: Battle Rage
317.description: Elite Stance. For 5...20 seconds, you move 33% faster and gain double adrenaline from attacks. Battle Rage ends if you use any non-adrenal skills.
317.concise description: Elite Stance. (5...20 seconds.) You move 33% faster and gain double adrenaline from your attacks.

318.name: Defy Pain
318.description: Elite Skill. For 20 seconds you have an additional 90...300 Health, an additional 20 armor, and you take 1...10 less damage.
318.concise description: Elite Skill. (20 seconds.) You have +90...300 maximum Health, +20 armor, and take 1...10 less damage.

319.name: Rush
319.description: Stance. For 8...20 seconds, you move 25% faster.

320.name: Hamstring
320.description: Sword Attack. If this attack hits, your target is Crippled for 3...15 seconds, slowing his [sic] movement.
320.concise description: Sword Attack. Inflicts Crippled condition (3...15 seconds).

321.name: Wild Blow
321.description: Melee Attack. Lose all adrenaline. If it hits, this attack will result in a critical hit and any stance being used by your target ends. This attack cannot be blocked.
321.concise description: Melee Attack. Always a critical hit. Removes a stance. Unblockable.

322.name: Power Attack
322.description: Melee Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +10...40 damage.

323.name: Desperation Blow
323.description: Melee Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +10...40 damage, and your target suffers from one of the following conditions: Deep Wound (for 20 seconds), Weakness (for 20 seconds), Bleeding (for 25 seconds), or Crippled (for 15 seconds). After making a Desperation Blow, you are knocked down.
323.concise description: Melee Attack. Deals +10...40 damage. Inflicts one of the following random conditions: Deep Wound (20 seconds), Weakness (20 seconds), Bleeding (25 seconds), or Crippled (15 seconds).

324.name: Thrill of Victory
324.description: Melee Attack. If this blow hits, you deal +20...40 damage. If you have more Health than target foe, you gain 1...2 strike[s] of adrenaline.
324.concise description: Melee Attack. Deals +20...40 damage. If you have more Health than your target, you gain 1...2 adrenaline.

325.name: Distracting Blow
325.description: Melee Attack. Swipe your weapon at the target, dealing no damage but disrupting the target's current action (and the actions of foes adjacent to your target).
325.concise description: Melee Attack. Also attacks foes adjacent to your target. Interrupts an action.

326.name: Protector's Strike
326.description: Melee Attack. If this attack strikes a moving foe, you strike for 10...40 more damage.
326.concise description: Melee Attack. Deals +10...40 damage if target is moving.

327.name: Griffon's Sweep
327.description: Melee Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +5...20 damage. If this attack is blocked, your target is knocked down and suffers 10...34 damage.
327.concise description: Melee Attack. Deals +5...20 damage. Causes knock-down and deals 10...34 damage if blocked.

328.name: Pure Strike
328.description: Sword Attack. If Pure Strike hits, you strike for +1...30 damage. If you are not using a stance, Pure Strike cannot be blocked.
328.concise description: Sword Attack. Deals +1...30 damage. Unblockable unless you are in a stance.

329.name: Skull Crack
329.description: Elite Melee Attack. If it hits, this attack interrupts the target's current action. If that foe was casting a spell, that foe is Dazed for 10 seconds.
329.concise description: Elite Melee Attack. Interrupts an action. Inflicts Dazed condition (10 seconds) if target is casting a spell.

330.name: Cyclone Axe
330.description: Axe Attack. Perform a spinning axe attack striking for +4...12 damage to all adjacent opponents.
330.concise description: Axe Attack. Deals +4...12 damage to all foes adjacent to you.

331.name: Hammer Bash
331.description: Hammer Attack. Lose all adrenaline. If Hammer Bash hits, your target is knocked down.

332.name: Bull's Strike
332.description: Melee Attack. If this attack hits a moving foe, you strike for +5...30 damage, and your target is knocked down.
332.concise description: Melee Attack. Deals +5...30 damage and causes knock-down if target foe is moving.

333.name: "I Will Avenge You!"
333.description: Shout. For each dead ally, you gain 10 seconds of +3...7 Health regeneration and your attack speed increases by 25%.
333.concise description: Shout. You have +3...7 Health regeneration and attack 25% faster (10 seconds for each dead ally).

334.name: Axe Rake
334.description: Axe Attack. If this attack hits a foe suffering from a Deep Wound, you strike for +1...10 damage, and that foe becomes Crippled for 15 seconds.
334.concise description: Axe Attack. Deals +1...10 damage and inflicts Crippled condition (15 seconds) if target foe has a Deep Wound.

335.name: Cleave
335.description: Elite Axe Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +10...30 damage.

336.name: Executioner's Strike
336.description: Axe Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +10...40 damage.

337.name: Dismember
337.description: Axe Attack. If it hits, this axe blow will inflict a Deep Wound on the target foe, lowering that foe's maximum Health by 20% for 5...20 seconds.
337.concise description: Axe Attack. Inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...20 seconds).

338.name: Eviscerate
338.description: Elite Axe Attack. If Eviscerate hits, you strike for +1...31 damage and inflict a Deep Wound, lowering your target's maximum Health by 20% for 5...20 seconds.
338.concise description: Elite Axe Attack. Deals +1...31 damage. Inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...20 seconds).

339.name: Penetrating Blow
339.description: Axe Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +5...20 damage. This axe attack has 20% armor penetration.
339.concise description: Axe Attack. Deals +5...20 damage. 20% armor penetration.

340.name: Disrupting Chop
340.description: Axe Attack. If it hits, this attack interrupts the target's current action. If that action was a skill, that skill is disabled for an additional 20 seconds.
340.concise description: Axe Attack. Interrupts an action. Interruption effect: interrupted skill is disabled for +20 seconds.

341.name: Swift Chop
341.description: Axe Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +1...20 damage. If Swift Chop is blocked, target foe takes 1...20 damage and suffers a Deep Wound for 20 seconds.
341.concise description: Axe Attack. Deals +1...20 damage. Deals 1...20 damage and inflicts Deep Wound condition (20 seconds) if blocked.

342.name: Axe Twist
342.description: Axe Attack. If this attack hits a foe suffering from a Deep Wound, you strike for 1...20 more damage and that foe suffers from Weakness for 20 seconds.
342.concise description: Axe Attack. Deals +1...20 damage and inflicts Weakness condition (20 seconds) if target foe has a Deep Wound.

343.name: "For Great Justice!"
343.description: Shout. For 20 seconds, whenever you gain adrenaline, you gain 100% more.
343.concise description: Shout. (20 seconds.) You gain 100% more adrenaline.

344.name: Flurry
344.description: Stance. For 5 seconds, your attack rate is increased by 33%, but you deal 25% less damage.

345.name: Defensive Stance
345.description: Stance. For 1...5 second[s], you have a 75% chance to block melee and projectile attacks. When Defensive Stance ends, you gain one strike of adrenaline for each melee attack skill you have (maximum 0...4).
345.concise description: Stance. (1...5 second[s].) You have 75% chance to block.

346.name: Frenzy
346.description: Stance. For 8 seconds, you attack 33% faster but take double damage.

347.name: Endure Pain
347.description: Skill. For 7...18 seconds you have an additional 90...300 Health.
347.concise description: Skill. (7...18 seconds.) You have +90...300 maximum Health.

348.name: "Watch Yourself!"
348.description: Shout. Party members within earshot gain +5...25 armor for 10 seconds. This shout ends after 10 incoming attacks.
348.concise description: Shout. (10 seconds.) Party members in earshot have +5...25 armor.

349.name: Sprint
349.description: Stance. For 8...14 seconds, you move 25% faster.

350.name: Belly Smash
350.description: Hammer Attack. If this attack strikes a foe who is knocked down, the resulting dust cloud will blind adjacent foes for 3...7 seconds.
350.concise description: Hammer Attack. Inflicts Blindness condition to adjacent foes (3...7 seconds) if target foe is knocked down.

351.name: Mighty Blow
351.description: Hammer Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +10...40 damage.

352.name: Crushing Blow
352.description: Hammer Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +1...20 damage. If you hit a knocked-down foe you inflict a Deep Wound, lowering your target's maximum Health by 20% for 5...20 seconds.
352.concise description: Hammer Attack. Deals +1...20 damage. Inflicts Deep Wound condition if target foe is knocked-down (5...20 seconds).

353.name: Crude Swing
353.description: Hammer Attack. Attack all adjacent foes. Each foe you hit is struck for +1...20 damage.
353.concise description: Hammer Attack. Attack all adjacent foes for +1...20 damage.

354.name: Earth Shaker
354.description: Elite Hammer Attack. Target foe and all adjacent foes are knocked down. (50% failure chance with Hammer Mastery 4 or less.)
354.concise description: Elite Hammer Attack. Knocks down target and adjacent foes.

355.name: Devastating Hammer
355.description: Elite Hammer Attack. If Devastating Hammer hits, your target is knocked down and suffers from Weakness for 5...20 seconds.
355.concise description: Elite Hammer Attack. Causes knock-down. Inflicts Weakness condition (5...20 seconds).

356.name: Irresistible Blow
356.description: Hammer Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +5...20 damage. If Irresistible Blow is blocked, your target is knocked down and takes 5...20 damage.
356.concise description: Hammer Attack. Deals +5...20 damage. Deals 5...20 damage and causes knock-down if blocked.

357.name: Counter Blow
357.description: Hammer Attack. If this attack hits an attacking foe, that foe is knocked down.
357.concise description: Hammer Attack. Causes knock-down if target foe is attacking.

358.name: Backbreaker
358.description: Elite Hammer Attack. If Backbreaker hits, you strike for +1...20 damage and your target is knocked down. If you have 8 Strength or higher, this knockdown lasts 4 seconds.
358.concise description: Elite Hammer Attack. Deals +1...20 damage. Causes knockdown.

359.name: Heavy Blow
359.description: Hammer Attack. Lose all adrenaline. If this attack hits a foe suffering from Weakness, that foe is knocked down and you strike for +1...30 damage.
359.concise description: Hammer Attack. Deals +1...30 damage and causes knock-down if target foe is Weakened.

360.name: Staggering Blow
360.description: Hammer Attack. If this hammer blow hits, your target will suffer from Weakness for 5...20 seconds.
360.concise description: Hammer Attack. Inflicts Weakness condition (5...20 seconds).

361.name: Dolyak Signet
361.description: Signet. For 8...20 seconds, you have +10...40 armor and cannot be knocked down, but your movement is slowed by 75%.
361.concise description: Signet. (8...20 seconds.) You have +10...40 armor and cannot be knocked-down.

362.name: Warrior's Cunning
362.description: Skill. For 5...11 seconds, your melee attacks cannot be blocked.
362.concise description: Skill. (5...11 seconds.) Your melee attacks are unblockable.

363.name: Shield Bash
363.description: Skill. For 5...11 seconds, while wielding a shield, the next attack skill used against you is blocked. If it was a melee skill, your attacker is knocked down and that skill is disabled for an additional 15 seconds.
363.concise description: Skill. (5...11 seconds.) You block the next attack skill. Causes knock-down and +15 second recharge if it was a melee skill.

364.name: "Charge!"
364.description: Elite Shout. Allies in earshot lose the Crippled condition. For 5...13 seconds, these allies move 33% faster.
364.concise description: Elite Shout. (5...13 seconds.) Allies in earshot move 33% faster. Initial effect: these allies lose the Crippled condition.

365.name: "Victory Is Mine!"
365.description: Elite Shout. You gain 10...68 Health and 3...7 Energy for each condition suffered by target foe.
365.concise description: Elite Shout. You gain 10...68 Health and 3...7 Energy for each condition on target foe.

366.name: "Fear Me!"
366.description: Shout. All nearby foes lose 1...4 Energy. For 1...15 second[s], your melee attacks gain +5...30% chance of a critical hit against stationary foes.
366.concise description: Shout. (1...15 second[s].) You have +5...30% chance of a critical hit with melee attacks against stationary foes. Initial effect: nearby foes lose 1...4 Energy.

367.name: "Shields Up!"
367.description: Shout. For 5...11 seconds, you and all party members within earshot gain +60 armor against incoming projectile attacks.
367.concise description: Shout. (5...11 seconds.) Party members in earshot have +60 armor against projectile attacks.

368.name: "I Will Survive!"
368.description: Shout. You gain +3 Health regeneration for each condition you are suffering. This regeneration expires after 5...11 seconds.
368.concise description: Shout. (5...11 seconds.) You have +3 Health regeneration for each condition on you.

370.name: Berserker Stance
370.description: Stance. For 5...11 seconds, you attack 33% faster and gain 50% more adrenaline. Berserker Stance ends if you use a skill.
370.concise description: Stance. (5...11 seconds.) You attack 33% faster and gain 50% more adrenaline.

371.name: Balanced Stance
371.description: Stance. For 8...20 seconds, you cannot be knocked down and you do not suffer extra damage from a critical attack.
371.concise description: Stance. (8...20 seconds.) You cannot be knocked-down and do not take extra damage from critical hits.

372.name: Gladiator's Defense
372.description: Elite Stance. For 5...11 seconds, you have a 75% chance to block incoming attacks. Whenever you block a melee attack this way, the attacker suffers 5...35 damage.
372.concise description: Elite Stance. (5...11 seconds.) You have 75% chance to block. Your attacker takes 5...35 damage whenever you block a melee attack this way.

373.name: Deflect Arrows
373.description: Stance. For 1...6 second[s], you have a 75% chance to block attacks. If you block a projectile attack, adjacent foes suffer from Bleeding for 5...15 seconds.
373.concise description: Stance. (1...6 second[s].) You have 75% chance to block attacks. Adjacent foes suffer Bleeding (5...15 seconds) when you block a projectile attack.

374.name: Warrior's Endurance
374.description: Elite Skill. For 5...35 seconds, you gain 3 Energy each time you hit with a melee attack. Warrior's Endurance cannot raise your Energy above 10...25.
374.concise description: Elite Skill. (5...35 seconds.) You gain 3 Energy each time you hit with a melee attack.

375.name: Dwarven Battle Stance
375.description: Elite Stance. For 5...11 seconds, if you are wielding a hammer, you attack 33% faster, you gain +40 armor, and your attack skills interrupt foes when they hit.
375.concise description: Elite Stance. (5...11 seconds.) You attack 33% faster, you gain +40 armor, and your attack skills interrupt actions.

376.name: Disciplined Stance
376.description: Stance. For 1...4 second[s], you gain +10 armor and have a 75% chance to block attacks. Disciplined Stance ends if you use an adrenal skill.
376.concise description: Stance. (1...4 second[s].) You have 75% chance to block and +10 armor.

377.name: Wary Stance
377.description: Stance. For 1...6 second[s], you block any attack skills used against you. For each successful block, you gain adrenaline and 5 Energy. Wary Stance ends if you use a skill.
377.concise description: Stance. (1...6 second[s]). You block attack skills. Gain adrenaline and 5 Energy for each block.

378.name: Shield Stance
378.description: Stance. For 1...6 second[s], while wielding a shield, you have a 75% chance to block incoming attacks, and damage is reduced by 2 for each rank of Strength (maximum 15 damage reduction).
378.concise description: Stance. (1...6 second[s].) You have 75% chance to block. Damage is reduced by 2 for each rank of Strength (maximum 15 damage reduction).

379.name: Bull's Charge
379.description: Elite Stance. For 5...11 seconds, you move 33% faster and if you strike a moving foe in melee, that foe is knocked down. Bull's Charge ends if you use a skill.
379.concise description: Elite Stance. (5...11 seconds.) You move 33% faster. Causes knock-down if you hit a moving foe in melee.

380.name: Bonetti's Defense
380.description: Stance. For 5...11 seconds, you have a 75% chance to block melee and projectile attacks. You gain 5 Energy for each successful melee attack blocked. Bonetti's Defense ends if you use a skill.
380.concise description: Stance. (5...11 seconds.) You have 75% chance to block. Gain 5 Energy for each melee attack blocked.

381.name: Hundred Blades
381.description: Elite Skill. For 15 seconds, whenever you attack with a sword, all adjacent foes take 10...25 slashing damage.
381.concise description: Elite Skill. (15 seconds.) Deals 10...25 slashing damage to all adjacent foes whenever you attack with a sword.

382.name: Sever Artery
382.description: Sword Attack. If this attack hits, the opponent begins Bleeding for 5...25 seconds, losing Health over time.
382.concise description: Sword Attack. Inflicts Bleeding condition (5...25 seconds).

383.name: Galrath Slash
383.description: Sword Attack. This attack strikes for +1...40 damage if it hits.

384.name: Gash
384.description: Sword Attack. If this attack hits a Bleeding foe, you strike for 5...20 more damage and that foe suffers a Deep Wound, lowering that foe's maximum Health by 20% for 5...20 seconds.
384.concise description: Sword Attack. Deals +5...20 damage and inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...20 seconds) if your target is Bleeding.

386.name: Seeking Blade
386.description: Sword Attack. If this attack hits you strike for +1...20 damage. If Seeking Blade is blocked, your target begins Bleeding for 25 seconds and takes 1...20 damage.
386.concise description: Sword Attack. Deals +1...20 damage. Deals 1...20 damage and inflicts Bleeding condition (25 seconds) if blocked.

387.name: Riposte
387.description: Skill. For 8 seconds, while you have a sword equipped, you block the next melee attack against you and your attacker is struck for 20...80 damage.
387.concise description: Skill. (8 seconds). You block the next melee attack and your attacker takes 20...80 damage.

388.name: Deadly Riposte
388.description: Skill. For 8 seconds, while you have a sword equipped, you block the next melee attack against you, and your attacker is struck for 15...90 damage and begins Bleeding for 3...25 seconds.
388.concise description: Skill. (8 seconds). You block the next melee attack and your attacker takes 15...90 damage. Inflicts Bleeding condition. (3...25 seconds).

389.name: Flourish
389.description: Elite Skill. All of your attack skills become recharged. You gain 2...7 Energy for each skill recharged by Flourish.
389.concise description: Elite Skill. Recharges your attack skills. You gain 2...7 Energy for each skill recharged.

390.name: Savage Slash
390.description: Sword Attack. If this attack hits, it interrupts target foe's action. If that action was a spell, you deal 1...40 extra damage.
390.concise description: Sword Attack. Interrupts an action. Interruption effect: deals +1...40 damage if action was a spell.

391.name: Hunter's Shot
391.description: Bow Attack. If this attack hits, your target bleeds for 3...25 seconds.
391.concise description: Bow Attack. Inflicts Bleeding condition (3...25 seconds) if your target is hit.

392.name: Pin Down
392.description: Bow Attack. If Pin Down hits, your target is Crippled for 3...15 seconds.
392.concise description: Bow Attack. Inflicts Crippled condition (3...15 seconds).

393.name: Crippling Shot
393.description: Elite Bow Attack. If Crippling Shot hits, your target becomes Crippled for 1...11 second[s]. This attack cannot be blocked.
393.concise description: Elite Bow Attack. Unblockable. Inflicts Crippled condition (1...11 second[s]).

394.name: Power Shot
394.description: Bow Attack. If Power Shot hits, target foe takes 25...50 damage.
394.concise description: Bow Attack. Target foe takes 25...50 damage.

395.name: Barrage
395.description: Elite Bow Attack. All your preparations are removed. Shoot arrows at target foe and up to 5 foes adjacent to your target. These arrows strike for +5...20 damage if they hit.
395.concise description: Elite Bow Attack. Deals +5...20 damage. Hits 5 foes adjacent to your target.

396.name: Dual Shot
396.description: Bow Attack. Shoot two arrows simultaneously at target foe. These arrows deal 25% less damage.
396.concise description: Bow Attack. You shoot two arrows simultaneously at target foe.

397.name: Quick Shot
397.description: Elite Bow Attack. Shoot an arrow that moves twice as fast.
397.concise description: Elite Bow Attack. You shoot an arrow that moves twice as fast.

398.name: Penetrating Attack
398.description: Bow Attack. If Penetrating Attack hits, you strike for +5...25 damage and this attack has 10% armor penetration.
398.concise description: Bow Attack. Deals +5...25 damage. 10% armor penetration.

399.name: Distracting Shot
399.description: Bow Attack. If Distracting Shot hits, it interrupts target foe's action but deals only 1...16 damage. If the interrupted action was a skill, that skill is disabled for an additional 20 seconds.
399.concise description: Bow Attack. Interrupts an action. Interruption effect: interrupted skill is disabled for +20 seconds.

400.name: Precision Shot
400.description: Bow Attack. If Precision Shot hits, you strike for +3...10 damage. Precision Shot cannot be blocked. This action is easily interrupted.

401.name: Splinter Shot
401.description: Bow Attack. If Splinter Shot hits, it ricochets to up to two more foes near your target. Splinter Shot strikes for + damage.
401.concise description: Bow Attack. Deals + damage. Hits two foes near your target.

402.name: Determined Shot
402.description: Bow Attack. If Determined Shot hits, you strike for +5...20 damage. If Determined Shot fails to hit, all of your attack skills are recharged.
402.concise description: Bow Attack. Deals +5...20 damage. Recharges your attack skills if it fails to hit.

403.name: Called Shot
403.description: Bow Attack. Shoot an arrow that moves 3 times faster and cannot be blocked.
403.concise description: Bow Attack. You shoot an arrow that moves 3 times faster. Unblockable.

404.name: Poison Arrow
404.description: Elite Bow Attack. If Poison Arrow hits, your target becomes Poisoned for 5...20 seconds.
404.concise description: Elite Bow Attack. Inflicts Poisoned condition. (5...20)

405.name: Oath Shot
405.description: Elite Bow Attack. If Oath Shot hits, all of your skills except Oath Shot are recharged. If it misses, all of your skills are disabled for 10...4 seconds. (50% miss chance with Expertise 7 or less.)
405.concise description: Elite Bow Attack. Recharges all skills except Oath Shot if it hits.

406.name: Debilitating Shot
406.description: Bow Attack. If Debilitating Shot hits, your target loses 1...10 Energy.

407.name: Point Blank Shot
407.description: Bow Attack. Shoot an arrow that has half the normal range, but strikes for +10...40 damage.
407.concise description: Half Range Bow Attack. Deals +10...40 damage.

408.name: Concussion Shot
408.description: Bow Attack. If Concussion Shot hits while target foe is casting a spell, the spell is interrupted and your target is Dazed for 5...20 seconds. This attack deals only 1...16 damage.
408.concise description: Bow Attack. Interrupts a spell. Interruption effect: inflicts Dazed condition (5...20 seconds).

409.name: Punishing Shot
409.description: Elite Bow Attack. If Punishing Shot hits, you strike for +10...20 damage and your target is interrupted.
409.concise description: Elite Bow Attack. Deals +10...20 damage. Interrupts an action.

411.name: Charm Animal
411.description: Skill. Charm target animal. Once charmed, your animal companion will travel with you whenever you have Charm Animal equipped. You cannot charm an animal that is more than 4 levels above you.
411.concise description: Skill. Charm target animal. Once charmed, your animal companion will travel with you whenever you have Charm Animal equipped.

412.name: Call of Protection
412.description: Shout. For 120 seconds, your animal companion has a 5...20 base damage reduction.
412.concise description: Shout. (120 seconds.) Your pet has 5...20 damage reduction.

415.name: Call of Haste
415.description: Shout. For 30 seconds, your animal companion has a 33% faster attack speed and moves 33% faster.
415.concise description: Shout. (30 seconds.) Your pet moves and attacks 33% faster.

422.name: Revive Animal
422.description: Skill. Resurrect all nearby allied animal companions. They come back to life with 10...94% Health.
422.concise description: Skill. Resurrects all nearby allied pets (10...94% Health).

423.name: Symbiotic Bond
423.description: Shout. For 120...300 seconds, your animal companion gains 1...3 Health regeneration, and half of all damage dealt to your animal companion is redirected to you.
423.concise description: Shout. (120...300 seconds.) Your pet has +1...3 Health regeneration. Half of all damage dealt to your pet is redirected to you.

424.name: Throw Dirt
424.description: Skill. Target touched foe and foes adjacent to your target become Blinded for 3...15 seconds.
424.concise description: Touch Skill. Inflicts Blindness condition (3...15 seconds). Also affects foes adjacent to target foe.

425.name: Dodge
425.description: Stance. For 5...11 seconds, you move 33% faster and have a 27...75% chance to block incoming projectiles. Dodge ends if you attack.
425.concise description: Stance. (5...11 seconds.) You move 33% faster and have 27...75% chance to block projectile attacks.

426.name: Savage Shot
426.description: Bow Attack. If Savage Shot hits, your target's action is interrupted. If that action was a spell, you strike for +13...28 damage.
426.concise description: Bow Attack. Interrupts an action. Interruption effect: deals +13...28 damage if action was a spell.

427.name: Antidote Signet
427.description: Signet. Cleanse yourself of Poison, Disease, and Blindness, and one additional condition.
427.concise description: Signet. Remove Poison, Disease, and Blindness from yourself, and one additional condition.

428.name: Incendiary Arrows
428.description: Elite Bow Attack. Shoot arrows at target foe and up to 2 foes near your target. Those foes are set on fire for 1...3 second[s].
428.concise description: Elite Bow Attack. Hits 2 foes near your target and inflicts burning (1...3 second[s]).

429.name: Melandru's Arrows
429.description: Elite Preparation. For 18 seconds, whenever your arrows hit, they cause Bleeding for 3...25 seconds, and if they hit a target who is under an enchantment, they do +8...28 damage.
429.concise description: Elite Preparation. (18 seconds.) Your arrows inflict Bleeding condition (3...25 seconds) and deal +8...28 damage to enchanted foes.

430.name: Marksman's Wager
430.description: Elite Preparation. For 18 seconds, you gain 5...10 Energy whenever your arrows hit, but lose 10 Energy whenever your arrows fail to strike.
430.concise description: Elite Preparation. (18 seconds.) Gain 5...10 Energy whenever your arrows hit.

431.name: Ignite Arrows
431.description: Preparation. For 24 seconds, your arrows explode on contact, dealing 3...18 fire damage to target and all adjacent foes.
431.concise description: Preparation. (24 seconds.) Your arrows deal 3...18 fire damage to target and foes adjacent to target.

432.name: Read the Wind
432.description: Preparation. For 24 seconds, your arrows move twice as fast and deal 3...10 extra damage.
432.concise description: Preparation. (24 seconds). +3...10 damage. Your arrows move twice as fast.

433.name: Kindle Arrows
433.description: Preparation. For 24 seconds, your arrows deal fire damage and hit for an additional 3...24 fire damage.
433.concise description: Preparation. (24 seconds.) +3...24 fire damage. Your arrows deal fire damage.

434.name: Choking Gas
434.description: Preparation. For 1...12 seconds, your arrows deal 1...8 more damage and spread Choking Gas to all adjacent foes on impact. Choking Gas interrupts foes attempting to cast spells.
434.concise description: Preparation. (1...12 seconds.) +1...8 damage. Spreads Choking Gas to foes adjacent to target. Choking Gas interrupts spells.

435.name: Apply Poison
435.description: Preparation. For 24 seconds, foes struck by your physical attacks become Poisoned for 3...15 seconds.
435.concise description: Preparation. (24 seconds.) Your physical attacks inflict Poisoned condition (3...15 seconds).

436.name: Comfort Animal
436.description: Skill. You heal your animal companion for 20...104 Health. If your companion is dead, it is resurrected with 10...58% Health. If you have Comfort Animal equipped, your animal companion will travel with you.
436.concise description: Skill. Your pet gains 20...104 Health. Resurrects your pet (10...58% Health.) If you have Comfort Animal equipped, your animal companion will travel with you.

437.name: Bestial Pounce
437.description: Pet Attack. Your animal companion attempts a Bestial Pounce that deals +5...20 damage. If the attack strikes a foe who is casting a spell, that foe is knocked down.
437.concise description: Pet Attack. Deals +5...20 damage. Causes knock-down if target foe is casting a spell.

438.name: Maiming Strike
438.description: Pet Attack. Your animal companion attempts a Maiming Strike that deals +5...20 damage. If that attack hits a moving foe that foe becomes Crippled for 3...15 seconds.
438.concise description: Pet Attack. Deals +5...20 damage. Inflicts Crippled condition (3...15 seconds) if target foe is moving.

439.name: Feral Lunge
439.description: Pet Attack. Your animal companion attempts a Feral Lunge that deals +5...35 damage. If the attack strikes a foe who is attacking, that foe suffers from Bleeding for 5...25 seconds.
439.concise description: Pet Attack. Deals +5...35 damage. Inflicts Bleeding condition if target foe is attacking (5...25 seconds).

440.name: Scavenger Strike
440.description: Pet Attack. Your animal companion attempts a Scavenger Strike that deals +10...25 damage. If the attack strikes a foe who is suffering a condition, you gain 3...15 Energy.
440.concise description: Pet Attack. Deals +10...25 damage. You gain 3...15 Energy if target foe has a condition.

441.name: Melandru's Assault
441.description: Pet Attack. Your animal companion attempts a Melandru's Assault that deals +5...20 damage to all nearby foes.
441.concise description: Pet Attack. Deals +5...20 damage to nearby foes.

442.name: Ferocious Strike
442.description: Elite Pet Attack. Your animal companion attempts a Ferocious Strike that deals +13...28 damage. If that attack hits, you gain adrenaline and 3...10 Energy.
442.concise description: Elite Pet Attack. Deals +13...28 damage. You gain adrenaline and 3...10 energy.

443.name: Predator's Pounce
443.description: Pet Attack. Your animal companion attempts a Predator's Pounce that deals +5...35 damage. If that attack hits, your animal companion gains 5...50 Health.
443.concise description: Pet Attack. Deals +5...35 damage. Your pet gains 5...50 Health if this attack hits.

444.name: Brutal Strike
444.description: Pet Attack. Your animal companion attempts a Brutal Strike that deals +5...35 damage. If that attack strikes a foe whose Health is below 50%, that foe takes an additional +5...35 damage.
444.concise description: Pet Attack. Deals +5...35 damage. Deals +5...35 more damage if target foe is under 50% health.

445.name: Disrupting Lunge
445.description: Pet Attack. Your animal companion attempts a Disrupting Lunge that deals +1...12 damage. If that attack strikes a foe using a skill that skill is interrupted and is disabled for an additional 20 seconds.
445.concise description: Pet Attack. Deals +1...12 damage. Interrupts a skill. Interruption effect: interrupted skill is disabled for +20 seconds.

446.name: Troll Unguent
446.description: Skill. For 13 seconds, you gain +3...10 Health regeneration.
446.concise description: Skill. (13 seconds.) You have +3...10 Health regeneration.

447.name: Otyugh's Cry
447.description: Shout. For 10...25 seconds, your animal companion gains +24 armor and cannot be blocked.
447.concise description: Shout. (10...25 seconds.) Your pet has +24 armor and is unblockable.

448.name: Escape
448.description: Elite Stance. For 1...8 second[s], you move 33% faster and have a 75% chance to block attacks.
448.concise description: Elite Stance. (1...8 second[s].) You move 33% faster and have 75% chance to block.

449.name: Practiced Stance
449.description: Elite Stance. For 20...35 seconds, your Preparations recharge 50% faster and last 30...150% longer.
449.concise description: Elite Stance. (20...35 seconds.) Your preparations recharge 50% faster and last 30...150% longer.

450.name: Whirling Defense
450.description: Stance. For 8...20 seconds, you have 75% chance to block attacks. Whenever you block a projectile in this way, adjacent foes take 5...11 damage.
450.concise description: Stance. (8...20 seconds.) You have 75% chance to block. Deals 5...11 damage to adjacent foes whenever you block a projectile attack.

451.name: Melandru's Resilience
451.description: Elite Stance. For 8...20 seconds, you gain +4 Health regeneration and +1 Energy regeneration for each condition and hex you are suffering.
451.concise description: Elite Stance. (8...20 seconds.) You have +4 Health regeneration and +1 Energy regeneration for each condition and hex on you.

452.name: Dryder's Defenses
452.description: Stance. For 5...11 seconds, you gain 75% chance to block attacks and 34...60 armor against elemental damage.
452.concise description: Stance. (5...11 seconds.) You have 75% chance to block and +34...60 armor against elemental damage.

453.name: Lightning Reflexes
453.description: Stance. For 5...11 seconds, you have a 75% chance to block melee and projectile attacks, and you attack 33% faster.
453.concise description: Stance. (5...11 seconds.) You attack 33% faster and have 75% chance to block.

454.name: Tiger's Fury
454.description: Stance. All your non-attack skills are disabled for 5 seconds. For 5...11 seconds, you attack 25% faster.

455.name: Storm Chaser
455.description: Stance. For 8...20 seconds, you move 25% faster, and you gain 1...5 Energy whenever you take elemental damage.
455.concise description: Stance. (8...20 seconds.) You move 25% faster and gain 1...5 Energy whenever you take elemental damage.

456.name: Serpent's Quickness
456.description: Stance. For 15...30 seconds, recharge times for your skills are reduced by 33%. Serpent's Quickness ends if your Health drops below 50%.
456.concise description: Stance. (15...30 seconds.) Your skills recharge 33% faster.

457.name: Dust Trap
457.description: Trap. When Dust Trap is triggered, every second (for 5 seconds total), all nearby foes are Blinded for 3...8 seconds and take 10...25 damage. While activating this skill, you are easily interrupted. Dust Trap ends after 90 seconds.
457.concise description: Trap. (90 seconds.) Affects nearby foes. Deals 10...25 damage every second (5 seconds). Inflicts Blindness condition (3...8 seconds) every second (5 seconds).

458.name: Barbed Trap
458.description: Trap. When Barbed Trap is triggered, all nearby foes are struck for 7...23 piercing damage, become Crippled, and begin Bleeding for 3...25 seconds. Barbed Trap ends after 90 seconds.  While activating this skill, you are easily interrupted.
458.concise description: Trap. (90 seconds.) Affects nearby foes. Deals 7...23 piercing damage. Inflicts Crippled and Bleeding conditions (3...25 seconds).

459.name: Flame Trap
459.description: Trap. When Flame Trap is triggered, every second (for 3 seconds total), all nearby foes are struck for 5...20 fire damage and set on fire for 1...3 second[s]. Flame Trap ends after 90 seconds. While activating this skill, you are easily interrupted.
459.concise description: Trap. (90 seconds.) Affects nearby foes. Deals 5...20 fire damage every second (3 seconds). Inflicts Burning condition (1...3 second[s]).

460.name: Healing Spring
460.description: Trap. For 10 seconds, all adjacent allies are healed for 15...60 every 2 seconds. While activating this skill, you are easily interrupted.
460.concise description: Trap. (10 seconds.) Affects adjacent allies. Heals for 15...60 every 2 seconds.

461.name: Spike Trap
461.description: Elite Trap. When Spike Trap is triggered, every second (for 2 seconds), all nearby foes are struck for 10...40 piercing damage, become Crippled for 3...25 seconds, and are knocked down. Spike Trap ends after 90 seconds. While activating this skill, you are easily interrupted.
461.concise description: Elite Trap. (90 seconds.) Affects nearby foes. Every second, (for 2 seconds), this trap deals 10...40 piercing damage, causes knockdown, and inflicts Crippled condition (3...25 seconds).

462.name: Winter
462.description: Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...10 spirit. For creatures within its range, all elemental damage is cold damage instead. This spirit dies after 30...150 seconds.
462.concise description: Nature Ritual. Creates a level 1...10 spirit (30...150 second lifespan). Converts elemental damage to cold damage for creatures in range. Does not affect spirits.

463.name: Winnowing
463.description: Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...10 spirit. Non-spirit creatures within range take 4 additional damage whenever they take physical damage.  This spirit dies after 30...150 seconds.
463.concise description: Nature Ritual. Creates a level 1...10 spirit (30...150 second lifespan). Increases physical damage by +4 for creatures in range. Does not affect spirits.

464.name: Edge of Extinction
464.description: Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...10 spirit. If a non-spirit creature within range dies, Edge of Extinction deals 14...50 damage to all creatures of the same type that are below 90% Health and within range of the spirit. This spirit dies after 30...150 seconds.
464.concise description: Nature Ritual. Creates a level 1...10 spirit (30...150 second lifespan). Deals 14...50 damage to creatures in its range whenever a creature of the same type dies. Does not affect spirits.

465.name: Greater Conflagration
465.description: Elite Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...10 spirit. For non-spirit creatures within its range, all physical damage is fire damage instead. This spirit dies after 30...150 seconds.
465.concise description: Elite Nature Ritual. Creates a level 1...10 spirit (30...150 second lifespan). Converts physical damage to fire damage for creatures in range. Does not affect spirits.

466.name: Conflagration
466.description: Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...10 spirit. For non-spirit creatures within its range, all arrows that hit strike for fire damage. This spirit dies after 30...150 seconds.
466.concise description: Nature Ritual. Creates a level 1...10 spirit (30...150 second lifespan). All arrows deal fire damage for creatures in range. Does not affect spirits.

467.name: Fertile Season
467.description: Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...10 spirit. Non-spirit creatures within range have +50...150 maximum Health and gain +8 armor. This spirit dies after 15...45 seconds.
467.concise description: Nature Ritual. Creates a level 1...10 spirit (15...45 second lifespan). Creatures in range have +50...150 maximum health and +8 armor. Does not affect spirits.

468.name: Symbiosis
468.description: Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...10 spirit. For each enchantment on a non-spirit creature within range, that creature has +27...150 maximum Health. This spirit dies after 30...150 seconds.
468.concise description: Nature Ritual. Creates a level 1...10 spirit (30...150 second lifespan). Creatures in range have +27...150 maximum health for each enchantment on them. Does not affect spirits.

469.name: Primal Echoes
469.description: Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...10 Spirit. For non-Spirit creatures within its range, Signets cost 10 Energy to use. This Spirit dies after 30...150 seconds.
469.concise description: Nature Ritual. Creates a level 1...10 spirit (30...150 second lifespan). Signets cost 10 energy for creatures in range. Does not affect spirits.

470.name: Predatory Season
470.description: Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...10 spirit. For non-spirit creatures within its range, all healing is reduced by 20%. If any of your attacks hit, you gain 5 Health. This spirit dies after 30...150 seconds.
470.concise description: Nature Ritual. Creates a level 1...10 spirit (30...150 second lifespan). Creatures in range receive 20% less from healing. Creatures gain 5 health each time they hit with an attack. Does not affect spirits.

471.name: Frozen Soil
471.description: Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...10 spirit. Non-spirit creatures within its range cannot activate resurrection skills. This spirit dies after 30...90 seconds.
471.concise description: Nature Ritual. Creates a level 1...10 spirit. (30...90 second lifespan). Creatures in range cannot activate resurrection skills. Does not affect spirits.

472.name: Favorable Winds
472.description: Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...10 spirit. For non-spirit creatures within its range, arrows move twice as fast and strike for +6 damage.  This spirit dies after 30...150 seconds.
472.concise description: Nature Ritual. Creates a level 1...10 spirit (30...150 second lifespan). Arrows move twice as fast and hit for +6 damage for creatures in range. Does not affect spirits.

474.name: Energizing Wind
474.description: Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...6 spirit. For non-spirit creatures within its range, all skills cost 15 less Energy (minimum cost 10 Energy), and skills recharge 25% slower. This spirit dies after 1...31 second[s].
474.concise description: Nature Ritual. Creates a level 1...6 spirit (1...31 second[s] lifespan). Skills cost 15 less energy (minimum cost 10 energy) and recharge 25% slower for creatures in range. Does not affect spirits.

475.name: Quickening Zephyr
475.description: Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...10 spirit. For non-spirit creatures within its range, all skills recharge twice as fast and cost 30% more of the base Energy to cast. This spirit dies after 15...45 seconds.
475.concise description: Nature Ritual. Creates a level 1...10 spirit (15...45 second lifespan). Skills cost 30% more Energy and recharge twice as fast for creatures in range. Does not affect spirits.

476.name: Nature's Renewal
476.description: Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...10 spirit. For 30...150 seconds, enchantments and hexes cast by non-spirit creatures in range take twice as long to cast, and it costs twice as much Energy to maintain enchantments. This spirit dies after 30...150 seconds.
476.concise description: Nature Ritual. Creates a level 1...10 spirit (30...150 second lifespan). For creatures in range, enchantments and Hexes unlike other descriptions with "hex" or "hexes" in it, it is capitalized here [sic] take twice as long to cast and it costs twice as much Energy to maintain enchantments. Does not affect spirits.

477.name: Muddy Terrain
477.description: Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...10 spirit. Non-spirit creatures within its range move 10% slower and speed boosts have no effect. This spirit dies after 30...90 seconds.
477.concise description: Nature Ritual. Creates a level 1...10 spirit (30...90 second lifespan). Creatures in range have 10% slower movement: also negates speed boosts.

503.name: Scepter of Orr's Aura
503.description: Signet. You feel the power of the Scepter. (+10 maximum Energy)
503.concise description: Signet. You feel the power of the Scepter. (+10 maximum Energy)

504.name: Scepter of Orr's Power
504.description: Signet. The power of the Scepter flows within you. (+1 Energy regeneration)
504.concise description: Signet. The power of the Scepter flows within you. (+1 Energy regeneration)

505.name: Burden Totem
505.description: Hex Spell. For 30 seconds, target foe moves 33% slower.
505.concise description: Hex Spell. (30 seconds.) Target foe moves 33% slower.

506.name: Splinter Mine
506.description: Signet. Surrounding foes begin Bleeding and are Crippled.
506.concise description: Signet. Surrounding foes are Bleeding and Crippled. [sic]

507.name: Entanglement
507.description: Signet. Surrounding foes are trapped for 4 seconds and take 20 damage.
507.concise description: Signet. Surrounding foes are trapped for 4 seconds and take 20 damage.

508.name: Dwarven Powder Keg
508.description: Signet. Surrounding foes get knocked down and are set on fire.
508.concise description: Signet. Surrounding foes are knocked-down and begin Burning.

509.name: Seed of Resurrection
509.description: Signet. Resurrect all allies within range.
509.concise description: Signet. Resurrect all allies within range.

510.name: Deafening Roar
510.description: Skill. All nearby foes become Dazed for 20 seconds.
510.concise description: Skill. Inflicts Dazed condition (20 seconds) to nearby foes.

513.name: Charm Animal
513.special: Monster <!-- only used by foe; not learnable -->
513.description: Skill. Charm target animal. Once charmed, your animal companion will travel with you whenever you have Charm Animal equipped.
513.concise description: Skill. Charm target animal. Once charmed, your animal companion will travel with you whenever you have Charm Animal equipped.

514.name: Breaking Charm
514.description: Skill. Allows any non-pet animal to break a charm attempt
514.concise description: Skill. Allows any non-pet animal to break a charm attempt

525.name: Nibble
525.description: Spell. Touch target corpse to gain 20 Health.
525.concise description: Touch Spell. Touch target corpse to gain 20 Health.

530.name: Giant Stomp
530.description: Attack. All foes within range are knocked down and take 25 damage.
530.concise description: Attack. Causes knock-down and deals 25 damage to foes in range.

531.name: Agnar's Rage
531.description: Attack. (monster only) Knock down all foes in earshot and do 25 damage to them. Gain +10 Health regeneration for 5 seconds.
531.concise description: Attack. (monster only) (5 seconds.) +10 Health regeneration. Deals 25 damage to foes in earshot and causes knock-down.

532.name: Healing Breeze
532.description: Enchantment Spell. (monster only) For 5 seconds, target ally gains +10 Health regeneration.
532.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (monster only) (5 seconds.) +10 Health regeneration.

533.name: Crystal Haze
533.description: Hex Spell. (monster only) For 30 seconds, target foe and all nearby foes suffer from -1 Energy degeneration and suffer 10 Overcast whenever they use a skill that costs Energy.
533.concise description: Hex Spell. (monster only) (30 seconds.) Also affects foes near target. Causes -1 Energy degeneration. Causes 10 Overcast whenever foes use an Energy skill.

534.name: Crystal Bonds
534.description: Hex Spell. (monster only) Remove 1 enchantment from target. For 15 seconds, target foe is encased in Crystal Bonds. Target's movement is drastically reduced and target may not be the target of enchantments.
534.concise description: Hex Spell. (monster only) Remove 1 enchantment. Target foe has reduced movement (15 seconds) and may not be the target of enchantments.

535.name: Jagged Crystal Skin
535.description: Stance. (monster only) For 10 seconds, whenever you are hit by physical damage, nearby foes take 100 damage.
535.concise description: Stance. (monster only) (10 seconds.) 100 damage to foes near you whenever you take physical damage.

536.name: Crystal Hibernation
536.description: Skill. (monster only) For 20 seconds, Gain +7 Health regeneration. Whenever you would take non-physical damage, gain an equal amount of Health instead.
536.concise description: Skill. (monster only) (20 seconds.) You gain +7 Health regeneration. Converts incoming non-physical damage to healing.

539.name: Hunger of the Lich
539.description: Attack. (monster only) If this attack hits target foe it removes one enchantment. If an enchantment is removed you gain 100 Health and 5 Energy.
539.concise description: Attack. (monster only) Removes one enchantment. Removal effect: you gain 100 Health and 5 Energy.

541.name: Life Vortex
541.description: Skill. (monster only) Steal up to 200 Health from each foe within 30 feet.
541.concise description: Skill. (monster only) Steal up to 200 Health from each foe within 30 feet.

543.name: Guardian Pacify
543.description: Spell. Guardians become pacified until attacked.
543.concise description: Spell. Guardians become pacified until attacked.

546.name: Spectral Agony
546.description: Skill. For 5 seconds, target foe moves, attacks, and uses skills up to 80% slower; suffers &#45; Health degeneration; and loses Health each second.
546.concise description: Skill. (5 seconds.) Target foe has &#45; Health degeneration; moves, attacks, and uses skills 80% slower; and loses Health each second.

558.name: Titans get plus Health regen and set enemies on fire each time he is hit.

560.name: Resurrect (Gargoyle)
560.description: Spell. Resurrect target back to life with 25% Health and zero Energy.
560.concise description: Spell. Resurrect target (25% Health and zero Energy.)

563.name: Wurm Siege
563.description: Spell. Deals damage to creatures at impact site.
563.concise description: Spell. Damages creatures at the impact site.

570.name: Mark of Insecurity
570.description: Elite Hex Spell. For 5...25 seconds, target foe suffers from 1...3 Health degeneration, and enchantments and stances on target foe expire 30...80% faster. All of your non-Assassin skills are disabled for 10 seconds.
570.concise description: Elite Hex Spell. (5...25 seconds.) Causes 1...3 Health degeneration. Enchantments and stances expire 30...80% faster on target foe.

571.name: Disrupting Dagger
571.description: Spell. Send out a Disrupting Dagger at target foe that strikes for 10...35 earth damage. If that foe was activating a skill, that skill is interrupted. This spell has half the normal range.
571.concise description: Half Range Spell. Projectile: deals 10...35 earth damage. Interrupts a skill.

572.name: Deadly Paradox
572.description: Stance. All of your attack skills are disabled for 10 seconds. For 5...15 seconds, your Assassin skills activate and recharge 33% faster.
572.concise description: Stance. (5...15 seconds.) Your Assassin skills activate and recharge 33% faster.

573.name: Teleport Players
573.description: Skill. Teleports all players to caster's location.
573.concise description: Skill. Teleports all players to caster's location.

574.name: Quest skill for Coastal Exam.
574.description: Signet. Artifact plays a glowy effect on all "chosen" and players, that's it.
574.concise description: Signet. Artifact plays a glowy effect on all "chosen" and players, that's it.

576.name: Statue's Blessing
576.description: Spell. Target character is restored to full Health and full Energy.
576.concise description: Spell. Target character is restored to full Health and full Energy.

580.name: Domain of Energy Draining
580.description: Spell. While you are in this area you suffer from Energy degeneration.
580.concise description: Spell. While you are in this area you suffer from Energy degeneration.

581.name: Domain of Elements
581.description: Spell. While you are in this area you are the target of chaotic natural forces.

582.name: Domain of Health Draining
582.description: Spell. While you are in this area you suffer from Health degeneration.
582.concise description: Spell. While you are in this area you suffer from Health degeneration.

583.name: Domain of Slow
583.description: Spell. While you are in this area your movement is slowed.
583.concise description: Spell. While you are in this area your movement is slowed.

586.name: Janthir's Gaze
586.description: Spell. Area knockdown caused by the Eye of Janthir.
586.concise description: Spell. Area knockdown caused by the Eye of Janthir.

589.name: Stormcaller
589.description: Spell. All Charr max Health reduced by 100.
589.concise description: Spell. All Charr max Health reduced by 100.

590.name: Knock
590.description: Skill. Rurik's wait to open the exit door.
590.concise description: Skill. Rurik's wait to open the exit door.

592.name: Rurik Must Live
592.description: Spell. Buff placed on Rurik that prevents him from dying for 5 minutes.

595.name: Restore Life
595.description: Spell. Touch a body of a fallen party member. Target party member is returned to life with % Health and % Energy.
595.concise description: Touch Spell. Touch a body of a fallen party member. Target party member is returned to life with % Health and % Energy.

596.name: Chimera of Intensity
596.description: Enchantment Spell. Your skills recharge 50% faster, spells you cast cost 50% less Energy, and your movement speed is increased by 50%.
596.concise description: Enchantment Spell. Your skills recharge 50% faster, spells you cast cost 50% less Energy, and your movement speed is increased by 50%.

763.name: Jaundiced Gaze
763.description: Enchantment Spell. Remove an enchantment from target foe. If an enchantment is removed, for the next 1...15 second[s], your next enchantment spell casts 0...1 second[s] faster and costs 1...10 less Energy.
763.concise description: Enchantment Spell. Removes an enchantment from target foe. Removal effect: your next enchantment casts 0...1 second[s] faster and costs 1...10 less Energy. (1...15 second[s])

764.name: Wail of Doom
764.description: Elite Hex Spell. For 1...4 second[s], all of target foe's attributes are set to 0.
764.concise description: Elite Hex Spell. (1...4 second[s].) Target foe's attributes are 0.

765.name: Hero's Insight
765.description: Party Bonus. For 10 minutes your party gains double XP from combat.
765.concise description: Party Bonus. (10 minutes.) Your party gains double XP from combat.

766.name: Gaze of Contempt
766.description: Spell. If target foe has more than 50% Health, that foe loses all enchantments.

767.name: Berserker's Insight
767.description: Party Bonus. Your party gains triple XP from combat. Berserker's Insight ends if your party fails to kill a foe for 30 seconds.
767.concise description: Party Bonus. Your party gains triple XP from combat. Ends if your party fails to kill a foe for 30 seconds.

768.name: Slayer's Insight
768.description: Party Bonus. Your party gains 250% XP from combat. Slayer's Insight ends if your party fails to kill a boss for 5 minutes.
768.concise description: Party Bonus. Your party gains 250% XP from combat. Ends if your party fails to kill a boss for 5 minutes.

769.name: Viper's Defense
769.description: Spell. All adjacent foes are Poisoned for 5...20 seconds. Shadow Step to a nearby location directly away from your target.
769.concise description: Spell. Inflict Poisoned condition (5...20 seconds) on all adjacent foes and Shadow Step to a nearby location directly away from your target.

770.name: Return
770.description: Spell. All adjacent foes are Crippled for 3...8 seconds. Shadow Step to target other ally's location.
770.concise description: Spell. Inflicts Crippled condition (3...8 seconds) on all foes adjacent to you. You Shadow Step to target ally's location.

771.name: Aura of Displacement
771.description: Elite Enchantment Spell. When you cast Aura of Displacement, Shadow Step to target foe. When you stop maintaining Aura of Displacement you return to your original location.
771.concise description: Elite Enchantment Spell. Shadow Step to target foe. End effect: return to your original location.

772.name: Generous Was Tsungrai
772.description: Item Spell. Hold Tsungrai's ashes for up to 15...60 seconds and gain +50...140 maximum Health. When you drop his ashes, you gain 100...280 Health.
772.concise description: Item Spell. (15...60 seconds.)  You have +50...140 maximum Health.  Drop effect: you gain 100...280 Health.

773.name: Mighty Was Vorizun
773.description: Item Spell. Hold Vorizun's ashes for up to 15...60 seconds. While you hold his ashes, you gain +15 armor and +30 maximum Energy.
773.concise description: Item Spell. (15...60 seconds.) You have +15 armor and +30 maximum Energy.

775.name: Death Blossom
775.description: Dual Attack. Must follow an off-hand attack. If it hits, Death Blossom strikes target foe for +20...45 damage and all adjacent foes take 20...45 damage.
775.concise description: Dual Attack. Deals +20...45 damage. Also affects foes adjacent to target foe.

776.name: Twisting Fangs
776.description: Dual Attack. Must follow an off-hand attack. If it hits, Twisting Fangs strikes for +10...20 damage and struck foe suffers from Bleeding and Deep Wound for 5...20 seconds.
776.concise description: Dual Attack. Deals +10...20 damage. Inflicts Bleeding and Deep Wound conditions (5...20 seconds).

777.name: Horns of the Ox
777.description: Dual Attack. Must follow an off-hand attack. If it hits, Horns of the Ox strikes for +1...11 damage. If struck foe is not adjacent to any allies, that foe is knocked down.
777.concise description: Dual Attack. Deals +1...11 damage. Causes knock-down if the target foe is not adjacent to any of its allies.

778.name: Falling Spider
778.description: Off-Hand Attack. Must strike a knocked-down foe. If it hits, Falling Spider strikes for +15...35 damage and target foe is Poisoned for 5...20 seconds.
778.concise description: Off-Hand Attack. Deals +15...35 damage. Inflicts Poisoned condition (5...20 seconds).

779.name: Black Lotus Strike
779.description: Lead Attack. If it hits, Black Lotus Strike strikes for +10...31 damage. If target foe is suffering from a Hex, you gain 5...13 Energy.
779.concise description: Lead Attack. Deals +10...31 damage. You gain 5...13 Energy if target foe is hexed.

780.name: Fox Fangs
780.description: Off-Hand Attack. Must follow a lead attack. Fox Fangs cannot be blocked and strikes for +10...35 damage if it hits.
780.concise description: Off-Hand Attack. Deals +10...35 damage. Unblockable. <span style="color:grey;">Must follow a lead attack.</span>

781.name: Moebius Strike
781.description: Elite Off-Hand Attack. Must follow a Dual Attack. If it hits, Moebius Strike strikes for +10...35 damage. If you strike a foe whose Health is below 50%, all your other attack skills are recharged.
781.concise description: Elite Off-Hand Attack. Deals +10...35 damage. Recharges all your other attack skills if target foe's Health is below 50%.

782.name: Jagged Strike
782.description: Lead Attack. If Jagged Strike hits, your target suffers from Bleeding for 5...20 seconds.
782.concise description: Lead Attack. Inflicts Bleeding condition (5...20 seconds).

783.name: Unsuspecting Strike
783.description: Lead Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +19...31 damage. If your target was above 90% Health you deal an additional 15...75 damage.
783.concise description: Lead Attack. Deals +19...31 damage. Deals 15...75 more damage if target foe's Health is above 90%.

784.name: Entangling Asp
784.description: Spell. Entangling Asp must follow a lead attack. Target foe is knocked down and becomes Poisoned for 5...20 seconds.
784.concise description: Spell. Causes knock-down. Inflicts Poisoned condition (5...20 seconds).

785.name: Mark of Death
785.description: Hex Spell. For 4...10 seconds, target foe gains 33% less benefit from healing.
785.concise description: Hex Spell. (4...10 seconds.) Target foe receives 33% less from healing.

786.name: Iron Palm
786.description: Skill. Target touched foe suffers 5...50 damage, and if that foe is suffering from a hex or condition that foe is knocked down. Iron Palm counts as a lead attack.
786.concise description: Touch Skill. Deals 5...50 damage. Causes knock-down if target foe is hexed or has a condition. Counts as a lead attack.

787.name: Resilient Weapon
787.description: Weapon Spell. For 3...12 seconds, target ally has a Resilient Weapon. While suffering from a hex or condition, that ally gains +1...6 Health regeneration and +24 armor.
787.concise description: Weapon Spell. (3...12 seconds.) +1...6 Health regeneration and +24 armor.

788.name: Blind Was Mingson
788.description: Item Spell. Hold Mingson's ashes for up to 15...60 seconds. When you drop his ashes, all nearby foes are Blinded for 3...8 seconds.
788.concise description: Item Spell. (15...60 seconds.) Drop effect: inflicts Blindness condition (3...8 seconds) on all nearby foes.

789.name: Grasping Was Kuurong
789.description: Elite Item Spell. Hold Kuurong's ashes for up to 15...60 seconds. When you drop his ashes, all nearby foes are struck for 15...75 damage and knocked down.
789.concise description: Elite Item Spell. (15...60 seconds.) Drop effect: deal 15...75 damage and knocks-down all nearby foes.

790.name: Vengeful Was Khanhei
790.description: Elite Item Spell. Hold Khanhei's ashes for 5...11 seconds. Whenever a foe strikes you in combat while you are holding Khanhei's ashes, you steal 5...35 Health from that foe.
790.concise description: Elite Item Spell. (5...11 seconds.) You steal 5...35 Health from every foe that hits you with an attack.

791.name: Flesh of My Flesh
791.description: Spell. Lose half your Health. Resurrect target party member with your current Health and 5...20% Energy.
791.concise description: Spell. Resurrect target party member (half your current Health and 5...20% Energy).

792.name: Splinter Weapon
792.description: Weapon Spell. For 20 seconds, target ally has a Splinter Weapon. Target ally's next 1...5 attack[s] deal 5...50 damage to up to 4 adjacent foes.
792.concise description: Weapon Spell. (20 seconds.) Attacks deal 5...50 damage to 3 [sic] adjacent foes.

793.name: Weapon of Warding
793.description: Weapon Spell. For 3...8 seconds, target ally has a Weapon of Warding that grants target ally +2...4 Health regeneration and a 50% chance to block.
793.concise description: Weapon Spell. (3...8 seconds.) +2...4 Health regeneration. 50% chance to block.

794.name: Wailing Weapon
794.description: Weapon Spell. For 3...9 seconds, target ally has a Wailing Weapon. Whenever the Wailing Weapon strikes an attacking foe, that foe is interrupted.
794.concise description: Weapon Spell. (3...9 seconds.) Attacks interrupt attacking foes.

795.name: Nightmare Weapon
795.description: Weapon Spell. For 12 seconds, target ally has a Nightmare Weapon. Target ally's next 3 attacks are reduced by 10...50 damage and steal up to 10...50 Health.
795.concise description: Weapon Spell. (12 seconds.) Target ally's attacks steal 10...50 Health but deal 10...50 less damage.

799.name: Beguiling Haze
799.description: Elite Spell. Shadow Step to target foe. That foe becomes Dazed for 3...9 seconds.
799.concise description: Elite Spell. You Shadow Step to this foe. Inflicts Dazed condition (3...9 seconds).

800.name: Enduring Toxin
800.description: Hex Spell. For 5 seconds, target foe suffers 1...5 Health degeneration. If that foe is moving when Enduring Toxin would end, Enduring Toxin is renewed for another 5 seconds.
800.concise description: Hex Spell. (5 seconds.) Causes 1...5 Health degeneration. Renewal: if the target foe is moving when this hex ends.

801.name: Shroud of Silence
801.description: Elite Hex Spell. All of your spells are disabled for 15 seconds. For 1...3 second[s], target touched foe cannot cast spells.
801.concise description: Elite Touch Hex Spell. (1...3 second[s].) Target foe cannot cast spells.

802.name: Expose Defenses
802.description: Hex Spell. For 1...11 second[s], target foe cannot block your attacks.
802.concise description: Hex Spell. (1...11 second[s].) Target foe cannot block your attacks.

803.name: Power Leech
803.description: Elite Hex Spell. If target foe is casting a spell or chant, that skill is interrupted and for 10 seconds, whenever that foe casts a spell, you steal up to 5...15 Energy from that foe.
803.concise description: Elite Hex Spell. Interrupt a spell or a chant. Interruption effect: steal 5...15 Energy whenever target foe casts a spell (10 seconds).

804.name: Arcane Languor
804.description: Elite Hex Spell. For 1...10 second[s], all spells cast by the target foe cause 10 Overcast.
804.concise description: Elite Hex Spell. (1...10 second[s].) Target foe's spells cause 10 Overcast.

805.name: Animate Vampiric Horror
805.description: Spell. Exploit nearest corpse to animate a level 1...17 Vampiric Horror. Whenever a Vampiric Horror you control deals damage, you gain the same amount of Health.
805.concise description: Spell. Creates a level 1...17 vampiric horror. You gain Health equal to the damage it deals.

806.name: Cultist's Fervor
806.description: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 5 seconds and 3 seconds longer for every rank of Soul Reaping, your Necromancer spells cost 1...6 Energy to cast but you suffer from Bleeding for 10 seconds each time you cast a Necromancer spell.
806.concise description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (5 seconds plus 3 seconds more for every rank of Soul Reaping.) Your Necromancer spells cost 1...6 less Energy.

808.name: Reaper's Mark
808.description: Elite Hex Spell. For 30 seconds, target foe suffers 1...5 Health degeneration. If that foe dies while hexed with Reaper's Mark, you gain 5...15 Energy.
808.concise description: Elite Hex Spell. (30 seconds.) Causes 1...5 Health degeneration. You gain 5...15 Energy if target foe dies while suffering from this hex.

809.name: Shatterstone
809.description: Elite Hex Spell. Target foe is struck for 25...100 cold damage and is hexed with Shatterstone for 3 seconds. When Shatterstone ends, that foe and all nearby foes are struck for 25...100 cold damage.
809.concise description: Elite Hex Spell. (3 seconds.) Initial effect: deals 25...100 cold damage. End effect: deals 25...100 cold damage to target and all nearby foes.

810.name: Protector's Defense
810.description: Skill. For 5...11 seconds, allies adjacent to you have a 75% chance to block incoming attacks. Protector's Defense ends if you move.
810.concise description: Skill. (5...11 seconds.) Allies adjacent to you have 75% chance to block.

811.name: Run as One
811.description: Stance. For 5...15 seconds, you and your pet run 25% faster.
811.concise description: Stance. (5...15 seconds.) You and your pet move 25% faster.

812.name: Defiant Was Xinrae
812.description: Elite Item Spell. Hold Xinrae's ashes for up to 15...60 seconds. While you hold her ashes, you cannot lose more than 20% of your max Health from a single hit. When you drop her ashes, you steal 5...50 Health from all nearby foes.
812.concise description: Elite Item Spell. (15...60 seconds.) You cannot lose more than 20% of your max Health from a single hit. Drop effect: steal 5...50 Health from nearby foes.

813.name: Lyssa's Aura
813.description: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 10 seconds, you have +0...5 Energy regeneration. This enchantment reapplies itself every time you cast a spell on a foe.
813.concise description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (10 seconds.) You have +0...5 Energy regeneration. Renewal: every time you cast a spell on an enemy.

814.name: Shadow Refuge
814.description: Enchantment Spell. For 6 seconds, you gain 5...10 Health regeneration. When Shadow Refuge ends, you gain 40...100 Health if you are attacking.
814.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (6 seconds.) You have +5...10 Health regeneration. End effect: heals you for 40...100 if you are attacking.

815.name: Scorpion Wire
815.description: Hex Spell. For 8...20 seconds, the next time you and target foe are more than 100' apart, you Shadow Step to that foe and that foe is knocked down. This spell has half the normal range.
815.concise description: Half Range Hex Spell. (8...20 seconds.) Shadow Step to target foe and cause knock-down the next time this foe is more than 100' away from you.

816.name: Mirrored Stance
