816.description: Hex Spell. For 10...35 seconds, whenever target foe enters a stance, you enter the same stance.
816.concise description: Hex Spell. (10...35 seconds.) You enter any stance used by target foe.

817.name: Discord
817.description: Elite Spell. If target foe is suffering from a condition and under the effects of a hex or an enchantment, that foe suffers 30...110 damage.

818.name: Well of Weariness
818.description: Well Spell. Exploit target corpse to create a Well of Weariness for 10...55 seconds. Enemies within the Well of Weariness suffer -1 Energy degeneration.
818.concise description: Well Spell. (10...55 seconds.) Foes in this well have -1 Energy degeneration.

819.name: Vampiric Spirit
819.description: Elite Enchantment Spell. Steal up to 5...50 Health from target foe. For 10 seconds, you have +5...10 Health regeneration.
819.concise description: Elite Enchantment Spell. Steal 5...50 Health from target foe. You have +5...10 Health regeneration (10 seconds).

820.name: Depravity
820.description: Elite Hex Spell. For 5...20 seconds, whenever target foe casts a spell, that foe and one nearby foe lose 1...5 Energy.
820.concise description: Elite Hex Spell. (5...20 seconds.) Causes 1...5 Energy loss whenever target foe casts a spell. One foe near your target also loses Energy.

821.name: Icy Veins
821.description: Elite Hex Spell. Target foe is struck for 10...90 cold damage. For 10...35 seconds, if target foe dies all nearby foes are struck for 20...110 cold damage.
821.concise description: Elite Hex Spell. (10...35 seconds.) Deals 20...110 cold damage to nearby foes if target foe dies. Initial effect: deals 10...90 cold damage.

822.name: Weaken Knees
822.description: Elite Hex Spell. For 1...16 second[s], target foe suffers 1...4 Health degeneration and takes 5...10 damage while moving.
822.concise description: Elite Hex Spell. (1...16 second[s].) Target foe has 1...4 Health degeneration and takes 5...10 damage while moving.

823.name: Burning Speed
823.description: Enchantment Spell. For 7 seconds, you are set on fire and move 30...45% faster. When Burning Speed ends, all adjacent foes are set on fire for 3...9 seconds.
823.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (7 seconds.) You move 30...45% faster. End effect: inflicts Burning condition (3...9 seconds) on adjacent foes.

824.name: Lava Arrows
824.description: Spell. Lava Arrows fly toward up to 3 foes near your target and strike for 20...65 fire damage if they hit.
824.concise description: Spell. Projectile: deals 20...65 fire damage. Bonus effect: sends projectiles at 2 other foes near your target.

825.name: Bed of Coals
825.description: Spell. Create a Bed of Coals at target foe's location. For 5 seconds, foes adjacent to target foe are struck for 5...29 fire damage each second. Any foe knocked down on the Bed of Coals is set on fire for 3...7 seconds.
825.concise description: Spell. Deals 5...29 fire damage each second (5 seconds) to location of target foe. Hits foes adjacent to your target. Inflicts Burning condition (3...7 seconds) on knocked down foes.

826.name: Shadow Form
826.description: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 5...21 seconds, you cannot be the target of enemy spells, and you gain 5 damage reduction for each Assassin enchantment on you. You cannot deal more than 5...25 damage with a single skill or attack.
826.concise description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (5...21 seconds.) Enemy spells cannot target you. Gain 5 damage reduction for each Assassin enchantment on you.

827.name: Siphon Strength
827.description: Elite Hex Spell. For 5...20 seconds, target foe deals 5...50 less damage with attacks and all of your attacks against that foe have an additional 33% chance of being a critical hit.
827.concise description: Elite Hex Spell. (5...20 seconds.) Target foe deals 5...50 attack damage. You have +33% chance to land a critical hit on this foe.

828.name: Vile Miasma
828.description: Hex Spell. Target foe is struck for 10...65 cold damage. If suffering from a condition, that foe is hexed with Vile Miasma and suffers 1...5 Health degeneration for 10 seconds.
828.concise description: Hex Spell. Causes 1...5 Health degeneration (10 seconds). Initial effect: deals 10...65 cold damage.

830.name: Ray of Judgment
830.description: Elite Spell. Invoke a Ray of Judgment at target foe's location. For 5 seconds, target foe and all foes adjacent to this location take 5...45 holy damage each second and begin Burning for 1...3 second[s].
830.concise description: Elite Spell. Deals 5...45 holy damage and inflicts Burning (1...3 second[s]) every second (5 seconds). Hits foes adjacent to target's initial location.

831.name: Primal Rage
831.description: Elite Stance. For 1...15 second[s], you attack 33% faster and move 25% faster, but you take double damage.
831.concise description: Elite Stance. (1...15 second[s].) You attack 33% faster and move 25% faster.

832.name: Animate Flesh Golem
832.description: Elite Spell. Exploit nearest corpse to animate a level 3...25 Flesh Golem. The Flesh Golem leaves an exploitable corpse. You can have only one Flesh Golem at a time.
832.concise description: Elite Spell. Creates a level 3...25 flesh golem which leaves a fresh corpse when it dies.

834.name: Reckless Haste
834.description: Hex Spell. For 6...12 seconds, target foe and all adjacent foes are hexed with Reckless Haste. While hexed, they attack 25% faster but have a 50% chance to miss with attacks.
834.concise description: Hex Spell. Also hexes foes adjacent to your target (6...12 seconds). These foes have 50% chance to miss, but attack 25% faster.

835.name: Blood Bond
835.description: Hex Spell. For 3...12 seconds, target foe and all adjacent foes are hexed with Blood Bond. Whenever an ally hits one of them with an attack, that ally gains 5...20 Health. If one of these foes dies while hexed, all allies adjacent to that foe are healed for 20...100 Health.
835.concise description: Hex Spell. Also hexes foes adjacent to your target (3...12 seconds). Allies hitting these foes gain 5...20 health. If any of these foes dies while hexed, adjacent allies are healed for 20...100.

836.name: Ride the Lightning
836.description: Elite Spell. You Ride the Lightning to target. All adjacent foes are Blinded for 1...5 second[s]. If your target is a foe, it is struck for 10...70 lightning damage. This spell has 25% armor penetration.
836.concise description: Elite Spell. Deals 10...70 lightning damage. 25% armor penetration. Blinds all adjacent foes (1...5 second[s]). You instantly move to your target. May target allies.

837.name: Energy Boon
837.description: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 36...60 seconds, Energy Boon raises the maximum Health of you and target ally by 1...3 for each point of your respective maximum Energy. When this enchantment is first applied, you and your target gain 1...12 Energy.  You gain an additional 1 Energy for every 2 points you have in Energy Storage.
837.concise description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (36...60 seconds.) Maximum Health for you and target ally is increased by 1...3 for each point of maximum Energy. Initial effect: Both gain 1...12 Energy.  You gain +1 Energy for every 2 points of Energy Storage.

838.name: Dwayna's Sorrow
838.description: Enchantment Spell. For 30 seconds, target ally and all nearby allies are enchanted with Dwayna's Sorrow. If an ally dies while under the effects of Dwayna's Sorrow, your party is healed for 5...50.
838.concise description: Enchantment Spell. Enchants allies near your target (30 seconds). Your party is healed for 5...50 whenever one of these allies dies.

839.name: "Retreat!"
839.description: Shout. If there are any dead allies within earshot, your party moves 33% faster for 5...11 seconds.
839.concise description: Shout. (5...11 seconds.) Party members in earshot move 33% faster.

840.name: Poisoned Heart
840.description: Spell. You and all adjacent foes are Poisoned for 5...15 seconds.
840.concise description: Spell. Inflicts Poisoned condition (5...15 seconds) to adjacent foes.

841.name: Fetid Ground
841.description: Spell. Target foe is struck for 15...65 cold damage. If that foe is knocked down, that foe becomes Poisoned for 5...20 seconds.
841.concise description: Spell. Deals 15...65 cold damage. Inflicts Poisoned condition (5...20 seconds) if target foe is knocked-down.

842.name: Arc Lightning
842.description: Spell. Target foe is struck for 5...40 lightning damage. If you are Overcast, two foes near your target are struck for 15...85 lightning damage. Damage from Arc Lightning has 25% armor penetration.
842.concise description: Spell. Deals 5...40 lightning damage. Deals 15...85 lightning damage to two nearby foes if you are Overcast. 25% armor penetration.

843.name: Gust
843.description: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 5...11 seconds, both you and target ally move 33% faster. When you cast this spell, all foes near you and your target take 15...70 cold damage. Foes struck by Gust while attacking or moving are knocked down.
843.concise description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (5...11 seconds.) You and target ally move 33% faster. Initial effect: Foes near you and target ally are struck for 15...70 cold damage. Attacking or moving foes are knocked down.

844.name: Churning Earth
844.description: Spell. Create Churning Earth at target foe's location. For the next 5 seconds, Churning Earth strikes foes near that location for 10...40 earth damage each second. Any foe moving faster than normal when struck by Churning Earth is knocked down.
844.concise description: Spell. Deals 10...40 earth damage each second (5 seconds). Hits foes near target's initial location. Causes knock-down to foes moving faster than normal.

845.name: Liquid Flame
845.description: Spell. Target foe is struck for 7...112 fire damage. If that foe is attacking or casting a spell, nearby foes are also struck for 7...112 fire damage.
845.concise description: Spell. Deals 7...112 fire damage. Deals 7...112 fire damage to nearby foes if target was attacking or casting.

846.name: Steam
846.description: Spell. Target foe is struck for 20...60 cold damage. If target foe is on fire, Steam Blinds that foe for 5...10 seconds.
846.concise description: Spell. Deals 20...60 cold damage. Inflicts Blindness condition (5...10 seconds) if target foe is Burning.

847.name: Boon Signet
847.description: Elite Signet. Heal target ally for 20...80 Health. Your next Healing or Protection Prayer [sic] spell that targets an ally heals for an additional 20...80 Health.
847.concise description: Elite Signet. Heals for 20...80. Your next Healing or Protection Prayer [sic] spell that targets an ally heals for +20...80 Health.

848.name: Reverse Hex
848.description: Enchantment Spell. Remove one hex from target ally. If a hex was removed in this way, for 5...10 seconds, the next time target ally would take damage, that damage is reduced by 5...50.
848.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (5...10 seconds.) Removes one hex from target ally. The next damage this ally takes is reduced by 5...50.

849.name: Lacerating Chop
849.description: Axe Attack. If Lacerating Chop hits, you deal +5...20 damage. If it strikes a knocked down foe your target suffers from Bleeding for 5...20 seconds.
849.concise description: Axe Attack. Deals +5...20 damage. Inflicts Bleeding condition (5...20 seconds) if target foe is knocked-down.

850.name: Fierce Blow
850.description: Hammer Attack. If Fierce Blow hits, you strike for +5...20 damage. If target foe was [sic] suffering from Weakness, that foe also suffers from a Deep Wound for 1...8 second[s].
850.concise description: Hammer Attack. Deals +5...20 damage. Inflicts Deep Wound (1...8 second[s]) if target foe is Weakened.

851.name: Sun and Moon Slash
851.description: Sword Attack. Attack target foe twice. These attacks cannot be blocked.
851.concise description: Sword Attack. You attack target foe twice. Unblockable.

852.name: Splinter Shot
852.description: Bow Attack. If Splinter Shot hits, you deal +3...15 damage. If Splinter Shot is blocked, all foes adjacent to your target take 5...65 damage.
852.concise description: Bow Attack. Deals +3...15 damage. Deals 5...65 damage to adjacent foes if blocked.

853.name: Melandru's Shot
853.description: Elite Bow Attack. If Melandru's Shot hits, your target begins Bleeding for 5...25 seconds. If it hits a foe that is moving or knocked down, that foe takes +10...25 damage and is Crippled for 5...15 seconds.
853.concise description: Elite Bow Attack. Inflicts Bleeding (5...25 seconds). Deals +10...25 damage and inflicts Crippled (5...15 seconds) if target foe was moving or knocked down.

854.name: Snare
854.description: Trap. When Snare is triggered, all nearby foes become Crippled for 3...15 seconds. Snare ends after 90 seconds. While activating this skill, you are easily interrupted.
854.concise description: Trap. (90 seconds.) Affects nearby foes. Inflicts Crippled condition (3...15 seconds).

856.name: "Kilroy Stonekin"
856.description: Shout. Your skills recharge 50% faster, your spells cost 50% less Energy, your movement speed is increased by 50%. When cast, this skill removes all Hexes on allies in the area.
856.concise description: Shout. Initial effect: removes all hexes from allies in the area. Your skills recharge 50% faster, your spells cost 50% less Energy, and you move 50% faster.

857.name: Adventurer's Insight
857.description: Party Bonus. For 10 minutes your party gains +50% XP from combat.
857.concise description: Party Bonus. (10 minutes.) Your party gains +50% XP from combat.

858.name: Dancing Daggers
858.description: Spell. Send out three Dancing Daggers at target foe, each striking for 5...35 earth damage if they hit. Dancing Daggers has half the normal range. This skill counts as a lead attack.
858.concise description: Half Range Spell. Three projectiles: each deals 5...35 earth damage. Counts as a lead attack.

859.name: Conjure Nightmare
859.description: Hex Spell. For 2...16 seconds, target foe suffers -8 Health degeneration.
859.concise description: Hex Spell. (2...16 seconds.) Causes -8 Health degeneration.

860.name: Signet of Disruption
860.description: Signet. If target foe is casting a spell, the spell is interrupted and that foe suffers 10...51 damage. If that foe is hexed, Signet of Disruption can interrupt any non-spell skills.
860.concise description: Signet. Interrupts a spell. Can interrupt any skill if target foe is hexed. Interruption effect: deals 10...51 damage.

862.name: Ravenous Gaze
862.description: Elite Spell. Deal 15...30 damage and steal 15...30 Health from target foe and all nearby foes.
862.concise description: Elite Spell. Deals 15...30 damage and steals 15...30 Health from target and nearby foes.

863.name: Order of Apostasy
863.description: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 5 seconds, whenever a party member hits a foe with physical damage, that foe loses one enchantment. For each Monk enchantment removed, you lose 25...15% maximum Health.
863.concise description: Elite Enchantment Spell. Enchants all party members (5 seconds). These party members remove one enchantment when they deal physical damage.

864.name: Oppressive Gaze
864.description: Spell. Target foe and adjacent foes take 10...30 shadow damage. Foes already suffering from a condition are Poisoned and Weakened for 3...12 seconds.
864.concise description: Spell. Deals 10...30 damage to target and adjacent foes. Inflicts Poison and Weakness (3...12 second) on foes suffering from a condition.

865.name: Lightning Hammer
865.description: Spell. Target foe is struck for 10...100 lightning damage and applies [sic] Cracked Armor for 5...20 seconds. Lightning Hammer has 25% armor penetration.
865.concise description: Spell. Deals 10...100 lightning damage. Applies Cracked Armor (5...20 seconds). 25% armor penetration.

866.name: Vapor Blade
866.description: Spell. Target foe is struck for 15...135 cold damage. Vapor Blade deals half damage if that foe has any enchantments on them.
866.concise description: Spell. Deals 15...135 cold damage. Half damage if target foe is enchanted.

867.name: Healing Light
867.description: Elite Spell. Heal target ally for 40...100 Health. If your target has an enchantment, you gain 1...3 Energy.
867.concise description: Elite Spell. Heals for 40...100. You gain 1...3 Energy if target ally is enchanted.

869.name: "Coward!"
869.description: Elite Shout. If target foe is moving, that foe is knocked down.
869.concise description: Elite Shout. Causes knock-down if target foe is moving.

870.name: Pestilence
870.description: Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...10 spirit. When any creature within its range dies, conditions on that creature spread to any creature in the area already suffering from a condition. This spirit dies after 30...90 seconds.
870.concise description: Nature Ritual. Creates a level 1...10 spirit (30...90 second lifespan). When any creature in range dies, conditions on this creature spread to any creature in the area with a condition. Spirits are not affected.

871.name: Shadowsong
871.description: Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...10 spirit. The spirit's attacks deal 5...20 damage and cause Blindness for 1...6 second[s]. This spirit dies after 30 second[s].
871.concise description: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...10 spirit (30-second lifespan).  Its attacks deal 5...20 damage and inflict Blindness condition (1...6 second[s]).

872.name: Shadowsong
872.description: Ranged Attack. Target foe takes 5...20 damage and suffers from Blindness for 1...6 seconds.
872.concise description: Ranged Attack. Deals 5...20 damage. Inflict Blindness condition (1...6 seconds).

873.name: Resurrect
873.description: Spell. Resurrect target party member. Target party member is returned to life with 25% Health and zero Energy.
873.concise description: Spell. Resurrect target (25% Health and zero Energy.) The period is before the bracket instead of after. [sic]

874.name: Consuming Flames
874.description: Melee Attack. Remove one enchantment from target touched foe. Do 400 fire damage split evenly among target foe and adjacent foes, gain life equal to the damage you did to one target.
874.concise description: Melee Attack. Remove one enchantment. Deals 400 fire damage split evenly among target and adjacent foes; you gain life equal to damage done to one target.

875.name: Chains of Enslavement
875.description: As long as this spell remains in effect, magical shackles bind you as a slave to the Stone Summit.
875.concise description: As long as this spell remains in effect, magical shackles bind you as a slave to the Stone Summit.

876.name: Signet of Shadows
876.description: Signet. Target foe takes 5...35 damage. If your target was Blinded, that foe suffers an additional 15...60 damage.
876.concise description: Signet. Deals 5...35 damage. Deals 15...60 more damage if target foe is Blinded.

877.name: Lyssa's Balance
877.description: Spell. Target foe loses one Enchantment. If you have more Enchantments than target foe, this skill has no effect.
877.concise description: Spell. Removes one enchantment from target foe.

878.name: Visions of Regret
878.description: Elite Hex Spell. For 10 seconds, target foe and adjacent foes take 15...45 damage whenever they use a skill and 5...50 additional damage if not under the effects of another Mesmer hex.
878.concise description: Elite Hex Spell. Also hexes foes adjacent to target (10 seconds). These foes take 15...45 damage whenever they use a skill and 5...50 additional damage if not under the effects of another Mesmer hex.

879.name: Illusion of Pain
879.description: Hex Spell. For 8 seconds, target foe has 3...10 Health degeneration and takes 3...10 damage each second. When Illusion of Pain ends, that foe is healed for 36...120.
879.concise description: Hex Spell. (8 seconds.) Causes 3...10 Health degeneration and target foe takes 3...10 damage each second. End effect: that foe is healed for 36...120.

880.name: Stolen Speed
880.description: Elite Hex Spell. For 1...10 seconds, spells cast by the target foe and all adjacent foes take 100% longer to cast. Spells targeting these foes that are cast by you or your allies take 50% less time to cast.
880.concise description: Elite Hex Spell. Also hexes adjacent foes (1...10 seconds). Doubles spell casting time. Spells cast by you or your allies have -50% casting times.

881.name: Ether Signet
881.description: Signet. If you have less than 5...10 Energy, gain 10...20 Energy.

882.name: Signet of Disenchantment
882.description: Signet. Lose all Energy. Target foe loses one enchantment.

883.name: Vocal Minority
883.description: Hex Spell. For 5...20 seconds, target foe and all nearby foes cannot use shouts or chants.
883.concise description: Hex Spell. Also hexes foes near target (5...20 seconds). These foes cannot use shouts or chants.

884.name: Searing Flames
884.description: Elite Spell. Target foe and all nearby foes are struck with Searing Flames. Foes already on fire when this skill is cast are struck for 10...100 fire damage. Foes not already on fire begin Burning for 1...7 seconds.
884.concise description: Elite Spell. Hits foes near your target. Deals 10...100 fire damage to foes already Burning. Inflicts Burning condition (1...7 seconds) to foes not Burning.

885.name: Shield Guardian
885.description: Enchantment Spell. For 1...4 seconds, all party members in earshot have a 75% chance to block incoming attacks. If an attack is blocked, all allies in earshot are healed for 10...40 and Shield Guardian ends.
885.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (1...4 second[s]). Party members in earshot have a 75% chance to block attacks. Block effect: Allies in earshot are healed for 10...40, and Shield Guardian ends.

886.name: Restful Breeze
886.description: Enchantment Spell. For 8...18 seconds, target ally has +10 Health regeneration. This enchantment ends if that ally attacks or uses a skill.

887.name: Signet of Rejuvenation
887.description: Signet. Heal target ally for 15...75. If target ally is casting a spell or attacking, that ally is healed for an additional 15...75 Health.
887.concise description: Signet. Heals for 15...75. Heals for 15...75 more if target ally is casting a spell or attacking.

888.name: Whirling Axe
888.description: Elite Axe Attack. If Whirling Axe hits, you strike for +5...20 damage and any stance being used by your target ends. This attack cannot be blocked.
888.concise description: Elite Axe Attack. Deals +5...20 damage and removes a stance. Unblockable.

889.name: Forceful Blow
889.description: Elite Hammer Attack. If Forceful Blow hits, you strike for +10...30 damage and any stance being used by target foe ends. Target foe suffers from Weakness for 5...20 seconds. This attack cannot be blocked.
889.concise description: Elite Hammer Attack. Deals +10...30 damage. Remove target foe's stance. Inflicts Weakness condition (5...20 seconds). Unblockable.

891.name: "None Shall Pass!"
891.description: Shout. All nearby foes that are moving are knocked down. This skill recharges 1...8 second[s] faster for each foe knocked down (maximum 25 seconds).
891.concise description: Shout. Knocks down all nearby moving foes. Recharges 1...8 second[s] faster for each affected foe (maximum 25 seconds).

892.name: Quivering Blade
892.description: Elite Sword Attack. If Quivering Blade hits, you strike for +10...40 damage. If this attack hits a moving foe, that foe is Dazed for 5 seconds.
892.concise description: Elite Sword Attack. Deals +10...40 damage. Inflicts Dazed condition (5 seconds) if target foe was moving.

893.name: Seeking Arrows
893.description: Preparation. For 3...14 seconds, your arrows cannot be blocked. Seeking Arrows ends if you fail to hit.
893.concise description: Preparation. (3...14 seconds.) Your arrows are unblockable.

894.name: Rampager's Insight
894.description: Party Bonus. Your party gains double XP from combat. Rampager's Insight ends if your party fails to kill a foe for 30 seconds.
894.concise description: Party Bonus. Your party gains double XP from combat. Ends if your party fails to kill a foe for 30 seconds.

895.name: Hunter's Insight
895.description: Party Bonus. Your party gains 175% XP from combat. Hunter's Insight ends if your party fails to kill a boss for 5 minutes.
895.concise description: Party Bonus. Your party gains 175% XP from combat. Ends if your party fails to kill a boss for 5 minutes.

897.name: Oath of Healing
897.description: Spell. (monster only) Heal your Guild Lord for 200 Health.
897.concise description: Spell. (monster only) Heal Guild Lord for 200.

898.name: Overload
898.description: Hex Spell. For 5 seconds, target foe suffers 1...3 Health degeneration. If target foe is using a skill, then Overload deals 15...75 damage to that foe and all adjacent foes.
898.concise description: Hex Spell. (5 seconds.) Causes 1...3 Health degeneration. If target foe is using a skill, that foe and all adjacent foes take 15...75 damage.

899.name: Images of Remorse
899.description: Hex Spell. For 5...10 seconds, target foe suffers 1...3 Health degeneration. If that foe was attacking, that foe takes 10...52 damage.
899.concise description: Hex Spell. (5...10 seconds.) Causes 1...3 Health degeneration. Initial effect: 10...52 damage if target foe is attacking.

900.name: Shared Burden
900.description: Elite Hex Spell. For 5...20 seconds, target foe and all nearby foes attack, cast spells, and move 50% slower.
900.concise description: Elite Hex Spell. Also hexes foes near your target (5...20 seconds). These foes attack, cast spells, and move 50% slower.

901.name: Soul Bind
901.description: Elite Hex Spell. For 30 seconds, every time target foe is healed, the healer takes 20...80 damage. This hex ends if target is suffering from a Smiting Prayers hex.
901.concise description: Elite Hex Spell. (30 seconds.) Every time target foe is healed, the healer takes 20...80 damage.

902.name: Blood of the Aggressor
902.description: Spell. Steal up to 5...45 Health from target foe. If that foe was attacking, that foe suffers Weakness for 3...12 seconds.
902.concise description: Spell. Steal 5...45 Health. Inflicts Weakness (3...12 seconds) if target foe was attacking.

903.name: Icy Prism
903.description: Spell. Target foe is struck for 15...75 cold damage. If that foe has a Water Magic hex, Icy Prism deals +The "+" is inconsistent with other skill descriptions. In this case, the additional damage is dealt to nearby foes, and not to the target [sic]15...75 cold damage to all other nearby foes.
903.concise description: Spell. Deals 15...75 cold damage. Deals +The "+" is inconsistent with other skill descriptions. In this case, the additional damage is dealt to nearby foes, and not to the target [sic]15...75 cold damage to other nearby foes if target has a Water Magic hex.

904.name: Furious Axe
904.description: Axe Attack. If Furious Axe hits, you strike for +5...35 damage. If it is blocked you gain 3 strikes worth of adrenaline.
904.concise description: Axe Attack. Deals +5...35 damage. Gives you 3 strikes of adrenaline if blocked.

905.name: Auspicious Blow
905.description: Hammer Attack. If Auspicious Blow hits, you strike for +5...20 damage and gain 3...8 Energy. If target foe is suffering from Weakness, this attack is unblockable.
905.concise description: Hammer Attack. Deals +5...20 damage and you gain 3...8 Energy. Unblockable if target foe is Weakened.

906.name: "On Your Knees!"
906.description: Shout. Lose all adrenaline. If any adjacent foes are knocked down, all of your stances are recharged.
906.concise description: Shout. Recharges all your stances if you are adjacent to a knocked-down foe.

907.name: Dragon Slash
907.description: Elite Sword Attack. If Dragon Slash hits, you strike for +10...40 damage and gain 1...5 strike[s] of adrenaline.
907.concise description: Elite Sword Attack. Deals +10...40 damage. You gain 1...5 strike[s] of adrenaline if it hits.

908.name: Marauder's Shot
908.description: Bow Attack. If Marauder's Shot hits, you strike for +10...35 damage and all your non-attack skills are disabled for 10 seconds.

909.name: Focused Shot
909.description: Bow Attack. If Focused Shot hits, you strike for +10...25 damage but all of your other attack skills are disabled for 5...3 seconds.

910.name: Spirit Rift
910.description: Spell. Open a Spirit Rift at target foe's location. After 3 seconds, all adjacent foes are struck for 25...125 lightning damage and suffer from Cracked Armor for 1...20 second[s].
910.concise description: Spell. After 3 seconds, affects foes adjacent to target's initial location. Deals 25...125 lightning damage and inflicts Cracked Armor (1...20 second[s]).

911.name: Union
911.description: Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...12 spirit. Whenever a non-spirit ally in its range takes damage or life steal, it is reduced by 15 and the spirit takes 15 damage. This spirit dies after 30...60 seconds.
911.concise description: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...12 spirit (30...60 second lifespan). Whenever a non-spirit ally within range takes damage or life steal, it is reduced by 15 and the spirit takes 15 damage.

913.name: Tranquil Was Tanasen
913.description: Elite Item Spell. Hold Tanasen's ashes for up to 5...20 seconds. While you hold his ashes, you have +10...25 armor and cannot be interrupted.
913.concise description: Elite Item Spell. (5...20 seconds.) You have +10...25 armor. You cannot be interrupted.

914.name: Consume Soul
914.description: Elite Spell. You steal 5...60 Health from target foe. All hostile summoned creatures in the area of that foe take 25...125 damage.
914.concise description: Elite Spell. Steals 5...60 Health. Deal 25...125 damage to hostile summoned creatures in the area of target foe.

915.name: Spirit Light
915.description: Spell. Target ally is healed for 60...180. If any spirits are within earshot, you don't sacrifice Health.
915.concise description: Spell. Heals for 60...180. You don't sacrifice Health if you are within earshot of any spirits.

916.name: Lamentation
916.description: Hex Spell. For 5...20 seconds, target foe and all nearby foes suffer 0...3 Health degeneration. When this hex is applied, these foes take 10...50 damage if you are within earshot of a spirit or corpse.
916.concise description: Hex Spell. Also hexes foes near your target (5...20 seconds). Causes 0...3 Health degeneration. Initial effect: Deals 10...50 damage to these foes if you are within earshot of a spirit or corpse.

917.name: Rupture Soul
917.description: Spell. Target allied spirit is destroyed. All nearby enemies are struck for 50...140 lightning damage and become blinded for 3...12 seconds.
917.concise description: Spell. Destroys target allied spirit. Deals 50...140 lightning damage and inflicts Blindness condition (3...12 seconds) to nearby foes.

918.name: Spirit to Flesh
918.description: Spell. Target touched allied spirit is destroyed. All nearby allies are healed for 30...240.
918.concise description: Touch Spell. Destroys target touched allied spirit. Heals nearby allies for 30...240.

919.name: Spirit Burn
919.description: Spell. Target foe is struck for 5...50 lightning damage. If any spirits are within earshot, Spirit Burn causes Burning for 1...5 second[s].
919.concise description: Spell. Deals 5...50 lightning damage. Inflicts Burning condition (1...5 second[s]) if you are within earshot of a spirit.

920.name: Destruction
920.description: Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...14 Spirit that dies after 30 seconds. When this Spirit dies, all foes in the area take 5...25 damage for each second the Spirit was alive (maximum 150 damage).
920.concise description: Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...14 Spirit that dies after 30 seconds. When this Spirit dies, all foes in the area take 5...25 damage for each second the Spirit was alive (maximum 150 damage).

921.name: Dissonance
921.description: Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...12 spirit. This spirit deals 5...20 damage and anyone struck by its attack is interrupted. This spirit dies after 10...25 seconds.
921.concise description: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...12 spirit (10...25 second lifespan). Its attacks deal 5...20 damage and interrupt actions.

922.name: Dissonance
922.description: Ranged Attack. This attack deals 5...20 damage and anyone struck by its attacks is interrupted.
922.concise description: Ranged Attack. Deals 5...20 damage. Interrupts actions.

923.name: Disenchantment
923.description: Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...12 spirit. This spirit deals 5...20 damage and anyone struck by its attack loses one enchantment. This spirit dies after 10...35 seconds.
923.concise description: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...12 spirit (10...35 second lifespan). Its attacks deal 5...20 damage and remove one enchantment.

924.name: Disenchantment
924.description: Ranged Attack. Target foe takes 5...20 damage and loses one Enchantment.
924.concise description: Ranged Attack. Deals 5...20 damage. Removes one enchantment.

925.name: Recall
925.description: Enchantment Spell. While you maintain Recall, nothing happens. When Recall ends, you Shadow Step to the ally you targeted when you activated this skill and all of your skills are disabled for 10 seconds.
925.concise description: Enchantment Spell. End effect: Shadow Step to target ally.

926.name: Sharpen Daggers
926.description: Enchantment Spell. For 5...30 seconds, your dagger attacks cause Bleeding for 5...15 seconds.
926.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (5...30 seconds.) Your dagger attacks inflict the Bleeding condition (5...15 seconds).

927.name: Shameful Fear
927.description: Hex Spell. For 10 seconds, target foe moves 10% faster than normal. For each second, if that foe is moving, that foe takes 5...20 damage.
927.concise description: Hex Spell. (10 seconds.) Target foe takes 5...20 damage each second while moving, but moves 10% faster.

928.name: Shadow Shroud
928.description: Elite Hex Spell. For 3...9 seconds, target foe cannot be the target of enchantments.
928.concise description: Elite Hex Spell. (3...9 seconds.) Target foe cannot be the target of enchantments.

929.name: Shadow of Haste
929.description: Stance. For 10...40 seconds you move 15% faster than normal. When Shadow of Haste ends, you shadow step to your original location.
929.concise description: Stance. (10...40 seconds.) You move 15% faster. End effect: return to your original location.

930.name: Auspicious Incantation
930.description: Enchantment Spell. For 20 seconds, the next spell you cast is disabled for an additional 10...5 seconds, and you gain 110...200% of that spell's Energy cost.
930.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (20 seconds.) Your next spell gives you 110...200% of its Energy cost.

931.name: Power Return
931.description: Spell. If target foe is casting a spell or chant, that skill is interrupted and target foe gains 10...5 Energy.
931.concise description: Spell. Interrupts a spell or chant. Interruption effect: target foe gains 10...5 Energy.

932.name: Complicate
932.description: Spell. If target foe is using a skill, that skill is interrupted and disabled for target foe and all foes in the area for an additional 5...12 seconds.
932.concise description: Spell. Interrupt a skill. Interruption effect: disables interrupted skill (+5...12 seconds) for target foe and all foes in the area.

933.name: Shatter Storm
933.description: Elite Spell. Target foe loses all enchantments. For each enchantment removed this way, Shatter Storm is disabled for an additional 7 seconds.

934.name: Unnatural Signet
934.description: Signet. Target foe takes 15...75 damage. If that foe is under the effects of a hex or enchantment, foes adjacent to your target take 5...50 damage.
934.concise description: Signet. Deals 15...75 damage. Deals 5...50 damage to other adjacent foes if the target is hexed or enchanted.

935.name: Rising Bile
935.description: Hex Spell. For 20 seconds, this hex does nothing. When Rising Bile ends, that foe and all foes in the area take 1...6 damage for each second Rising Bile was in effect.
935.concise description: Hex Spell. (20 seconds.) End effect: deals 1...6 damage for each second Rising Bile was in effect. Also damages other foes in the area.

936.name: Envenom Enchantments
936.description: Spell. Target foe loses one enchantment. For every remaining enchantment, target foe is poisoned for 3...10 seconds.
936.concise description: Spell. Removes one enchantment from target foe. Inflicts Poisoned condition (3...10 seconds for each remaining enchantment on that foe).

937.name: Shockwave
937.description: Elite Spell. All foes in the area take 15...60 earth damage and are Weakened for 1...10 second[s]. Nearby foes also take +15...60 earth damage and have Cracked Armor for 1...10 second[s].  Adjacent foes suffer the previous effects, take +15...60 earth damage, and are Blinded for 1...10 second[s].
937.concise description: Elite Spell. Foes in the area take 15...60 earth damage and are Weakened (1...10 second[s]). Nearby foes also take +15...60 earth damage and have Cracked Armor (1...10 second[s]). Adjacent foes also take +15...60 earth damage and are Blinded (1...10 second[s]).

938.name: Ward of Stability
938.description: Ward Spell. Create a Ward of Stability at your current location. For 10...25 seconds, non-spirit allies cannot be knocked down.
938.concise description: Ward Spell. (10...25 seconds.) Allies in this ward cannot be knocked-down.

939.name: Icy Shackles
939.description: Elite Hex Spell. For 1...10 second[s], target foe's movement speed is reduced by 66%. While under the effects of an enchantment, that foe's movement is reduced by 90%.
939.concise description: Elite Hex Spell. (1...10 second[s].) Target foe moves 66% slower. This foe moves 90% slower if enchanted.

941.name: Blessed Light
941.description: Elite Spell. Heal target ally for 10...140 Health and remove one condition and one hex.
941.concise description: Elite Spell. Heals for 10...140. Removes one condition and one hex.

942.name: Withdraw Hexes
942.description: Elite Spell. Remove all hexes from target ally and all adjacent allies. This spell takes an additional 20...5 seconds to recharge for each hex removed in this way.
942.concise description: Elite Spell. Removes all hexes. Also affects adjacent allies.

943.name: Extinguish
943.description: Spell. Remove one condition from each party member. Party members relieved of Burning are healed for 10...100 Health.
943.concise description: Spell. Affects all party members. Removes one condition. Party members relieved of Burning are healed for 10...100.

944.name: Signet of Strength
944.description: Signet. Your next 1...16 attack[s] deal +5 damage.

946.name: Trapper's Focus
946.description: Elite Preparation. For 12...24 seconds, your trap skills are not easily interruptible and your Wilderness Survival attribute is increased by +0...2.
946.concise description: Elite Preparation. (12...24 seconds.) Your trap skills are no longer easy to interrupt. You gain +0...2 to your Wilderness Survival attribute.

947.name: Brambles
947.description: Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...10 Spirit. Non-Spirit creatures that are knocked down in its range take 5 damage and begin Bleeding for 5...20 seconds. This Spirit dies after 30...150 seconds.
947.concise description: Nature Ritual. Creates a level 1...10 spirit (30...150 second lifespan). Knocked-down creatures take 5 damage and begin Bleeding (5...20 seconds). Does not affect spirits.

948.name: Desperate Strike
948.description: Lead Attack. If you have less than 50...80% Health, you deal +15...60 damage.
948.concise description: Lead Attack. Deals +15...60 damage if you have less than 50...80% Health.

949.name: Way of the Fox
949.description: Enchantment Spell. For 10...35 seconds, your next 1...6 attack[s] cannot be blocked.
949.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (10...35 seconds.) Your attacks are unblockable.

950.name: Shadowy Burden
950.description: Hex Spell. For 3...15 seconds, target foe moves 25% slower and while target foe has no other hexes, that foe has 20 less armor against your attacks.
950.concise description: Hex Spell. (3...15 seconds.) Target foe moves 25% slower and has 20 less armor against your attacks.

951.name: Siphon Speed
951.description: Hex Spell. For 5...15 seconds, target foe moves 33% slower and you move 33% faster. This spell has half the normal range. This spell recharges 50% faster if cast on a moving foe.
951.concise description: Half Range Hex Spell. (5...15 seconds.) Target foe moves 33% slower and you move 33% faster. Recharges 50% faster if cast on a moving foe.

952.name: Death's Charge
952.description: Spell. Shadow Step to target foe. If that foe has more Health than you, you are healed for 65...200.
952.concise description: Spell. You Shadow Step to target foe. You are healed for 65...200 if this foe has more Health than you.

953.name: Power Flux
953.description: Elite Hex Spell. If target foe is casting a spell or chant, that skill is interrupted and for 4...10 seconds, that foe has -2 Energy degeneration.
953.concise description: Elite Hex Spell. Interrupts a spell or chant. Interruption effect: -2 Energy degeneration (4...10 seconds).

954.name: Expel Hexes
954.description: Elite Spell. Remove up to 2 Hexes from target ally.
954.concise description: Elite Spell. Removes 2 hexes from target ally.

955.name: Rip Enchantment
955.description: Spell. Remove 1 enchantment from target foe. If an enchantment was removed, that foe suffers from Bleeding for 5...25 seconds.
955.concise description: Spell. Removes 1 enchantment. Removal effect: inflicts Bleeding (5...25 seconds).

957.name: Spell Shield
957.description: Enchantment Spell. For 5...20 seconds, while you are casting spells, foes cannot target you with spells. When Spell Shield ends, all your skills are disabled for 10...5 seconds.
957.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (5...20 seconds.) While casting spells, you cannot be the target of spells.

958.name: Healing Whisper
958.description: Spell. Target other ally is healed for 40...100. This spell has half the normal range.

959.name: Ethereal Light
959.description: Spell. Target ally is healed for 25...100. This spell is easily interrupted.

960.name: Release Enchantments
960.description: Spell. Lose all enchantments. Each party member is healed for 5...35 Health for each Monk enchantment lost.
960.concise description: Spell. Removes all of your enchantments. Heals all party members for 5...35 for each Monk Enchantment removed.

961.name: Lacerate
961.description: Elite Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...10 spirit. Bleeding creatures within its range suffer -2 Health degeneration. When this spirit dies, all non-spirit creatures within its range that have less than 90% Health begin Bleeding for 5...25 seconds. This spirit dies after 30...150 seconds.
961.concise description: Elite Nature Ritual. Creates a level 1...10 spirit (30...150 second lifespan). Bleeding creatures in range have -2 Health degeneration. End effect: Inflicts Bleeding condition (5...25 seconds) on creatures in range that have less than 90% health. Does not affect spirits.

962.name: Spirit Transfer
962.description: Spell. The spirit nearest you loses 5...50 Health. Target ally is healed for 5 for each point of Health lost.
962.concise description: Spell. The spirit nearest you loses 5...50 Health. Heals target ally for 5 for each point of Health lost.

963.name: Restoration
963.description: Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...14 spirit. When this spirit dies, all party members in the area are resurrected with 5...50% Health and zero Energy. This spirit dies after 30 seconds.
963.concise description: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...14 spirit (30 second lifespan). End effect: resurrects party members in the area with 5...50% Health and zero Energy.

964.name: Vengeful Weapon
964.description: Weapon Spell. For 8 seconds, the next time target ally takes damage or life steal from a foe, that ally steals up to 15...60 Health from that foe.
964.concise description: Weapon Spell. (8 seconds.) Steals 15...60 Health from the next foe that deals damage or life steal to target ally.

971.name: Argo's Cry
971.description: Spell. Create a meteor shower at target foe's location. For 9 seconds, foes adjacent to that location are struck for 120 fire damage and knocked down every 3 seconds.
971.concise description: Spell. (9 seconds.) Hits foes adjacent to target's location. Deals 120 fire damage each second. Causes knock-down every 3 seconds.

972.name: Jade Fury
972.description: Spell. All foes in the area take 50 damage, are knocked down, and then take an additional 150 damage.
972.concise description: Spell. Deals 50 damage, causes knock-down, and then deals an additional 150 damage. Affects foes in the area.

973.name: Blinding Powder
973.description: Spell. Must follow an off-hand attack. Target foe and all adjacent foes become Blinded for 3...15 seconds.
973.concise description: Spell. Inflicts Blindness condition (3...15 seconds) on target and adjacent foes.

974.name: Mantis Touch
974.description: Spell. Must follow a lead attack. Target foe becomes Crippled for 5...20 seconds. This skill counts as an off-hand attack.
974.concise description: Spell. Inflicts Crippled condition (5...20 seconds). This skill counts as an off-hand attack.

975.name: Exhausting Assault
975.description: Dual Attack. Must follow a lead attack. Target foe's action is interrupted. If that action was casting a spell, target foe suffers 10 Overcast.
975.concise description: Dual Attack. Interrupts an action. Inflicts 10 Overcast if the interrupted action was a spell.

976.name: Repeating Strike
976.description: Off-Hand Attack. Must follow an off-hand attack. If it hits, this attack strikes for +10...30 damage. If it misses, it takes an additional 15 seconds to recharge.

977.name: Way of the Lotus
977.description: Enchantment Spell. For 20 seconds, the next time you hit with a dual attack skill, you gain 5...20 Energy.
977.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (20 seconds.) You gain 5...20 Energy the next time you hit with a dual attack.

978.name: Mark of Instability
978.description: Hex Spell. For 20 seconds, the next time you hit target foe with a dual attack skill that foe is knocked down.
978.concise description: Hex Spell. (20 seconds.) Causes knock-down the next time you hit target foe with a dual attack.

979.name: Mistrust
979.description: Hex Spell. For 6 seconds, the next spell that target foe casts on one of your allies fails and deals 10...100 damage to that foe and all nearby foes.
979.concise description: Hex Spell. (6 seconds.) The next spell that target foe casts on one of your allies fails and deals 10...100 damage to target and nearby foes.

980.name: Feast of Souls
980.description: Spell. Destroy all nearby allies' spirits. For each spirit destroyed in this way, all party members are healed for 50...100 Health.
980.concise description: Spell. Heals all party members for 50...100 for each nearby allied spirit.

981.name: Recuperation
981.description: Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...14 spirit. Non-spirit allies within its range gain +1...3 Health regeneration. This spirit dies after 15...45 seconds.
981.concise description: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...14 spirit (15...45 second lifespan). Non-spirit allies within range have +1...3 Health regeneration.

982.name: Shelter
982.description: Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...12 spirit. Non-spirit allies within its range cannot lose more than 10% maximum Health from a single attack. When this spirit prevents damage, it loses 75...45 Health. This spirit lasts 30...60 seconds.
982.concise description: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...12 spirit (30...60 second lifespan). Non-spirit allies within range cannot lose more than 10% maximum Health from a single attack.

983.name: Weapon of Shadow
983.description: Weapon Spell. For 1...7 second[s], target ally has a Weapon of Shadow. Whenever that ally is struck by an attack, that ally's attacker becomes Blinded for 5 seconds. The next 1...3 times "Times" appears instead of "time" when it is only "1" [sic] that ally hits with an attack, his target is Blinded for 5 seconds.
983.concise description: Weapon Spell. (1...7 second[s].) Inflicts Blindness condition (5 seconds) on anyone who attacks target ally. Target ally's next 1...3 attack[s] inflict Blindness (5 seconds) if they hit.

985.name: Caltrops
985.description: Spell. Target foe and all foes adjacent to your target are Crippled for 5...15 seconds. Caltrops has half the normal range.
985.concise description: Half Range Spell. Inflicts Crippled condition (5...15 seconds) on target and adjacent foes.

986.name: Nine Tail Strike
986.description: Dual Attack. Must follow an off-hand attack. Nine Tail Strike cannot be blocked and strikes for +15...40 damage if it hits.

987.name: Way of the Empty Palm
987.description: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 5...20 seconds, off-hand and dual attacks cost no Energy.
987.concise description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (5...20 seconds.) Your off-hand and dual attacks cost no Energy.

988.name: Temple Strike
988.description: Elite Off-Hand Attack. Must follow a lead attack. If this attack hits, target foe is Dazed and Blinded for 1...10 seconds, and if target foe is casting a spell, that foe is interrupted.
988.concise description: Elite Off-Hand Attack. Interrupts a spell. Inflicts Dazed and Blindness conditions (1...10 seconds).

989.name: Golden Phoenix Strike
989.description: Off-Hand Attack. If you are not under the effects of an enchantment, this skill misses. If it hits, Golden Phoenix Strike deals +10...30 damage and all adjacent foes take 10...30 damage.
989.concise description: Off-Hand Attack. Deals +10...30 damage to target and deals 10...30 damage to adjacent foes.

990.name: Expunge Enchantments
990.description: Skill. Target foe loses 1 enchantment. All of your other non-attack skills are disabled for 10...5 seconds. For each skill disabled in this way, target touched foe loses 1 additional enchantment.
990.concise description: Touch Skill. Removes one enchantment for each non-attack skill you have.

991.name: Deny Hexes
991.description: Spell. Remove one hex from target ally and one additional hex for each recharging Divine Favor skill you have.
991.concise description: Spell. Removes one hex from target ally and one additional hex for each recharging Divine Favor skill you have.

992.name: Triple Chop
992.description: Elite Axe Attack. Attack target foe and adjacent foes. Each attack that hits deals +10...40 damage.
992.concise description: Elite Axe Attack. Deals +10...40 damage. Also hits adjacent foes.

993.name: Enraged Smash
993.description: Elite Hammer Attack. If Enraged Smash hits, you gain 1...4 strike[s] of adrenaline. If you hit a moving foe, you strike for +10...40 damage, and target foe is knocked down.
993.concise description: Elite Hammer Attack. Gives you 1...4 strike[s] of adrenaline if you hit. Deals +10...40 damage and causes knockdown if target foe was moving.

994.name: Renewing Smash
994.description: Hammer Attack. If Renewing Smash hits, it deals +10...40 damage.  If you hit a knocked-down foe, you gain 3 Energy and this attack recharges instantly.
994.concise description: Hammer Attack. Deals +10...40 damage. You gain 3 Energy and this attack recharges instantly if target foe was knocked down.

995.name: Tiger Stance
995.description: Stance. For 4...10 seconds, you attack 33% faster. Tiger Stance ends if any of your attacks fail to hit.

996.name: Standing Slash
996.description: Sword Attack. If it hits, Standing Slash deals +5...20 damage plus an additional 5...20 damage if you are in a stance.
996.concise description: Sword Attack. Deals +5...20 damage. Deals 5...20 more damage if you are in a stance.

997.name: Famine
997.description: Elite Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...10 spirit. Whenever a non-spirit creature in its range reaches 0 Energy, that creature takes 10...35 damage. This spirit dies after 30...90 seconds.
997.concise description: Elite Nature Ritual. Creates a level 1...10 spirit (30...90 lifespan). Deals 10...35 damage to creatures in range that reach 0 energy. Does not affect spirits.

1000.name: Blinding Snow
1000.description: Spell. You interrupt target foe's action. That foe is Blinded for 10 seconds.
1000.concise description: Spell. Interrupts an action. Also inflicts Blindness (10 seconds.)

1001.name: Avalanche
1001.description: Spell. Target foe and all nearby foes are Crippled for 7 seconds.
1001.concise description: Spell. Inflicts Crippled (7 seconds) on target and nearby foes.

1002.name: Snowball
1002.description: Spell. You throw a slow-moving snowball at target foe and gain 1 strike of adrenaline. That foe takes 50 damage if it hits.
1002.concise description: Spell. Slow projectile: deals 50 damage. You gain 1 strike of adrenaline.

1003.name: Mega Snowball
1003.description: Spell. You throw a very slow-moving snowball at target foe. That foe is knocked down and takes 75 damage if it hits.
1003.concise description: Spell. Very slow projectile: deals 75 damage and causes knock-down.

1006.name: Ice Fort
1006.description: Enchantment Spell. For 10 seconds, you cannot be knocked down, you are immune to conditions, and all incoming damage is reduced to 0. Ice Fort ends if you move.
1006.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (10 seconds.) You cannot be knocked down, you are immune to conditions, and you take no damage. Ends if you move.

1007.name: Yellow Snow
1007.description: Preparation. Lose one condition. Your next snowball causes Disease for 10 seconds.
1007.concise description: Preparation. Lose one condition. Your next snowball causes Disease ( 10 seconds.) There is a space between the bracket "(" and "10" [sic]

1008.name: Hidden Rock
1008.description: Glyph. Your next snowball knocks down target foe and causes Daze for 10 seconds.
1008.concise description: Glyph. Your next snowball causes knock-down and inflicts Dazed (10 seconds.)

1009.name: Snow Down the Shirt
1009.description: Hex Spell. For 20 seconds, whenever touched foe takes any damage while suffering from this hex, that foe is interrupted.
1009.concise description: Touch Hex Spell. (20 seconds.) Interrupts target foe whenever it takes damage.

1010.name: "Mmmm. Snowcone!"
1010.description: Shout. You are healed for 300 Health, and all of your Skills are disabled for 10 seconds.
1010.concise description: Shout. Heals you for 300. Your skills are disabled (10 seconds).

1011.name: Holiday Blues
1011.description: Spell. Sacrifice 50% maximum Health. All nearby foes take 50 damage, and you bring the Holiday Blues to this location. For 30 seconds, foes within the area suffer -15 Health degeneration.
1011.concise description: Spell. Deals 50 damage to nearby foes. Foes within the area have -15 Health degeneration (30 seconds).

1012.name: Icicles
1012.description: Hex Spell. For 5 seconds, target and adjacent foes are struck for 75 cold damage and move 66% slower.
1012.concise description: Hex Spell. Deals 75 cold damage to target and adjacent foes. These foes move 66% slower (5 seconds).

1013.name: Ice Breaker
1013.description: Enchantment Spell. For 10 seconds, target ally has +5 Health regeneration and anyone striking target ally with an attack is knocked down.
1013.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (10 seconds.) +5 Health regeneration; knocks-down anyone striking target ally with an attack.

1014.name: "Let's Get 'Em!"
1014.description: Shout. For 5 seconds, all allies within earshot move 10% faster. You gain 1 strike of adrenaline for each ally affected.
1014.concise description: Shout. (5 seconds.) Allies in earshot move 10% faster. You gain 1 strike of adrenaline for each ally affected.

1015.name: Flurry of Ice
1015.description: Spell. Throw a snowball at up to 4 foes adjacent to your target. These snowballs deal 50 damage if they hit.
1015.concise description: Spell. Throw a snowball at up to 4 foes adjacent to your target. These snowballs deal 50 damage if they hit.

1016.name: Snowball
1016.description: Spell. You throw a slow-moving snowball at target foe. That foe takes 0 damage if it hits.

1018.name: Critical Eye
1018.description: Skill. For 10...35 seconds, you have an additional 3...15% chance to land a critical hit when attacking. You gain 1 Energy whenever you score a critical hit.
1018.concise description: Skill. (10...35 seconds.) You have +3...15% chance to land a critical hit. You gain 1 Energy whenever you land a critical hit.

1019.name: Critical Strike
1019.description: Dual Attack. Must follow an off-hand attack. If it hits, this attack strikes for +10...30 damage, results in a critical hit, and you gain 1...3 Energy.
1019.concise description: Dual Attack. Deals +10...30 damage. Automatic critical hit. You gain 1...3 Energy.

1020.name: Blades of Steel
1020.description: Dual Attack. Must follow an off-hand attack. If it hits, this attack strikes for +5...16 damage (maximum bonus 60) for each recharging dagger attack.
1020.concise description: Dual Attack. Deals +5...16 damage (maximum 60) for each recharging dagger attack. <span style="color:grey;">Must follow an off-hand attack.</span>

1021.name: Jungle Strike
1021.description: Off-Hand Attack. Must follow a lead attack. If it hits, this attack strikes for +10...25 damage. If it hits a foe that was Crippled, that foe and all adjacent foes take +1...31 damage.
1021.concise description: Off-Hand Attack. Deals +10...25 damage. Deals +1...31 damage to target and adjacent foes if target foe is Crippled.

1022.name: Wild Strike
1022.description: Off-Hand Attack. Must follow a lead attack. If it hits, this attack strikes for +10...35 damage and any stance being used by target foe ends. This attack cannot be blocked.
1022.concise description: Off-Hand Attack. Deals +10...35 damage. Removes target foe's stance. Unblockable.

1023.name: Leaping Mantis Sting
1023.description: Lead Attack. If Mantis Sting hits, target foe takes +5...15 damage. If this attack strikes a moving foe, that foe is Crippled for 3...15 seconds.
1023.concise description: Lead Attack. Deals +5...15 damage. Inflicts Crippled condition (3...15 seconds) if target foe is moving.

1024.name: Black Mantis Thrust
1024.description: Lead Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +8...20 damage. If target foe is suffering from a Hex, that foe is Crippled for 3...15 seconds.
1024.concise description: Lead Attack. Deals +8...20 damage. Inflicts Crippled condition (3...15 seconds) if target foe is hexed.

1025.name: Disrupting Stab
1025.description: Lead Attack. If this attack hits, it interrupts target foe's action. If that action was a spell, it is disabled for 3...10 seconds.
1025.concise description: Lead Attack. Interrupts an action. If the interrupted action was a spell, it is disabled (3...10 seconds).

1026.name: Golden Lotus Strike
1026.description: Lead Attack. If it hits, this attack strikes for +5...20 damage. If you are under the effects of an Enchantment, you gain 5...8 Energy.
1026.concise description: Lead Attack. Deals +5...20 damage. You gain 5...8 Energy if you are enchanted.

1027.name: Critical Defenses
1027.description: Enchantment Spell. For 4...10 seconds, you have a 75% chance to block. Critical Defenses refreshes every time you land a critical hit.
1027.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (4...10 seconds.) You have a 75% chance to block. Renewal: every time you land a critical hit.

1028.name: Way of Perfection
1028.description: Enchantment Spell. For 60 seconds, whenever you successfully land a critical hit, you gain 10...40 Health.
1028.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (60 seconds.) Your critical hits heal you for 10...40.

1029.name: Dark Apostasy
1029.description: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 3...17 seconds, every time you successfully land a critical hit, you remove one enchantment from your target. If you remove an enchantment in this way, you lose 10...4 Energy or Dark Apostasy ends.
1029.concise description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (3...17 seconds.) Your critical hits remove an enchantment. <span style="color:grey;">Removal cost: lose 10...4 Energy or Dark Apostasy ends.</span>

1030.name: Locust's Fury
1030.description: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 10...35 seconds, you have an additional 50% chance to double strike while using daggers.
1030.concise description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (10...35 seconds.) You have +50% chance to double strike.

1031.name: Shroud of Distress
1031.description: Enchantment Spell. For 30...60 seconds, if you are below 50% Health, you have 3...8 health regeneration and a 75% chance to block attacks.
1031.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (30...60 seconds.) You have 3...8 health regeneration and a 75% chance to block.

1032.name: Heart of Shadow
1032.description: Spell. You are healed for 30...150. Shadow Step to a nearby location directly away from your target.
1032.concise description: Spell. You are healed for 30...150 and you Shadow Step to a nearby location directly away from your target.

1033.name: Impale
1033.description: Skill. Must follow a dual attack. Target foe is struck for 25...100 earth damage and suffers from a Deep Wound for 5...20 seconds.
1033.concise description: Skill. Deals 25...100 earth damage. Inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...20 seconds).

1034.name: Seeping Wound
1034.description: Elite Hex Spell. For 1...7 second[s], target foe moves 33% slower. That foe takes 5...25 damage each second while suffering from a condition. This spell has half the normal range.
1034.concise description: Elite Half Range Hex Spell. (1...7 second[s].) Target foe moves 33% slower. This foe takes 5...25 damage each second while suffering from a condition.

1035.name: Assassin's Promise
1035.description: Elite Hex Spell. For 5...15 seconds, if target foe dies, you gain 5...20 Energy and all your skills are recharged.
1035.concise description: Elite Hex Spell. (5...15 seconds.) You gain 5...20 Energy and all your skills recharge if target foe dies.

1036.name: Signet of Malice
1036.description: Signet. For each condition suffered by target foe, you lose one condition.
1036.concise description: Signet. You lose one condition for each condition on target foe.

1037.name: Dark Escape
1037.description: Stance. For 5...15 seconds, you move 25% faster and take half damage. Dark Escape ends if you successfully hit with an attack.
1037.concise description: Stance. (5...15 seconds.) You move 25% faster and take half damage.

1038.name: Crippling Dagger
1038.description: Spell. Send out a Crippling Dagger at target foe. Crippling Dagger strikes for 15...60 earth damage if it hits, and Cripples moving foes for 3...15 seconds. This spell has half the normal range.
1038.concise description: Half Range Spell. Projectile: deals 15...60 earth damage. Inflicts Crippled condition (3...15 seconds) if target foe is moving.

1039.name: Star Strike
1039.description: Skill. For 10 seconds, upon every successful hit by you or a party member a level 20 celestial attacker is called forth to attack foes (maximum of 6).
1039.concise description: Skill. (10 seconds.) Party-wide effect. Every successful attack summons a level 20 celestial attacker (maximum of 6).

1040.name: Spirit Walk
1040.description: Spell. Shadow Step to target spirit.
1040.concise description: Spell. Shadow Step to target Spirit. "Spirit" is capitalized in concise description [sic]

1041.name: Unseen Fury
1041.description: Stance. All adjacent foes are Blinded for 3...10 seconds. For 10...30 seconds, you cannot be blocked by Blinded foes.
1041.concise description: Stance. Inflicts Blindness condition on adjacent foes (3...10). You cannot be blocked by Blinded foes for 10...30 seconds.

1042.name: Flashing Blades
1042.description: Elite Stance. For 5...30 seconds, you have a 75% chance to block incoming attacks while attacking. If you block an attack in this way, your attacker takes 5...20 damage.
1042.concise description: Elite Stance. (5...30 seconds.) You have 75% chance to block while attacking. Block effect: 5...20 damage to your attacker.

1043.name: Dash
1043.description: Stance. For 3 seconds, you run 50% faster.

1044.name: Dark Prison
1044.description: Hex Spell. Shadow Step to target foe. For 1...6 seconds, that foe moves 33% slower.
1044.concise description: Hex Spell. Shadow Step to target foe. This foe moves 33% slower (1...6 seconds).

1045.name: Palm Strike
1045.description: Elite Skill. Target touched foe takes 10...65 damage and is Crippled for 1...5 second[s]. This skill counts as an off-hand attack.
1045.concise description: Elite Touch Skill. Deals 10...65 damage and inflicts Crippled condition (1...5 second[s]). This skill counts as an off-hand attack.

1048.name: Revealed Enchantment
1048.description: Spell. Remove an enchantment from target foe and gain 3...15 Energy. For 20 seconds, Revealed Enchantment is replaced with the enchantment removed from target foe.
1048.concise description: Spell. Removes an enchantment from target foe. Removal effects: you gain 3...15 Energy; this spell is replaced with that enchantment (20 seconds).

1049.name: Revealed Hex
1049.description: Spell. Remove a hex from target ally and gain 4...10 Energy. For 20 seconds, Revealed Hex is replaced with the hex that was removed.
1049.concise description: Spell. Removes a hex from target ally. Removal effects: you gain 4...10 Energy; this spell is replaced with that hex (20 seconds).

1052.name: Accumulated Pain
1052.description: Spell. Target foe takes 15...75 damage. If target foe is suffering from 2 or more hexes, that foe suffers a Deep Wound for 5...20 seconds.
1052.concise description: Spell. Deals 15...75 damage. Inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...20 seconds) if target foe has 2 or more hexes.

1053.name: Psychic Distraction
1053.description: Elite Spell. All of your other skills are disabled for 8 seconds. If target foe is using a skill, that skill is interrupted and disabled for an additional 5...12 seconds.
1053.concise description: Elite Spell. Interrupts a skill. Interruption effect: disables interrupted skill (+5...12 seconds).

1054.name: Ancestor's Visage
1054.description: Enchantment Spell. For 4...10 seconds, whenever target ally is hit by a melee attack, all adjacent foes lose all adrenaline and 3 Energy.
1054.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (4...10 seconds.) All adjacent foes lose all adrenaline and 3 Energy whenever a melee attack hits target ally.

1055.name: Recurring Insecurity
1055.description: Elite Hex Spell. For 10 seconds, target foe suffers from 1...5 Health degeneration. If that foe has another hex when Recurring Insecurity would end, it is reapplied.
1055.concise description: Elite Hex Spell. (10 seconds.) Causes 1...5 Health degeneration. Renewal: if target foe has another hex when Recurring Insecurity would end.

1056.name: Kitah's Burden
1056.description: Hex Spell. For 10 seconds, target foe moves 50% slower. When Kitah's Burden ends you gain 10...18 Energy.
1056.concise description: Hex Spell. (10 seconds.) Target foe moves 50% slower. End effect: you gain 10...18 Energy.

1057.name: Psychic Instability
1057.description: Elite Spell. Interrupt the target foe's action. If that action was a skill, that foe and nearby foes are knocked down for 2...4 seconds. (50% failure chance with Fast Casting 4 or less.)
1057.concise description: Elite Spell. Interrupts an action. Interruption effect: if the action is a skill, cause knockdown for 2...4 seconds on target foe and all nearby foes.

1059.name: Hex Eater Signet
1059.description: Signet. Target touched ally and up to 2...5 adjacent allies each lose one hex. You gain 1...4 Energy for each hex removed this way.
1059.concise description: Touch Signet. Removes a hex from target and 2...5 adjacent allies. Removal effect: you gain 1...4 Energy for each hex removed.

1060.name: Celestial Haste
1060.description: Spell. For 15 seconds, your entire party has 50% faster casting and all skills recharge 25% faster.
1060.concise description: Spell. (15 seconds.) Affects all party members. 50% faster casting. 25% faster skill recharge.

1061.name: Feedback
1061.description: Spell. Target foe loses one enchantment. If an enchantment is removed in this way, that foe also loses 4...10 Energy.
1061.concise description: Spell. Removes one enchantment. Removal effect: target foe loses 4...10 Energy.

1062.name: Arcane Larceny
1062.description: Spell. For 5...35 seconds, one random spell is disabled for target foe and Arcane Larceny is replaced by that spell.
1062.concise description: Spell. (5...35 seconds.) Disables one random spell. This skill becomes that spell.

1066.name: Spoil Victor
1066.description: Elite Hex Spell. For 3...15 seconds, whenever target foe attacks or casts a spell on a creature with less Health, that foe loses 25...100 Health.
1066.concise description: Elite Hex Spell. (3...15 seconds.) Causes 25...100 Health loss whenever target foe attacks or casts spells on a creature with less Health.

1067.name: Lifebane Strike
1067.description: Spell. Target foe takes 12...48 shadow damage. If that foe's Health is above 50%, you steal up to 12...48 Health.
1067.concise description: Spell. Deals 12...48 damage. Steals 12...48 Health if target foe's Health is above 50%.

1068.name: Bitter Chill
1068.description: Spell. Target foe is struck for 15...60 cold damage. If that foe had more Health than you, Bitter Chill recharges instantly.
1068.concise description: Spell. Deals 15...60 cold damage. Recharges instantly if target foe had more Health than you.

1069.name: Taste of Pain
1069.description: Spell. If target foe is below 50% Health, you gain 30...150 Health.

1070.name: Defile Enchantments
1070.description: Spell. Target foe and all nearby foes take 6...60 shadow damage and 4...20 shadow damage for each enchantment on them.
1070.concise description: Spell. Deals 6...60 damage to target and nearby foes. Deals 4...20 more damage for each enchantment on them.

1071.name: Shivers of Dread
1071.description: Hex Spell. For 10...40 seconds, whenever target foe is struck for cold damage while using a skill, that foe is interrupted and you lose 10...5 Energy or Shivers of Dread ends.
1071.concise description: Hex Spell. (10...40 seconds.) Cold damage interrupts target foe's skills.

1072.name: Star Servant
1072.description: Skill. Summon a level-25 celestial horror at your location. Each time the celestial horror successfully lands an attack, your party gains 25 Health and 3 Energy.
1072.concise description: Skill. Summon a level 25 celestial horror. Your party members gain 25 Health and 3 Energy each time the celestial horror lands an attack.

1075.name: Vampiric Swarm
1075.description: Spell. Vampiric Swarm steals up to 15...60 Health from up to three foes in the area.
1075.concise description: Spell. Steals 15...60 Health. Hits 2 additional foes in the area.

1076.name: Blood Drinker
1076.description: Spell. If your Health is above 50%, you begin Bleeding for 10 seconds. Steal up to 20...65 Health from target foe.

1077.name: Vampiric Bite
1077.description: Skill. Touch target foe to steal up to 29...74 Health.

1078.name: Wallow's Bite
1078.description: Skill. Target touched foe takes 20...58 damage.

1079.name: Enfeebling Touch
1079.description: Skill. Target touched foe loses 5...50 Health and suffers from Weakness for 5...20 seconds.
1079.concise description: Touch Skill. Causes 5...50 Health loss. Inflicts Weakness condition (5...20 seconds).

1081.name: Teinai's Wind
1081.description: Spell. Target foe and all adjacent foes take 10...40 cold damage. Burning foes struck by Teinai's Wind take an additional 40...80 damage and are interrupted.
1081.concise description: Spell. Deals 10...40 cold damage. Burning foes take +40...80 damage and are interrupted. Also strikes adjacent.

1082.name: Shock Arrow
1082.description: Spell. Send out a shocking arrow that flies swiftly toward target foe, striking for 5...50 lightning damage. If Shock Arrow strikes a foe suffering from Cracked Armor, you gain 5 Energy plus 1 Energy for every 2 ranks of Energy Storage. Shock Arrow has 25% armor penetration.
1082.concise description: Spell. Rapid projectile: deals 5...50 lightning damage. Gain 5 Energy plus 1 Energy for every 2 ranks of Energy Storage if you hit a foe suffering from Cracked Armor. 25% armor penetration.

1083.name: Unsteady Ground
1083.description: Elite Spell. You create Unsteady Ground at target foe's location. For 5 seconds, nearby foes take 10...40 earth damage each second. Attacking foes struck by Unsteady Ground are knocked down.
1083.concise description: Elite Spell. Deals 10...40 earth damage each second (5 seconds) and causes knock-down to attacking foes. Hits foes near target's initial location.

1084.name: Sliver Armor
1084.description: Enchantment Spell. For 5...11 seconds, you have 25...50% chance to block attacks and whenever you are the target of a hostile spell or attack one nearby foe is struck for 5...35 earth damage.
1084.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (5...11 seconds.) You have 25...50% chance to block. Deals 5...35 earth damage to one nearby foe whenever you are the target of a hostile spell or attack.

1085.name: Ash Blast
1085.description: Hex Spell. Target and adjacent foes are struck for 35...65 earth damage. Burning foes struck by Ash Blast are hexed for 5 seconds and have a 20...75% chance to miss with attacks.
1085.concise description: Hex Spell. Deals 35...65 earth damage. Burning foes are hexed for 5 seconds and miss 20...75% of attacks. Also strikes adjacent.

1086.name: Dragon's Stomp
1086.description: Spell. You invoke a Dragon's Stomp at target foe's location. All foes near this location are knocked down and are struck for 26...100 earth damage.
1086.concise description: Spell. Deals 26...100 earth damage. Causes knock-down. Also hits foes near this foe.

1088.name: Second Wind
1088.description: Elite Spell. You gain 1 Energy and 5 Health for each point of Energy restricted by Overcast. You lose all enchantments.
1088.concise description: Elite Spell. You gain 1 Energy and 5 Health for each point of Overcast. You lose all enchantments.

1090.name: Smoldering Embers
1090.description: Hex Spell. Target foe is struck for 10...70 fire damage. If you are Overcast, that foe is hexed with Smoldering Embers for 3 seconds and takes 5...25 additional fire damage each second.
1090.concise description: Hex Spell. Deals 10...70 fire damage to target. If you are Overcast, foe is hexed for 3 seconds, taking 5...25 fire damage each second.

1091.name: Double Dragon
1091.description: Elite Enchantment Spell. Invoke the power of the Dragon. For 8 seconds, you and target ally are enchanted with Double Dragon. Adjacent foes are dealt 5...30 fire damage each second. Additionally, when you or your ally use skills that target a foe, that foe is set on fire for 0...3 second[s].
1091.concise description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (8 seconds.) Enchants you and target ally. Adjacent foes take 5...30 fire damage each second. Skills that target a foe also inflict Burning (0...3 second[s]).

1093.name: Teinai's Heat
1093.description: Ward Spell. Place a ward of Teinai's Heat at your location for 10...15 seconds. Foes within the ward suffer 2...5 health Unlike most other descriptions "Health" is lowercase here [sic] degeneration. Weakened foes attack 33% slower. This skill is disabled for 20 seconds.
1093.concise description: Ward Spell. (10...15 seconds.) Causes 2...5 health [sic] degeneration. Weakened foes in the ward attack 33% slower. Disabled for 20 seconds.

1094.name: Breath of Fire
1094.description: Spell. Create Breath of Fire at target foe's current location. For 5 seconds, foes adjacent to that location are struck for 10...40 fire damage each second.
1094.concise description: Spell. Deals 10...40 fire damage each second (5 seconds). Hits foes adjacent to target's initial location.

1095.name: Star Burst
1095.description: Elite Spell. Target touched foe and all foes in the area are struck for 7...112 fire damage and set on fire for 1...4 second[s]. For each foe you hit, gain 2 Energy.
1095.concise description: Elite Touch Spell. Deals 7...112 fire damage. Inflicts Burning (1...4 seconds). "Seconds" is plural even when it's "1 second" [sic] Gain 2 Energy for each foe struck. Also hits foes in the area.

1096.name: Glyph of Essence
1096.description: Glyph. For 15 seconds, your next spell casts instantly but causes you to lose all Energy.
1096.concise description: Glyph. (15 seconds.) Your next spell casts instantly.

1097.name: Teinai's Prison
1097.description: Hex Spell. For 1...6 second[s], target foe's legs are encased in ice, causing the foe to move 66% slower. If that foe has Cracked Armor, the chill seeps through causing 5...9 Health degeneration.
1097.concise description: Hex Spell. (1...6 second[s].) Target foe moves 66% slower. Foes with Cracked Armor have 5...9 Health degeneration.

1098.name: Mirror of Ice
1098.description: Elite Hex Spell. Shatter a Mirror of Ice. All foes near you and target ally take 15...70 cold damage and move 66% slower for 2...6 seconds. If you strike a foe hexed with Water Magic, Mirror of Ice recharges 50% faster.
1098.concise description: Elite Hex Spell. Deals 15...70 cold damage and slows foes by 66% (2...6 seconds). Hits foes near you and target ally. Recharges 50% faster if it hits a foe hexed with Water Magic.

1099.name: Teinai's Crystals
1099.description: Spell. Target foe takes 20...40 damage. If target foe has a Water Magic hex, this spell strikes target and nearby foes for an additional 20...40 damage, and nearby foes also suffer Cracked Armor for 5...15 seconds.
1099.concise description: Spell. Deals 20...40 damage to target. Deals +20...40 more Descriptions usually don't display '+ [number] more damage'. It's either '+ [number] damage' or '[number] more damage'. [sic] damage and causes Cracked Armor (5...15 seconds) nearby if that foe had a Water Magic hex.

1100.name: Celestial Storm
1100.description: Skill. Create a celestial storm at target foe's location that lasts for 15 seconds. Each second, all foes in the area take 40 fire damage, 40 cold damage, 40 lightning damage, and 40 earth damage.
1100.concise description: Skill. Deals 40 damage of each elemental type each second (15 seconds). Hits all foes in the area of target's initial location.

1106.name: Shield of Saint Viktor
1106.description: Spell. You are protected by the Shield of Saint Viktor. <strong style="color: green;">80...1280</strong> damage is absorbed.
1106.concise description: Spell. You are protected by the Shield of Saint Viktor. <strong style="color: green;">80...1280</strong> damage is absorbed.

1113.name: Kirin's Wrath
1113.description: Spell. For 5 seconds, foes adjacent to the location in which the spell was cast take 8...32 holy damage each second.
1113.concise description: Spell. Deals 8...32 holy damage each second (5 seconds). Hits foes adjacent to your initial location.

1114.name: Spirit Bond
1114.description: Enchantment Spell. For 8 seconds, whenever target ally takes more than 50 damage from the next 10 attacks or spells, that ally is healed for 30...90 Health.
1114.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (8 seconds.) Heals for 30...90 whenever target ally takes more than 50 damage.

1115.name: Air of Enchantment
1115.description: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 4...10 seconds, enchantments cast on target other ally cost 5 less Energy (minimum 1 Energy).
1115.concise description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (4...10 seconds.) Enchantments cast on target ally cost 5 less Energy (minimum 1 Energy).

1117.name: Heaven's Delight
