1117.description: Spell. Heals you and party members within earshot for 15...60 points.
1117.concise description: Spell. Heals you and party members within earshot for 15...60 points.

1118.name: Healing Burst
1118.description: Elite Spell. Target ally is healed for 10...160. All party members in earshot of your target gain Health equal to the Divine Favor bonus from this spell. Your Smiting Prayers are disabled for 20 seconds.
1118.concise description: Elite Spell. Heals for 10...160. Party members in earshot of your target gain Health equal to the Divine Favor bonus.

1119.name: Karei's Healing Circle
1119.description: Spell. Heal yourself and all adjacent creatures for 30...180 points.
1119.concise description: Spell. Heals you for 30...180. Also heals adjacent creatures.

1120.name: Jamei's Gaze
1120.description: Spell. Heal target other ally for 35...180 Health.

1121.name: Gift of Health
1121.description: Spell. All of your other Healing Prayers skills are disabled for 10...5 seconds. Target other ally is healed for 15...150 Health.

1123.name: Life Sheath
1123.description: Elite Enchantment Spell. Remove 0...2 condition[s] from target ally. For 8 seconds, the next time that ally would take damage or life steal, that ally gains that amount of Health instead (maximum 20...100).
1123.concise description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (8 seconds.) Converts the next incoming damage or life steal (maximum 20...100) to healing. Initial effect: Removes 0...2 condition[s].

1124.name: Star Shine
1124.description: Skill. Your entire party is healed to their maximum Health. All conditions and hexes are removed from your party.
1124.concise description: Skill. Heals your entire party to their maximum Health and removes all conditions and hexes.

1126.name: Empathic Removal
1126.description: Elite Spell. You and target other ally lose 1 condition and 1 hex, and are healed for 50.
1126.concise description: Elite Spell. Removes one condition and hex from target ally and yourself, and heals for 50.

1128.name: Resurrection Chant
1128.description: Spell. Resurrect target party member with up to your current Health and 5...35% Energy. This spell has half the normal range.
1128.concise description: Half Range Spell. Resurrects target party member at your current Health and with 5...35% Energy.

1129.name: Word of Censure
1129.description: Elite Spell. Target foe takes 15...75 holy damage. If your target was below 33% Health, Word of Censure takes 20 additional seconds to recharge.

1130.name: Spear of Light
1130.description: Spell. Spear of Light flies toward target foe and deals 26...56 holy damage if it hits. Spear of Light deals +15...60 damage if it hits an attacking foe.
1130.concise description: Spell. Projectile: deals 26...56 holy damage. Deals 15...60 more damage if target foe is attacking.

1131.name: Stonesoul Strike
1131.description: Skill. Touched target foe takes 10...55 holy damage. If knocked down, your target takes an additional 10...55 holy damage.
1131.concise description: Touch Skill. Deals 10...55 holy damage. Deals 10...55 more holy damage if target is knocked down.

1133.name: Drunken Blow
1133.description: Melee Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +10...40 damage and your target suffers from one of the following conditions: Deep Wound (for 20 seconds), Weakness (for 20 seconds), Bleeding (for 25 seconds), or Crippled (for 15 seconds). After making a Drunken Blow, you are knocked down.
1133.concise description: Melee Attack. Deals +10...40 damage. Inflicts one of the following random conditions: Deep Wound (20 seconds), Weakness (20 seconds), Bleeding (25 seconds), or Crippled (15 seconds).

1134.name: Leviathan's Sweep
1134.description: Melee Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +5...20 damage. If this attack is blocked, your target is knocked down and suffers 10...34 damage.
1134.concise description: Melee Attack. Deals +5...20 damage. Causes knock-down and deals 10...34 damage if blocked.

1135.name: Jaizhenju Strike
1135.description: Sword Attack. If Jaizhenju Strike hits, you strike for +1...30 damage. If you are not using a stance, Jaizhenju Strike cannot be blocked.
1135.concise description: Sword Attack. Deals +1...30 damage. Unblockable unless you are in a stance.

1136.name: Penetrating Chop
1136.description: Axe Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +5...20 damage. This axe attack has 20% armor penetration.
1136.concise description: Axe Attack. Deals +5...20 damage. 20% armor penetration.

1137.name: Yeti Smash
1137.description: Hammer Attack. Lose all adrenaline. Attack all adjacent foes. If this attack strikes a foe suffering from a condition, that foe is knocked down. (50% failure chance with Hammer Mastery 4 or less.)
1137.concise description: Hammer Attack. Attack all adjacent foes. Knocks down foes suffering from a condition.

1140.name: Storm of Swords
1140.description: Skill. For 15 seconds, you and all adjacent allies deal 25 damage to all adjacent foes each second.
1140.concise description: Skill. (15 seconds.) Affects you and all adjacent allies. Deals 25 damage to all adjacent foes each second.

1141.name: "You Will Die!"
1141.description: Shout. If target foe is below 50% Health, you gain 1...3 strike[s] of adrenaline.
1141.concise description: Shout. You gain 1...3 strike[s] of adrenaline.

1142.name: Auspicious Parry
1142.description: Elite Stance. For 8 seconds, the next attack against you is blocked. You gain 1...4 strike[s] of adrenaline when this stance ends.
1142.concise description: Elite Stance. (8 seconds.) Blocks one attack. End effect: you gain 1...4 strike[s] of adrenaline.

1144.name: Silverwing Slash
1144.description: Sword Attack. This attack strikes for +1...40 damage if it hits.

1146.name: Shove
1146.description: Elite Skill. Target touched foe is knocked down. If that foe was moving, that foe's stance ends and that foe takes 15...75 damage before being knocked down.
1146.concise description: Elite Touch Skill. Causes knockdown. Initial effect: ends foe's stance and deals 15...75 damage if target foe is moving.

1147.name: Base Defense
1147.description: Skill. All foes in range lose 999 Health and are knocked down for 5 seconds.
1147.concise description: Skill. Causes 999 Health loss and knocks down (5 seconds). Hits all foes in range.

1148.name: Carrier Defense
1148.description: Skill. All nearby foes take 100 damage and are teleported away.
1148.concise description: Skill. Deals 100 damage to nearby foes and teleports them away.

1149.name: The Chalice of Corruption
1149.description: Skill. Target foe suffers -2 Health degeneration. This effect lasts until it is removed by Brother Tosai.
1149.concise description: Skill. -2 Health degeneration. This effect lasts until Brother Tosai removes it.

1151.name: Song of the Mists
1151.description: Shout. For 10 seconds, each nearby ally gains +6 Energy regeneration. If an ally successfully uses a skill, Song of The Mists ends and steals 20 Health from the nearest foe.
1151.concise description: Shout. (10 seconds.) +6 Energy regeneration to nearby allies. If an ally successfully uses a skill, Song of The Mists ends and steals 20 Health from the nearest foe.

1152.name: Demonic Agility
1152.description: Enchantment Spell. For 30 seconds, This "This" is capitalized [sic] demon creature has 100% chance to double strike when attacking in melee.
1152.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) This demon creature has 100% chance to double strike when attacking in melee.

1153.name: Blessing of the Kirin
1153.description: Enchantment Spell. For 30 seconds, the next time a nearby ally of this Kirin uses a skill, that ally is cured of Miasma or one condition.
1153.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) When a nearby ally uses a skill, that ally is cured of Miasma or one condition.

1154.name: Emperor Degen
1154.description: The emperor suffers Health degeneration for 30 minutes.

1155.name: Juggernaut Toss
1155.description: Skill. Target touched foe takes 50 damage and is knocked down for 5 seconds.
1155.concise description: Touch Skill. 50 damage. Causes knock-down (5 seconds).

1156.name: Aura of the Juggernaut
1156.description: Skill. You are inside a Kurzick Juggernaut's aura. All allies within a Kurzick Juggernaut's aura receive +1 Energy regeneration.
1156.concise description: Skill. Allies have +1 Energy regeneration when in range of the Kurzick Juggernaut's aura.

1172.name: Turtle Shell
1172.description: Stance. Reduces damage from non-critical hits.
1172.concise description: Stance. Reduces damage from non-critical hits.

1173.name: Exposed Underbelly
1173.description: While on your side, you take +X damage when you take damage, where X is twice your level.
1173.concise description: While on your side, you take +X damage when you take damage, where X is twice your level.

1175.name: Blood of zu Heltzer
1175.description: Spell. Magical barriers put in place by a zu Heltzer family member are opened.
1175.concise description: Spell. Magical barriers put in place by a zu Heltzer family member are opened.

1176.name: Afflicted Soul Explosion
1176.description: When Afflicted creature dies, all nearby foes take damage.
1176.concise description: Deals damage to nearby foes when Afflicted creature dies.

1179.name: Dark Chain Lightning
1179.description: Attack. Target foe is struck for 300 lightning damage and is knocked down. Dark Chain Lightning then hits each nearest foe in succession, knocking down each foe and striking for 10% less damage each time.
1179.concise description: Attack. Deals 300 lightning damage and causes knock-down. Dark Chain Lightning then hits each nearest foe in succession, knocking-down each foe and doing 10% less damage each time.

1181.name: Corrupted Breath
1181.description: Preparation. For 20 seconds, whenever your attacks hit a foe, all nearby foes take 50 damage for each enchantment on your target.
1181.concise description: Preparation. (20 seconds.) Whenever your attacks hit, all nearby foes take 50 damage for each enchantment on your target.

1182.name: Renewing Corruption
1182.description: Stance. For 20 seconds, if Kuunavang is in casting range when this creature dies, Kuunavang is healed for 500 Health.
1182.concise description: Stance. (20 seconds.) If Kuunavang is in casting range when this creature dies, Kuunavang is healed for 500 Health.

1183.name: Corrupted Dragon Spores
1183.description: Spell. Create 6 "Corrupted Spore" creatures around target foe. Foes within their range take 100% longer to cast spells and suffer from -2 Health degeneration. Corrupted Spore creatures die after 30 seconds.
1183.concise description: Spell. (30 seconds.) Create 6 corrupted spore creatures around target foe. Foes within their range take twice as long to cast spells and have -2 Health degeneration.

1184.name: Corrupted Dragon Scales
1184.description: Spell. Create 6 "Corrupted Scale" creatures around target foe. Foes within their range attack 50% slower and suffer from -10 Health degeneration. Corrupted Scale creatures die after 30 seconds.
1184.concise description: Spell. (30 seconds.) Create 6 corrupted scale creatures around target foe. Foes within their range attack 50% slower and have -10 Health degeneration.

1186.name: Siege Turtle Attack
1186.description: Skill. Enemies within the blast area take 80 damage.
1186.concise description: Skill. Deals 80 damage to foes in the blast area.

1187.name: Siege Turtle Attack
1187.description: Skill. Enemies within the blast area take 80 damage. Target foe takes 250 damage.
1187.concise description: Skill. Deals 80 damage to foes in the blast area. 250 damage to target foe.

1188.name: Siege Turtle Attack
1188.description: Skill. Enemies within the blast area take 80 damage. Target foe takes 250 damage.
1188.concise description: Skill. Deals 80 damage to foes in the blast area. 250 damage to target foe.

1190.name: Passage to Tahnnakai
1190.description: Spell. The magical protections sealing Tahnnakai Temple temporarily lift, allowing passage to the Temple's interior.
1190.concise description: Spell. The magical protections sealing Tahnnakai Temple temporarily lift, allowing passage into the interior.

1191.name: Sundering Attack
1191.description: Bow Attack. If Sundering Attack hits, you strike for +5...25 damage and this attack has 10% armor penetration.
1191.concise description: Bow Attack. Deals +5...25 damage. 10% armor penetration.

1192.name: Zojun's Shot
1192.description: Bow Attack. Shoot an arrow that has half the normal range, but strikes for +10...40 damage.
1192.concise description: Half Range Bow Attack. Deals +10...40 damage.

1194.name: Predatory Bond
1194.description: Shout. For 5...20 seconds, your animal companion attacks 25% faster and heals you for 1...31 Health with each successful attack.
1194.concise description: Shout. (5...20 seconds.) Your pet attacks 25% faster and you gain 1...31 Health whenever your pet makes a successful attack.

1195.name: Heal as One
1195.description: Elite Skill. For 15 seconds, your animal companion steals 1...20 Health whenever it hits with an attack. You and your companion are both healed for 20...104 Health. If your companion is dead, it's resurrected with 50% Health. If you have this skill equipped, your companion will travel with you.
1195.concise description: Elite Skill. (15 seconds.) Your pet's attacks steal 1...20 Health. Initial effect: heals you and your pet for 20...104; resurrects your pet (50% Health) if dead. If you have this equipped, your pet will travel with you.

1196.name: Zojun's Haste
1196.description: Stance. For 5...11 seconds, you move 33% faster and have a 27...75% chance to block incoming projectiles. Zojun's Haste ends if you attack.
1196.concise description: Stance. (5...11 seconds.) You move 33% faster and have 27...75% chance to block projectiles.

1197.name: Needling Shot
1197.description: Bow Attack. Needling Shot strikes for only 10...30 damage and moves faster than normal. If Needling Shot strikes a foe below 50% Health, Needling Shot recharges instantly. Your other attack skills are disabled for 2 seconds.
1197.concise description: Bow Attack. Fast-moving arrow. Deals 10...30 damage. Recharges instantly if target foe is below 50% Health.

1198.name: Broad Head Arrow
1198.description: Elite Bow Attack. You shoot a broad head arrow that moves slower than normal. If it hits, target foe is Dazed for 5...20 seconds, and if target foe is casting a spell that spell is interrupted.
1198.concise description: Elite Bow Attack. Slow moving arrow. Interrupts a spell. Inflicts Dazed condition (5...20 seconds).

1199.name: Glass Arrows
1199.description: Elite Preparation. For 10...35 seconds, your arrows strike for +5...20 damage if they hit and cause Bleeding for 10...20 seconds if they are blocked.
1199.concise description: Elite Preparation. (10...35 seconds.) Your arrows deal +5...20 damage. Inflicts Bleeding condition if blocked (10...20 seconds).

1200.name: Archer's Signet
1200.description: Elite Signet. For 1...24 second[s], conditions you apply while wielding a bow last 100% longer.
1200.concise description: Elite Signet. (1...24 second[s].) Conditions you apply while wielding a bow last 100% longer.

1201.name: Savage Pounce
1201.description: Pet Attack. Your animal companion attempts a Savage Pounce that deals +5...20 damage. If the attack strikes a foe who is casting a spell, that foe is knocked down.
1201.concise description: Pet Attack. Deals +5...20 damage. Causes knock-down if target foe is casting a spell.

1202.name: Enraged Lunge
1202.description: Elite Pet Attack. Your animal companion attempts an Enraged Lunge that applies a Deep Wound to target foe for 5...20 seconds and deals +10...50 damage.
1202.concise description: Elite Pet Attack. Inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...20 seconds) and deals +10...50 damage.

1203.name: Bestial Mauling
1203.description: Pet Attack. Your animal companion attempts a Bestial Mauling that deals +5...20 damage. If the attack strikes a knocked-down foe, that foe is Dazed for 4...10 seconds.
1203.concise description: Pet Attack. Deals +5...20 damage. Inflicts Dazed condition (4...10 seconds) if target foe is knocked-down.

1205.name: Poisonous Bite
1205.description: Pet Attack. Your animal companion attempts a Poisonous Bite that Poisons target foe for 5...20 seconds.
1205.concise description: Pet Attack. Inflicts Poisoned condition (5...20 seconds).

1206.name: Pounce
1206.description: Pet Attack. Your animal companion's next attack is a Pounce that deals +5...20 damage. If the attack strikes a moving foe, that foe is knocked down.
1206.concise description: Pet Attack. Deals +5...20 damage. Causes knock-down if target foe is moving.

1207.name: Celestial Stance
1207.description: Skill. For 15 seconds, your entire party has a 75% chance to block attacks and +3 Health regeneration.
1207.concise description: Skill. (15 seconds.) Affects all party members. 75% chance to block. +3 Health regeneration.

1209.name: Bestial Fury
1209.description: Stance. All your non-attack skills are disabled for 5 seconds. For 5...11 seconds, you attack 25% faster.

1211.name: Viper's Nest
1211.description: Trap. Create a Viper's Nest. When it is triggered, all nearby foes are struck for 5...35 piercing damage and become Poisoned for 5...20 seconds. Viper's Nest expires after 90 seconds. This Trap is easily interrupted.
1211.concise description: Trap. (90 seconds.) Affects nearby foes. Deals 5...35 piercing damage. Inflicts Poisoned condition (5...20 seconds).

1212.name: Equinox
1212.description: Elite Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...10 spirit. Spells cast within its range that cause Overcast cause an additional 10 Overcast. This spirit dies after 30...150 seconds.
1212.concise description: Elite Nature Ritual. Creates a level 1...10 spirit (30...150 second lifespan). Overcast-causing spells cast within range cause an additional 10 Overcast.

1213.name: Tranquility
1213.description: Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...10 spirit. Enchantments cast by non-spirit creatures within its range expire 20...50% faster. This spirit dies after 15...60 seconds.
1213.concise description: Nature Ritual. Creates a level 1...10 spirit (15...60 second lifespan). Enchantments expire 20...50% faster on creatures in range. Does not affect spirits.

1215.name: Clamor of Souls
1215.description: Elite Spell. Target foe and all nearby foes take 10...65 lightning damage. If you are within earshot of a spirit or holding a bundle item, you gain 10 Energy.
1215.concise description: Elite Spell. Deals 10...65 lightning damage to target and nearby foes. You gain 10 Energy if you are within earshot of a spirit or holding a bundle item.

1217.name: Ritual Lord
1217.description: Elite Skill. For 5...35 seconds, your Ritualist attributes are boosted by 2...4 for your next skill. If that skill is a Binding Ritual, it recharges 10...60% faster and Ritual Lord recharges instantly.
1217.concise description: Elite Skill. (5...35 seconds.) You have +2...4 to all Ritualist attributes for your next skill. If that skill is a Binding Ritual, it recharges 10...60% faster and Ritual Lord recharges instantly.

1218.name: Cruel Was Daoshen
1218.description: Item Spell. Hold Daoshen's ashes for up to 15...60 seconds. While you hold his ashes, all Ritualist skills have 10% armor penetration. When you drop his ashes, all nearby foes are struck for 15...85 lightning damage.
1218.concise description: Item Spell. (15...60 seconds.) Your Ritualist skills have 10% armor penetration. Drop effect: deals 15...85 lightning damage to all nearby foes.

1219.name: Protective Was Kaolai
1219.description: Item Spell. Hold Kaolai's ashes for up to 15...60 seconds. While you hold his ashes, you gain 10 armor. When you drop his ashes, all party members are healed for 10...85 Health.
1219.concise description: Item Spell. (15...60 seconds.) You have +10 armor. Drop effect: all party members are healed for 10...85.

1220.name: Attuned Was Songkai
1220.description: Elite Item Spell. Hold Songkai's ashes for up to 45 seconds. While you hold her ashes, your spells and binding rituals cost 5...50% of the base Energy to cast.
1220.concise description: Elite Item Spell. (45 seconds.) Your spells and binding rituals cost 5...50% of the base Energy.

1221.name: Resilient Was Xiko
1221.description: Item Spell. Hold Xiko's ashes for up to 5...20 seconds. For each hex or condition you are suffering from while holding her ashes, you gain +3 Health regeneration. When you drop her ashes, you lose 1...4 conditions. [sic]
1221.concise description: Item Spell. (5...20 seconds.) You have +3 Health regeneration for each hex or condition on you. Drop effect: you lose 1...4 condition[s].

1222.name: Lively Was Naomei
1222.description: Item Spell. Hold Naomei's ashes for up to 45 seconds. When you drop her ashes, all party members in the area are resurrected with 15...75% Health and zero Energy.
1222.concise description: Item Spell. (45 seconds.) Drop effect: resurrects party members in the area (15...75% Health and zero Energy).

1223.name: Anguished Was Lingwah
1223.description: Item Spell. Hold Lingwah's ashes for up to 10...60 seconds. While you hold her ashes, your Ritualist hexes cost 1...5 less energy and last 33% longer. When you drop her ashes all your Ritualist hexes are recharged.
1223.concise description: Item Spell. (10...60 seconds.) Your Ritualist hexes cost 1...5 less energy and last 33% longer. Drop effect: all your Ritualist hexes are recharged.

1224.name: Draw Spirit
1224.description: Spell. Teleport target allied spirit to your location.
1224.concise description: Spell. Teleports target allied spirit to your location.

1225.name: Channeled Strike
1225.description: Spell. Target foe is struck for 5...95 lightning damage. That foe is struck for an additional 5...35 lightning damage if you are holding an item.
1225.concise description: Spell. Deals 5...95 lightning damage. Deals 5...35 additional lightning damage if you are holding an item.

1226.name: Spirit Boon Strike
1226.description: Spell. Target foe is struck for 20...65 lightning damage, and all spirits you control within earshot gain 20...65 Health.
1226.concise description: Spell. Deals 20...65 lightning damage. Spirits you control within earshot gain 20...65 Health.

1227.name: Essence Strike
1227.description: Spell. Target foe is struck for 15...60 lightning damage. If any spirits are within earshot, you gain 1...9 Energy.
1227.concise description: Spell. Deals 15...60 lightning damage. You gain 1...9 Energy if any spirits are within earshot.

1228.name: Spirit Siphon
1228.description: Spell. The spirit nearest you loses all Energy. You gain 15...50% of that Energy.
1228.concise description: Spell. The spirit nearest you loses all Energy. You gain 15...50% of that Energy.

1229.name: Explosive Growth
1229.description: Enchantment Spell. For 15...60 seconds, whenever you create a creature, up to 5 foes near that creature are struck for 20...65 lightning damage.
1229.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (15...60 seconds.) Deals 20...65 lightning damage each time you create a creature to 5 foes near that creature.

1230.name: Boon of Creation
1230.description: Enchantment Spell. For 15...60 seconds, whenever you create a creature, you gain 5...50 Health and 1...6 Energy.
1230.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (15...60 seconds.) You gain 5...50 Health and 1...6 Energy whenever you create a creature.

1231.name: Spirit Channeling
1231.description: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 12 seconds, you have +1...6 Energy regeneration. When you cast this spell, you gain 3...12 Energy if you are within earshot of a spirit.
1231.concise description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (12 seconds.) You have +1...6 Energy regeneration. Initial effect: you gain 3...12 Energy if you are within earshot of a spirit.

1232.name: Armor of Unfeeling
1232.description: Skill. For 10...35 seconds, your spirits within earshot take 50% less damage and are immune to critical attacks.
1232.concise description: Skill. (10...35 seconds.) Your spirits within earshot take 50% less damage and are immune to critical attacks.

1233.name: Soothing Memories
1233.description: Spell. Target ally is healed for 10...100 Health. If you are holding an item, you gain 3 Energy.
1233.concise description: Spell. Heals for 10...100. You gain 3 Energy if you are holding an item.

1234.name: Mend Body and Soul
1234.description: Spell. Target ally is healed for 20...115 Health. That ally loses one condition for each spirit within earshot.
1234.concise description: Spell. Heals for 20...115. Removes one condition for each spirit within earshot.

1235.name: Dulled Weapon
1235.description: Hex Spell. For 5...15 seconds, target foe and all adjacent foes cannot achieve a critical hit and deal 1...15 less damage.
1235.concise description: Hex Spell. Also hexes foes adjacent to your target (5...15 seconds). Removes ability to land a critical hit. Reduces damage by 1...15.

1236.name: Binding Chains
1236.description: Hex Spell. For 3 seconds, target foe and all nearby foes move 90% slower and take 1...30 damage each second while moving.
1236.concise description: Hex Spell. Also hexes foes near your target. (3 seconds.) These foes move 90% slower and takes 1...30 damage each second while moving.

1237.name: Painful Bond
1237.description: Hex Spell. For 10...20 seconds, target foe and all nearby foes are hexed with Painful Bond and take 8...20 damage whenever hit by a spirit's attack.
1237.concise description: Hex Spell. Also hexes foes near your target (10...20 seconds). Spirits do 8...20 more damage against these foes.

1238.name: Signet of Creation
1238.description: Signet. You gain 4 Energy for every summoned creature you control within earshot (maximum 3...12 Energy).
1238.concise description: Signet. Gain 4 Energy (maximum 3...12 Energy) for each summoned creature you control within earshot.

1239.name: Signet of Spirits
1239.description: Elite Signet. Create 3 level 1...12 spirits. These spirits deal 5...20 damage with attacks and die after 60 seconds.
1239.concise description: Elite Signet. Creates 3 level 1...12 spirits (60 second lifespan). These spirits deal 5...20 damage with attacks.

1240.name: Soul Twisting
1240.description: Elite Skill. For 5...45 seconds, your Binding Rituals cost 15 less Energy (minimum 10) and recharge instantly. Soul Twisting ends after 1...3 Binding Ritual[s].
1240.concise description: Elite Skill. (5...45 seconds.) Your Binding Rituals cost 15 less Energy (minimum 10) and recharge instantly.

1241.name: Celestial Summoning
1241.description: Skill. Archemorous and Saint Viktor are summoned from the spirit realm.
1241.concise description: Skill. Archemorous and Saint Viktor are summoned from the spirit realm.

1244.name: Ghostly Haste
1244.description: Enchantment Spell. For 5...20 seconds, spells you cast while within earshot of a spirit recharge 25% faster.
1244.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (5...20 seconds.) Spells you cast recharge 25% faster.

1245.name: Gaze from Beyond
1245.description: Spell. Target foe is struck for 20...65 lightning damage. If you are within earshot of a spirit, that foe is Blinded for 2...6 seconds.
1245.concise description: Spell. Deals 20...65 lightning damage. Inflicts Blindness condition for 2...6 seconds if you are within earshot of a spirit.

1246.name: Ancestors' Rage
1246.description: Skill. For 1 second, nothing happens. When this skill ends, all foes adjacent to target ally are struck for 5...110 lightning damage.
1246.concise description: Skill. (1 second.) End Effect: deals 5...110 lightning damage to foes adjacent to target ally.

1247.name: Pain
1247.description: Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...12 spirit. This spirit's attacks deal 5...30 damage. This spirit dies after 30...150 seconds.
1247.concise description: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...12 spirit (30...150 second lifespan). Its attacks deal 5...30 damage.

1248.name: Pain
1248.description: Ranged Attack. If this attack hits, it deals 5...30 damage.

1249.name: Displacement
1249.description: Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...14 spirit. All non-spirit allies within its range have a 75% chance to block incoming attacks. Every time an attack is blocked in this way, this spirit takes 60 damage. This spirit dies after 30...60 seconds.
1249.concise description: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...14 spirit (30...60 second lifespan). Non-spirit allies within range have 75% chance to block. <span style="color:grey;">Block effect: this spirit takes 60 damage.</span>

1250.name: Preservation
1250.description: Elite Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...14 spirit. Every 4 seconds, this spirit heals one non-spirit ally in the area for 10...115 Health. This spirit dies after 90 seconds.
1250.concise description: Elite Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...14 spirit (90 second lifespan). Every 4 seconds this spirit heals one non-spirit ally for 10...115.

1251.name: Life
1251.description: Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...14 spirit. When this spirit dies, all non-spirit allies within its range are healed for 1...7 Health for each second this spirit was alive. This spirit dies after 20 seconds.
1251.concise description: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...14 spirit (20 second lifespan). Affects non-spirit allies within range. End effect: heals for 1...7 for each second this spirit was alive.

1252.name: Earthbind
1252.description: Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...14 spirit. All non-spirit foes knocked down within its range are knocked down for at least 3 seconds. Whenever this happens, this spirit loses 50...25 Health. This spirit dies after 15...45 seconds.
1252.concise description: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...14 spirit (15...45 second lifespan). Any time non-spirit foes within range are knocked down, they are knocked down for at least 3 seconds.

1253.name: Bloodsong
1253.description: Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...12 spirit who dies after 30...150 seconds. Attacks by that spirit steal up to 5...25 Health.
1253.concise description: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...12 spirit (30...150 second lifespan). Its attacks steal 5...25 Health.

1254.name: Bloodsong
1254.description: Ranged Attack. Steal up to 5...25 Health from target foe.

1255.name: Wanderlust
1255.description: Elite Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...12 spirit. Whenever this spirit's attack hits a stationary foe, that foe is knocked down and the spirit loses 70...50 Health. This spirit dies after 30...60 seconds.
1255.concise description: Elite Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...12 spirit (30...60 second lifespan). Its attacks against stationary foes cause knock-down.

1256.name: Wanderlust
1256.description: Ranged Attack. If this attack hits a stationary foe, that foe is knocked down and this spirit loses 70...50 Health.
1256.concise description: Ranged Attack. Causes knock-down to stationary foes. Knock-down cost: this spirit loses 70...50 Health.

1257.name: Spirit Light Weapon
1257.description: Elite Weapon Spell. For 10 seconds, target ally gains 1...15 Health per second and an additional 1...15 Health per second if that ally is within earshot of a spirit.
1257.concise description: Elite Weapon Spell. (10 seconds.) Target ally gains 1...15 Health each second. 1...15 more healing per second while within earshot of a spirit.

1258.name: Brutal Weapon
1258.description: Weapon Spell. Give target ally a Brutal Weapon for 10...40 seconds. The bearer's weapon strikes for +5...15 damage as long as the bearer is under no enchantments.
1258.concise description: Weapon Spell. (10...40 seconds.) Attacks deal +5...15 damage.

1259.name: Guided Weapon
1259.description: Weapon Spell. For 4...10 seconds, target ally's attacks cannot be blocked.
1259.concise description: Weapon Spell. (4...10 seconds.)  Attacks are unblockable.

1260.name: Meekness
1260.description: Hex Spell. For 5...30 seconds, target foe and all foes in the area attack 50% slower.
1260.concise description: Hex Spell. Also hexes foes in the area of target (5...30 seconds). These foes attack 50% slower.

1261.name: Frigid Armor
1261.description: Enchantment Spell. For 10...25 seconds, you have +10...40 armor against physical damage and cannot be set on fire.
1261.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (10...25 seconds.) You have +10...40 armor against physical damage and immunity to Burning.

1262.name: Healing Ring
1262.description: Spell. Heal adjacent creatures for 30...180 Health. The caster is not healed.
1262.concise description: Spell. Heals adjacent allies and foes for 30...180.

1263.name: Renew Life
1263.description: Spell. Resurrect target touched dead target [sic] party member with 50% Health and 5...20% Energy. That party member and all allies within earshot are healed for 55...130 Health.
1263.concise description: Touch Spell. Resurrects target party member (50% Health and 5...20% Energy). Heals allies within earshot for 55...130.

1264.name: Doom
1264.description: Spell. Strike target foe for 10...40 lightning (maximum 135) damage for every recharging binding ritual you have.
1264.concise description: Spell. Deals 10...40 lightning damage (maximum 135) for each of your recharging binding rituals.

1265.name: Wielder's Boon
1265.description: Spell. Heal target ally for 15...60 points. If that ally is under the effects of a weapon spell, Wielder's Boon heals for an additional 15...75 Health.
1265.concise description: Spell. Heals for 15...60. Heals for 15...75 more if this ally is under a Weapon [sic] spell.

1266.name: Soothing
1266.description: Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...12 spirit. All foes within its range take twice as long to build adrenaline. This spirit dies after 15...45 seconds.
1266.concise description: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...12 spirit (15...45 second lifespan). Building adrenaline takes twice as long for foes within range.

1267.name: Vital Weapon
1267.description: Weapon Spell. For 5...30 seconds, target ally has a Vital Weapon and has +40...175 maximum Health.

1268.name: Weapon of Quickening
1268.description: Elite Weapon Spell. For 5...25 seconds, target ally has a Weapon of Quickening, and spells and binding rituals recharge 33% faster.
1268.concise description: Elite Weapon Spell. (5...25 seconds.) Spells and binding rituals recharge 33% faster.

1269.name: Signet of Rage
1269.description: Signet. Target foe takes 5...50 holy damage and +5...10 holy damage for each adrenaline skill that foe has.
1269.concise description: Signet. Deals 5...50 holy damage. Deals 5...10 more holy damage for each of target foe's adrenaline skills.

1270.name: Fingers of Chaos
1270.description: Stance. (monster only) For 5 seconds, your attacks: cannot miss rangers; remove enchantments from monks; cause conditions on warriors; interrupt elementalists; and lose a hex when attacking necros. [sic]
1270.concise description: Stance. (monster only) (5 seconds.) Your attacks cannot miss Rangers, remove enchantments from Monks, cause conditions on Warriors, interrupt Elementalists, and remove a hex when attacking Necromancers.

1271.name: Echoing Banishment
1271.description: Shout. Target foe is banished to the mists and his spirit bound to Shiro. If the Spirit Binder is destroyed, the spirit is freed.
1271.concise description: Shout. Target foe is banished to the mists and his spirit bound to Shiro. If the Spirit Binder is destroyed, the spirit is freed.

1273.name: Impossible Odds
1273.description: Skill. All hexes are removed from Shiro. For the next 10 seconds, all of Shiro's attacks are double strikes and hit nearby foes. Shiro tranfers [sic] any conditions from himself to foes he hits.
1273.concise description: Skill. (10 seconds.) All Shiro's attacks are double strikes and hit nearby foes. Shiro transfers conditions from himself to foes he hits. Initial effect: removes all hexes from Shiro.

1274.name: Battle Scars
1274.description: Stance. For 7 seconds, Shiro's attacks gain life stealing equal to the highest damage he takes while in this stance.
1274.concise description: Stance. (7 seconds.) Shiro's attacks gain life stealing equal to the highest damage he takes while in this stance.

1275.name: Riposting Shadows
1275.description: Stance. For 20 seconds, Shiro Shadow Steps to the next foe who attacks you Should be 'him' [sic] and attempts a return attack. If this attack hits, Riposting Shadows is renewed.
1275.concise description: Stance. (20 seconds.) Shiro Shadow Steps to the next foe who attacks target and attempts a return attack. If this attack hits, Riposting Shadows is renewed.

1277.name: Battle Cry
1277.description: Spell. For 60 seconds, players within range move 25% faster, attack 15% faster, and skills recharge 33% faster.
1277.concise description: Spell. (60 seconds.) Players in range move 25% faster, attack 15% faster, and recharge skills 33% faster.

1283.name: Turret Arrow
1283.concise description: Spell. Shoot arrows at up to 6 foes adjacent to target. These arrows strike for +15 and cause Cripple if they hit.

1286.name: Poison Arrow
1286.concise description: Spell. Send out flares that strike any foes in the area for 0 fire damage if they hit. Target is then poisoned for 15 seconds.

1305.name: Shielding Urn
1305.description: Spell. Players within the radius of the urn when it drops share 500 points of damage reduction.
1305.concise description: Spell. Drop effect: players in the radius of the urn share 500 points of damage reduction.

1307.name: Forest's Binding
1307.description: Skill. Fires an impaling spike at target foe which causes target to be hexed with "Binding Chains" if it hits.
1307.concise description: Skill. Projectile: Target foe is hexed with "Binding Chains."

1309.name: Suicide Energy
1309.description: Attack. The next time you land a physical attack, you sacrifice all of your Health and target foe loses all Energy.
1309.concise description: Attack. The next time you land a physical attack, you sacrifice all of your Health and target foe loses all Energy.

1310.name: Suicide Health
1310.description: Attack. The next time you land a physical attack, you sacrifice all of your Health and target foe loses all Health.
1310.concise description: Attack. The next time you land a physical attack, you sacrifice all of your Health and target foe loses all Health.

1311.name: Nightmare Refuge
1311.description: Enchantment Spell. For 10 seconds, 50% of target attacks are blocked, and spells targeting this creature fail 50% of the time. If Nightmare Refuge remains active for its entire duration, it heals Kanaxai for 1,000 Health.
1311.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (10 seconds.) 50% chance to block and spells targeting this creature have 50% chance to fail. If Nightmare Refuge lasts its full duration, it heals Kanaxai for 1,000.

1315.name: Rage of the Sea
1315.description: Skill. For 2 minutes, you have +4 Health regeneration, +1 Energy regeneration, and you move 33% faster.
1315.concise description: Skill. (2 minutes.) You have +4 Health regeneration, +1 Energy regeneration, and move 33% faster.

1324.name: Torment Slash
1324.description: Skill. All enemies directly in front of you are struck for 150 slashing damage, twice.
1324.concise description: Skill. 150 damage to all foes in front of you. Hits twice.

1326.name: Trade Winds
1326.description: Skill. For 10 seconds, you move with the swiftness of the Canthan fleet. This enchantment may also be applied to target allies.
1326.concise description: Skill. (10 seconds.) Target ally moves with the swiftness of the Canthan fleet.

1327.name: Dragon Blast
1327.description: Skill. Send out a projectile that kills target foe if it hits.
1327.concise description: Skill. Projectile: kills target foe if it hits.

1328.name: Imperial Majesty
1328.description: Skill. Target touched foe kowtows before you and takes 80 damage.
1328.concise description: Touch Skill. Target foe kowtows before you and takes 80 damage.

1333.name: Extend Conditions
1333.description: Elite Spell. Spread all conditions from target foe to foes near your target. The durations of those conditions are increased by 5...100% (maximum 30 seconds).
1333.concise description: Elite Spell. Spread all conditions from target foe to foes near your target. Those [sic] durations of those conditions are increased by 5...100% (maximum 30 seconds).

1334.name: Hypochondria
1334.description: Spell. Transfer all conditions from all foes in the area to target foe.
1334.concise description: Spell. Transfer all conditions from foes in the area to target foe.

1335.name: Wastrel's Demise
1335.description: Hex Spell. For 5 seconds, target foe is hexed with Wastrel's Demise. Each second while hexed, target foe and all foes adjacent to that foe take 1...10 damage and an additional 1...10 damage for each second this spell is in effect. This hex ends prematurely if target foe uses a skill.
1335.concise description: Hex Spell. (5 seconds.) Each second while hexed, target foe and all foes adjacent to that foe take 1...10 damage. Foes take +1...10 damage each second this hex is in effect.

1336.name: Spiritual Pain
1336.description: Spell. Target foe takes 15...75 damage. All hostile summoned creatures in the area of that foe take 25...125 damage.
1336.concise description: Spell. Deals 15...75 damage. Deals 25...125 damage to hostile summoned creatures in the area of your target foe.

1337.name: Drain Delusions
1337.description: Spell. Remove one Mesmer hex from target foe. If a hex was removed in this way, that foe loses 1...5 Energy and you gain 4 Energy for each point lost.
1337.concise description: Spell. Removes one Mesmer hex from target foe. Causes 1...5 Energy loss. You gain 4 Energy for each point lost.

1338.name: Persistence of Memory
1338.description: Enchantment Spell. For 5...20 seconds, whenever a spell you cast is interrupted, that spell is instantly recharged.
1338.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (5...20 seconds.) Your interrupted spells recharge instantly.

1339.name: Symbols of Inspiration
1339.description: Elite Skill. For 1...31 seconds, this skill becomes the Elite of target foe. Elite spells you cast use your Fast Casting attribute instead of their normal attributes.
1339.concise description: Elite Skill. (1...31 seconds.) This skill becomes the Elite of target foe. Elite spells you cast use your Fast Casting attribute instead of their normal attributes.

1340.name: Symbolic Celerity
1340.description: Enchantment Spell. For 36...60 seconds, all of your signets use your Fast Casting attribute instead of their normal attributes.
1340.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (36...60 seconds.) Your signets use your Fast Casting attribute.

1341.name: Frustration
1341.description: Hex Spell. For 5...20 seconds, target foe casts spells 50% slower and takes 5...50 damage whenever interrupted. If a skill is interrupted, Frustration deals double damage.
1341.concise description: Hex Spell. (5...20 seconds.) Causes 50% slower spell casting. Target foe takes 5...50 damage whenever interrupted. Deals double damage on skill interrupt.

1342.name: Tease
1342.description: Elite Spell. If target foe is using a skill, that foe and other foes in the area are interrupted and you steal 0...5 Energy from all foes in the area.
1342.concise description: Elite Spell. Interrupts a skill. Interruption effect: also interrupts other foes in the area, and you steal 0...5 Energy from all foes in the area.

1343.name: Ether Phantom
1343.description: Hex Spell. For 10 seconds, target foe has -1 Energy degeneration. If this hex is removed prematurely, that foe loses 1...5 Energy.
1343.concise description: Hex Spell. (10 seconds.) Causes -1 Energy degeneration. Causes 1...5 Energy loss if this hex ends early.

1344.name: Web of Disruption
1344.description: Hex Spell. Interrupt target foe. For 10 seconds, target foe is hexed with Web of Disruption. When this hex ends, that foe is interrupted again.
1344.concise description: Hex Spell. (10 seconds.) Initial effect: interrupts a skill. End effect: interrupts a skill.

1345.name: Enchanter's Conundrum
1345.description: Elite Hex Spell. For 10 seconds, target foe casts enchantments 100...200% slower. If target foe is not under the effects of an enchantment when this hex is applied, that foe and all adjacent foes take 10...100 damage.
1345.concise description: Elite Hex Spell. Causes 100...200% slower enchantment casting (10 seconds). Initial effect: deals 10...100 damage to target and adjacent foes if target foe is not enchanted.

1346.name: Signet of Illusions
1346.description: Elite Signet. Your next 1...3 spell[s] use your Illusion attribute instead of its normal attribute.
1346.concise description: Elite Signet. Your next 1...3 spell[s] use your Illusion attribute instead of its normal attribute.

1347.name: Discharge Enchantment
1347.description: Spell. Remove one enchantment from target foe. If that foe is hexed, this skill recharges 20...50% faster.
1347.concise description: Spell. Removes one enchantment from target foe. 20...50% faster recharge if that foe was hexed.

1348.name: Hex Eater Vortex
1348.description: Elite Spell. Remove a hex from target ally. If a hex is removed in this way, foes near that ally take 30...90 damage and lose one enchantment.
1348.concise description: Elite Spell. Removes one hex from target ally. Removal effect: deals 30...90 damage and removes one enchantment from foes near this ally.

1349.name: Mirror of Disenchantment
1349.description: Spell. Remove one enchantment from target foe. All of that foe's party members also lose that same enchantment.
1349.concise description: Spell. Removes one enchantment from target foe. That foe's party members also lose this enchantment.

1350.name: Simple Thievery
1350.description: Elite Spell. Interrupt target foe's action. If that action was a skill, that skill is disabled for 5...20 seconds, and Simple Thievery is replaced by that skill.
1350.concise description: Elite Spell. Interrupts an action. Interruption effect: If a skill was interrupted, that skill is disabled and Simple Thievery becomes that skill (5...20 seconds).

1351.name: Animate Shambling Horror
1351.description: Spell. Exploit nearest corpse to create a level 1...17 shambling horror. When the shambling horror dies, it is replaced by a level 0...15 jagged horror that causes Bleeding with each of its attacks.
1351.concise description: Spell. Creates a level 1...17 shambling horror. When the shambling horror dies, it is replaced by a level 0...15 jagged horror that causes Bleeding with each of its attacks.

1352.name: Order of Undeath
1352.description: Elite Spell. For 5 seconds, your minions deal +3...16 damage, but you lose 2% of your maximum Health whenever one of your minions hits with an attack.
1352.concise description: Elite Spell. (5 seconds.) Your undead servants deal +3...16 damage.

1353.name: Putrid Flesh
1353.description: Spell. Destroy one of your target animated undead minions. All foes near that creature are Diseased for 5...15 seconds.
1353.concise description: Spell. Destroys one of your undead servants. Inflicts Diseased condition (5...15 seconds) to foes near this servant.

1354.name: Feast for the Dead
1354.description: Spell. Destroy target animated undead ally. All of your other animated undead allies are healed for 10...100 Health.
1354.concise description: Spell. Destroys one of your undead servants. Heals your servants for 10...100.

1355.name: Jagged Bones
1355.description: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 30 seconds, whenever target undead servant dies, it is replaced by a level 0...15 jagged horror that causes Bleeding with each of its attacks.
1355.concise description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) When target undead servant dies, it is replaced by a level 0...15 jagged horror that inflicts Bleeding with attacks.

1356.name: Contagion
1356.description: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 60 seconds, whenever you suffer from a new condition, all foes in the area suffer from that same condition and you sacrifice 10...5% maximum Health.
1356.concise description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (60 seconds.) Whenever you gain a condition, all foes in the area gain that same condition.

1358.name: Ulcerous Lungs
1358.description: Hex Spell. For 10...25 seconds, target foe and all nearby foes suffer from -4 Health degeneration when Bleeding, and whenever they use a shout or chant, they Bleed for 3...15 seconds.
1358.concise description: Hex Spell. Also hexes foes near your target (10...25 seconds). Causes -4 Health degeneration to any of these foes that are Bleeding. Inflicts Bleeding (3...15 seconds) whenever these foes use a shout or chant.

1359.name: Pain of Disenchantment
1359.description: Elite Spell. Target foe loses 1...3 enchantment[s]. If an enchantment was lost in this way, that foe and all adjacent foes lose 10...100 Health.
1359.concise description: Elite Spell. Target foe loses 1...3 enchantment[s]. Removal effect: that foe and all adjacent foes lose 10...100 Health.

1360.name: Mark of Fury
1360.description: Hex Spell. For 5 seconds, allies hitting target foe gain 0...2 strike[s] of adrenaline. When this hex ends, that foe suffers from Cracked Armor for 1...15 second[s].
1360.concise description: Hex Spell. (5 seconds.) Allies hitting target foe gain 0...2 strike[s] of adrenaline. End effect: inflicts Cracked Armor (1...15 second[s].)

1362.name: Corrupt Enchantment
1362.description: Elite Hex Spell. Remove one enchantment from target foe. If an enchantment is removed in this way, that foe suffers from 1...8 Health degeneration for 10 seconds.
1362.concise description: Elite Hex Spell. Removes one enchantment from target foe. Removal effect: 1...8 Health degeneration (10 seconds).

1363.name: Signet of Sorrow
1363.description: Signet. Target foe takes 15...75 damage. If target foe is near a corpse or has a dead pet, this skill recharges instantly.
1363.concise description: Signet. Deals 15...75 damage. Recharges instantly if target foe is near a corpse or has a dead pet.

1364.name: Signet of Suffering
1364.description: Elite Signet. You suffer from Bleeding for 6 seconds. The next Necromancer skill that targets a foe causes Bleeding for 2...16 seconds.
1364.concise description: Elite Signet. You Bleed for 6 seconds. Applies Bleeding (2...16 seconds) to the target of your next Necromancer skill.

1365.name: Signet of Lost Souls
1365.description: Signet. If target foe is below 50% Health, you gain 10...100 Health and 1...10 Energy.
1365.concise description: Signet. You gain 10...100 Health and 1...10 Energy if target foe is below 50% Health.

1366.name: Well of Darkness
1366.description: Well Spell. Exploit nearest corpse to create a Well of Darkness for 5...50 seconds. Hexed foes within the Well of Darkness miss 50% of the time.
1366.concise description: Well Spell. (5...50 seconds.) Hexed foes in this well have 50% chance to miss..

1367.name: Blinding Surge
1367.description: Elite Spell. Target foe is struck for 5...50 lightning damage. That foe and all adjacent foes are Blinded for 3...8 seconds. This spell has 25% armor penetration. If this spell strikes an attacking foe, all adjacent foes are also struck and this spell deals 50% more damage.
1367.concise description: Elite Spell. Deals 5...50 lightning damage. Inflicts Blindness condition (3...8 seconds) on target and adjacent foes. 25% armor penetration. If target was attacking, also hits adjacent foes and deals 50% more damage.

1368.name: Chilling Winds
1368.description: Hex Spell. Target foe and all adjacent foes are struck for 30...60 cold damage. For 10 seconds, the next Water Magic hex targeting a hexed foe lasts 25...100% longer.
1368.concise description: Hex Spell. (10 seconds.) The next water hex on target foe lasts 25...100% longer. Initial effect: 30...60 cold damage. Also strikes adjacent.

1369.name: Lightning Bolt
1369.description: Spell. Send out a Lightning Bolt that strikes for 5...50 lightning damage if it hits. If Lightning Bolt strikes a moving foe, that foe is struck for 5...50 additional lightning damage. This spell has 25% armor penetration.
1369.concise description: Spell. Projectile: deals 5...50 lightning damage. Deals 5...50 more lightning damage if target foe is moving. 25% armor penetration.

1370.name: Storm Djinn's Haste
1370.description: Enchantment Spell. For 10...25 seconds, you move 25% faster. Each second that you are moving, you lose 1 Energy.
1370.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (10...25 seconds.) You move 25% faster.

1371.name: Stone Striker
1371.description: Enchantment Spell. For 5...30 seconds, whenever you take or deal elemental or physical damage, that damage is converted to earth damage.
1371.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (5...30 seconds.) Converts elemental and physical damage you take or deal to earth damage.

1372.name: Sandstorm
1372.description: Elite Spell. Create a Sandstorm at target foe's location. For 10 seconds, nearby foes are struck for 10...30 earth damage each second and attacking foes are struck for an additional 10...30 earth damage each second.
1372.concise description: Elite Spell. Deals 10...30 earth damage each second (10 seconds). Hits foes near target foe's initial location. Hits attacking foes for 10...30 more earth damage each second.

1373.name: Stone Sheath
1373.description: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 5...20 seconds, you and target ally have +1...30 armor and are immune to critical hits. When you cast this spell, all foes near you and your target take 15...70 earth damage and are Weakened for 5...20 seconds.
1373.concise description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (5...20 seconds.) Gives you and target ally +1...30 armor and immunity to critical hits. Initial effect: Foes near you and target ally are struck for 15...70 earth damage and are Weakened (5...20 seconds).

1374.name: Ebon Hawk
1374.description: Spell. Send a projectile that strikes target foe for 10...85 earth damage and causes Weakness for 5...15 seconds if it hits.
1374.concise description: Spell. Projectile: deals 10...85 earth damage and inflicts Weakness condition (5...15 seconds).

1375.name: Stoneflesh Aura
1375.description: Enchantment Spell. For 5...15 seconds, damage you receive is reduced by 1...31, and you are immune to critical attacks.
1375.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (5...15 seconds.) Reduces damage you take by 1...31, and you are immune to critical hits.

1376.name: Glyph of Restoration
1376.description: Glyph. For 15 seconds, your next 2 spells heal you for 30...105 Health, and you are healed for 150...400% of the Energy cost of each spell.
1376.concise description: Glyph. (15 seconds.) Your next 2 spells heal you for 30...105, and you are healed for 150...400% of the Energy cost of each spell.

1377.name: Ether Prism
1377.description: Elite Skill. For 3 seconds, all damage you take is reduced by 75%. When Ether Prism ends, you gain 5...20 Energy.
1377.concise description: Elite Skill. (3 seconds.) All damage you take is reduced by 75%. End effect: gain 5...20 Energy.

1378.name: Master of Magic
1378.description: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 1...61 second[s], all of your elemental attributes are set to 8...14 and your elemental spells return 30% of their Energy cost.
1378.concise description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (1...61 second[s]). Your elemental attributes are set to 8...14 and elemental spells return 30% of their Energy cost.

1379.name: Glowing Gaze
1379.description: Spell. Target foe takes 5...50 fire damage. If that foe is on Fire, "Fire" is capitalized, unlike other descriptions which state "on fire" [sic] you gain 5 Energy plus 1 Energy for every 2 ranks of Energy Storage.
1379.concise description: Spell. Deals 5...50 fire damage. You gain 5 Energy plus 1 Energy for every 2 ranks of Energy Storage if target foe is Burning.

1380.name: Savannah Heat
1380.description: Elite Spell. You create Savannah Heat at target foe's location. For 5 seconds, all nearby foes take 5...20 fire damage for each second this spell has been in effect.
1380.concise description: Elite Spell. Deals 5...20 fire damage for each second since casting this spell (5 seconds).

1381.name: Flame Djinn's Haste
1381.description: Enchantment Spell. All adjacent foes are struck for 15...120 fire damage. For 8...14 seconds, you move 25% faster. Flame Djinn's Haste recharges 50% faster if a foe was struck by this spell.
1381.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (8...14 seconds.) You move 25% faster. Initial effect: deals 15...120 fire damage to foes adjacent to you. If you damage a foe with this spell, it recharges 50% faster.

1382.name: Freezing Gust
1382.description: Hex Spell. If target foe is under the effect of a Water Magic hex, that foe is struck for 20...80 cold damage. Otherwise, that foe moves 66% slower for 1...5 second[s].
1382.concise description: Hex Spell. Deals 20...80 cold damage if target foe is hexed with Water Magic. Otherwise, this foe moves 66% slower (1...5 second[s]).

1389.name: Light of Seborhin
1389.description: Skill. Dropping the Light of Seborhin next to a Harbinger is the only means by which to damage a Harbinger.
1389.concise description: Skill. Harbingers can only be damaged by dropping the Light of Seborhin next to them.

1390.name: Judge's Intervention
1390.description: Enchantment Spell. For 10 seconds, the next time target ally receives damage that would be fatal, the damage is negated and one nearby foe takes 30...180 holy damage.
1390.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (10 seconds.) Negates the next fatal damage. Negation effect: deals 30...180 holy damage to one foe near target ally.

1391.name: Supportive Spirit
1391.description: Enchantment Spell. For 5...23 seconds, whenever target ally takes damage while knocked down, that ally is healed for 5...35 Health.
1391.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (5...23 seconds.) Heals for 5...35 whenever target ally takes damage while knocked-down.

1392.name: Watchful Healing
1392.description: Enchantment Spell. For 10 seconds, target ally gains +1...4 Health regeneration. If this skill ends prematurely, that ally gains 30...120 Health.
1392.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (10 seconds.) Target ally has +1...4 Health regeneration and gains 30...120 Health if this enchantment ends early.

1393.name: Healer's Boon
1393.description: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 10...55 seconds. a period is used instead of a comma [sic] Healing Prayers spells cast 50% faster and heal for 50% more Health.
1393.concise description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (10...55 seconds.) Healing Prayers spells cast 50% faster and heal for 50% more.

1394.name: Healer's Covenant
1394.description: Elite Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, your Healing Prayers spells heal for 25% less Health, but cost 1...3 Energy.
1394.concise description: Elite Enchantment Spell. Your Healing Prayers spells cost 1...3 less Energy.

1395.name: Balthazar's Pendulum
1395.description: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 5...10 seconds, the next time target ally would be knocked down by a foe, that foe is knocked down instead.
1395.concise description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (5...10 seconds.) Causes knock-down to the next foe attempting to knock-down target ally.

1396.name: Words of Comfort
1396.description: Spell. Target ally is healed for 15...60 Health and an additional 15...45 Health if that ally is suffering from a condition.
1396.concise description: Spell. Heals for 15...60. Heals for 15...45 more if target ally has a condition.

1397.name: Light of Deliverance
1397.description: Elite Spell. All party members are healed for 5...70 Health.
1397.concise description: Elite Spell. Heals entire party for 5...70.

1398.name: Scourge Enchantment
1398.description: Hex Spell. For 30 seconds, each time target foe is the target of an enchantment, the caster of that enchantment takes 15...75 damage.
1398.concise description: Hex Spell. (30 seconds.) Deals 15...75 damage to anyone casting an enchantment on target foe.

1399.name: Shield of Absorption
1399.description: Enchantment Spell. For 3...7 seconds, damage received by target ally is reduced by 5 each time that ally is hit while under the effects of this enchantment.
1399.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (3...7 seconds.) Reduces incoming damage by 5 each time target ally takes damage.

1400.name: Reversal of Damage
1400.description: Enchantment Spell. For 8 seconds, the next time target ally would take damage, the foe dealing the damage takes that damage instead (maximum 5...75).
1400.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (8 seconds.) Negates the next damage and hits the source for that same amount (maximum 5...75).

1401.name: Mending Touch
1401.description: Spell. Touched ally loses two conditions and is healed for 15...60 Health for each condition removed in this way.
1401.concise description: Touch Spell. Removes two conditions. Heals for 15...60 for each condition removed.

1402.name: Critical Chop
1402.description: Axe Attack. If this attack hits, you inflict +5...20 damage. If this attack results in a critical hit, target foe is interrupted.
1402.concise description: Axe Attack. Deals +5...20 damage. Interrupts an action if you land a critical hit.

1403.name: Agonizing Chop
1403.description: Axe Attack. When this attack hits, you deal +5...20 damage. If target foe is suffering from a Deep Wound, you interrupt that foe's action.
1403.concise description: Axe Attack. Deals +5...20 damage. Interrupts an action if target foe has a Deep Wound.

1404.name: Flail
1404.description: Stance. For 1...15 second[s], you attack 33% faster but move 33% slower.

1405.name: Charging Strike
1405.description: Elite Stance. For 1...10 second[s], you run 33% faster. Your next successful melee hit does +10...40 damage and this stance ends. This stance ends if you use a skill.
1405.concise description: Elite Stance. (1...10 second[s].) You move 33% faster and deal +10...40 damage with your next melee hit.

1406.name: Headbutt
1406.description: Elite Skill. Target touched foe takes 40...100 damage. You are Dazed for 5...20 seconds.

1407.name: Lion's Comfort
1407.description: Skill. All of your signets are disabled for 12 seconds. You are healed for 50...110 Health, and gain 0...3 strike[s] of adrenaline.
1407.concise description: Skill. You are healed for 50...110 and gain 0...3 strike[s] of adrenaline.

1408.name: Rage of the Ntouka
1408.description: Elite Skill. Gain 1...7 strike[s] of adrenaline. For 10 seconds, whenever you use an adrenal skill, that skill recharges for 5 seconds.

1409.name: Mokele Smash
1409.description: Hammer Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +5...20 damage and gain 2 strikes of adrenaline.
1409.concise description: Hammer Attack. Deals +5...20 damage and you gain 2 strikes of adrenaline.

1410.name: Overbearing Smash
1410.description: Hammer Attack. If this attack hits, you deal +1...20 damage. If target foe is knocked down, that foe is Dazed for 1...8 second[s].
1410.concise description: Hammer Attack. Deals +1...20 damage. If target foe is knocked down, they are Dazed (1...8 second[s]).

1411.name: Signet of Stamina
1411.description: Signet. You have +50...300 maximum Health. This signet ends if you successfully hit with an attack.

1412.name: "You're All Alone!"
1412.description: Elite Shout. If target foe isn't near an ally, that foe suffers from Cripple and Weakness for 8 seconds.
1412.concise description: Elite Shout. Inflicts Cripple and Weakness conditions (8 seconds).

1413.name: Burst of Aggression
1413.description: Stance. For 2...10 seconds, you attack 33% faster. When this stance ends, you lose all adrenaline.

1414.name: Enraging Charge
1414.description: Stance. For 5...15 seconds, you move 25% faster. Enraging Charge ends when you successfully strike a target, at which point you gain 0...3 strike[s] of adrenaline if you hit with a melee attack.
1414.concise description: Stance. (5...15 seconds.) You move 25% faster. Gain +0...3 adrenaline on your next melee attack.

1415.name: Crippling Slash
1415.description: Elite Sword Attack. If this attack hits, target foe is Crippled for 5...15 seconds and begins Bleeding for 10...25 seconds.
1415.concise description: Elite Sword Attack. Inflicts Crippled condition (5...15 seconds) and Bleeding condition (10...25 seconds).

1416.name: Barbarous Slice
1416.description: Sword Attack. If this attack hits, you deal +5...30 damage. If you are currently not in a stance, you also inflict Bleeding for 5...15 seconds.
1416.concise description: Sword Attack. Deals +5...30 damage. Inflicts Bleeding condition (5...15 seconds) if you are not in a stance.

1444.name: Summon Torment
1444.description: Spell. Any nearby rifts or altars become much more Tormented
1444.concise description: Spell. Any nearby rifts or altars become much more Tormented.

1451.name: Hunger's Bite
1451.description: Attack. Steal 30 Health from target foe for each condition on that foe. Target foe randomly gains two of the following conditions for 15 seconds: Poisoned, Bleeding, Diseased, Deep Wound, Crippled, Weakness, or Dazed. This skill cannot be disabled.
1451.concise description: Attack. Steal 30 Health for each condition on target foe. This foe randomly gains two of the following conditions (15 seconds): Poisoned, Bleeding, Diseased, Deep Wound, Crippled, Weakness, or Dazed. This skill cannot be disabled.

1465.name: Prepared Shot
1465.description: Elite Bow Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +10...25 damage. If you are under the effects of a preparation, you gain 1...9 Energy.
1465.concise description: Elite Bow Attack. Deals +10...25 damage. You gain 1...9 Energy if you have a preparation active.

1466.name: Burning Arrow
1466.description: Elite Bow Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +10...30 damage and cause Burning for 1...7 seconds.
1466.concise description: Elite Bow Attack. Deals +10...30 damage. Inflicts Burning condition (1...7 seconds).

1467.name: Arcing Shot
1467.description: Bow Attack. If this arrow hits, it strikes for +10...25 damage. This arrow cannot be blocked, but it moves 50% slower.

1468.name: Strike as One
1468.description: Elite Shout. Your animal companion instantly moves to your target and causes Bleeding for 5...15 seconds with its next attack. The next time you hit with an attack, target foe is Crippled for 5...15 seconds.
1468.concise description: Elite Shout. Your animal companion instantly moves to your target and inflicts Bleeding (5...15 seconds) with its next attack. The next time you hit with an attack, you inflict Crippled condition (5...15 seconds).

1469.name: Crossfire
1469.description: Bow Attack. If this attack hits target foe, it deals +5...20 damage. If that foe is near any of your allies, this attack cannot be blocked.
1469.concise description: Bow Attack. Deals +5...20 damage. Unblockable if target foe is near any of your allies.

1470.name: Barbed Arrows
1470.description: Preparation. For 24 seconds, your arrows cause Bleeding for 3...15 seconds. You have -40 armor while activating this skill.
1470.concise description: Preparation. (24 seconds.) Your arrows inflict Bleeding condition (3...15 seconds).

1471.name: Scavenger's Focus
1471.description: Elite Skill. For 10 seconds if you strike a foe who is suffering from a condition you gain 3...12 Energy.
1471.concise description: Elite Skill. (10 seconds). You gain 3...12 Energy if you strike a foe who has a condition.

1472.name: Toxicity
1472.description: Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...10 spirit. Poisoned or Diseased creatures within its range suffer -2 Health degeneration. This spirit dies after 30...90 seconds.
1472.concise description: Nature Ritual. Creates a level 1...10 spirit (30...90 second lifespan.) Poisoned or Diseased creatures within range have -2 Health degeneration.

1473.name: Quicksand
1473.description: Elite Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...10 spirit. All non-spirit creatures within its range lose 1 Energy each time they attack or use a skill. This spirit dies after 30...90 seconds.
1473.concise description: Elite Nature Ritual. Creates a level 1...10 spirit (30...90 second lifespan). Creatures lose 1 Energy each time they attack or use a skill. Does not affect spirits.

1474.name: Storm's Embrace
1474.description: Stance. For 10 seconds, you move 25% faster. This stance is refreshed whenever you take Elemental damage.
1474.concise description: Stance. (10 seconds.) You move 25% faster. Renewal: whenever you take elemental damage.

1475.name: Trapper's Speed
1475.description: Stance. For 5...30 seconds, your Traps recharge 25% faster and activate 25% faster. This Stance ends if you successfully hit with an attack.
1475.concise description: Stance. (5...30 seconds.) Your traps recharge 25% faster and activate 25% faster.

1476.name: Tripwire
1476.description: Trap. When Tripwire is triggered, all nearby foes are struck for 5...20 piercing damage. Any Crippled foes are knocked down. Tripwire ends after 90 seconds. While activating this skill, you are easily interrupted.
1476.concise description: Trap. (90 seconds.) Deals 5...20 piercing damage to nearby foes. Causes knock-down to Crippled foes.

1478.name: Renewing Surge
1478.description: Hex Spell. For 8 seconds, target foe suffers 2...12 damage each second. When this hex ends, you gain 1...8 Energy.
1478.concise description: Hex Spell. (8 seconds.) Deals 2...12 damage each second. End effect: You gain 1...8 energy.

1479.name: Offering of Spirit
1479.description: Elite Spell. Gain 8...17 Energy. If any spirits are within earshot, you do not sacrifice Health.
1479.concise description: Elite Spell. You gain 8...17 Energy. You do not sacrifice Health if any spirits are within earshot.

1480.name: Spirit's Gift
1480.description: Enchantment Spell. For 60 seconds, whenever you create a creature, all allies near that creature gain 5...50 Health and lose 1 condition.
1480.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (60 seconds.) Whenever you create a creature, all nearby allies gain 5...50 Health and lose one condition.

1481.name: Death Pact Signet
1481.description: Signet. Resurrect target party member with your current Health and 15...100% Energy. The next time that ally dies within 120 seconds, so do you.
1481.concise description: Signet. Resurrects target party member with your current Health and 15...100% maximum Energy.

1482.name: Reclaim Essence
1482.description: Elite Spell. All of your Spirits die. You gain 5...20 Energy and all of your Binding Rituals are recharged if a Spirit died in this way.
1482.concise description: Elite Spell. All of your Spirits die. If a Spirit dies in this way, you gain 5...20 Energy and all of your Binding Rituals are recharged.

1483.name: Banishing Strike
1483.description: Melee Attack. If it hits, this attack deals 10...60 holy damage. It deals double damage to summoned creatures.
1483.concise description: Melee Attack. Deals 10...60 holy damage. Deals double damage to summoned creatures.

1484.name: Mystic Sweep
1484.description: Melee Attack. If this attack hits, you deal +3...12 damage. If you are enchanted, this attack deals an additional +3...12 damage.
1484.concise description: Melee Attack. Deals +3...12 damage. Deals an additional +3...12 damage if you are enchanted.

1485.name: Eremite's Attack
1485.description: Scythe Attack. If it hits, this attack deals +1...10 damage and removes a Dervish enchantment. If an enchantment is removed, you do an additional +1...10 damage and strike all adjacent foes.
1485.concise description: Scythe Attack. Deals +1...10 damage and removes a Dervish enchantment. Removal Effect:  Deals +1...10 damage and strikes all adjacent foes.

1486.name: Reap Impurities
1486.description: Melee Attack. If this attack hits, you deal +3...15 damage. Each foe you hit loses 1 condition. For each foe who loses a condition, all foes adjacent to that target foe take 10...40 holy damage.
1486.concise description: Melee Attack. Deals +3...15 damage. Struck foes lose 1 condition. Removal Effect: all foes adjacent to those struck take 10...40 holy damage.

1487.name: Twin Moon Sweep
1487.description: Melee Attack. You lose 1 Dervish enchantment and gain 10...50 Health. If an enchantment is lost in this way, you cannot be blocked, you strike twice, and you gain an additional 10...70 Health.
1487.concise description: Melee Attack. Remove 1 of your Dervish enchantments. Gain 10...50 Health. Removal effect: unblockable, attack twice, and gain 10...70 more Health.

1488.name: Victorious Sweep
1488.description: Melee Attack. If this attack hits, you deal +5...25 damage. If target foe has less Health than you, you gain 30...80 Health.
1488.concise description: Melee Attack. Deals +5...25 damage. You gain 30...80 Health for each foe you hit that has less Health than you.

1489.name: Irresistible Sweep
1489.description: Scythe Attack. Deal +3...15 damage and lose 1 Dervish enchantment. If you lose an enchantment in this way, Irresistible Sweep cannot be blocked, removes a stance, and deals +3...15 additional damage.
1489.concise description: Scythe Attack. Deals +3...15 damage. Remove 1 of your Dervish enchantments. Removal effect: unblockable, removes a stance, deals +3...15 additional damage.

1490.name: Pious Assault
1490.description: Melee Attack. If it hits, this attack deals +10...20 damage and removes 1 Dervish enchantment. If a Dervish enchantment was removed, this skill recharges 75% faster and adjacent foes take 10...30 damage.
1490.concise description: Melee Attack. Deals +10...20 damage. Removes 1 of your Dervish enchantments. Removal Effect: this skill recharges 75% faster and adjacent foes take 10...30 damage.

1491.name: Mystic Twister
1491.description: Spell. Deals 10...60 cold damage to all nearby foes. If you are enchanted, this spell deals an additional 10...60 cold damage.
1491.concise description: Spell. Deals 10...60 cold damage to all nearby foes. Deals 10...60 more cold damage if you are enchanted.

1493.name: Grenth's Fingers
1493.description: Flash Enchantment Spell. All nearby foes are struck for 10...40 cold damage. For 30 seconds, your attacks deal cold damage. When this enchantment ends, you transfer&nbsp; 1...2 condition[s] to all nearby foes. Additional word spacing (i.e. 2 spaces instead of the usual 1 space) after "transfer". [sic]
1493.concise description: Flash Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Your attacks deal cold damage. Initial effect: hits nearby foes for 10...40 cold damage. End effect: transfers 1...2 condition[s] to all nearby foes.

1495.name: Aura of Thorns
1495.description: Flash Enchantment Spell. All nearby foes begin Bleeding for 5...15 seconds. For 30 seconds, this enchantment does nothing. When this enchantment ends, all nearby foes are Crippled for 3...8 seconds.
1495.concise description: Flash Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Initial effect: inflicts Bleeding condition (5...15 seconds) on nearby foes. End effect: inflicts Crippled condition (3...8 seconds) on nearby foes.

1496.name: Balthazar's Rage
1496.description: Flash Enchantment Spell. All nearby foes are set on fire for 1...3 second[s]. For 20 seconds afterward, this enchantment does nothing. When this enchantment ends, you gain 1...2 strike[s] of adrenaline if any foes are within earshot.
1496.concise description: Flash Enchantment Spell. (20 seconds.) Initial Effect: Inflicts burning (1...3 second[s]) on nearby foes.  End effect: gain 1...2 strike[s] of adrenaline if any foes are within earshot.

1497.name: Dust Cloak
1497.description: Flash Enchantment Spell. All adjacent foes are struck for 10...40 earth damage. For 30 seconds, your attacks deal earth damage. When this enchantment ends, all adjacent foes are Blinded for 1...4 second[s].
1497.concise description: Flash Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Your attacks deal earth damage. Initial effect: deals 10...40 earth damage to adjacent foes. End effect: inflicts Blindness condition (1...4 second[s]) on adjacent foes.

1498.name: Staggering Force
1498.description: Flash Enchantment Spell. All nearby foes are struck for 10...40 earth damage. For 30 seconds, your attacks deal earth damage. When this enchantment ends, all nearby foes have Cracked Armor for 1...10 second[s].
1498.concise description: Flash Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Your attacks deal earth damage. Initial effect: deals 10...40 earth damage to nearby foes.  End effect: inflicts Cracked Armor condition (1...10 second[s]) on nearby foes.

1499.name: Pious Renewal
1499.description: Elite Flash Enchantment Spell. For 8 seconds, nothing happens. When this enchantment ends, Pious Renewal is recharged and you gain 0...5 Energy and 0...30 Health.
1499.concise description: Elite Flash Enchantment Spell. (8 seconds.) End Effect: recharges itself and you gain 0...5 Energy and 0...30 Health.

1500.name: Mirage Cloak
1500.description: Flash Enchantment Spell. For 1...7 second[s], you have a 40...80% chance to block incoming attacks. When you cast this enchantment, all nearby foes are struck for 10...40 earth damage.
1500.concise description: Flash Enchantment Spell. (1...7 second[s].) You have 40...80% chance to block. Initial Effect: deals 10...40 earth damage to nearby foes.

1502.name: Arcane Zeal
1502.description: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 10 seconds, whenever you cast a spell, you gain 1 Energy for each enchantment on you (maximum 1...7 Energy).
1502.concise description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (10 seconds.) You gain 1 Energy (maximum 1...7) for each enchantment on you whenever you cast a spell.

1503.name: Mystic Vigor
1503.description: Enchantment Spell. For 20 seconds, every time you successfully hit with an attack, you gain 3...15 Health for each enchantment on you (maximum 25 Health).
1503.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (20 seconds.) You gain 3...15 Health (maximum 25) for each enchantment on you whenever you hit with an attack.

1504.name: Watchful Intervention
1504.description: Enchantment Spell. For 60 seconds, the next time damage drops target ally's Health below 25%, that ally is healed for 50...200 Health.
1504.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (60 seconds.) Heals for 50...200 the next time damage drops target ally's Health below 25%.

1505.name: Vow of Piety
1505.description: Enchantment Spell. For 20 seconds, you have +24 armor and +1...4 Health regeneration. Vow of Piety renews whenever an enchantment on you ends.
1505.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (20 seconds) +24 armor and +1...4 Health regeneration. Renewal: Whenever an enchantment on you ends.

1506.name: Vital Boon
1506.description: Enchantment Spell. For 20 seconds, you have +40...100 maximum Health. When this enchantment ends, you are healed for 75...200 Health.
1506.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (20 seconds.) You have +40...100 maximum Health. End effect: Heals you for 75...200.

1507.name: Heart of Holy Flame
1507.description: Flash Enchantment Spell. All nearby foes take 5...30 holy damage. For 30 seconds, your attacks deal holy damage. When this enchantment ends, all nearby foes are set on fire for 2...5 seconds.
1507.concise description: Flash Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Your attacks deal holy damage. Initial effect: deals 5...30 holy damage to nearby foes. End effect: inflicts Burning condition (2...5 seconds) on nearby foes.

1508.name: Extend Enchantments
1508.description: Skill. For 10 seconds, your next Dervish enchantment lasts 10...150% longer.
1508.concise description: Skill. (10 seconds.) Your next Dervish enchantment lasts 10...150% longer.

1509.name: Faithful Intervention
1509.description: Enchantment Spell. If damage drops your Health below 50%, Faithful Intervention ends. When Faithful Intervention ends, you are healed for 30...150 Health.
