1509.concise description: Enchantment Spell. You gain 30...150 Health the next time damage drops your Health below 50%.

1510.name: Sand Shards
1510.description: Flash Enchantment Spell. For 30 seconds, the next 1...5 time[s] you hit with a scythe, all other adjacent foes take 10...60 earth damage.
1510.concise description: Flash Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Deal 10...60 earth damage to all other adjacent foes whenever you hit with your scythe.

1512.name: Lyssa's Haste
1512.description: Flash Enchantment Spell. For 3...15 seconds, your Dervish enchantments recharge 33% faster. When you activate this enchantment, all adjacent foes are interrupted. When this enchantment ends, all adjacent foes are interrupted. 50% failure chance unless Wind Prayers 5 or higher.
1512.concise description: Flash Enchantment Spell. (3...15 seconds.) Your Dervish enchantments recharge 33% faster. Initial Effect: interrupts all adjacent foes. End Effect: interrupts all adjacent foes.

1513.name: Guiding Hands
1513.description: Enchantment Spell. For 20 seconds, your next 0...3 attack[s] cannot be blocked. When activated, this skill removes the Blindness condition.
1513.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (20 seconds.) Your next 0...3 attack[s] cannot be blocked. Initial effect: removes Blindness.

1514.name: Fleeting Stability
1514.description: Flash Enchantment Spell. For 2...6 seconds, you cannot be knocked down and move 25% faster. This enchantment ends prematurely if it prevents a knockdown.
1514.concise description: Flash Enchantment Spell. (2...6 seconds.) You cannot be knocked down and move 25% faster. Ends if knockdown prevented.

1515.name: Armor of Sanctity
1515.description: Enchantment Spell. All adjacent foes suffer from Weakness for 5...15 seconds. For 15 seconds, you take 5...20 less damage from foes suffering from a condition.
1515.concise description: Enchantment Spell. Inflicts Weakness condition on all adjacent foes (5...15). You take 5...20 less damage from foes with a condition. (15 seconds.)

1516.name: Mystic Regeneration
1516.description: Enchantment Spell. For 5...20 seconds, you have  +1...4 Health regeneration for each enchantment (maximum of 8) on you.
1516.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (5...20 seconds.) You have +1...4 Health regeneration for each enchantment (maximum of 8) on you.

1517.name: Vow of Silence
1517.description: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 5...10 seconds, you cannot be the target of spells, and you cannot cast spells.
1517.concise description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (5...10 seconds.) Spells cannot target you.

1518.name: Avatar of Balthazar
1518.description: Elite Form. For 10...90 seconds, you gain +20 armor against physical damage, you gain adrenaline 25% faster, your attacks deal holy damage, and whenever you lose a Dervish enchantment, nearby foes are set on fire for 1...3 second[s]. This skill is disabled for 45 seconds.
1518.concise description: Elite Form. (10...90 seconds.) You gain +20 armor against physical damage, you gain adrenaline 25% faster, your attacks deal holy damage, you inflict Burning (1...3 second[s]) on nearby foes whenever you lose a Dervish enchantment. This skill is disabled for 45 seconds.

1519.name: Avatar of Dwayna
1519.description: Elite Form. For 10...90 seconds, your attacks deal holy damage. Whenever you use a Dervish attack skill, you lose 1 hex. Whenever you lose a Dervish enchantment, all allies in earshot are healed for 5...50 Health. This skill is disabled for 45 seconds.
1519.concise description: Elite Form. (10...90 seconds.) You deal holy damage. Whenever you use a Dervish attack skill, you lose 1 hex. Heal allies in earshot for 5...50 Health when you lose a Dervish enchantment.

1520.name: Avatar of Grenth
1520.description: Elite Form. For 10...90 seconds, your scythe attacks deal dark damage, and steal 0...12 Health. You are immune to Disease, and inflict Disease on all adjacent foes for 3 seconds whenever you lose a Dervish enchantment. This skill is disabled for 45 seconds.
1520.concise description: Elite Form. (10...90 seconds.) Your scythe attacks deal dark damage and steal 0...12 Health. You are immune to Disease. Apply Disease to all adjacent foes (3 seconds) when you lose a Dervish enchantment. This skill is disabled for 45 seconds.

1521.name: Avatar of Lyssa
1521.description: Elite Form. For 10...90 seconds, your Dervish enchantments recharge 50% faster and your attacks deal chaos damage. Whenever you lose a Dervish enchantment, steal 1 Energy from all nearby foes. This skill is disabled for 45 seconds.
1521.concise description: Elite Form. (10...90 seconds.) Your Dervish enchantments recharge 50% faster and deal chaos damage with attacks. Steal 1 Energy from nearby foes when you lose a Dervish enchantment. This skill is disabled for 45 seconds.

1522.name: Avatar of Melandru
1522.description: Elite Form. For 10...90 seconds, you have +150 Health, +30 elemental armor, and your attacks deal earth damage. Whenever you lose a Dervish enchantment, all party members in earshot lose 1 condition. This skill is disabled for 45 seconds.
1522.concise description: Elite Form. (10...90 seconds.) You have +150 maximum Health, +30 elemental armor, and your attacks deal earth damage. Cure 1 condition from all party members in earshot whenever you lose a Dervish enchantment.

1523.name: Meditation
1523.description: Enchantment Spell. Lose all adrenaline. For 20 seconds, you gain 1...4 Energy every time an enchantment on you ends.
1523.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (20 seconds.) Gain 1...4 Energy whenever an enchantment on you ends.

1524.name: Eremite's Zeal
1524.description: Enchantment Spell. You gain 1...3 Energy for each foe within earshot, maximum 8 Energy. For 10 seconds afterward, this enchantment does nothing. When this enchantment ends, you gain 1...3 Energy for each foe within earshot, maximum 8 Energy.
1524.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (10 seconds.) Initial effect: you gain 1...3 Energy (maximum 8) for each foe in earshot. End effect: you gain 1...3 Energy (maximum 8) for each foe in earshot.

1525.name: Natural Healing
1525.description: Spell. You are healed for 50...170 Health. If you are not enchanted, this spell activates 50% faster.
1525.concise description: Spell. Heals you for 50...170. This skill activates 50% faster if you are not enchanted.

1526.name: Imbue Health
1526.description: Spell. Target other ally is healed for 5...50% of your current Health (maximum 300 Health).
1526.concise description: Spell. Heals for 5...50% of your current Health (maximum 300).

1527.name: Mystic Healing
1527.description: Spell. You are healed for 5...65 Health. Also heals all enchanted party members for 5...65 Health.
1527.concise description: Spell. Heals you for 5...65. Heals all enchanted party members for 5...65 Health.

1528.name: Dwayna's Touch
1528.description: Spell. Target touched ally is healed for 15...60 Health for each Enchantment on you (maximum 150).
1528.concise description: Touch Spell. Heals for 15...60 (maximum 150) for each enchantment on you.

1529.name: Pious Restoration
1529.description: Spell. You gain 80...150 Health and remove 1 Dervish enchantment. If an enchantment was removed in this way, you also lose 1...2 hex[es].
1529.concise description: Spell. Gain 80...150 Health and remove 1 Dervish enchantment. Removal effect: lose 1...2 hex[es].

1530.name: Signet of Pious Light
1530.description: Signet. Remove 1 Dervish enchantment. Target ally is healed for 30...150 Health. If an enchantment was removed in this way, this signet recharges 75% faster.
1530.concise description: Signet. Heals for 30...150. Removes one of your Dervish enchantments. Removal effect: recharges 75% faster.

1531.name: Intimidating Aura
1531.description: Enchantment Spell. For 60 seconds, you have +40...100 max Health and take 1...10 less damage from foes with less Health than you.
1531.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (60 seconds.) You have +40...100 max Health and take 1...10 damage from foes with less Health than you.

1532.name: Mystic Sandstorm
1532.description: Spell. Create a sandstorm at your location that lasts 3 seconds. Each second, foes nearby this location take 10...20 earth damage. Attacking foes take an additional 10...20 damage. If you are enchanted when you cast this spell, it lasts twice as long.
1532.concise description: Spell. (3 seconds.) Deals 10...20 earth damage each second. Deals an additional 10...20 damage to attacking foes. Hits foes nearby your initial location. Lasts twice as long if you are enchanted.

1533.name: Winds of Disenchantment
1533.description: Spell. Lose 1 Dervish enchantment.  If a Dervish enchantment was removed in this way, all nearby foes lose 1 enchantment and take 20...80 cold damage.
1533.concise description: Spell. Remove one of your Dervish enchantments. Removal effect: all nearby foes lose 1 enchantment and take 20...80 cold damage.

1534.name: Rending Touch
1534.description: Spell. Deals 15...65 cold damage to target foe. You lose one Dervish enchantment. If an enchantment was removed, target foe loses 1 enchantment and you gain 1 strike of adrenaline.
1534.concise description: Touch Spell. Deals 15...65 cold damage. Lose 1 Dervish enchantment. Removal effect: target foe loses 1 enchantment and you gain 1 strike of adrenaline.

1535.name: Crippling Sweep
1535.description: Scythe Attack. If this attack hits a foe, that foe is Crippled for 3...12 seconds. This skill deals +3...15 extra damage if that foe is moving.
1535.concise description: Scythe Attack. (3...12 seconds.) Inflicts Cripple [sic] condition. Deals +3...15 damage to moving foes.

1536.name: Wounding Strike
1536.description: Elite Scythe Attack. If this attack hits, you do +5...20 damage, target foe suffers from Bleeding for 5...20 seconds, and you lose 1 Dervish enchantment. If an enchantment is removed, target foe also suffers from a Deep Wound for 5...20 seconds.
1536.concise description: Elite Scythe Attack. Deals +5...20 damage and inflicts Bleeding condition (5...20 seconds). Remove 1 Dervish enchantment. Removal Effect: inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...20 seconds).

1537.name: Wearying Strike
1537.description: Scythe Attack. You remove 1 Dervish enchantment. If an enchantment was removed, you inflict a Deep Wound for 3...10 seconds. You suffer from Weakness for 10 seconds if an enchantment is not removed.
1537.concise description: Scythe Attack. Remove 1 Dervish Enchantment. Removal Effect: Inflicts Deep Wound condition (3...10 seconds).

1538.name: Lyssa's Assault
1538.description: Scythe Attack. This attack interrupts an action if it hits. If you are enchanted, any skill you interrupt is disabled for additional 1...10 second[s]. This attack does 50% normal damage.
1538.concise description: Scythe Attack. Interrupts an action. If you are enchanted, the interrupted skill is disabled for an additional 1...10 second[s]. This attack does 50% of normal damage.

1539.name: Chilling Victory
1539.description: Scythe Attack. If it hits, this attack strikes for +3...15 damage. For each foe hit who has less Health than you, that foe and all adjacent foes are struck for 10...30 cold damage.
1539.concise description: Scythe Attack. Deals +3...15 damage. Deals 10...30 cold damage to each foe hit who has less Health than you and foes adjacent to those targets.

1540.name: Conviction
1540.description: Flash Enchantment Spell. For 10 seconds, you gain +10 armor if you have a condition and gain 1...3 Health regen [sic] for each condition you are suffering from. When this enchantment ends, you are cured of 1...2 condition[s].
1540.concise description: Flash Enchantment Spell. (10 seconds.) Gain +10 armor while conditioned. Gain 1...3 Health regeneration for each condition you have. End Effect: Remove 1...2 condition[s].

1541.name: Enchanted Haste
1541.description: Flash Enchantment Spell. For 7 seconds, you move 25% faster. If this enchantment ends prematurely, you lose 1 condition.
1541.concise description: Flash Enchantment Spell. (7 seconds). You move 25% faster. Lose 1 condition if this enchantment ends prematurely.

1542.name: Pious Concentration
1542.description: Stance. For 5...20 seconds, you cannot be interrupted, but each time you would have been interrupted, you lose 1 Dervish enchantment or Pious Concentration ends.

1543.name: Pious Haste
1543.description: Stance. You remove 1 Dervish enchantment and for 1...7 second[s] you move 25% faster. If an enchantment was removed you move 50% faster instead.
1543.concise description: Stance. (1...7 second[s].) Lose 1 Dervish enchantment and move 25% faster. Removal Effect: Run 50% faster instead.

1544.name: Whirling Charge
1544.description: Flash Enchantment Spell. For 1...6 second[s], you move 33% faster than normal. The next time you strike a foe, all other nearby foes take 10...60 cold damage and this enchantment ends.
1544.concise description: Flash Enchantment Spell. (1...6 second[s].) You move 33% faster. Deal 10...60 cold damage to all other nearby foes the next time you hit a foe and this enchantment ends.

1545.name: Test of Faith
1545.description: Spell. Deals 15...65 cold damage and takes 1 enchantment from target foe. If that foe was not enchanted, that foe is Dazed for 1...4 second[s].
1545.concise description: Touch Spell. Deals 15...65 cold damage and removes 1 enchantment. Target foe is Dazed for 1...4 second[s] if that foe was not enchanted.

1546.name: Blazing Spear
1546.description: Spear Attack. If this attack hits, it deals +5...25 damage and sets target foe on Fire "Fire" is capitalized, unlike other descriptions which state "set on fire" [sic] for 1...3 second[s].
1546.concise description: Spear Attack. Deals +5...25 damage. Inflicts Burning condition (1...3 second[s]).

1547.name: Mighty Throw
1547.description: Spear Attack. Your spear moves three times faster. If it hits, you deal +10...40 damage.
1547.concise description: Spear Attack. Deals +10...40 damage. This spear moves three times faster.

1548.name: Cruel Spear
1548.description: Elite Spear Attack. If this attack hits, you deal +1...31 damage. If it hits a non-moving target, you inflict a Deep Wound for 5...20 seconds.
1548.concise description: Elite Spear Attack. Deals +1...31 damage. Inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...20 seconds) if target is not moving.

1549.name: Harrier's Toss
1549.description: Spear Attack. If this attack hits, you deal +5...20 damage. If this attack hits a moving foe, it deals an additional 5...30 damage.
1549.concise description: Spear Attack. Deals +5...20 damage. Deals 5...30 more damage if target is moving.

1550.name: Unblockable Throw
1550.description: Spear Attack. If this attack hits, you deal +10...40 damage. This attack cannot be blocked.

1551.name: Spear of Lightning
1551.description: Spear Attack. If this attack hits, it deals +8...20 lightning damage. This attack has 25% armor penetration.
1551.concise description: Spear Attack. Deals +8...20 lightning damage. 25% armor penetration.

1552.name: Wearying Spear
1552.description: Spear Attack. If this attack hits, you deal +10...40 damage. You are Weakened for 5 seconds.

1553.name: Anthem of Fury
1553.description: Elite Chant. For 10 seconds, all party members within earshot gain 1...4 strikes of adrenaline the next time they use an attack skill.
1553.concise description: Elite Chant. (10 seconds.) Party members in earshot gain 1...4 adrenaline with their next attack skill.

1554.name: Crippling Anthem
1554.description: Elite Chant. For 10 seconds, the next attack skill used by each ally within earshot causes Crippling for 5...15 seconds.
1554.concise description: Elite Chant. (10 seconds.) Allies in earshot inflict Crippled condition (5...15 seconds) with their next attack skill.

1555.name: Defensive Anthem
1555.description: Elite Chant. For 4...10 seconds, each party member within earshot has a 50% chance to block incoming attacks. This chant ends if that party member hits with an attack skill.
1555.concise description: Elite Chant. (4...10 seconds.) Party members in earshot have 50% chance to block.

1556.name: Godspeed
1556.description: Shout. For 5...20 seconds, all allies within earshot move 25% faster while under the effects of an enchantment.
1556.concise description: Shout. (5...20 seconds.) Allies in earshot move 25% faster while enchanted.

1557.name: Anthem of Flame
1557.description: Chant. For 10 seconds, the next attack skill used by each party member within earshot also causes Burning for 1...3 second[s].
1557.concise description: Chant. (10 seconds.) Party members in earshot inflict Burning condition (1...3 second[s]) with their next attack skill.

1558.name: "Go for the Eyes!"
1558.description: Shout. For 10 seconds, the next time each ally within earshot makes an attack, that attack has an additional 30...100% chance to critical.
1558.concise description: Shout. (10 seconds.) Allies in earshot have +30...100% to land a critical hit with their next attack.

1559.name: Anthem of Envy
1559.description: Chant. For 10 seconds, the next attack skill used by each ally within earshot deals +10...25 damage against foes with more than 50% Health.
1559.concise description: Chant. (10 seconds.) Allies in earshot do +10...25 damage with their next attack skill.

1560.name: Song of Power
1560.description: Chant. For 5...20 seconds, each ally within earshot gains 4 Energy regeneration until that ally uses a Skill.
1560.concise description: Chant. (5...20 seconds.) Allies in earshot gain +4 Energy regeneration.

1561.name: Zealous Anthem
1561.description: Chant. For 10 seconds, the next time each ally within earshot uses an attack skill, that ally gains 1...8 Energy.
1561.concise description: Chant. (10 seconds.) Allies in earshot gain 1...8 Energy with their next attack skill.

1562.name: Aria of Zeal
1562.description: Chant. For 10 seconds, the next time each ally within earshot uses a Spell, that ally gains 1...6 Energy.
1562.concise description: Chant. (10 seconds.) Allies in earshot gain 1...6 Energy with their next spell.

1563.name: Lyric of Zeal
1563.description: Chant. For 10 seconds, the next time each ally within earshot uses a signet, that ally gains 1...8 Energy.
1563.concise description: Chant. (10 seconds.) Allies in earshot gain 1...8 Energy with their next signet.

1564.name: Ballad of Restoration
1564.description: Chant. For 10 seconds, the next time each party member within earshot takes damage, that party member gains 15...75 Health.
1564.concise description: Chant. (10 seconds.) Party members in earshot gain 15...75 Health the next time they take damage.

1565.name: Chorus of Restoration
1565.description: Chant. For 10 seconds, the next time each ally within earshot uses a shout or chant, that ally is healed for 30...90 Health.
1565.concise description: Chant. (10 seconds.) Allies in earshot are healed for 30...90 with their next shout or chant.

1566.name: Aria of Restoration
1566.description: Chant. For 10 seconds, the next time each party member within earshot uses a spell, that party member gains 30...90 Health.
1566.concise description: Chant. (10 seconds.) Party members in earshot gain 30...90 Health with their next spell.

1567.name: Song of Concentration
1567.description: Chant. For 10 seconds, the next skill used by each ally within earshot cannot be interrupted.
1567.concise description: Chant. (10 seconds.) Allies in earshot are uninterruptible with their next skill.

1568.name: Anthem of Guidance
1568.description: Elite Chant. For 10 seconds, the next attack skill used by each party member within earshot cannot be blocked.
1568.concise description: Elite Chant. (10 seconds.) Party members in earshot are unblockable with their next attack skill.

1569.name: Energizing Chorus
1569.description: Chant. For 10 seconds, the next Shout or Chant used by each ally within earshot costs 3...7 less Energy.
1569.concise description: Chant. (10 seconds.) The next shout or chant costs 3...7 less Energy for allies within earshot.

1570.name: Song of Purification
1570.description: Elite Chant. For 20 seconds, the next 1...3 skill[s] used by each ally within earshot remove 1 condition from that ally.
1570.concise description: Elite Chant. (20 seconds.) Allies in earshot lose one condition with their next 1...3 skill[s].

1571.name: Hexbreaker Aria
1571.description: Chant. For 10 seconds, the next time each ally within earshot casts a spell, that ally loses 1 hex.
1571.concise description: Chant. (10 seconds.) Allies in earshot lose one hex with their next spell.

1572.name: "Brace Yourself!"
1572.description: Shout. For 5...15 seconds, the next time target other ally would be knocked down, all nearby foes take 15...75 damage instead.
1572.concise description: Shout. (5...15 seconds.) Prevents the next knock-down and deals 15...75 damage to all foes near target ally.

1573.name: Awe
1573.description: Skill. If this skill hits a knocked-down foe, that foe becomes Dazed for 5...15 seconds. Awe has half the normal range.
1573.concise description: Half Range Skill. Inflicts Dazed condition (5...15 seconds).

1574.name: Enduring Harmony
1574.description: Echo. For 10...35 seconds, chants and shouts last 50% longer on target non-spirit ally.
1574.concise description: Echo. (10...35 seconds.) Chants and shouts last 50% longer on target ally.

1575.name: Blazing Finale
1575.description: Echo. For 10...35 seconds, whenever a chant or shout ends on target non-spirit ally, all foes adjacent to that ally are set on Fire for 1...7 second[s].
1575.concise description: Echo. (10...35 seconds.) Inflicts Burning condition (1...7 second[s]) to adjacent foes whenever a chant or shout ends on target ally.

1576.name: Burning Refrain
1576.description: Echo. For 20 seconds, if target non-spirit ally hits a foe with more Health than that ally, that foe is set on Fire "Fire" is capitalized, unlike other descriptions which state "set on fire" [sic] for 1...3 second[s]. This echo is reapplied every time a chant or shout ends on that ally.
1576.concise description: Echo. (20 seconds.) Inflicts Burning condition (1...3 second[s]) if target ally hits a foe with more Health. Renewal: Whenever a chant or shout ends on that ally.

1577.name: Finale of Restoration
1577.description: Echo. For 10...35 seconds, whenever a chant or shout ends on target non-spirit ally, that ally is healed for 15...75 Health.
1577.concise description: Echo. (10...35 seconds.) Target ally gains [sic] 15...75 Health whenever a shout or chant ends on that ally.

1578.name: Mending Refrain
1578.description: Echo. For 15 seconds, target non-spirit ally has +2...3 Health regeneration. This echo is reapplied every time a chant or shout ends on that ally.
1578.concise description: Echo. (15 seconds.) Target ally has +2...3 Health regeneration. Renewal: whenever a chant or shout ends on that ally.

1579.name: Purifying Finale
1579.description: Echo. For 10...35 seconds, target non-spirit ally loses 1 condition whenever a chant or shout ends on that ally.
1579.concise description: Echo. (10...35 seconds.) Target ally loses one condition whenever a chant or shout ends on that ally.

1580.name: Bladeturn Refrain
1580.description: Echo. For 20 seconds, target non-spirit ally has a 5...20% chance to block incoming attacks. This echo is reapplied every time a chant or shout ends on that ally.
1580.concise description: Echo. (20 seconds.) Target ally has 5...20% chance to block. Renewal: Whenever a chant or shout ends on that ally.

1581.name: Glowing Signet
1581.description: Signet. If target foe is Burning, you gain 5...15 Energy.
1581.concise description: Signet. You gain 5...15 Energy if target foe is Burning.

1583.name: Leader's Zeal
1583.description: Skill. For each nearby ally, you gain 2 Energy (maximum 8...12 Energy).
1583.concise description: Skill. You gain 2 Energy (maximum 8...12 Energy) for each nearby ally.

1584.name: Leader's Comfort
1584.description: Skill. You gain 30...75 Health. For each ally within earshot, you also gain +10...20 Health (maximum 140 Health).
1584.concise description: Skill. You gain 30...75 Health. You also gain 10...20 Health (maximum 140) for each ally in earshot.

1585.name: Signet of Synergy
1585.description: Signet. Target other ally is healed for 40...100 Health. If you are not under the effects of an enchantment, you are also healed for 40...100 Health.
1585.concise description: Signet. Heal target ally for 40...100. You are also healed for 40...100 if you are not enchanted.

1586.name: Angelic Protection
1586.description: Skill. For 10 seconds, any time target other ally takes more than 250...100 damage per second, that ally is healed for any damage over that amount.
1586.concise description: Skill. (10 seconds.) Each second that target ally takes damage over 250...100, that ally is healed for any damage over that amount.

1587.name: Angelic Bond
1587.description: Elite Skill. For 10 seconds, the next time an ally within earshot would take fatal damage, that damage is negated and that ally is healed for 20...200 Health. Angelic Bond ends on all other allies.
1587.concise description: Elite Skill. (10 seconds.) The next time an ally within earshot would take fatal damage, that damage is negated and that ally is healed for 20...200.

1588.name: Cautery Signet
1588.description: Elite Signet. All party members lose all conditions. You are set on Fire "Fire" is capitalized, unlike other descriptions which state "set on fire" [sic] for 1 second for each condition removed in this way.
1588.concise description: Elite Signet. All party members lose all conditions.

1589.name: "Stand Your Ground!"
1589.description: Shout. For 5...20 seconds, all party members within earshot receive +24 armor when not moving.
1589.concise description: Shout. (5...20 seconds.) Party members in earshot gain +24 armor when not moving.

1590.name: "Lead the Way!"
1590.description: Shout. Target ally moves 25% faster for 1...5 seconds for each ally within earshot (maximum of 20 seconds).
1590.concise description: Shout. Target ally moves 25% faster for 1...5 seconds (maximum of 20 seconds) for each ally in earshot.

1591.name: "Make Haste!"
1591.description: Shout. For 5...20 seconds, target other ally moves 33% faster. This skill ends if that ally successfully hits with an attack.
1591.concise description: Shout. (5...20 seconds.) Target ally moves 33% faster.

1592.name: "We Shall Return!"
1592.description: Shout. All party members in earshot are resurrected with 25...50% Health and 5...20% Energy.
1592.concise description: Shout. All party members in earshot are resurrected (25...50% Health and 5...20% Energy).

1593.name: "Never Give Up!"
1593.description: Shout. All allies within earshot and below 75% Health gain 1...10 Energy.
1593.concise description: Shout. Allies in earshot gain 1...10 Energy.

1594.name: "Help Me!"
1594.description: Shout. You gain 15...90 Health. For 1...10 seconds, other allies' spells targeting you cast 50% faster.
1594.concise description: Shout. (1...10 seconds.) Other allies' spells targeting you cast 50% faster. You gain 15...90 Health.

1595.name: "Fall Back!"
1595.description: Shout. For 4...10 seconds, all allies within earshot gain 5...15 Health per second while moving and move 33% faster. "Fall Back!" ends on an ally affected by this shout when that ally successfully hits with an attack.
1595.concise description: Shout. (4...10 seconds.) Allies in earshot gain 5...15 Health per second while moving and move 33% faster.

1596.name: "Incoming!"
1596.description: Elite Shout. For 4...10 seconds, all allies within earshot move 33% faster, and gain 5...15 Health while moving.
1596.concise description: Elite Shout. (4...10 seconds) Allies in earshot move 33% faster and gain 5...15 Health while moving.

1597.name: "They're on Fire!"
1597.description: Shout. For 10 seconds, party members within earshot take 5...35% less damage from foes suffering from Burning.
1597.concise description: Shout. (10 seconds.) Party members in earshot take 5...35% less damage from Burning foes.

1598.name: "Never Surrender!"
1598.description: Shout. For 15 seconds, all party members within earshot and below 75% Health gain +1...5 Health regeneration.
1598.concise description: Shout. (15 seconds.) Party members in earshot gain +1...5 Health regeneration.

1599.name: "It's Just a Flesh Wound."
1599.description: Elite Shout. Target other ally loses all conditions. If a condition was removed in this way, that ally moves 25% faster for 1...10 second[s].
1599.concise description: Elite Shout. Remove all conditions from target ally. That ally moves 25% faster (1...10 second[s]) if a condition was removed.

1600.name: Barbed Spear
1600.description: Spear Attack. If this attack hits, your target begins Bleeding for 5...20 seconds.
1600.concise description: Spear Attack. Inflicts Bleeding condition (5...20 seconds).

1601.name: Vicious Attack
1601.description: Spear Attack. If this attack hits, you deal +5...20 damage. If you land a critical hit with this attack, target foe suffers from a Deep Wound for 5...15 seconds.
1601.concise description: Spear Attack. Deals +5...20 damage. Inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...15 seconds) with a critical hit.

1602.name: Stunning Strike
1602.description: Elite Spear Attack. If this attack hits, you deal +5...30 damage. If it hits a foe suffering from a condition, that foe is also Dazed for 4...10 seconds.
1602.concise description: Elite Spear Attack. Deals +5...30 damage. Inflicts Dazed condition (4...10 seconds) if target has a condition.

1603.name: Merciless Spear
1603.description: Spear Attack. If this attack hits a foe with less than 50% Health, that foe suffers from a Deep Wound for 5...20 seconds.
1603.concise description: Spear Attack. Inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...20 seconds).

1604.name: Disrupting Throw
1604.description: Spear Attack. If this attack hits a foe suffering from a condition, that foe is interrupted.

1605.name: Wild Throw
1605.description: Spear Attack. If this attack hits, it deals +5...20 damage, and any stance being used by your target ends. This attack cannot be blocked. All of your non-spear attack skills are disabled for 3 seconds.
1605.concise description: Spear Attack. Deals +5...20 damage. Unblockable. Ends target's stance.

1623.name: Skin of Stone
1623.description: Caster can only be harmed by wurm siege.
1623.concise description: Caster can only be harmed by wurm siege.

1633.name: Malicious Strike
1633.description: Melee Attack. If this attack hits a foe suffering from a condition, you deal +10...30 damage and this attack results in a critical hit.
1633.concise description: Melee Attack. If target foe has a condition, this attack deals +10...30 damage and is a critical hit.

1634.name: Shattering Assault
1634.description: Elite Dual Attack. Must follow an off-hand attack. If it hits, you deal 5...50 damage and target foe loses one enchantment. This attack cannot be blocked.
1634.concise description: Elite Dual Attack. Deals 5...50 damage.  Removes one enchantment.  Unblockable.

1635.name: Golden Skull Strike
1635.description: Elite Off-Hand Attack. If you are under the effects of an enchantment and this attack hits, target foe is Dazed 1...5 seconds.
1635.concise description: Elite Off-Hand Attack. Inflicts Dazed condition (1...5 seconds).

1636.name: Black Spider Strike
1636.description: Off-Hand Attack. Must strike a hexed foe. If it hits, this attack strikes for +5...20 damage and target foe is Poisoned for 5...20 seconds.
1636.concise description: Off-Hand Attack. Deals +5...20 damage. Inflicts Poisoned condition (5...20 seconds). <span style="color:grey;">Must strike a hexed foe.</span>

1637.name: Golden Fox Strike
1637.description: Lead Attack. If this attack hits, target foe takes +10...30 damage. If you are under the effects of an Enchantment, this attack cannot be blocked.
1637.concise description: Lead Attack. Deals +10...30 damage. Unblockable if you are Enchanted.

1638.name: Deadly Haste
1638.description: Enchantment Spell. For 10...35 seconds, half-ranged spells cast 5...50% faster and recharge 5...50% faster.
1638.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (10...35 seconds.) Your half-ranged spells cast 5...50% faster and recharge 5...50% faster.

1639.name: Assassin's Remedy
1639.description: Enchantment Spell. For 30 seconds, the next 1...10 attack skills you use remove one condition.
1639.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Your next 1...10 attack skills each remove one condition.

1640.name: Fox's Promise
1640.description: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 5...20 seconds, your dagger attacks cannot be blocked. This enchantment ends the next time you fail to hit.
1640.concise description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (5...20 seconds.)  Your dagger attacks are unblockable.

1641.name: Feigned Neutrality
1641.description: Enchantment Spell. For 4...10 seconds, you have +7 Health regeneration and +80 armor. This enchantment ends if you successfully hit with an attack or use a skill.
1641.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (4...10 seconds.)  You have +7 Health regeneration and +80 armor.

1642.name: Hidden Caltrops
1642.description: Elite Hex Spell. Your non-Assassin skills are disabled for 10 seconds. For 1...10 seconds, target foe moves 50% slower. When this hex ends that foe is Crippled for 1...15 seconds.
1642.concise description: Elite Hex Spell. (1...10 seconds.)  Causes 50% slower movement.  End effect: inflicts Crippled condition (1...15 seconds). Your non-Assassin skills are disabled (10 seconds.)

1643.name: Assault Enchantments
1643.description: Elite Skill. Must follow a dual attack. Target foe loses all enchantments.

1644.name: Wastrel's Collapse
1644.description: Elite Skill. Shadow Step to target foe. If target foe is not using a skill, that foe is knocked down. All of your non-dagger attack skills are disabled for 10 seconds.
1644.concise description: Elite Skill. Shadow Step to target foe. Causes knock-down if target foe is not using a skill.

1645.name: Lift Enchantment
1645.description: Touch Skill. If target touched foe is knocked down, that foe loses one enchantment.

1646.name: Augury of Death
1646.description: Hex Spell. For 5...35 seconds, the next time damage would drop target foe's Health below 50%, you inflict a Deep Wound for 5...20 seconds and Shadow Step to that foe. This spell has half the normal range.
1646.concise description: Half Range Hex Spell. (5...35 seconds.) Inflict Deep Wound condition (5...20 seconds) and Shadow Step to target foe the next time damage would drop this foe's Health below 50%.

1647.name: Signet of Toxic Shock
1647.description: Signet. If target foe is suffering from Poison, that foe takes 10...100 damage.

1648.name: Signet of Twilight
1648.description: Signet. For each hex on target foe, that foe loses one enchantment.
1648.concise description: Signet. Removes one enchantment for each hex on target foe.

1649.name: Way of the Assassin
1649.description: Elite Stance. For the next 20 seconds while wielding daggers, you attack 5...20% faster and have a +5...35% chance to land a critical hit.
1649.concise description: Elite Stance. (20 seconds.) While wielding daggers, you attack 5...20% faster and have +5...35% chance to land a critical hit.

1650.name: Shadow Walk
1650.description: Stance. Shadow Step to target foe. For 15 seconds nothing happens. Your attack skills are disabled for 1 second, and your stances and enchantments are disabled for 10 seconds. When this stance ends, you return to your original location.
1650.concise description: Stance. (15 seconds.) Shadow Step to target foe. End effect: return to your original location.

1651.name: Death's Retreat
1651.description: Spell. Shadow Step to target ally. If you have less Health than that ally, you gain 40...130 Health.
1651.concise description: Spell. Gain 40...130 Health if you have less Health than target ally.  Initial effect: Shadow Step to this ally.

1652.name: Shadow Prison
1652.description: Elite Hex Spell. Shadow Step to target foe. For 1...7 seconds, that foe moves 66% slower.
1652.concise description: Elite Hex Spell. Shadow Step to target foe.  This foe moves 66% slower (1...7 seconds).

1653.name: Swap
1653.description: Spell. You and target summoned creature Shadow Step to each other's location.
1653.concise description: Spell. You and target summoned creature Shadow Step to each other's locations.

1654.name: Shadow Meld
1654.description: Elite Enchantment Spell. Shadow Step to target other ally. When you stop maintaining this Enchantment, you return to your original location.
1654.concise description: Elite Enchantment Spell. Shadow Step to target ally.  End effect: return to your original location.

1655.name: Price of Pride
1655.description: Hex Spell. For 5...20 seconds, the next time target foe uses an elite skill, that foe loses 1...7 Energy.
1655.concise description: Hex Spell. (5...20 seconds.) Causes 1...7 Energy loss the next time target foe uses an elite skill.

1656.name: Air of Disenchantment
1656.description: Elite Hex Spell. Remove one enchantment from target foe and all nearby foes. For 5...20 seconds, enchantments expire 150...300% faster on those foes.
1656.concise description: Elite Hex Spell. Also hexes foes near your target (5...20 seconds). Remove one enchantment from target and nearby foes. Enchantments expire 150...300% faster on those foes.

1657.name: Signet of Clumsiness
1657.description: Signet. If target foe is attacking, that foe and all adjacent foes are interrupted and take 15...60 damage. Any foes using attack skills are knocked down.
1657.concise description: Signet. Interrupts an attack for target foe and all adjacent foes. Interruption effect: deals 15...60 damage; knocks down foes using attack skills.

1658.name: Symbolic Posture
1658.description: Stance. For 5...20 seconds, the next signet you activate recharges 20...80% faster.
1658.concise description: Stance. (5...20 seconds.) Your next signet recharges 20...80% faster.

1659.name: Toxic Chill
1659.description: Elite Spell. Target foe is struck for 15...75 cold damage. If that foe is under the effects of a hex or enchantment, that foe becomes Poisoned for 10...25 seconds.
1659.concise description: Elite Spell. Deals 15...75 cold damage. Inflicts Poisoned condition (10...25 seconds) if target foe is hexed or enchanted.

1660.name: Well of Silence
1660.description: Well Spell. Exploit target corpse to create a Well of Silence for 10...30 seconds. Foes within the well cannot use shouts or chants and suffer 1...4 Health degeneration.
1660.concise description: Well Spell. (10...30 seconds.) Foes in this well cannot use shouts and chants and have 1...4 Health degeneration.

1661.name: Glowstone
1661.description: Spell. Send a projectile that strikes for 5...50 earth damage if it hits. If this spell hits a weakened Unlike the concise description, "weakened" is lowercase here [sic] foe, you gain 5 Energy plus 1 Energy for every 2 ranks of Energy Storage.
1661.concise description: Spell. Projectile: deals 5...50 earth damage. You gain 5 Energy plus 1 Energy for every 2 ranks of Energy Storage if target foe is Weakened.

1662.name: Mind Blast
1662.description: Elite Spell. Target foe is struck for 15...60 fire damage. If you have more Energy than target foe, you gain 1...8 Energy.
1662.concise description: Elite Spell. Deals 15...60 fire damage. You gain 1...8 Energy if you have more Energy than target foe.

1663.name: Elemental Flame
1663.description: Enchantment Spell. For 10...35 seconds, whenever you apply an Elemental hex to a foe, that foe is set on fire for 1...5 second[s].
1663.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (10...35 seconds.) Inflicts Burning condition (1...5 second[s]) whenever you apply an Elemental hex to a target.

1664.name: Invoke Lightning
1664.description: Elite Spell. Target foe and up to two other foes near your target are struck for 10...90 lightning damage. This spell has 25% armor penetration.
1664.concise description: Elite Spell. Deals 10...90 lightning damage. Hits two foes near target. 25% armor penetration.

1668.name: Northern Health Shrine Bonus
1668.description: Spell. Your party members' maximum Health is increased by 120.
1668.concise description: Spell. Your party members have +120 maximum Health.

1669.name: Southern Health Shrine Bonus
1669.description: Spell. Your party members' maximum Health is increased by 120.
1669.concise description: Spell. Your party members have +120 maximum Health.

1683.name: Pensive Guardian
1683.description: Enchantment Spell. For 5...11 seconds, target ally has a 50% chance to block attacks from enchanted foes.
1683.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (5...11 seconds.) 50% chance to block enchanted foes.

1684.name: Scribe's Insight
1684.description: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 10...35 seconds, you gain 3 Energy whenever you use a Signet.
1684.concise description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (10...35 seconds.) You gain 3 Energy whenever you use a signet.

1685.name: Holy Haste
1685.description: Enchantment Spell. For 1...60 second[s], your Healing Prayers spells cast 50% faster. This enchantment ends if you cast another enchantment.
1685.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (1...60 second[s].) Your Healing Prayers spells cast 50% faster.

1686.name: Glimmer of Light
1686.description: Elite Spell. Heal target ally for 10...115 Health.

1687.name: Zealous Benediction
1687.description: Elite Spell. Heal target ally for 30...180 Health. If target was below 50% Health, you gain 7 Energy.
1687.concise description: Elite Spell. Heals for 30...180. You gain 7 Energy if target ally was below 50% Health.

1688.name: Defender's Zeal
1688.description: Elite Hex Spell. For 5...25 seconds, whenever target foe hits with an attack, you gain 2 Energy.
1688.concise description: Elite Hex Spell. (5...25 seconds.) You gain 2 Energy whenever target foe hits with an attack.

1689.name: Signet of Mystic Wrath
1689.description: Signet. Target foe takes 5...35 holy damage for each enchantment on you (maximum 100 holy damage).
1689.concise description: Signet. Deals 5...35 holy damage for each enchantment on you (maximum 100 holy damage).

1690.name: Signet of Removal
1690.description: Elite Signet. If target ally is under the effects of an enchantment, that ally loses one hex and one condition.
1690.concise description: Elite Signet. Removes one hex and one condition.

1691.name: Dismiss Condition
1691.description: Spell. Remove one condition from target ally. If that ally is under the effects of an enchantment, that ally is healed for 15...75 Health.
1691.concise description: Spell. Removes one condition. Heals for 15...75 if target ally is enchanted.

1692.name: Divert Hexes
1692.description: Elite Spell. Remove up to 1...3 hex[es] from target ally. For each hex removed in this way, that ally loses one condition and gains 15...75 Health.
1692.concise description: Elite Spell. Removes 1...3 hex[es]. For each hex removed, target ally loses one condition and gains 15...75 Health.

1693.name: Counterattack
1693.description: Melee Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +5...35 damage. If you hit an attacking foe, you gain 2...6 Energy.
1693.concise description: Melee Attack. Deals +5...35 damage. You gain 2...6 Energy if target foe is attacking.

1694.name: Magehunter Strike
1694.description: Elite Melee Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +5...20 damage. If your target is under the effects of an enchantment, this attack cannot be blocked.
1694.concise description: Elite Melee Attack. Deals +5...20 damage. Unblockable if target foe is enchanted.

1695.name: Soldier's Strike
1695.description: Melee Attack. If this attack hits, you deal +10...40 more damage. If you are under the effects of a chant or shout, this attack cannot be blocked.
1695.concise description: Melee Attack. Deals +10...40 damage. Unblockable if you are under the effects of a chant or shout.

1696.name: Decapitate
1696.description: Elite Axe Attack. You lose all adrenaline and all Energy. If this attack hits, you deal +5...50 damage and cause a Deep Wound for 5...20 seconds. This attack always results in a critical hit.
1696.concise description: Elite Axe Attack. Deals +5...50 damage. Inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...20 seconds). Automatic critical hit.

1697.name: Magehunter's Smash
1697.description: Elite Hammer Attack. If this attack hits, target foe is knocked down. If your target is under the effects of an enchantment, this attack cannot be blocked.
1697.concise description: Elite Hammer Attack. Causes knock-down. Unblockable if target foe is enchanted.

1698.name: Soldier's Stance
1698.description: Elite Stance. For 5...15 seconds, you have a 75% chance to block. You attack 33% faster while under the effects of a shout or chant.
1698.concise description: Elite Stance. (5...15 seconds.) You have a 75% chance to block. You attack 33% faster while under the effects of a chant or shout.

1699.name: Soldier's Defense
1699.description: Stance. For 1...6 second[s], you have a 75% chance to block attacks while under the effects of a shout or chant. You gain 1 strike of adrenaline for each blocked attack.
1699.concise description: Stance. (1...6 second[s].) You have 75% chance to block while under the effects of a shout or chant. Block effect: gain 1 adrenaline.

1700.name: Frenzied Defense
1700.description: Stance. For 8 seconds, you have a 75% chance to block incoming attacks, but take double damage.
1700.concise description: Stance. (8 seconds.) You have 75% chance to block.

1701.name: Steady Stance
1701.description: Elite Stance. For 10 seconds, the next time you would be knocked down, you gain 1...3 strike[s] of adrenaline and 1...7 Energy instead.
1701.concise description: Elite Stance. (10 seconds.) The next time you would be knocked-down, you gain 1...3 adrenaline and 1...7 Energy instead.

1702.name: Steelfang Slash
1702.description: Sword Attack. If this attack hits, you deal +1...31 damage. If you hit a foe that is knocked down, you gain 1...5 adrenaline.
1702.concise description: Sword Attack. Deals +1...31 damage. You gain 1...5 adrenaline if target foe is knocked down.

1704.name: Untouchable
1704.description: Skill. You are invulnerable for 5 seconds after being resurrected by the Resurrection Shrine.
1704.concise description: Skill. (5 seconds.) You are invulnerable after being resurrected by the Resurrection Shrine.

1707.name: Words of Madness
1707.description: Hex Spell. All targets within earshot are hexed with Words of Madness for 15 seconds, and each has a random skill disabled for 30 seconds and takes 20 damage for each skill currently recharging. When Words of Madness ends, their skills are recharged.
1707.concise description: Hex Spell. (15 seconds.) Foes within earshot each have a random skill disabled (30 seconds) and take 20 damage for each of their skills currently recharging.

1711.name: The Apocrypha is changing to another form!
1711.description: Skill. The Apocrypha is preparing to change to another form! It cannot be harmed while in tablet form.
1711.concise description: Skill. The Apocrypha is preparing to change to another form! It cannot be harmed while in tablet form.

1719.name: Screaming Shot
1719.description: Bow Attack. If this attack hits, you deal +10...25 damage. If your target is within earshot, that foe begins Bleeding for 5...20 seconds.
1719.concise description: Bow Attack. Deals +10...25 damage. Inflicts Bleeding condition (5...20 seconds) if target foe is within earshot.

1720.name: Keen Arrow
1720.description: Bow Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +5...20 damage. If you land a critical hit, you deal an additional +5...25 damage.
1720.concise description: Bow Attack. Deals +5...20 damage. Deals +5...25 more damage if you land a critical hit.

1721.name: Rampage as One
1721.description: Elite Skill. For 3...15 seconds, both you and your animal companion attack 33% faster and run 25% faster.
1721.concise description: Elite Skill. (3...15 seconds.) You and your pet attack 33% faster and move 25% faster.

1722.name: Forked Arrow
1722.description: Bow Attack. Shoot two arrows simultaneously at target foe. If you are under the effects of an enchantment or hex, you shoot only one arrow.
1722.concise description: Bow Attack. You shoot two arrows simultaneously.

1723.name: Disrupting Accuracy
1723.description: Preparation. For 36 seconds, whenever your arrows critical, they also interrupt your target.
1723.concise description: Preparation. (36 seconds.) Interrupts an action whenever your arrows critical.

1724.name: Expert's Dexterity
1724.description: Elite Stance. For 1...20 second[s], you attack 33% faster and your Marksmanship attribute is increased by 2.
1724.concise description: Elite Stance. (1...20 second[s].) You attack 33% faster and you gain +2 to your Marksmanship attribute.

1725.name: Roaring Winds
1725.description: Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...10 spirit. Chants and shouts cost 1...5 more Energy. This spirit dies after 30...60 seconds.
1725.concise description: Nature Ritual. Creates a level 1...10 spirit (30...60 second lifespan). Chants and shouts cost 1...5 more Energy for creatures in range.

1726.name: Magebane Shot
1726.description: Elite Bow Attack. If this attack hits, it interrupts target foe's action. If that action was a spell, it is disabled for an additional 10 seconds. This attack cannot be blocked.
1726.concise description: Elite Bow Attack. Interrupts an action. Interruption effect: an interrupted spell is disabled for +10 seconds. Unblockable.

1727.name: Natural Stride
1727.description: Stance. For 1...8 second[s], you run 33% faster and have a 50% chance to block incoming attacks. Natural Stride ends if you become hexed or enchanted.
1727.concise description: Stance. (1...8 second[s].) You move 33% faster and have 50% chance to block.

1728.name: Heket's Rampage
1728.description: Stance. For 5...11 seconds, you attack 33% faster. This stance ends if you use an attack skill.

1729.name: Smoke Trap
1729.description: Elite Trap. When Smoke Trap is triggered, nearby foes are Blinded and Dazed for 5...10 seconds. Smoke Trap ends after 90 seconds. While activating this skill, you are easily interrupted.
1729.concise description: Elite Trap. (90 seconds.) Inflicts Blinded and Dazed conditions (5...10 seconds) to nearby foes.

1730.name: Infuriating Heat
1730.description: Elite Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...10 spirit. Non-spirit creatures within its range gain adrenaline twice as fast. This spirit dies after 30...60 seconds.
1730.concise description: Elite Nature Ritual. Creates a level 1...10 spirit (30...60 second lifespan). Doubles adrenaline gain for creatures in range.

1731.name: Vocal Was Sogolon
1731.description: Item Spell. For 60 seconds, all shouts and chants you use last 20...50% longer.
1731.concise description: Item Spell. (60 seconds.) Shouts and chants you use last 20...50% longer.

1732.name: Destructive Was Glaive
1732.description: Elite Item Spell. Hold Glaive's ashes for up to 30...60 seconds. While you hold her ashes, all Ritualist skills have 20% armor penetration. When you drop her ashes, all foes in the area are struck for 15...85 lightning damage.
1732.concise description: Elite Item Spell. (30...60 seconds.) Your Ritualist skills have 20% armor penetration. Drop effect: deals 15...85 lightning damage to all foes in the area.

1733.name: Wielder's Strike
1733.description: Spell. Target foe is struck for 5...50 lightning damage. If you are under the effects of a weapon spell, you deal an additional 10...40 lightning damage.
1733.concise description: Spell. Deals 5...50 lightning damage. Deals 10...40 more lightning damage if you are under a weapon spell.

1734.name: Gaze of Fury
1734.description: Binding Ritual. Destroy target spirit and create a level 1...14 Spirit of Fury. This spirit's attacks deal 5...20 damage. This spirit dies after 30...60 seconds.
1734.concise description: Binding Ritual. Destroys a spirit. Creates a level 1...14 spirit (30...60 second lifespan). Its attacks deal 5...20 damage.

1735.name: Gaze of Fury
1735.description: Ranged Attack. Target foe takes 5...20 damage.

1736.name: Spirit's Strength
1736.description: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 15...60 seconds, your attacks deal 5...35 more damage while under the effects of a weapon spell.
1736.concise description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (15...60 seconds.) Your attacks deal +5...35 damage if you are under a weapon spell.

1737.name: Wielder's Zeal
1737.description: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 10...30 seconds, whenever you cast a Weapon Spell on an ally, you gain 1...5 Energy.
1737.concise description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (10...30 seconds.) You gain 1...5 Energy whenever you cast a weapon spell.

1738.name: Sight Beyond Sight
1738.description: Enchantment Spell. For 8...20 seconds, you cannot be Blinded.
1738.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (8...20 seconds). You are immune to Blindness.

1739.name: Renewing Memories
1739.description: Enchantment Spell. For 5...20 seconds, while holding an item, any weapon and item Spells you cast cost 5...35% less Energy.
1739.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (5...20 seconds.) Your weapon and item spells cost 5...35% less Energy.

1740.name: Wielder's Remedy
1740.description: Enchantment Spell. For 10...30 seconds, whenever you cast a weapon spell on an ally, that ally loses 1 condition.
1740.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (10...30 seconds.) Whenever you cast a weapon spell, the targeted ally loses one condition.

1741.name: Ghostmirror Light
1741.description: Spell. Target other ally is healed for 15...90 Health. If you are within earshot of a spirit, you are also healed for 15...90 Health.
1741.concise description: Spell. Heals for 15...90.  You gain 15...90 Health if you are within earshot of a spirit.

1742.name: Signet of Ghostly Might
1742.description: Elite Signet. For 5...20 seconds, all spirits you control within earshot attack 33% faster and deal 5...10 additional damage.
1742.concise description: Elite Signet. (5...20 seconds.) All spirits you control within earshot attack 33% faster and deal +5...10 damage.

1743.name: Signet of Binding
1743.description: Signet. You lose 200...50 Health and take control of target enemy-controlled spirit. (50% failure chance with Spawning Power 4 or less.)
1743.concise description: Signet. You lose 200...50 Health. Gain control of target enemy-controlled spirit.

1744.name: Caretaker's Charge
1744.description: Elite Spell. Target foe is struck for 20...75 lightning damage. If you are holding an item, you gain 5 Energy and 5...50 Health.
1744.concise description: Elite Spell. Deals 20...75 lightning damage. You gain 5 Energy and 5...50 Health if you are holding an item.

1745.name: Anguish
1745.description: Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...11 spirit. This spirit's attacks deal 5...20 damage and deal double damage to hexed foes. This spirit dies after 15...45 seconds.
1745.concise description: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...11 spirit (15...45 second lifespan). Its attacks deal 5...20 damage. Double damage to hexed foes.

1746.name: Anguish
1746.description: Ranged Attack. This attack deals 5...17 damage and deals double damage to hexed foes.
1746.concise description: Ranged Attack. Deals 5...17 damage. Double damage to hexed foes.

1747.name: Empowerment
1747.description: Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...14 spirit. All allies within its range holding an item gain 15...45 maximum Health and 10 maximum Energy. This spirit dies after 15...60 seconds.
1747.concise description: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...14 spirit (15...60 second lifespan).  Allies in range holding an item gain 15...45 maximum Health and 10 maximum Energy.

1748.name: Recovery
1748.description: Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...14 spirit. Conditions on allies within range of this spirit expire 20...50% faster. This spirit dies after 30...60 seconds.
1748.concise description: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...14 spirit (30...60 second lifespan). Conditions on allies in range expire 20...50% faster.

1749.name: Weapon of Fury
1749.description: Elite Weapon Spell. For 5...20 seconds, target ally gains 5...50% more adrenaline and 1 Energy whenever that ally successfully hits with an attack.
1749.concise description: Elite Weapon Spell. (5...20 seconds.) 5...50% more adrenaline gain and +1 Energy whenever target ally hits with an attack.

1750.name: Xinrae's Weapon
1750.description: Elite Weapon Spell. For 8 seconds, the next time target ally takes damage from a foe that damage is limited to 5% of that ally's max Health and that ally steals up to 20...80 Health from that foe.
1750.concise description: Elite Weapon Spell. (8 seconds). The next time target ally takes damage from a foe, that damage is limited to 5% of target ally's max Health and that ally steals 20...80 Health from that foe.

1751.name: Warmonger's Weapon
1751.description: Weapon Spell. For 3...13 seconds, if target ally attacks a foe who is not attacking, that foe is interrupted.
1751.concise description: Weapon Spell. (3...13 seconds.) Attacks interrupt an action. Does not interrupt attacking foes.

1752.name: Weapon of Remedy
1752.description: Elite Weapon Spell. For 8 seconds, the next time target ally takes damage or life steal from a foe, that ally steals up to 15...75 Health from that foe and loses 1 condition.
1752.concise description: Elite Weapon Spell. (8 seconds.) The next time target ally takes damage or life steal from a foe, this ally steals 15...75 Health from that foe and loses 1 condition.

1753.name: Rending Sweep
1753.description: Scythe Attack. You deal +5...20 and lose 1 Dervish enchantment. If an enchantment was lost, you remove an enchantment from each foe you hit.
1753.concise description: Scythe Attack. Deals +5...20 damage. You lose 1 Dervish enchantment. Removal effect: struck foes lose an enchantment.

1754.name: Onslaught
1754.description: Elite Flash Enchantment Spell. For 3...15 seconds, you attack, move and gain adrenaline 25% faster.
1754.concise description: Elite Flash Enchantment Spell. (3...15 seconds.) You attack, move and gain adrenaline 25% faster.

1755.name: Mystic Corruption
1755.description: Flash Enchantment Spell. All adjacent foes suffer from Disease for 1...2 second[s]. For 20 seconds, nothing happens. Disease duration is doubled if you are enchanted when you activate this skill. When this enchantment ends, all party members in earshot are cured of Disease.
1755.concise description: Flash Enchantment Spell. (20 seconds.) Initial Effect: all adjacent foes are Diseased (1...2 second[s].) Double duration if you are already enchanted. End Effect: party members in earshot lose Disease.

1756.name: Grenth's Grasp
1756.description: Elite Flash Enchantment Spell. For 20 seconds, if you are wielding a cold weapon, your attack skills also Cripple that [sic] foe for 1...11 second[s] and you transfer 1 condition from yourself to that foe.
1756.concise description: Elite Flash Enchantment Spell. (20 seconds.) Inflicts Crippled condition (1...11 second[s]) with your attack skills and transfer 1 condition.

1757.name: Veil of Thorns
1757.description: Flash Enchantment Spell. When you cast this enchantment, all nearby foes are struck for 5...50 piercing damage. For 5...25 seconds you take 5...35% less damage from spells.
1757.concise description: Flash Enchantment Spell. (5...25 seconds.) Spell damage is reduced by 5...35%. Initial Effect: nearby foes are struck for 5...50 piercing damage.

1758.name: Harrier's Grasp
1758.description: Flash Enchantment Spell. For 5...20 seconds, attacks against moving foes also Cripple that foe for 2...9 seconds. This enchantment ends after you apply Cripple 1...3 times. says "times" even if the value is 1 [sic] When you cast this spell, you lose Cripple and 1 other condition.
1758.concise description: Flash Enchantment Spell. (5...20 seconds.) Attacks on moving foes also Cripple them. fails to mention cripple duration [sic]  Initial Effect: you lose Cripple and 1 other condition.

1759.name: Vow of Strength
1759.description: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 15 seconds, whenever you attack a foe with your scythe, you deal 10...25 slashing damage to all adjacent foes.
1759.concise description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (15 seconds.) When you attack with a scythe, deals 10...25 slashing damage to adjacent foes.

1760.name: Ebon Dust Aura
1760.description: Elite Flash Enchantment Spell. When you cast this enchantment, all nearby foes are Blinded for 1...7 second[s]. For 30 seconds, if you are wielding an earth weapon, your melee attacks deal +3...15 earth damage. When this enchantment ends, you are cured of Blindness.
1760.concise description: Elite Flash Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Deal +3...15 earth damage with your melee attacks. Initial Effect: Blinds nearby foes for 1...7 second[s]. End Effect: removes Blindness.

1761.name: Zealous Vow
1761.description: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 20 seconds, you have -3 Energy regeneration, and you gain 1...6 Energy every time you hit with an attack.
1761.concise description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (20 seconds.) You gain 1...6 Energy each time you hit with an attack.

1762.name: Heart of Fury
1762.description: Stance. For 2...10 seconds, you attack 25% faster.

1763.name: Zealous Renewal
1763.description: Flash Enchantment Spell. All nearby foes take 5...30 holy damage. For 5...25 seconds, you have -1 Energy regeneration, and gain 1 Energy whenever you hit a foe. If this enchantment ends prematurely, you gain 1...5 Energy.
1763.concise description: Flash Enchantment Spell. (5...25 seconds.) Initial effect: deals 5...30 holy damage to nearby foes. You have -1 Energy regeneration and gain 1 Energy when you hit. Gain 1...5 Energy if this enchantment ends early.

1764.name: Attacker's Insight
1764.description: Flash Enchantment Spell. For 3...10 seconds you have a 50% chance to block while attacking. When this enchantment ends, you inflict Weakness on all adjacent foes for 3...15 seconds.
1764.concise description: Flash Enchantment Spell. (3...10 seconds.) Gives 50% block chance while attacking. End Effect: Causes Weakness 3...15 seconds to adjacent foes.

1765.name: Rending Aura
1765.description: Flash Enchantment Spell. When you cast this enchantment, all nearby foes take 10...40 cold damage. For&nbsp;&nbsp;30 there is an extra space between "For" and "30" [sic] seconds, your attack skills remove enchantments from knocked-down foes. When this enchantment ends, nearby foes are affected by Cracked Armor for 1...10 second[s].
1765.concise description: Flash Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Your attack skills remove enchantments from knocked-down foes. Initial effect: deals 10...40 cold damage to all nearby foes.  End effect: nearby foes have Cracked Armor for 1...10 second[s].

1766.name: Featherfoot Grace
1766.description: Enchantment Spell. For 5...20 seconds, you move 25% faster, and conditions expire 25% faster.
1766.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (5...20 seconds.)  You move 25% faster, and conditions expire 25% faster.

1767.name: Reaper's Sweep
1767.description: Elite Scythe Attack. If this attack hits, you Cripple your target for 3...15 seconds. You lose 1 Dervish enchantment. If an enchantment was removed, this attack knocks down for 2...3 seconds.
1767.concise description: Elite Scythe Attack. (3...15 seconds.) Cause Cripple. Lose 1 Dervish enchantment. Removal Effect: cause knockdown for 2...3 seconds.

1768.name: Harrier's Haste
1768.description: Flash Enchantment Spell. For 2...8 seconds, you move 25% faster and deal +3...12 more damage against moving foes.
1768.concise description: Flash Enchantment Spell. (2...8 seconds.)  You move 25% faster and deal +3...12 damage to moving foes.

1769.name: Focused Anger
1769.description: Elite Skill. For 45 seconds, you gain 0...150% more adrenaline.
1769.concise description: Elite Skill. (45 seconds.) You gain 0...150% more adrenaline.

1770.name: Natural Temper
1770.description: Skill. For 4...10 seconds, you gain 33% more adrenaline while not under the effects of an Enchantment.
1770.concise description: Skill. (4...10 seconds.) You gain 33% more adrenaline.

1771.name: Song of Restoration
1771.description: Elite Chant. For 10 seconds, the next time each party member within earshot uses a skill, that party member gains 45...110 Health.
1771.concise description: Elite Chant. (10 seconds.) Party members in earshot gain 45...110 Health with their next skill.

1772.name: Lyric of Purification
1772.description: Chant. For 5...20 seconds, the next time each ally within earshot uses a Signet, that ally loses 1 Condition.
1772.concise description: Chant. (5...20 seconds.) Allies in earshot lose one condition with their next signet.

1773.name: Soldier's Fury
1773.description: Elite Echo. For 10...35 seconds, if you are under the effects of a chant or a shout, you attack 33% faster and gain 33% more adrenaline, but you have -20 armor.
1773.concise description: Elite Echo. (10...35 seconds.) You attack 33% faster and gain 33% more adrenaline if under the effects of a shout or chant.

1774.name: Aggressive Refrain
1774.description: Echo. For 5...25 seconds, you attack 25% faster but have -20 armor. This echo is reapplied every time a chant or shout ends on you.
1774.concise description: Echo. (5...25 seconds.) You attack 25% faster. Renewal: whenever a chant or shout ends on you.

1775.name: Energizing Finale
1775.description: Echo. For 10...35 seconds, whenever a shout or chant ends on target non-spirit ally, that ally gains 1 Energy.
1775.concise description: Echo. (10...35 seconds.) Target ally gains 1 Energy whenever a shout or chant ends on that ally.

1776.name: Signet of Aggression
1776.description: Signet. If you are under the effects of a shout or chant, you gain 2 strikes of adrenaline.
1776.concise description: Signet. You gain 2 adrenaline if you are under the effects of a shout or chant.

1778.name: Signet of Return
1778.description: Signet. Resurrect target party member with 5...15% Health and 1...4% Energy for each party member within earshot.
1778.concise description: Signet. Resurrects target party member (5...15% Health and 1...4% Energy for each party member in earshot).

1779.name: "Make Your Time!"
1779.description: Shout. You gain 1 strike of adrenaline for each party member within earshot (maximum 1...5 adrenaline).
1779.concise description: Shout. You gain one adrenaline (maximum 1...5) for each party member in earshot.

1780.name: "Can't Touch This!"
1780.description: Shout. For 20 seconds, the next 1...5 touch skill[s] used against allies [sic] within earshot fail[s].
1780.concise description: Shout. (20 seconds.) The next 1...5 touch-range skill[s] used against allies [sic] within earshot fail[s].

1781.name: "Find Their Weakness!"
1781.description: Shout. For 5...20 seconds, the next time target ally attacks, that ally deals +5...50 damage and inflicts a Deep Wound for 5...20 seconds.
1781.concise description: Shout. (5...20 seconds.) Target ally deals +5...50 damage and inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...20 seconds) with the next attack.

1782.name: "The Power Is Yours!"
1782.description: Elite Shout. For 3 seconds, all allies within earshot gain 0...1 Energy regeneration.
1782.concise description: Elite Shout. (3 seconds.) Allies within earshot gain 0...1 Energy regeneration.

1783.name: Slayer's Spear
1783.description: Spear Attack. If this attack hits, you deal +5...25 damage. If that foe has more Health than you, that foe suffers from a Deep Wound for 5...20 seconds.
1783.concise description: Spear Attack. Deals +5...25 damage. Inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...20 seconds) if target has more Health than you.

1784.name: Swift Javelin
1784.description: Spear Attack. If this attack hits, you deal +5...20 damage. If you are under the effects of an enchantment, this spear flies twice as fast and cannot be blocked.
1784.concise description: Spear Attack. Deals +5...20 damage. This spear moves twice as fast and is unblockable if you are enchanted.

1814.name: Lightbringer's Gaze
1814.description: Skill. Target demonic servant of Abaddon takes 100 holy damage and is interrupted. This skill strikes one additional foe in the area for each rank of Lightbringer you have attained. This skill is disabled for 15 seconds after it is used.
1814.concise description: Skill. Target demonic servant of Abaddon takes 100 holy damage and is interrupted. Hits one additional foe in the area for each rank of Lightbringer you have attained.

1815.name: Lightbringer Signet
1815.description: Signet. If you are within the area of a demonic servant of Abaddon, you gain strikes of adrenaline and  Energy.
1815.concise description: Signet. You gain strikes of adrenaline and  Energy if you are within the area of a demonic servant of Abaddon.

1816.name: Sunspear Rebirth Signet
1816.description: Signet. Resurrect target dead party member at your location with full Health and 10% Energy for each Sunspear rank you have attained. This signet can only be used once per mission unless recharged by a morale boost.
1816.concise description: Signet. Resurrect target dead ally [sic] at your location (full Health and 10% Energy for each Sunspear Rank attained).

1820.name: Spirit Form
1820.description: Enchantment Spell. Your wurm's body is consumed by powerful spiritual energy that enables you to do battle with maddened spirits and reduces the effectiveness of the maddened spirits' attacks by 75%.
1820.concise description: Enchantment Spell. Powerful spiritual energy consumes your wurm's body and enables you to battle with maddened spirits and reduces the effectiveness of the maddened spirits' attacks by 75%.

1866.name: Capture Point
1866.description: Spell. While within the range of this capture point, heroes and henchmen take the initiative in attacking targets.
1866.concise description: Spell. While within the range of this catpure point, heroes and henchmen take the initiative in attacking targets.

1875.name: Words of Madness
1875.description: Skill. Target foe takes 120 damage and is knocked down. Target foe is Dazed for 10 seconds.
1875.concise description: Skill. Deals 120 damage and causes knock-down. Inflicts Dazed condition (10 seconds).

1876.name: Unknown Junundu Ability
1876.description: Elite Skill. You have not taught your junundu to perform this skill.
1876.concise description: Elite Skill. You have not taught your junundu to perform this skill.

1887.name: Lightbringer's Insight
1887.description: Party Bonus. For 10 minutes your party gains triple XP from combat.
1887.concise description: Party Bonus. (10 minutes.) Your party gains triple XP from combat.

1893.name: Enraged
1893.description: Skill. Attacks and skills do +50% damage if this creature's Health is below 70%, and an additional +50% damage if its Health is below 30%.
1893.concise description: Skill. This creature's attacks and skills do +50% damage if its Health is below 70%, and an additional +50% damage if its Health is below 30%.

1894.name: Touch of Aaaaarrrrrrggghhh
1894.description: Skill. Target foe's attributes are set to 0 for 20 seconds, and target foe and another random foe swap positions.
1894.concise description: Skill. (20 seconds.) Target foe's attributes are set to 0. This foe and another random foe swap positions.

1900.name: Side Step
1900.description: Skill. Shadow Step to a random location in the area. You gain 250 Health.
1900.concise description: Skill. Shadow Step to a random location in the area. You gain 250 Health.

1901.name: Jack Frost
1901.description: Binding Ritual. Create a level 5 Jack Frost. This creature deals 50 damage with snowballs. This creature dies after 60 seconds.
1901.concise description: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 5 Jack Frost (60 second lifespan). It deals 50 damage with snowballs.

1910.name: Charm Animal
1910.description: Skill. Charm target animal. Once charmed, your animal companion will travel with you whenever you have Charm Animal equipped.
1910.concise description: Skill. Charm target animal. Once charmed, your animal companion will travel with you whenever you have Charm Animal equipped.

1911.name: Volatile Charr Crystal
1911.description: Signet. Nearby foes take 100 damage and begin Bleeding and Burning for 10 seconds when this crystal explodes.
1911.concise description: Signet. Hits nearby foes. Deals 100 damage and inflicts Bleeding and Burning conditions (10 seconds) when this crystal explodes.

1986.name: Vampiric Assault
1986.description: Dual Attack. Must follow an off-hand attack. If this attack hits, you steal 10...40 Health.
1986.concise description: Dual Attack. Steals 10...40 Health if this attack hits.

1987.name: Lotus Strike
1987.description: Off-Hand Attack. Must follow a lead attack. If it hits, this attack strikes for +10...25 damage and you gain 5...20 Energy.
1987.concise description: Off-Hand Attack. Deals +10...25 damage; you gain 5...20 Energy.

1988.name: Golden Fang Strike
1988.description: Off-Hand Attack. Must follow a lead attack. If you are under the effects of an enchantment and this attack hits, target foe suffers from a Deep Wound for 5...20 seconds.
1988.concise description: Off-Hand Attack. Inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...20 seconds) if you are enchanted.

1990.name: Falling Lotus Strike
1990.description: Off-Hand Attack. Must strike a knocked-down foe. If it hits, you strike for +15...35 damage and gain 1...12 Energy.
1990.concise description: Off-Hand Attack. Deals +15...35 damage; you gain 1...12 Energy.

1991.name: Sadist's Signet
1991.description: Signet. You gain 10...40 Health for each condition on target foe.
1991.concise description: Signet. You gain 10...40 Health for each condition on target foe.

1992.name: Signet of Distraction
1992.description: Signet. If target foe is casting a spell, that spell is interrupted and disabled for 1...5 seconds for each signet you have equipped.
1992.concise description: Signet. Interrupts a spell. Interruption effect: target foe's spell is disabled for 1...5 seconds for each signet you have equipped.

1993.name: Signet of Recall
1993.description: Signet. For 10 seconds, you have -4 Energy regeneration. When this effect ends, you gain 13...20 Energy.
1993.concise description: Signet. (10 seconds.) You have -4 Energy regeneration. End effect: you gain 13...20 Energy.

1994.name: Power Lock
1994.description: Spell. If target foe is casting a spell or chant, that skill is interrupted and disabled for an additional 5...13 seconds.
1994.concise description: Spell. Interrupts a spell or chant. Interruption effect: interrupted spell or chant is disabled for +5...13 seconds.

1995.name: Waste Not, Want Not
1995.description: Spell. If target foe is not casting a spell or attacking, you gain 8...13 Energy.
1995.concise description: Spell. You gain 8...13 Energy if target foe is not attacking or casting a spell.

1996.name: Sum of All Fears
1996.description: Hex Spell. For 1...10 second[s], target foe moves, attacks, and casts spells 33% slower.
1996.concise description: Hex Spell. (1...10 second[s].) Target foe moves, attacks, and casts spells 33% slower.

1997.name: Withering Aura
1997.description: Enchantment Spell. For 5...20 seconds, target ally's melee attacks cause Weakness for 5...20 seconds.
1997.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (5...20 seconds.) Target ally's melee attacks cause Weakness condition (5...20 seconds.)

1998.name: Cacophony
1998.description: Hex Spell. For 10 seconds, whenever target foe uses a shout or chant, that foe takes 35...105 damage.
1998.concise description: Hex Spell. (10 seconds.) Deals 35...105 damage whenever target foe uses a shout or chant.

1999.name: Winter's Embrace
1999.description: Hex Spell. For 2...6 seconds, target foe moves 66% slower and takes 5...15 damage while moving.
1999.concise description: Hex Spell. (2...6 seconds.) Target foe moves 66% slower and takes 5...15 damage while moving.

2000.name: Earthen Shackles
2000.description: Hex Spell. For 3 seconds, target and all nearby foes move 90% slower. When Earthen Shackles ends, it applies Weakness for 5...20 seconds.
2000.concise description: Hex Spell. (3 seconds.) Target and nearby foes move 90% slower. Applies Weakness for 5...20 seconds when it ends.

2001.name: Ward of Weakness
2001.description: Ward Spell. You create a Ward of Weakness at your current location. For 5...20 seconds, foes in this area become Weakened for 5...20 seconds whenever they take elemental damage.
2001.concise description: Ward Spell. (5...20 seconds). Inflicts Weakened condition (5...20 seconds) to any foes that take elemental damage in this ward.

2002.name: Glyph of Swiftness
2002.description: Glyph. For 15 seconds, your next 1...5 spell[s] recharge 25% faster and projectiles from the affected spells move 200% faster.
2002.concise description: Glyph. (15 seconds.) Your next 1...5 spell[s] recharge 25% faster and projectiles from them move 200% faster.

2003.name: Cure Hex
2003.description: Spell. Remove one Hex from target ally. If a Hex was removed, that ally is healed for 30...120 Health.
2003.concise description: Spell. Removes a Hex. Removal effect: Heals for 30...120.

2004.name: Smite Condition
2004.description: Spell. Remove one condition from target ally. If a condition was removed, foes in the area take 10...60 holy damage.
2004.concise description: Spell. Removes a condition. Removal effect: deals 10...60 holy damage to foes in the area of target ally.

2005.name: Smiter's Boon
2005.description: Enchantment Spell. For 30 seconds, your Smiting Prayers have double the Divine Favor bonus.
2005.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Your Smiting Prayers have double Divine Favor healing bonus.

2006.name: Castigation Signet
2006.description: Signet. Target foe takes 26...56 holy damage. If that foe was attacking, you gain 1...10 Energy.
2006.concise description: Signet. Deals 26...56 holy damage. You gain 1...10 Energy if target foe is attacking.

2007.name: Purifying Veil
2007.description: Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, conditions expire 5...50% faster on target ally. When this enchantment ends, one condition is removed from that ally.
2007.concise description: Enchantment Spell. Conditions expire 5...50% faster on target ally. End effect: removes a condition.

2008.name: Pulverizing Smash
2008.description: Hammer Attack. If you hit a knocked-down foe, that foe suffers from Weakness and a Deep Wound for 5...20 seconds.
2008.concise description: Hammer Attack. Inflicts Weakness and Deep Wound conditions (5...20 seconds) if target foe is knocked-down.

2009.name: Keen Chop
2009.description: Axe Attack. If it hits, this attack always results in a critical hit.
2009.concise description: Axe Attack. Always a critical hit.

2010.name: Knee Cutter
2010.description: Sword Attack. If this attack hits a Crippled foe, you gain 2...7 Energy and 1...3 strikes Plural "1 strikes" when it should be "1 strike" [sic] of adrenaline.
2010.concise description: Sword Attack. You gain 2...7 Energy and 1...3 adrenaline if target foe is Crippled.

2011.name: Grapple
2011.description: Skill. You and target touched foe are knocked down. You lose your current stance.
2011.concise description: Touch Skill. Causes knockdown. You are also knocked down.

2012.name: Radiant Scythe
2012.description: Scythe Attack. This attack strikes for +1 damage for each point of Energy you currently have, maximum 5...30. You gain 1...7 Energy if this attack hits.
2012.concise description: Scythe Attack. Deals +1 damage (maximum 5...30) for each point of Energy you have. Gain 1...7 Energy.

2013.name: Grenth's Aura
