2013.description: Flash Enchantment Spell. For 20 seconds, you deal 5...25 less damage and steal 5...25 Health whenever you hit with a scythe attack. When you cast this enchantment you steal 5...25 Health from all adjacent foes.
2013.concise description: Flash Enchantment Spell. (20 seconds.)  You deal 5...25 less damage and steal 5...25 Health when you hit with a scythe. Initial effect: steal 5...25 Health from all adjacent foes.

2014.name: Signet of Pious Restraint
2014.description: Signet. Remove one Dervish enchantment. Target foe is Crippled for 5...15 seconds. If an enchantment was removed, all foes nearby your target are also Crippled and this signet recharges 75% faster.
2014.concise description: Signet. Inflicts Crippled condition (5...15 seconds). Remove one of your Dervish enchantments. Removal effect: also causes Cripple to foes nearby your target and recharges 75% faster.

2015.name: Farmer's Scythe
2015.description: Scythe Attack. If this attack hits, you deal +5...20 damage. If you hit more than one foe, this attack recharges instantly.
2015.concise description: Scythe Attack. Deals +5...20 damage.  Instant recharge if you hit more than one foe.

2016.name: Energetic Was Lee Sa
2016.description: Item Spell. Hold Lee Sa's ashes for 5...15 seconds. While you hold her ashes, you gain +2 Energy regeneration. When you drop her ashes, you gain +1...10 Energy.
2016.concise description: Item Spell. (5...15 seconds.) You have +2 Energy regeneration. Drop effect: you gain +1...10 Energy.

2017.name: Anthem of Weariness
2017.description: Chant. For 8 seconds, the next attack skill used by each ally within earshot also causes Weakness for 1...16 second[s].
2017.concise description: Chant. (8 seconds.) Allies in earshot inflict Weakness (1...16 second[s]) with their next attack skill.

2018.name: Anthem of Disruption
2018.description: Chant. For 1...10 seconds, the next attack skill used by each ally within earshot also interrupts an action.
2018.concise description: Chant. (1...10 seconds.) Allies in earshot interrupt an action with their next attack skill.

2052.name: Shadow Fang
2052.description: Hex Spell. Shadow Step to target foe. For 10 seconds, this hex does nothing. When this hex ends, you return to your original location and that foe suffers from a Deep Wound for 5...20 seconds.
2052.concise description: Hex Spell. Shadow Step to target foe.  End effect after 10 seconds: inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...20 seconds); you return to your original location.

2053.name: Calculated Risk
2053.description: Hex Spell. For 3...24 seconds, target foe's attacks do +10 damage, but there is a 50% chance that the damage from each attack will be done to that foe instead. (Maximum 15...100 damage.)
2053.concise description: Hex Spell. Target foe does +10 damage with attacks (3...24 seconds). There is a 50% chance that the damage from each attack (maximum 15...100) will be done to that foe instead.

2054.name: Shrinking Armor
2054.description: Hex Spell. For 10 seconds, target foe suffers from 1...4 Health degeneration. When this hex ends, that foe has Cracked Armor for 5...20 seconds.
2054.concise description: Hex Spell. (10 seconds.) Causes 1...4 Health degeneration. End effect: inflicts Cracked Armor condition (5...20 seconds).

2055.name: Aneurysm
2055.description: Spell. Target foe regains all Energy. For each point of Energy gained in this way, that foe takes 1...3 damage and all adjacent foes lose 1 Energy. (Maximum 1...30).
2055.concise description: Spell. Target foe regains all Energy. For each point of Energy gained, target takes 1...3 damage and all adjacent foes lose 1 Energy (maximum 1...30).

2056.name: Wandering Eye
2056.description: Hex Spell. For 4 seconds, the next time target foe attacks, that attack is interrupted and all nearby foes take 30...110 damage.
2056.concise description: Hex Spell. (4 seconds.) Interrupts target foe's next attack. Interruption effect: 30...110 damage to nearby foes.

2057.name: Foul Feast
2057.description: Spell. All conditions are transferred from target other ally to yourself. For each condition acquired in this way, you gain 0...45 Health and 0...2 Energy. This skill recharges twice as fast if you remove Disease from your target.
2057.concise description: Spell. Transfers all conditions from target ally to yourself. You gain 0...45 Health and 0...2 Energy for each condition transferred. Half recharge if you remove Disease.

2058.name: Putrid Bile
2058.description: Hex Spell. For 5...20 seconds, target foe suffers 1...3 Health degeneration. If that foe dies while under the effects of this hex, all nearby foes take 25...85 damage.
2058.concise description: Hex Spell. (5...20 seconds.) Causes 1...3 Health degeneration. Deals 25...85 damage to all nearby foes if target foe dies.

2059.name: Shell Shock
2059.description: Spell. Target foe is struck for 10...30 lightning damage and has Cracked Armor for 5...20 seconds. This spell has 25% armor penetration. If you are Overcast, this spell strikes adjacent foes.
2059.concise description: Spell. Deals 10...30 lightning damage. Inflicts Cracked Armor condition (5...20 seconds). 25% armor penetration. If Overcast, strikes adjacent.

2060.name: Glyph of Immolation
2060.description: Glyph. For 15 seconds, your next 1...4 spell[s] that target[s] a foe also cause[s] Burning for 1...4 second[s].
2060.concise description: Glyph. (15 seconds.) Your next 1...4 spell[s] that target[s] a foe also inflict[s] Burning condition (1...4 second[s]).

2061.name: Patient Spirit
2061.description: Enchantment Spell. For 2 seconds, target ally is enchanted with Patient Spirit. Unless this enchantment ends prematurely, that ally is healed for 30...120 Health when the enchantment ends.
2061.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (2 seconds.) End effect: heals for 30...120.

2062.name: Healing Ribbon
2062.description: Spell. Target other ally is healed for 20...110 Health. Up to 2 additional allies near target ally are healed for 10...100 Health.
2062.concise description: Spell. Heals for 20...110. Heals two additional allies near target ally for 10...100.

2063.name: Aura of Stability
2063.description: Enchantment Spell. For 3...8 seconds, target other ally cannot be knocked down.
2063.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (3...8 seconds.) Target ally cannot be knocked-down.

2064.name: Spotless Mind
2064.description: Enchantment Spell. For 1...15 seconds, target other ally loses a hex every 5 seconds.
2064.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (1...15 seconds.) Removes a hex every 5 seconds.

2065.name: Spotless Soul
2065.description: Enchantment Spell. For 1...15 seconds, target other ally loses a condition every 3 seconds.
2065.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (1...15 seconds.) Removes a condition every 3 seconds.

2066.name: Disarm
2066.description: Sword Attack. Interrupt target foe's action. If that action was an attack, all of that foe's attack skills are disabled for 0...3 second[s].
2066.concise description: Sword Attack. Interrupts target foe. Interruption effect: disables this foe's attack skills (0...3 second[s]) if that action was an attack.

2067.name: "I Meant to Do That!"
2067.description: Shout. If you are knocked down, you gain 1...5 strikes of adrenaline.
2067.concise description: Shout. You gain 1...5 strikes of adrenaline if you are knocked-down.

2068.name: Rapid Fire
2068.description: Preparation. For 5...25 seconds, you attack 33% faster while wielding a bow.
2068.concise description: Preparation. (5...25 seconds.) You attack 33% faster while wielding a bow.

2069.name: Sloth Hunter's Shot
2069.description: Bow Attack. If this attack hits, target foe takes +10...25 damage. If that foe is not using a skill, Sloth Hunter's Shot does an additional +10...35 damage.
2069.concise description: Bow Attack. Deals +10...25 damage. Deals +10...35 more damage if target foe is not using a skill.

2070.name: Aura Slicer
2070.description: Melee Attack. If this attack hits, you inflict Bleeding for 5...15 seconds. If you are enchanted, you also inflict Cracked Armor for 1...10 second[s].
2070.concise description: Melee Attack. (5...15 seconds.)Inflicts No space between the bracket and 'Inflicts' [sic] Bleeding condition. Also inflicts Cracked Armor (1...10 second[s]) if you are enchanted.

2071.name: Zealous Sweep
2071.description: Scythe Attack. If this attack hits, you deal +5...20 damage. You gain 3 Energy and 1 adrenaline for each foe you hit.
2071.concise description: Scythe Attack. Deals +5...20 damage. You gain 3 Energy and 1 adrenaline for each foe you hit.

2072.name: Pure Was Li Ming
2072.description: Item Spell. Hold Li Ming's ashes for 5...20 seconds. While you hold her ashes, conditions on you expire 10...50% faster. When you drop her ashes, all allies within earshot lose 1...4 condition[s].
2072.concise description: Item Spell. (5...20 seconds.) Conditions on you expire 10...50% faster. Drop effect: removes 1...4 condition[s] from allies in earshot.

2073.name: Weapon of Aggression
2073.description: Weapon Spell. For 5...15 seconds, you attack 25% faster.
2073.concise description: Weapon Spell. (5...15 seconds.) You attack 25% faster.

2074.name: Chest Thumper
2074.description: Spear Attack. If this attack hits a foe with Cracked Armor, that foe suffers a Deep Wound for 5...20 seconds.
2074.concise description: Spear Attack. Inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...20 seconds) if target foe has Cracked Armor.

2075.name: Hasty Refrain
2075.description: Echo. For 3...11 seconds, target ally moves 25% faster. This echo is reapplied every time a chant or shout ends on that ally.
2075.concise description: Echo. (3...11 seconds.) Target ally moves 25% faster. Renewal: every time a chant or shout ends on this ally.

2076.name: Drain Minion
2076.description: Spell. Sacrifice target undead servant to gain 300 Health.
2076.concise description: Spell. Sacrifice target undead servant to gain 300 Health.

2090.name: Ground Cover
2090.description: Creature has 50% chance to block attack [sic] while moving.
2090.concise description: Creature has 50% chance to block attack [sic] while moving.

2101.name: Critical Agility
2101.description: Enchantment Spell. For 4 seconds and 1 second for each rank of Critical Strikes, you attack 33% faster and gain armor. This skill reapplies itself every time you land a critical hit.
2101.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (4 seconds plus 1 second for each rank of Critical Strikes.)  You attack 33% faster and gain + armor. Renewal: every time you land a critical hit.

2102.name: Cry of Pain
2102.description: Spell. Interrupt target foe's skill. If that foe was suffering from a Mesmer hex, that foe and all foes in the area take damage and have  Health degeneration for 10 seconds.
2102.concise description: Spell. Interrupts a skill. If target foe had a Mesmer hex, deals  damage to target and foes in the area and causes  Health degeneration (10 seconds).

2103.name: Necrosis
2103.description: Skill. If target foe is suffering from a condition or hex, that foe suffers damage.
2103.concise description: Skill. Deals damage if target foe has a condition or hex.

2104.name: Intensity
2104.description: Skill. For 10 seconds, the next time you deal elemental damage with a spell to a target, you deal % of that damage to all other foes in the area.
2104.concise description: Skill. (10 seconds.) The next time you deal elemental damage with a spell, other targets in the area take % of that damage.

2105.name: Seed of Life
2105.description: Enchantment Spell. For seconds, whenever target other ally takes damage, all party members are healed for 2 Health for each rank in Divine Favor.
2105.concise description: Enchantment Spell. seconds. Heals party members for 2 for each rank in Divine Favor whenever target takes damage. Cannot self target.

2107.name: Whirlwind Attack
2107.description: Melee Attack. Attack target and adjacent foes. Each attack that hits deals + damage.
2107.concise description: Melee Attack. Deals + damage to target and adjacent foes.

2108.name: Never Rampage Alone
2108.description: Skill. For seconds, you and your pet attack 25% faster and have  Health regeneration.
2108.concise description: Skill. ( seconds.) You and your pet attack 25% faster and have + Health regeneration.

2109.name: Eternal Aura
2109.description: Enchantment Spell. You have +100 max Health. When this enchantment ends, all party members in the area are resurrected with % Health and % Energy.
2109.concise description: Enchantment Spell. You have +100 max Health. End effect: all party members in the area are resurrected with % Health and % Energy.

2110.name: Vampirism
2110.description: Binding Ritual. Create a level spirit that dies after  seconds. Attacks by this spirit steal up to  Health, and you are healed for  Health.
2110.concise description: Binding Ritual. Creates a level spirit (lifespan  seconds). Its attacks steal  Health, and you are healed for.

2111.name: Vampirism
2111.description: Ranged Attack. Steal up to Health from target foe.

2112.name: "There's Nothing to Fear!"
2112.description: Shout. For 4 seconds and 1 second for every 2 ranks in Leadership, all party members within earshot take % less damage. Affected party members are healed for Health when this shout ends.
2112.concise description: Shout. (4 seconds plus 1 second for every 2 ranks in Leadership.) Reduces damage by % for party members in earshot. End effect: heals for Health.

2116.name: Sneak Attack
2116.description: Melee Attack. If this attack hits, target foe is Blinded for seconds. This attack counts as a lead attack.

2121.name: Marked For Death
2121.description: You are preferred target of your enemies.
2121.concise description: You are preferred target of your enemies.

2123.name: Long Claws
2123.description: This creature's critical hits cause Deep Wound and Bleeding.
2123.concise description: This creature's critical hits cause Deep Wound and Bleeding.

2135.name: Trampling Ox
2135.description: Dual Attack. Must follow an off-hand attack. If it hits, you deal +5...20 damage. If you a [sic] hit a Crippled foe, that foe is knocked down.
2135.concise description: Dual Attack. Deals +5...20 damage; causes knock-down if target foe is Crippled.

2136.name: Smoke Powder Defense
2136.description: Stance. For 8 seconds, the next time you are struck, you take half damage and all adjacent foes are Blinded for 2...6 seconds.
2136.concise description: Stance. (8 seconds.) The next time you are struck, you take half damage and inflict Blindness condition (2...6 seconds) on adjacent foes.

2137.name: Confusing Images
2137.description: Hex Spell. For 2...10 seconds, target foe takes twice as long to activate non-attack skills.
2137.concise description: Hex Spell. (2...10 seconds). Target foe takes twice as long to activate non-attack skills.

2138.name: Hexer's Vigor
2138.description: Enchantment Spell. For 10 seconds, you have +1...8 Health regeneration. Hexer's Vigor ends if you cast a non-hex skill.
2138.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (10 seconds.) You have +1...8 Health regeneration.

2139.name: Masochism
2139.description: Enchantment Spell. For 10...40 seconds, you have +2 to your Death Magic and Soul Reaping attributes and sacrifice 5...3% of your maximum Health when you cast a spell.
2139.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (10...40 seconds.) You have +2 Death Magic and Soul Reaping. Sacrifice 5...3%  Health when you cast a spell.

2140.name: Piercing Trap
2140.description: Trap. When Piercing Trap is triggered, all nearby foes are struck for 5...50 piercing damage. Any foes with Cracked Armor are struck for an additional 15...60 damage. Piercing Trap ends after 90 seconds. While activating this skill, you are easily interrupted.
2140.concise description: Trap. (90 seconds.) Affects nearby foes. Deals 5...50 piercing damage. Deals 15...60 more damage to any foes with Cracked Armor.

2141.name: Companionship
2141.description: Skill. If you have less Health than your pet, you are healed for 30...120 Health. If your pet has less Health than you, it is healed for 30...120 Health.
2141.concise description: Skill. Heals you for 30...120 if you have less Health than your pet. Heals your pet for 30...120 if it has less Health than you.

2142.name: Feral Aggression
2142.description: Skill. For 5...20 seconds, your pet attacks 33% faster and deals +3...10 additional damage.
2142.concise description: Skill. (5...20 seconds.) Your pet attacks 33% faster and deals +3...10 damage.

2143.name: Disrupting Shot
2143.description: Bow Attack. If this attack hits, target foe's action is interrupted. If that action was a Skill, you strike for +10...40 damage.
2143.concise description: Bow Attack. Interrupts an action. Interruption effect: +10...40 damage if you interrupt a skill.

2144.name: Volley
2144.description: Bow Attack. All your Preparations are removed. Shoot arrows at target foe and up to 3 foes adjacent to your target. These arrows strike for +1...10 damage if they hit.
2144.concise description: Bow Attack. Deals +1...10 damage. Hits up to 3 foes adjacent to your target.

2145.name: Expert Focus
2145.description: Preparation. For 24 seconds, your bow attack skills cost 1...2 less Energy and deal 1...10 extra damage.
2145.concise description: Preparation. (24 seconds.) Your bow attack skills cost 1...2 less Energy and do +1...10 damage.

2146.name: Pious Fury
2146.description: Stance. Remove 1 Dervish enchantment. For 1...7 second[s], you attack 25% faster. If an enchantment was removed, this stance lasts twice as long.
2146.concise description: Stance. (1...7 second[s].)You No space between the closing bracket and 'You' [sic] attack 25% faster and remove 1 of your Dervish enchantments. Removal effect: this stance lasts twice as long.

2147.name: Crippling Victory
2147.description: Scythe Attack. If this attack hits a foe, that foe is Crippled for 3...8 seconds. If you have more Health than target foe, all adjacent foes take 10...30 earth damage.
2147.concise description: Scythe Attack. (3...8 seconds) Cripples target foe. If your health is greater than target foe's, all adjacent foes take 10...30 earth damage.

2148.name: Sundering Weapon
2148.description: Weapon Spell. For 4...10 seconds, target ally's next 3 attacks have 10% armor penetration and cause Cracked Armor for 5...20 seconds.
2148.concise description: Weapon Spell. (4...10 seconds.) Target ally's next 3 attacks inflict Cracked Armor condition (5...20 seconds) and have 10% armor penetration.

2149.name: Weapon of Renewal
2149.description: Weapon Spell. For 4...10 seconds, the next time target ally hits with an attack skill, that ally gains 1...7 Energy.
2149.concise description: Weapon Spell. (4...10 seconds.) Target ally gains 1...7 Energy the next time this ally hits with an attack skill.

2150.name: Maiming Spear
2150.description: Spear Attack. If your attack hits a Bleeding foe, that foe is Crippled for 5...20 seconds.
2150.concise description: Spear Attack. Inflicts Crippled condition (5...20 seconds) if target foe is Bleeding.

2151.name: Temporal Sheen
2151.description: Monster is immune to damage from all sources except Flux Energy.
2151.concise description: Monster is immune to damage from all sources except Flux Energy.

2152.name: Flux Overload
2152.description: Signet. Flux Energy bursts forth and deals 1,337 damage to nearby foes.
2152.concise description: Signet. Deals 1,337 damage to nearby foes.

2184.name: Rolling Shift
2184.description: Attack. Creature shifts form to attack.

2186.name: Signet of Deadly Corruption
2186.description: Signet. Target foe takes 5...35 damage for each condition on that foe (maximum 130 damage).
2186.concise description: Signet. Deals 5...35 damage (maximum 130) for each condition on target foe.

2187.name: Way of the Master
2187.description: Enchantment Spell. For 60 seconds, while holding a non-dagger weapon, you have an additional 3...33% chance to land a critical hit.
2187.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (60 seconds.) While holding a non-dagger weapon, you have +3...33% chance to land a critical hit.

2188.name: Defile Defenses
2188.description: Hex Spell. For 5...20 seconds, the next time target foe blocks, that foe takes 30...120 damage.
2188.concise description: Hex Spell. (5...20 seconds.) Deals 30...120 damage the next time target foe blocks.

2189.name: Angorodon's Gaze
2189.description: Spell. Steal 10...50 Health from target foe. If you are suffering from a condition, you gain 3...12 Energy.
2189.concise description: Spell. Steals 10...50 Health. You gain 3...12 Energy if you have a condition.

2190.name: Magnetic Surge
2190.description: Enchantment Spell. Target foe takes 15...75 damage. If you are Overcast, Magnetic Surge enchants all allies in earshot for 1...5 second[s] to block the next attack against them.
2190.concise description: Enchantment Spell. Deals 15...75 damage. If you are Overcast, allies in earshot are enchanted for 1...5 "Seconds" is missing [sic] and block the next attack against them.

2191.name: Slippery Ground
2191.description: Spell. If target or adjacent foes are Blind or moving, these foes are knocked down. There is a 50% chance of failure with Water Magic less than 5.
2191.concise description: Spell. Causes knock-down if this foe is Blind or moving. Affects foes adjacent to your target.

2192.name: Glowing Ice
2192.description: Spell. Target foe is struck for 5...50 cold damage. If that foe is under the effects of a Water Magic hex, you gain 5 Energy plus 1 Energy for every 2 ranks of Energy Storage.
2192.concise description: Spell. Deals 5...50 cold damage. You gain 5 Energy plus 1 Energy for every 2 ranks of Energy Storage if target foe is hexed with Water Magic.

2193.name: Energy Blast
2193.description: Spell. Target foe takes 1...2 damage for each point of Energy you have (maximum 130 damage).
2193.concise description: Spell. Deals 1...2 damage (maximum 130) for each point of Energy you have.

2194.name: Distracting Strike
2194.description: Melee Attack. If Distracting Strike hits, it deals no damage and interrupts target foe's action. If target foe has Cracked Armor, that skill is disabled for 20 seconds.
2194.concise description: Melee Attack. Interrupts an action. Interruption effect: Disables interrupted skill (20 seconds) if target foe has Cracked Armor.

2195.name: Symbolic Strike
2195.description: Melee Attack. If this attack hits, you deal +12 damage for each signet you have equipped (maximum 70 damage).
2195.concise description: Melee Attack. Deals +12 damage (maximum 70) for each signet you have equipped.

2196.name: Soldier's Speed
2196.description: Stance. For 3...18 seconds, you move 15% faster. You move an additional 15% faster while under the effects of a chant or shout.
2196.concise description: Stance. (3...18 seconds.) You move 15% faster and an additional 15% while affected by a chant or shout.

2197.name: Body Blow
2197.description: Melee Attack. If this attack hits, target foe takes +10...40 damage. If target foe has Cracked Armor, that foe suffers from a Deep Wound for 0...15 second[s].
2197.concise description: Melee Attack. Deals +10...40 damage. Inflicts Deep Wound (0...15 second[s]) if target foe has Cracked Armor.

2198.name: Body Shot
2198.description: Bow Attack. If this attack hits, you deal +5...20 damage. If it hits a foe with Cracked Armor, you gain 5...10 Energy.
2198.concise description: Bow Attack. Deals +5...20 damage. You gain 5...10 Energy if target foe has Cracked Armor.

2199.name: Poison Tip Signet
2199.description: Signet. For 60 seconds, your next attack also inflicts Poison for 8...15 seconds.
2199.concise description: Signet. (60 seconds.) Inflicts Poisoned condition (8...15 seconds) with your next attack.

2200.name: Signet of Mystic Speed
2200.description: Signet. For 30 seconds, your next 1...3 self-targeting enchantment[s] cast instantly. Flash enchantments do not consume uses of this skill.
2200.concise description: Signet. (30 seconds.) Your next 1...3 self-targeted enchantments [sic] cast instantly.

2201.name: Shield of Force
2201.description: Flash Enchantment Spell. For 1...16 second[s], blocks the next 1 attack against you. If an attack is blocked, all adjacent attacking foes are knocked down and suffer from Weakness for 5...20 seconds.
2201.concise description: Flash Enchantment Spell. (1...16 second[s].) Blocks the next 1 attack against you. Knocks down and inflicts Weakness (5...20 seconds) on all adjacent attacking foes.

2202.name: Mending Grip
2202.description: Spell. Target ally is healed for 15...75 Health. If that ally is under the effects of a weapon spell, that ally loses one condition.
2202.concise description: Spell. Heals for 15...75. Removes one condition if target ally is under a Weapon "weapon" is capitalized [sic] spell.

2203.name: Spiritleech Aura
2203.description: Skill. For 5...20 seconds, all of your spirits within earshot deal 5...20 less damage and steal 5...20 Health when they attack.
2203.concise description: Skill. (5...20 seconds.) All of your spirits within earshot deal 5...20 less damage and steal 5...20 Health when they attack.

2204.name: Rejuvenation
2204.description: Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...20 spirit. This spirit heals all party members within earshot for 3...10 Health each second. This spirit loses 3...10 Health for each party member healed in this way. This spirit dies after 30...90 seconds.
2204.concise description: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...20 spirit (30...90 second lifespan). Heals party members in earshot for 3...10 each second.

2205.name: Agony
2205.description: Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...12 spirit. This spirit causes 3...10 Health loss each second to foes within earshot. This spirit loses 3...10 Health for each foe hurt in this way. This spirit dies after 30...90 seconds.
2205.concise description: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...12 spirit (30...90 second lifespan). Causes 3...10 Health loss each second to foes in earshot.

2206.name: Ghostly Weapon
2206.description: Weapon Spell. For 5...20 seconds, target other ally's next attack cannot be blocked.
2206.concise description: Weapon Spell. (5...20 seconds.) Target ally's next attack is unblockable.

2207.name: Inspirational Speech
2207.description: Skill. You lose all adrenaline and target other ally gains 1...4 strikes of adrenaline.
2207.concise description: Skill. Target ally gains 1...4 strike[s] of adrenaline.

2208.name: Burning Shield
2208.description: Skill. For 3...9 seconds, while wielding a shield, the next attack skill used against you is blocked. If it was a melee attack, your attacker is set on fire for 1...6 seconds.
2208.concise description: Skill. (3...9 seconds.) Blocks the next attack skill against you. Inflicts Burning condition (1...6 second[s]) if it was a melee attack.

2209.name: Holy Spear
2209.description: Spear Attack. If this attack hits, you deal +5...20 damage. If it hits a summoned creature, all nearby foes take 15...90 holy damage, and are set on fire for 3 seconds.
2209.concise description: Spear Attack. Deals +5...20 damage. Deals 15...90 holy damage and inflicts Burning condition (3 seconds) to nearby foes if you hit a summoned creature.

2210.name: Spear Swipe
2210.description: Spear Attack. If this attack hits, you deal +5...20 damage and target foe is Dazed for 4...10 seconds. This attack has melee range.
2210.concise description: Spear Melee Attack. Deals +5...20 damage and inflicts Dazed condition (4...10 seconds).

2211.name: Alkar's Alchemical Acid
2211.description: Spell. Throw Alkar's Alchemical Acid at target foe. Target and adjacent foes are struck for damage. Destroyers take an additional  damage and they have Cracked Armor for  seconds.
2211.concise description: Spell. Projectile: deals damage to target and adjacent foes. Deals  more damage and inflicts Cracked Armor condition ( seconds) to Destroyers.

2212.name: Light of Deldrimor
2212.description: Spell. All foes in the area are struck for holy damage. The location of hidden objects are briefly indicated on your Compass. Any hidden objects in the area are revealed.
2212.concise description: Spell. Deals holy damage to foes in the area. Pings hidden objects within the area on the compass.

2213.name: Ear Bite
2213.description: Skill. Target touched foe takes piercing damage and begins Bleeding for  seconds.
2213.concise description: Touch Skill. Deals piercing damage and inflicts Bleeding condition ( seconds).

2214.name: Low Blow
2214.description: Skill. Strike target foe for damage. If target foe is knocked down, that foe takes an additional  damage and suffers from Cracked Armor for  seconds.
2214.concise description: Touch Skill. Deals damage. Inflicts  damage and Cracked Armor ( seconds) if target foe is knocked down.

2215.name: Brawling Headbutt
2215.description: Skill. You headbutt target touched foe dealing damage and knocking down that foe if it hits.
2215.concise description: Touch Skill. Deals damage; causes knock-down.

2216.name: "Don't Trip!"
2216.description: Shout. For seconds, party members within earshot cannot be knocked down.
2216.concise description: Shout. ( seconds.) Prevents knock-down; affects party members within earshot.

2217.name: "By Ural's Hammer!"
2217.description: Shout. For 30 seconds, all dead party members in earshot are resurrected with full Health and Energy. Resurrected party members deal % more damage. When this effect ends, affected party members die. This skill does not incur a death penalty.
2217.concise description: Shout. (30 seconds.) Resurrect all dead party members in earshot with full Health and Energy. Affected party members deal % more damage. Affected party members die when it ends, but do not receive a death penalty.

2218.name: Drunken Master
2218.description: Stance. For seconds, your movement and attack speeds are increased by %. If you are drunk while activating this skill, your movement and attack speeds are increased by % instead.
2218.concise description: Stance. ( seconds.) You move and attack % faster if you are not drunk. You move and attack % faster if you are drunk.

2219.name: Great Dwarf Weapon
2219.description: Weapon Spell. For 20 seconds, target other ally's weapon strikes for + damage and has a % chance to cause knock down.
2219.concise description: Weapon Spell. (20 seconds.) + weapon damage and % chance to cause knock-down with attacks.

2220.name: Great Dwarf Armor
2220.description: Enchantment Spell. For seconds, target ally has +24 armor, +60 maximum Health, and an additional +24 armor against Destroyers.
2220.concise description: Enchantment Spell. ( seconds.)  +24 armor and +60 maximum Health.  Additional +24 armor against Destroyers.

2221.name: Breath of the Great Dwarf
2221.description: Spell. All party members are relieved of Burning and are healed for Health.
2221.concise description: Spell. Removes burning and heals for Health. Affects party members.

2222.name: Snow Storm
2222.description: Spell. Create a Snow Storm at target foe's location. For 5 seconds, foes adjacent to that location are struck for cold damage each second.
2222.concise description: Spell. Deals cold damage each second (5 seconds). Hits foes adjacent to target foe's initial location.

2223.name: Black Powder Mine
2223.description: Trap. When Black Powder Mine is triggered, all nearby foes are struck for damage, become Blinded, and begin Bleeding for  seconds. Black Powder Mine ends after 90 seconds. While activating this skill, you are easily interrupted.
2223.concise description: Trap. (90 seconds.) Affects nearby foes. Deals damage. Inflicts Blindness and Bleeding conditions ( seconds).

2224.name: Summon Mursaat
2224.description: Spell. Summon a level Mursaat that lives for  seconds and has Enervating Charge. Only 1 Asura Summon can be active at a time.
2224.concise description: Spell. Summon a level Mursaat ( lifespan) that has Enervating Charge. Only 1 Asura Summon can be active a time.

2225.name: Summon Ruby Djinn
2225.description: Spell. Summon a level Ruby Djinn that lives for  seconds and has Immolate. Only 1 Asura Summon can be active at a time.
2225.concise description: Spell. Summon a level Ruby Djinn ( lifespan) that has Immolate. Only 1 Asura Summon can be active a time.

2226.name: Summon Ice Imp
2226.description: Spell. Summon a level Ice Imp that lives for  seconds and has Ice Spikes. Only 1 Asura Summon can be active a time.
2226.concise description: Spell. Summon a level Ice Imp ( lifespan) that has Ice Spikes. Only 1 Asura Summon can be active a time.

2227.name: Summon Naga Shaman
2227.description: Spell. Summon a level Naga Shaman that lives for  seconds and has Stoning. Only 1 Asura Summon can be active a time.
2227.concise description: Spell. Summon a level Naga Shaman ( lifespan) that has Stoning. Only 1 Asura Summon can be active a time.

2228.name: Deft Strike
2228.description: Ranged Attack. If this attack hits, target foe takes damage. If that foe has Cracked Armor, it begins Bleeding for  seconds.
2228.concise description: Ranged Attack. Deals damage. Inflicts Bleeding condition ( seconds) if target foe has Cracked Armor.

2229.name: Signet of Infection
2229.description: Signet. If target foe is Bleeding, that foe is Diseased for seconds.
2229.concise description: Signet. Inflicts Diseased condition seconds if target foe is Bleeding.

2230.name: Tryptophan Signet
2230.description: Signet. For seconds, target foe and all adjacent foes move and attack % slower.
2230.concise description: Signet. ( seconds.) Target and adjacent foes move and attack % slower.

2231.name: Ebon Battle Standard of Courage
2231.description: Ward Spell. You plant an Ebon Battle Standard of Courage at your current location. For seconds, non-spirit allies in this area gain +24 armor and an additional +24 armor against Charr.
2231.concise description: Ward Spell. ( seconds.) Allies in this ward have +24 armor and +24 more armor against Charr.

2232.name: Ebon Battle Standard of Wisdom
2232.description: Ward Spell. You plant an Ebon Battle Standard of Wisdom at your current location. For seconds, non-spirit allies in this area have a % chance to halve skill recharge of spells they cast.
2232.concise description: Ward Spell. ( seconds.) Spells that allies in this ward cast have a % chance to recharge 50% faster.

2233.name: Ebon Battle Standard of Honor
2233.description: Ward Spell. You plant an Ebon Battle Standard of Honor at your current location. For seconds, non-spirit allies in this area strike for + damage and an additional + vs. Charr.
2233.concise description: Ward Spell. ( seconds.) Allies in this ward deal + damage and + more damage against Charr.

2234.name: Ebon Vanguard Sniper Support
2234.description: Spell. Target foe is struck for piercing damage and begins Bleeding for  seconds. This attack has a 10% chance of doing an additional + piercing damage. If this attack hits a Charr it has a 25% chance of doing an additional + piercing damage.
2234.concise description: Spell. Deals piercing damage and inflicts Bleeding condition ( seconds). 10% chance of + piercing damage. 25% chance of + piercing damage if target foe is a Charr.

2235.name: Ebon Vanguard Assassin Support
2235.description: Spell. Summon a level Ebon Vanguard Assassin that has Iron Palm, Fox Fangs, and Nine Tail Strike. This summoned Assassin Shadow Steps to target foe. If that foe is a Charr, the Assassin lives for  seconds. If target foe is not a Charr, the Assassin lives for  seconds.
2235.concise description: Spell. Summon a level assassin that has Iron Palm, Fox Fangs, and Nine Tail Strike; it Shadow Steps to this foe. If this foe is a Charr, the assassin lives for  seconds. If target foe is not a Charr, the Assassin lives for  seconds.

2236.name: Well of Ruin
2236.description: Well Spell. Exploit nearest corpse to create a Well of Ruin at its location. For 5...30 seconds, whenever a foe in the well takes physical damage, that foe has Cracked Armor for 5...20 seconds.
2236.concise description: Well Spell. (5...30 seconds.) Inflicts Cracked Armor condition (5...20 seconds) to any foe in the well that takes physical damage.

2237.name: Atrophy
2237.description: Hex Spell. For 3...7 seconds, target foe's primary attribute is reduced to 0.
2237.concise description: Hex Spell. (3...7 seconds.) Reduces this foe's primary attribute to 0.

2238.name: Spear of Redemption
2238.description: Spear Attack. If this attack hits, you deal +5...20 damage. If it fails to hit, you lose one condition.
2238.concise description: Spear Attack. Deals +5...20 damage. If it fails to hit, you lose one condition.

2240.name: Gelatinous Material Explosion
2240.description: Signet. Nearby foes take 200 damage when the unstable gelatinous material explodes.
2240.concise description: Signet. Deals 200 damage to nearby foes when the unstable gelatinous material explodes.

2242.name: Gelatinous Mutation
2242.description: Skill. Mutating ooze creates an unstable ooze. This skill always recharges in 4 seconds.

2345.name: Flame Jet
2345.description: Skill. A jet of lava shoots out to target foe dealing 600 damage. If that foe is under the effects of an enchantment, the damage is halved.
2345.concise description: Skill. Deals 600 damage. Half that damage if target is enchanted.

2349.name: Spirit Shield
2349.description: Skill. For the next 30 seconds, if any friendly spirit is in the area, you take 50% less damage from attacks.

2350.name: Summoning Lord
2350.description: Skill. For the next 30 seconds, all of your summoning spells take 1 second to cast instead of their normal casting time.

2351.name: Charm Animal
2351.description: Skill. Charm target animal. Once charmed, your animal companion will travel with you whenever you have Charm Animal equipped.
2351.concise description: Skill. Charm target animal. Once charmed, your animal companion will travel with you whenever you have Charm Animal equipped.

2353.name: "Finish Him!"
2353.description: Shout. If target foe has less than 50% Health, that foe takes damage and suffers from Cracked Armor and a Deep Wound for  seconds.
2353.concise description: Shout. Deals damage and inflicts Cracked Armor and Deep Wound conditions ( seconds).

2354.name: "Dodge This!"
2354.description: Shout. For seconds, your next attack cannot be blocked and does + damage.
2354.concise description: Shout. ( seconds.) Your next attack is unblockable and deals + damage.

2355.name: "I Am the Strongest!"
2355.description: Shout. Your next attacks do an additional + damage.
2355.concise description: Shout. Your next attacks deal + damage.

2356.name: "I Am Unstoppable!"
2356.description: Shout. For seconds, you have +24 armor and cannot be knocked down or Crippled.
2356.concise description: Shout. ( seconds.) You have +24 armor and cannot be knocked-down or Crippled.

2357.name: A Touch of Guile
2357.description: Hex Spell. Target touched foe takes damage. If target foe was knocked down, that foe cannot attack for  seconds.
2357.concise description: Touch Hex Spell. Deals damage. Target foe cannot attack (5...8 seconds) if it was knocked-down.

2358.name: "You Move Like a Dwarf!"
2358.description: Shout. Target foe is knocked down and takes damage. That foe is also Crippled for  seconds.
2358.concise description: Shout. Deals damage, causes knock-down, and inflicts Crippled condition ( seconds).

2359.name: "You Are All Weaklings!"
2359.description: Shout. Target foe and foes adjacent to target are Weakened for seconds.
2359.concise description: Shout. Inflicts Weakness condition ( seconds). Also affects adjacent foes.

2360.name: Feel No Pain
2360.description: Skill. For 30 seconds you have + Health regeneration. If you are drunk when activating this skill, you also have + maximum Health.
2360.concise description: Skill. (30 seconds.) You have + Health regeneration. You have + maximum Health if you are drunk when activating this skill.

2361.name: Club of a Thousand Bears
2361.description: Melee Attack. If this attack hits, it deals + damage for each adjacent foe (maximum 60 damage). If target foe is non-human it is knocked down.
2361.concise description: Melee Attack. Deals + damage for each adjacent foe (maximum 60 damage). Causes knock-down if target foe is non-human.

2369.name: Murakai's Censure
2369.description: Spell. Murakai's Censure washes over all foes, dealing 80 damage and causing Poison and Disease for 10 seconds.
2369.concise description: Spell. Deals 80 damage to all foes and inflicts Poison and Disease (10 seconds).

2372.name: Edification
2372.description: Title. You have + maximum Energy in Asura territory.
2372.concise description: Title. You have + maximum Energy in Asura territory.

2374.name: Ursan Blessing
2374.description: Elite Form. You lose all effects and take on the aspect of the bear. For 60 seconds, you have 100 armor and 750...800 Health. All your attributes are set to 0 and bear attacks replace your skills.
2374.concise description: Elite Form. You lose all effects and take on the aspect of the bear (60 seconds). All your attributes are set to 0 and bear attacks replace your skills, and you have 100 armor and 750...800 Health.

2379.name: Volfen Blessing
2379.description: Elite Form. You lose all effects and take on the aspect of the wolf. For 60 seconds, you have 80 armor, Health, and  Health regeneration. All your attributes are set to 0 and wolf attacks replace your skills.
2379.concise description: Elite Form. You lose all effects and take on the aspect of the wolf (60 seconds). All your attributes are set to 0 and wolf attacks replace your skills, and you have 80 armor,  Health and  Health regeneration.

2384.name: Raven Blessing
2384.description: Elite Form. You lose all effects and take on the aspect of the raven. For 60 seconds, you have 80 armor, Health, and a % chance to block, All your attributes are set to 0 and raven attacks replace your skills.
2384.concise description: Elite Form. You lose all effects and take on the aspect of the Raven (60 seconds). All your attributes are set to 0 and raven attacks replace your skills, and you have 80 armor, Health, and a % block chance.

2411.name: Mindbender
2411.description: Enchantment Spell. For seconds, you move % faster and your Spells take 20% less time to cast.
2411.concise description: Enchantment Spell. ( seconds.) You move % faster and cast Spells 20% faster.

2412.name: Smooth Criminal
2412.description: Spell. For seconds, one random spell is disabled for target foe and Smooth Criminal is replaced by that spell. You gain  Energy.
2412.concise description: Spell. ( seconds.) Disables one Spell. This skill becomes that Spell. You gain Energy.

2413.name: Technobabble
2413.description: Spell. Target foe and all adjacent foes are struck for damage. If target foe is not a boss, that foe and all adjacent foes are Dazed for  seconds.
2413.concise description: Spell. Deals damage to target and adjacent foes. Inflicts Dazed condition ( seconds) on these foes if target was not a boss.

2414.name: Radiation Field
2414.description: Ward Spell. For 5 seconds, foes in the area have &#45; Health degeneration. When the portal ends, foes in the area are Diseased for seconds.
2414.concise description: Ward Spell. (5 seconds.) Causes &#45; Health degeneration to foes in the area. End effect: inflicts Disease condition ( seconds) to foes in the area.

2415.name: Asuran Scan
2415.description: Hex Spell. For seconds your attacks cannot miss target foe. Killing a foe hexed with Asuran Scan removes 5% Death Penalty.
2415.concise description: Hex Spell. ( seconds.) You cannot miss target foe. If you kill this foe, you lose 5% Death Penalty.

2416.name: Air of Superiority
2416.description: Skill. For seconds you gain a random Asura benefit every time you earn experience from killing an enemy.
2416.concise description: Skill. ( seconds). Gain a random Asura benefit every time you earn experience from killing an enemy.

2417.name: Mental Block
2417.description: Enchantment Spell. For seconds you have a 50% chance to block attacks. This Enchantment is reapplied every time an enemy strikes you.
2417.concise description: Enchantment Spell. ( seconds.) You have a 50% chance to block. Renewal: every time an enemy hits you.

2418.name: Pain Inverter
2418.description: Hex Spell. For seconds, every time target foe deals damage that foe takes % of the damage it causes (maximum 80 damage).
2418.concise description: Hex Spell. ( seconds.) Deals % of the damage (maximum 80) back to target foe every time it does damage.

2419.name: Healing Salve
2419.description: Signet. When dropped, the invigorating mist is released. It restores 300 Health to you and all adjacent creatures.
2419.concise description: Signet. When dropped, the invigorating mist is released. It restores 300 Health to you and all adjacent creatures.

2420.name: Ebon Escape
2420.description: Spell. Shadow Step to target other ally. You and that other ally are healed for health.
2420.concise description: Spell. Heals you and target ally for . Initial effect: Shadow Step to this ally.

2421.name: Weakness Trap
2421.description: Trap. When Weakness Trap is triggered, all nearby foes are Weakened for seconds and take  lightning damage. All Charr are knocked down. Weakness Trap ends after 90 seconds. While activating this skill, you are easily interrupted.
2421.concise description: Trap. (90 seconds.) Affects nearby foes. Deals lightning damage. Inflicts Weakness condition ( seconds). Knocks-down Charr.

2422.name: Winds
2422.description: Ebon Vanguard Ritual. Create a level Spirit. All foes within its range have 15% chance to miss with ranged attacks. This spirit dies after  seconds.
2422.concise description: Ebon Vanguard Ritual. Creates a level spirit ( second lifespan.) Affects foes within range. 15% chance to miss with ranged attacks.

2423.name: Dwarven Stability
2423.description: Enchantment Spell. For seconds, your stances last % longer. If you activated this skill while drunk, you cannot be knocked down.
2423.concise description: Enchantment Spell. ( seconds.) Your stances last % longer. You cannot be knocked-down if you activated this skill while drunk . There's a space between 'drunk' and the period [sic]

2425.name: Inscribed Ettin Aura
2425.description: This aura is a passive buff that loops consistently on an Inscribed Ettin, signifying that this creature is inscribed.

2491.name: False Death
2491.description: Insects have a 25% chance of resurrecting when killed. Insects are resurrected with 25% Health and Energy.
2491.concise description: Insects have a 25% chance of resurrecting when killed. Insects are resurrected with 25% Health and Energy.

2495.name: Sweeping Strikes
2495.description: This creatures [sic] attacks hit two additional adjacent foes.

2519.name: Fix Monster Attributes
2519.description: This creature gains +16 to all attributes tied to a skill that the creature possesses.

2525.name: Selvetarm's Blessing
2525.description: Skill. Damage you take from spirits is reduced by 50%.
2525.concise description: Skill. Damage you take from spirits is reduced by 50%.

2526.name: Thommis's Blessing
2526.description: Skill. conditions [sic] and hexes on you expire 50% faster.
2526.concise description: Skill. Conditions and hexes on you expire 50% faster.

2529.name: Rand's Attack
2529.description: Skill. For 10 seconds, all nearby allies gain +5 Health regeneration.

2530.name: Selvetarm's Attack
2530.description: Whenever any of Selvetarm's allies are nearby, Selvetarm takes no damage.

2531.name: Thommis's Attack
2531.description: All of Thommis's attacks cause Burning for 5 seconds. Whenever Thommis strikes a Burning foe, he gains 100 Health.

2532.name: Create Spore
2532.description: This creature creates fungal spore every 10 seconds while turtled.
2532.concise description: This creature creates fungal spore every 10 seconds while turtled.

2537.name: Courageous Was Saidra
2537.description: Item Spell. Hold Saidra's Ashes for up to 300 seconds. While you hold her ashes, you gain +30 maximum Energy. When you drop her ashes, all party members are healed for 200 Health.
2537.concise description: Item Spell. Hold Saidra's Ashes for up to 300 seconds. While you hold her ashes, you gain +30 maximum Energy. When you drop her ashes, all party members are healed for 200 Health.

2542.name: Charm Animal
2542.description: Skill. Charm target animal. Once charmed, your animal companion will travel with you whenever you have Charm Animal equipped.
2542.concise description: Skill. Charm target animal. Once charmed, your animal companion will travel with you whenever you have Charm Animal equipped.

2543.name: Wurm Siege
2543.description: Spell. Fires a projectile and damages foes in range.
2543.concise description: Spell. Projectile: damages foes in range.

2546.name: Dishonorable
2546.description: Hex Spell. You are considered Dishonorable because teammates repeatedly reported you for leeching, or because you abandoned your team in PvP matches. You may not participate in PvP until this effect expires.
2546.concise description: Hex Spell. You are considered Dishonorable because teammates repeatedly reported you for leeching, or because you abandoned your team in PvP matches. You may not participate in PvP until this effect expires.

2657.name: Call of Haste (PvP)
2657.description: Shout. For 30 seconds, your animal companion has a 25% faster attack speed and moves 25% faster.
2657.concise description: Shout. (30 seconds.) Your pet moves and attacks 25% faster.

2712.name: Party Time!
2712.description: Party Bonus. Excellent! For 3 minutes, you gain double points towards the Party Animal title track when using festive items.
2712.concise description: Party Bonus. (3 minutes.) Excellent! You gain double points towards the Party Animal title track when using festive items.

2734.name: Mind Wrack (PvP)
2734.description: Hex Spell. For 5...40 seconds, whenever this foe is the target of one of your non-hex Mesmer skills, that foe loses 1 Energy. If the target foe's Energy drops to 0, Mind Wrack ends and that foe takes 15...100 damage.
2734.concise description: Hex Spell. (5...40 seconds.) Causes 1 Energy loss each time foe is the target of your non-hex Mesmer skills. If target foe's Energy drops to 0, Mind Wrack ends and that foe takes 15...100 damage.

2756.name: Mad King's Fan
2756.description: Hex Spell. Mad King Thorn is pleased by your undying support. Survive his celebration for bonus treats!
2756.concise description: Hex Spell. Mad King Thorn is pleased by your undying support. Survive his celebration for bonus treats!

2758.name: Candy Corn Strike
2758.description: Signet. Launch a delicious projectile at target foe. If it hits, foe takes 50 damage and you gain 1 strike of adrenaline. This spell [sic] ignores armor.
2758.concise description: Signet. Projectile: deals 50 damage, and you gain 1 strike of adrenaline. Armor Ignoring.

2759.name: Rocket-Propelled Gobstopper
2759.description: Spell. Launch an explosively tasty, high-speed Gobstopper at target foe's location. All nearby foes are struck for 100 damage and knocked down. This spell ignores armor.
2759.concise description: Spell. Fast projectile: deals 100 damage and causes knockdown. Hits all foes near target location. Armor Ignoring.

2760.name: Rain of Terror
2760.description: Spell. Create a Rain of Terror at target foe's location. For 5 seconds, foes in the area are struck for 30 damage. This damage ignores armor.
2760.concise description: Spell. (5 seconds.) Deals 30 damage. Hits foes in the area of the target. Armor Ignoring.

2761.name: Cry of Madness
2761.description: Elite Shout. Scream like a madman! Foes in the area lose 10 Energy and all adrenaline. For 10 seconds, allies within earshot move 25% faster and have +5 Health regeneration and +1 Energy regeneration.
2761.concise description: Elite Shout. Foes in the area lose 10 Energy and all adrenaline. Allies within earshot move 25% faster and have +5 Health regeneration and +1 Energy regeneration. (10 seconds.)

2762.name: Sugar Infusion
2762.description: Spell. Sacrifice 25% of your current Health. Target other ally is healed for 150% of the amount you lost. If this targets Mad King Thorn, this spell heals for 200% the amount you lost.
2762.concise description: Spell. Heal target ally for 150% of your Health sacrifice. If targeting Mad King Thorn, heal for 200% of your Health sacrifice.

2763.name: Feast of Vengeance
2763.description: Spell. Steal 150 Health from target foe.
2763.concise description: Spell. You steal 150 Health from target foe.

2764.name: Animate Candy Golem
2764.description: Spell. Exploit nearest corpse to animate a level 20 Candy Golem. You may only have one Candy Golem at a time.
2764.concise description: Spell. Creates one level 20 Candy Golem.

2765.name: Taste of Undeath
2765.concise description: Elite Spell. Steal up to 500 health from target ally.

2766.name: Scourge of Candy
2766.concise description: Elite Spell. Target foe and nearby foes are struck for 200 damage and suffer from Dazed for 5 seconds.

2767.name: Motivating Insults
2767.concise description: Elite Shout. Scream insults at your army. For 10 seconds they have 8 Health regeneration, and move and attack 33% faster.

2768.name: Mad King Pony Support
2768.description: Elite Spell. Summon a level 20 Invisible Pony. This summoned pony prances to target foe. This pony lasts 60 seconds.
2768.concise description: Elite Spell. Summon a level 20 Invisible Pony. This summoned pony prances to target foe.

2769.name: "It's Good to Be King!"
2769.description: Elite Shout. You steal 50 Health from allies within earshot. These allies move 50% faster for 20 seconds.
2769.concise description: Elite Shout. You steal 50 Health from allies within earshot. These allies move 50% faster for 20 seconds.

2770.name: Maddening Laughter
2770.concise description: Elite Shout. Let out a maniacal cackle. Foes within earshot are struck for 100 damage, and suffer from Dazed for 5 seconds

2802.name: Portal Sickness
2802.description: Skill. Your skills are disabled for 10 seconds and you cannot teleport using a God Beacon for 30 seconds.

2803.name: Mind Freeze (PvP)
2803.description: Elite Hex Spell. Target foe takes 10...40 cold damage. If you have more Energy than target foe, that foe suffers an additional 10...40 cold damage and moves 90% slower for 1...5 seconds.
2803.concise description: Elite Hex Spell. Deals 10...40 cold damage. If you have more Energy than target foe, deals +10...40 cold damage and causes 90% slower movement (1...5 second[s]).

2804.name: Mind Shock (PvP)
2804.description: Elite Spell. Target foe suffers 10...50 lightning damage. If you have more Energy than target foe, that foe suffers 10...50 more lightning damage and is knocked down. This spell has 25% armor penetration.
2804.concise description: Elite Spell. Deals 10...50 lightning damage. If you have more Energy than target foe, deals +10...50 lightning damage and causes knockdown. 25% armor penetration.

2805.name: Mist Form (PvP)
2805.description: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 10...45 seconds, you take 33% less damage from foes under the effects of Water Magic hexes. Whenever you cast an elemental spell, all non-spirit allies in earshot are healed for 50...250% of the Energy cost of the spell. This spell does not heal allies above 80% Health.
2805.concise description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (10...45 seconds.) Take 33% less damage from foes hexed with Water Magic. Heals non-spirit allies in earshot for 50...250% of the energy cost of your elemental spells.

2806.name: Ward Against Harm (PvP)
2806.description: Elite Ward Spell. Create a Ward Against Harm at this location. For 5...15 seconds, non-spirit allies in this area have +1...3 health regeneration, +12...24 armor, and an additional +12...24 armor against elemental damage. This spell is disabled for 30 seconds.
2806.concise description: Elite Ward Spell. (5...15 seconds.) Allies in this ward have +1...3 Health regeneration, +12...24 armor, and +12...24 additional armor against elemental damage.

2807.name: Ride the Lightning (PvP)
2807.description: Elite Spell. You Ride the Lightning to target. All adjacent foes are Blinded for 1...5 second[s]. If your target is a foe, it is struck for 10...70 lightning damage. This spell has 25% armor penetration.
2807.concise description: Elite Spell. Deals 10...70 lightning damage. 25% armor penetration. Blinds all adjacent foes (1...5 second[s]). You instantly move to your target. May target allies.

2808.name: Enraged Smash (PvP)
2808.description: Elite Hammer Attack. If Enraged Smash hits, you gain 1...4 strike[s] of adrenaline. If you hit a moving foe, you strike for +10...40 damage, and target foe is knocked down.
2808.concise description: Elite Hammer Attack. Gives you 1...4 strike[s] of adrenaline if you hit. Deals +10...40 damage and causes knockdown if target foe was moving.

2809.name: Obsidian Flame (PvP)
2809.description: Spell. Deal 22...92 damage to target foe. This spell ignores armor.

2857.name: Aegis (PvP)
2857.description: Enchantment Spell. For 1...3 seconds, target other party member cannot be the target of hostile spells, and attacks against this party member fail.
2857.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (1...3 seconds). Target party member cannot be targeted by hostile spells. Attacks against this party member fail.

2858.name: "Watch Yourself!" (PvP)
2858.description: Shout. Party members within earshot gain +5...25 armor for 10 seconds. This shout ends after 1...3 incoming attack[s].
2858.concise description: Shout. (10 seconds.) Party members in earshot have +5...25 armor.

2859.name: Enfeeble (PvP)
2859.description: Spell. Target suffers from Weakness for 10...30 seconds.

2860.name: Ether Renewal (PvP)
2860.description: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 7 seconds, each time you cast a spell, you gain 1...3 Energy and 5...20 Health for each enchantment on you.
2860.concise description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (7 seconds.) Each time you cast a spell, you gain 1...3 Energy and 5...20 Health for each enchantment on you.

2861.name: Penetrating Attack (PvP)
2861.description: Bow Attack. If Penetrating Attack hits, you strike for +3...10 damage and this attack has 10% armor penetration.
2861.concise description: Bow Attack. Deals +3...10 damage. 10% armor penetration.

2862.name: Shadow Form (PvP)
2862.description: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 5...15 seconds, all hostile spells that target you fail and all attacks against you miss. When Shadow Form ends, lose all but 5...50 Health.
2862.concise description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (5...15 seconds.) Hostile spells targeting you fail, and attacks against you miss.

2863.name: Discord (PvP)
2863.description: Elite Spell. If target foe is suffering from a condition and under the effects of a hex or an enchantment, that foe suffers 30...110 damage.

2864.name: Sundering Attack (PvP)
2864.description: Bow Attack. If Sundering Attack hits, you strike for +3...10 damage and this attack has 10% armor penetration.
2864.concise description: Bow Attack. Deals +3...10 damage. 10% armor penetration.

2866.name: Flesh of My Flesh (PvP)
2866.description: Spell. Lose half your Health. Resurrect target party member with your current Health and 5...20% Energy.
2866.concise description: Spell. Resurrect target party member (half your current Health and 5...20% Energy). Lose half your Health.

2867.name: Ancestors' Rage (PvP)
2867.description: Skill. For 3 seconds all foes adjacent to target ally are struck for 1...41 lightning damage each second.
2867.concise description: Skill. (3 seconds.) Deals 1...41 lightning damage to foes adjacent to target ally each second.

2868.name: Splinter Weapon (PvP)
2868.description: Weapon Spell. For 20 seconds, target ally has a Splinter Weapon. Target ally's next 1...5 attack[s] deal 5...30 damage to up to 4 adjacent foes.
2868.concise description: Weapon Spell. (20 seconds.) Attacks deal 5...30 damage to 3 [sic] adjacent foes.

2869.name: Assassin's Remedy (PvP)
2869.description: Enchantment Spell. For 30 seconds, the next 1...10 attack skills you use remove one condition.
2869.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Your next 1...10 attack skills each remove one condition.

2871.name: Light of Deliverance (PvP)
2871.description: Elite Spell. All party members are healed for 5...70 Health. All your Smiting Prayers are disabled for 20 seconds.
2871.concise description: Elite Spell. Heals entire party for 5...70.

2872.name: Death Pact Signet (PvP)
2872.description: Signet. Resurrect target party member with your current Health and 15...100% Energy. The next time that ally dies within 120 seconds, so do you.
2872.concise description: Signet. Resurrects target party member with your current Health and 15...100% maximum Energy. For 120 seconds, you die the next time this party member dies.

2875.name: Harrier's Toss (PvP)
2875.description: Spear Attack. If this attack hits, you deal +5...20 damage. If this attack hits a moving foe, it deals an additional 5...30 damage.
2875.concise description: Spear Attack. Deals +5...20 damage. Deals 5...30 more damage if target is moving.

2876.name: Defensive Anthem (PvP)
2876.description: Elite Chant. For 4...10 seconds, each party member within earshot has a 50% chance to block incoming attacks. This chant ends if that party member hits with an attack skill.
2876.concise description: Elite Chant. (4...10 seconds.) Party members in earshot have 50% chance to block.

2877.name: Ballad of Restoration (PvP)
2877.description: Chant. For 10 seconds, the next time each party member within earshot takes damage, that party member gains 15...75 Health.
2877.concise description: Chant. (10 seconds.) Party members in earshot gain 15...75 Health the next time they take damage.

2878.name: Song of Restoration (PvP)
2878.description: Elite Chant. For 10 seconds, the next time each party member within earshot uses a skill, that party member gains 45...110 Health.
2878.concise description: Elite Chant. (10 seconds.) Party members in earshot gain 45...110 Health with their next skill.

2879.name: "Incoming!" (PvP)
2879.description: Elite Shout. For 4...10 seconds, all allies within earshot move 33% faster, and gain 5...15 Health while moving.
2879.concise description: Elite Shout. (4...10 seconds) Allies in earshot move 33% faster and gain 5...15 Health while moving.

2880.name: "Never Surrender!" (PvP)
2880.description: Shout. For 10 seconds, all party members within earshot and below 75% Health gain +1...5 Health regeneration.
2880.concise description: Shout. (10 seconds.) Party members in earshot gain +1...5 Health regeneration.

2883.name: "For Great Justice!" (PvP)
2883.description: Shout. For 8 seconds, when you hit with an attack, you gain 1 additional strike of adrenaline.
2883.concise description: Shout. (8 seconds.) You gain 1 extra strike of adrenaline whenever you hit with an attack.

2884.name: Mystic Regeneration (PvP)
2884.description: Enchantment Spell. For 5...20 seconds, you have  +1...4 Health regeneration for each enchantment (maximum of 3) on you.
2884.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (5...20 seconds.) You have +1...4 Health regeneration for each enchantment (maximum of 3) on you.

2885.name: Enfeebling Blood (PvP)
2885.description: Spell. Target foe and all nearby foes suffer from Weakness for 1...16 second[s].
2885.concise description: Spell. Inflicts Weakness condition (1...16 second[s]) on this foe and nearby foes.

2886.name: Summoning Sickness
2886.description: Skill. For 10 minutes, you are unable to use summoning stones.
2886.concise description: Skill. (10 minutes.) You are unable to use summoning stones.

2887.name: Signet of Judgment (PvP)
2887.description: Elite Signet. Target foe is knocked down. That foe and all adjacent foes take 5...50 holy damage. This signet has half the normal range.
2887.concise description: Elite Half Range Signet. Knocks down target. Deals 5...50 holy damage to target and adjacent foes.

2891.name: Unyielding Aura (PvP)
2891.description: Elite Enchantment Spell. Bring target dead party member back to life at full Health and full Energy. If you stop maintaining this enchantment or if this enchantment is removed, that party member dies and leaves an exploited corpse. Deaths while enchanted with Unyielding Aura do not incur a death penalty. (50% failure chance with Divine Favor 4 or less.)
2891.concise description: Elite Enchantment Spell. Resurrects target party member (full Health, full Energy). End effect: this ally dies and leaves an exploited corpse. Does not incur a death penalty.

2892.name: Spirit Bond (PvP)
2892.description: Enchantment Spell. For 8 seconds, whenever target ally takes more than 50 damage from the next 10 attacks or spells, that ally is healed for 30...90 Health.
2892.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (8 seconds.) Heals for 30...90 whenever target ally takes more than 50 damage.

2893.name: Weapon of Warding (PvP)
2893.description: Weapon Spell. For 3...8 seconds, target ally has a Weapon of Warding that grants target ally +2...4 Health regeneration and a 50% chance to block. Weapon of Warding ends if that ally attacks.
2893.concise description: Weapon Spell. (3...8 seconds.) +2...4 Health regeneration. 50% chance to block.

2895.name: Smiter's Boon (PvP)
2895.description: Enchantment Spell. For 5 seconds, your Smiting Prayers have double the Divine Favor bonus.
2895.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (5 seconds.) Your Smiting Prayers have double Divine Favor healing bonus.

2902.name: Reactor Blast
2902.description: Spell. P.O.X. sets off an explosion, striking everything in the area for 200 damage and causing knockdown and Burning for 10 seconds.
2902.concise description: Spell. P.O.X sets off explosion in the area which deals 200 damage, causes knock down, and inflicts Burning (10 seconds).

2903.name: Reactor Blast Timer
2903.description: Skill. P.O.X. counts down from 5 before setting off a reactor blast.
2903.concise description: Skill. P.O.X counts down from 5 before setting off a reactor blast.

2905.name: Internal Power Engaged
2905.description: Skill. P.O.X uses internal powering devices to gain 2 Health regeneration.
2905.concise description: Skill. P.O.X uses internal powering devices to gain 2 Health regeneration.

2906.name: Target Acquisition
2906.description: Hex Spell. P.O.X. attempting [sic] to acquire target.  After 5 seconds, this hex will end and the target will suffer from Dazed, Weakness, and Burning for 15 seconds.
2906.concise description: Hex Spell. (5 seconds) P.O.X. attempting [sic] to acquire target. End effect: inflicts Dazed, Weakness, and Burning (15 seconds).

2907.name: N.O.X. Beam
2907.description: Spell. Send out a beam that strikes all targets in a line for 200 damage.
2907.concise description: Spell. Deals 200 damage to all targets in a line.

2908.name: N.O.X. Field Dash
2908.description: Stance. For 10 seconds, move faster, knock aside foes, and deal 50 damage to them.
2908.concise description: Stance. (10 seconds.) Move faster, knock aside foes, and deal 50 damage to them.

2909.name: N.O.X.ion Buster
2909.description: Spell. N.O.X.ion Buster strikes target foe for 350 damage.
2909.concise description: Spell. Deals 350 damage to target foe.

2910.name: Countdown
2910.description: Skill. Starts charging sequence for the N.O.X.ion Buster
2910.concise description: Skill. Starts charging sequence for the N.O.X.ion Buster

2911.name: Bit Golem Breaker
2911.description: Spell. Launch a projectile that strikes target foe for 30 damage and inflicts a random condition for 15 seconds.
2911.concise description: Spell. Projectile: 30 damage and inflicts a random condition (15 seconds).

2912.name: Bit Golem Rectifier
2912.description: Enchantment Spell. N.O.X. is healed for 10 Health every second.
2912.concise description: Enchantment Spell. Heals N.O.X. for 10 every second.

2913.name: Bit Golem Crash
2913.description: Spell. All foes near the impact area suffer 250 damage and are knocked down.
2913.concise description: Spell. Deals 250 damage to all foes near the impact area and causes knockdown.

2914.name: Bit Golem Force
2914.description: Spell. All adjacent foes are struck for 150 damage.
2914.concise description: Spell. Deals 150 damage to all adjacent foes.

2916.name: N.O.X. Phantom
2916.description: Hex Spell. N.O.X. Phantom hexes target foe, plus one additional foe for each Phantom Bit. Any targets already hexed with this skill take 200 damage and lose the hex.
2916.concise description: Hex Spell. N.O.X. Phantom hexes target foe, plus one additional foe for each Phantom Bit. Any targets already hexed with this skill take 200 damage and lose the hex.

2917.name: N.O.X. Thunder
2917.description: Spell. 2 projectiles strike target foe for 100 damage. This skills hits one additional foe for each Thunder Bit.
2917.concise description: Spell. 2 projectiles strike target foe for 100 damage. This skill hits one additional foe for each Thunder Bit.

2920.name: N.O.X. Fire
2920.description: Spell. Deals 150 damage to all adjacent foes, plus 150 additional damage for each active Fire Bit.
2920.concise description: Spell. Deals 150 damage to all adjacent foes, plus 150 additional damage for each active Fire Bit.

2921.name: N.O.X. Knuckle
2921.description: Spell. Strikes target and adjacent foes for +150 damage.
2921.concise description: Spell. Deals +150 damage to target and adjacent foes.

2922.name: N.O.X. Divider Drive
2922.description: Spell. Deals 900 damage, divided among target and all nearby foes.
2922.concise description: Spell. Deals 900 damage, divided among target and all nearby foes.

2925.name: Sloth Hunter's Shot (PvP)
2925.description: Bow Attack. If this attack hits, target foe takes +5...20 damage. If that foe is not using a skill, Sloth Hunter's Shot does an additional +5...15 damage.
2925.concise description: Bow Attack. Deals +5...20 damage. Deals +5...15 more damage if target foe is not using a skill.

2957.name: Western Health Shrine Bonus
2957.description: Spell. Your party members' maximum Health is increased by 120.
2957.concise description: Spell. Your party members have +120 maximum Health.

2958.name: Eastern Health Shrine Bonus
2958.description: Spell. Your party members' maximum Health is increased by 120.
2958.concise description: Spell. Your party members have +120 maximum Health.

2959.name: Expert's Dexterity (PvP)
2959.description: Elite Stance. For 1...20 second[s], you attack 15% faster and your Marksmanship attribute is increased by 1.
2959.concise description: Elite Stance. (1...20 second[s].) You attack 15% faster and you gain +1 to your Marksmanship attribute.

2960.name: Siege Turtle Attack
2960.description: Skill. Enemies within the blast area take 80 damage.
2960.concise description: Skill. Deals 80 damage to foes in the blast area.

2965.name: Signet of Spirits (PvP)
2965.description: Elite Signet. You gain 3...12 Energy if you are within earshot of a spirit.

2966.name: Signet of Ghostly Might (PvP)
2966.description: Elite Signet. Target allied summoned creature's attacks deal 5...35 more damage. After 10 seconds, that creature is destroyed.
2966.concise description: Elite Signet. Target allied summoned creature deals +5...35 damage.

2968.name: Oversized Tonic Warning
2968.description: Skill. Notice! While in this area, certain tonics will convert you into a more festive appearance. Affected tonics are: Abominable, Automatonic, Phantasmal, and Sinister Automatonic.
2968.concise description: Skill. Notice! While in this area, certain tonics will convert you into a more festive appearance. Affected tonics are: Abominable, Automatonic, Phantasmal, and Sinister Automatonic.

2969.name: Read the Wind (PvP)
2969.description: Preparation. For 24 seconds, your arrows move twice as fast.
2969.concise description: Preparation. (24 seconds). Your arrows move twice as fast.

2998.name: Fragility (PvP)
2998.description: Hex Spell. For 8...20 seconds, target foe takes 5...20 damage each time that foe suffers or recovers from a new condition.
2998.concise description: Hex Spell. (8...20 seconds.) Target foe takes 5...20 damage each time it gains or loses a condition.

2999.name: Strength of Honor (PvP)
2999.description: Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, target ally deals 1...5 more damage in melee.
2999.concise description: Enchantment Spell. Target ally deals 1...5 more damage in melee.

3002.name: Warrior's Endurance (PvP)
3002.description: Elite Stance. For 5...35 seconds, you gain 3 Energy each time you hit with a melee attack. Warrior's Endurance cannot raise your Energy above 10...25.
3002.concise description: Elite Stance. (5...35 seconds.) You gain 3 Energy each time you hit with a melee attack.

3003.name: Armor of Unfeeling (PvP)
3003.description: Enchantment Spell. For 10...35 seconds, you have 10 base damage reduction while casting Binding Rituals.
3003.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (10...35 seconds.) You have 10 base damage reduction while casting binding rituals.

3005.name: Union (PvP)
3005.description: Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...8 spirit. Whenever a non-spirit ally in its range takes damage or life steal, it is reduced by 15 and the spirit takes 15 damage. This spirit dies after 30...60 seconds.
3005.concise description: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...8 spirit (30...60 second lifespan). Whenever a non-spirit ally within range takes damage or life steal, that damage is reduced by 15 and the spirit takes 15 damage.

3006.name: Shadowsong (PvP)
3006.description: Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...6 spirit. The spirit's attacks deal 5...20 damage and cause Blindness for 1...6 second[s]. This spirit dies after 30 second[s]. See the bug note on the Shadowsong page [sic]
3006.concise description: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...6 spirit (30-second lifespan).  Its attacks deal 5...20 damage and inflict Blindness condition (1...6 second[s]).

3007.name: Pain (PvP)
3007.description: Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...8 spirit. This spirit's attacks deal 5...30 damage. This spirit dies after 30...150 seconds.
3007.concise description: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...8 spirit (30...150 second lifespan). Its attacks deal 5...30 damage.

3008.name: Destruction (PvP)
3008.description: Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...10 Spirit "spirit" is capitalized in the non-concise description [sic] that dies after 30 seconds. When this Spirit dies, all foes in the area take 1...10 damage for each second the Spirit was alive (maximum of 150 damage).
3008.concise description: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...10 spirit (30 second lifespan). On death, it deals 1...10 damage for each second it was alive to all foes in the area (maximum 150 damage).

3009.name: Soothing (PvP)
3009.description: Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...8 spirit. All foes within its range take twice as long to build adrenaline. This spirit dies after 15...45 seconds.
3009.concise description: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...8 spirit (15...45 second lifespan). Building adrenaline takes twice as long for foes within range.

3010.name: Displacement (PvP)
3010.description: Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...10 spirit. All non-spirit allies within its range have a 75% chance to block incoming attacks. Every time an attack is blocked in this way, this spirit takes 60 damage. This spirit dies after 30...60 seconds.
3010.concise description: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...10 spirit (30...60 second lifespan). Non-spirit allies within range have 75% chance to block.

3011.name: Preservation (PvP)
3011.description: Elite Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...10 spirit. Every 4 seconds, this spirit heals one non-spirit ally in the area for 10...115 Health. This spirit dies after 90 seconds.
3011.concise description: Elite Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...10 Spirit (90 second lifespan). Every 4 seconds this spirit heals one non-spirit ally for 10...115.

3012.name: Life (PvP)
3012.description: Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...10 spirit. When this spirit dies, all non-spirit allies within its range are healed for 1...7 Health for each second this spirit was alive. This spirit dies after 20 seconds.
3012.concise description: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...10 spirit (20 second lifespan). Affects non-spirit allies within range. End effect: heals for 1...7 for each second this spirit was alive.

3013.name: Recuperation (PvP)
3013.description: Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...10 spirit. Non-spirit allies within its range gain +1...3 Health regeneration. This spirit dies after 15...45 seconds.
3013.concise description: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...10 spirit (15...45 second lifespan). Non-spirit allies within range have +1...3 Health regeneration.

3014.name: Dissonance (PvP)
3014.description: Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...8 spirit. This spirit deals 5...20 damage and anyone struck by its attack is interrupted. This spirit dies after 10...25 seconds.
3014.concise description: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...8 spirit (10...25 second lifespan). Its attacks deal 5...20 damage and interrupt actions.

3015.name: Earthbind (PvP)
3015.description: Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...10 spirit. All non-spirit foes knocked down within its range are knocked down for at least 3 seconds. Whenever this happens, this spirit loses 50...25 Health. This spirit dies after 15...45 seconds.
3015.concise description: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...10 spirit (15...45 second lifespan). Any time non-spirit foes within range are knocked down, they are knocked down for at least 3 seconds.

3016.name: Shelter (PvP)
3016.description: Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...8 spirit. Non-spirit allies within its range cannot lose more than 10% maximum Health from a single attack. When this spirit prevents damage, it loses 75...45 Health. This spirit lasts 30...60 seconds.
3016.concise description: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...8 spirit (30...60 second lifespan). Non-spirit allies within range cannot lose more than 10% maximum Health from a single attack.

3017.name: Disenchantment (PvP)
3017.description: Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...8 spirit. This spirit deals 5...20 damage and anyone struck by its attack loses one enchantment. This spirit dies after 10...35 seconds.
3017.concise description: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...8 spirit (10...35 second lifespan). Its attacks deal 5...20 damage and remove one enchantment.

3018.name: Restoration (PvP)
3018.description: Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...10 spirit. When this spirit dies, all party members in the area are resurrected with 5...50% Health and zero Energy. This spirit dies after 30 seconds.
3018.concise description: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...10 spirit (30 second lifespan). End effect: resurrects party members in the area with 5...50% Health and zero Energy.

3019.name: Bloodsong (PvP)
3019.description: Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...8 spirit who dies after 30...150 seconds. Attacks by that spirit steal up to 5...25 Health.
3019.concise description: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...8 spirit (30...150 second lifespan). Its attacks steal 5...25 Health.

3020.name: Wanderlust (PvP)
3020.description: Elite Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...8 spirit. Whenever this spirit's attack hits a stationary foe, that foe is knocked down and the spirit loses 70...50 Health. This spirit dies after 30...60 seconds.
3020.concise description: Elite Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...8 spirit (30...60 second lifespan). Its attacks against stationary foes cause knock-down.

3021.name: Savannah Heat (PvP)
