3021.description: Elite Spell. You create Savannah Heat at target foe's location. For 5 seconds, all nearby foes take 5...20 fire damage for each second this spell has been in effect.
3021.concise description: Elite Spell. Deals 5...20 fire damage for each second since casting this spell (5 seconds). Hits foes near target's initial location.

3022.name: Gaze of Fury (PvP)
3022.description: Binding Ritual. Destroy target allied spirit and create a level 1...10 Spirit of Fury. This spirit's attacks deal 5...20 damage. This spirit dies after 30...60 seconds.
3022.concise description: Binding Ritual. Destroys an allied spirit. Creates a level 1...10 spirit (30...60 second lifespan). Its attacks deal 5...20 damage.

3023.name: Anguish (PvP)
3023.description: Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...7 spirit. This spirit's attacks deal 5...20 damage and deal double damage to hexed foes. This spirit dies after 15...45 seconds.
3023.concise description: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...7 spirit (15...45 second lifespan). Its attacks deal 5...20 damage. Double damage to hexed foes.

3024.name: Empowerment (PvP)
3024.description: Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...10 spirit. All allies within its range holding an item gain 15...45 maximum Health and 10 maximum Energy. This spirit dies after 15...60 seconds.
3024.concise description: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...10 spirit (15...60 second lifespan). Allies in range holding an item gain 15...45 maximum Health and 10 maximum Energy.

3025.name: Recovery (PvP)
3025.description: Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...10 spirit. Conditions on allies within range of this spirit expire 20...50% faster. This spirit dies after 30...60 seconds.
3025.concise description: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...10 spirit (30...60 second lifespan). Conditions on allies in range expire 20...50% faster.

3026.name: "Go for the Eyes!" (PvP)
3026.description: Shout. For 10 seconds, the next time each ally within earshot makes an attack, that attack has an additional 30...75% chance to critical.
3026.concise description: Shout. (10 seconds.) Allies in earshot have +30...75% to land a critical hit with their next attack.

3027.name: "Brace Yourself!" (PvP)
3027.description: Shout. For 5...15 seconds, the next time target other ally would be knocked down, 1 nearby foe takes 15...75 damage instead.
3027.concise description: Shout. (5...15 seconds.) Prevents the next knock-down and deals 15...75 damage to one foe near target ally.

3028.name: Blazing Finale (PvP)
3028.description: Echo. For 10...35 seconds, whenever a chant or shout ends on target non-spirit ally, all foes adjacent to that ally are set on Fire for 1...3 second[s].
3028.concise description: Echo. (10...35 seconds.) Inflicts Burning condition (1...3 second[s]) to adjacent foes whenever a chant or shout ends on target ally. Cannot target spirits.

3029.name: Bladeturn Refrain (PvP)
3029.description: Echo. For 20 seconds, target non-spirit ally has +10...40 armor against slashing damage. This echo is reapplied every time a chant or shout ends on that ally.
3029.concise description: Echo. (20 seconds.) Target ally has +10...40 armor against slashing damage. Renewal: Whenever a chant or shout ends on that ally.

3030.name: Signet of Return (PvP)
3030.description: Signet. Resurrect target party member with 5...15% Health and 1...4% Energy for each party member within earshot.
3030.concise description: Signet. Resurrects target party member (5...15% Health and 1...4% Energy for each party member in earshot).

3031.name: "Can't Touch This!" (PvP)
3031.description: Shout. For 20 seconds, the next 1...5 touch skill[s] used against you fail[s].
3031.concise description: Shout. (20 seconds.) The next 1...5 touch-range skill[s] used against you fail[s].

3032.name: "Stand Your Ground!" (PvP)
3032.description: Shout. For 5...20 seconds, all party members within earshot receive +24 armor when not moving. This effect ends on an ally affected by this shout when that ally attacks.
3032.concise description: Shout. (5...20 seconds.) Party members in earshot gain +24 armor when not moving. Ends for an ally if that ally attacks.

3033.name: "We Shall Return!" (PvP)
3033.description: Shout. For 10 seconds, whenever party members within earshot use a resurrection skill, their fallen allies return with 10...75% more Health and 5...50% more Energy.
3033.concise description: Shout. (10 seconds.) Whenever party members in earshot use a resurrection skill, their fallen allies return with 10...75% more Health and 5...50% more Energy.

3034.name: "Find Their Weakness!" (PvP)
3034.description: Shout. For 5...20 seconds, the next time target ally criticals, that ally also inflicts a Deep Wound for 5...20 seconds.
3034.concise description: Shout. (5...20 seconds.) Target ally inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...20 seconds) with the next critical hit.

3035.name: "Never Give Up!" (PvP)
3035.description: Shout. All allies within earshot and below 75% Health gain 1...10 Energy.
3035.concise description: Shout. Allies in earshot gain 1...10 Energy.

3036.name: "Help Me!" (PvP)
3036.description: Shout. You gain 5...50 Health. For 1...10 seconds, other allies' spells targeting you cast 50% faster.
3036.concise description: Shout. (1...10 seconds.) Other allies' spells targeting you cast 50% faster. You gain 5...50 Health.

3037.name: "Fall Back!" (PvP)
3037.description: Shout. For 4...10 seconds, all allies within earshot gain 5...15 Health per second while moving and move 33% faster. "Fall Back!" ends on an ally affected by this shout when that ally successfully hits with an attack.
3037.concise description: Shout. (4...10 seconds.) Allies in earshot gain 5...15 Health per second while moving and move 33% faster.

3038.name: Agony (PvP)
3038.description: Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...8 spirit. This spirit causes 3...10 Health loss each second to foes within earshot. This spirit loses 3...10 Health for each foe hurt in this way. This spirit dies after 30...90 seconds.
3038.concise description: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...8 spirit (30...90 second lifespan). Causes 3...10 Health loss each second to foes in earshot.

3039.name: Rejuvenation (PvP)
3039.description: Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...16 spirit. This spirit heals all party members within earshot for 3...10 Health each second. This spirit loses 3...10 Health for each party member healed in this way. This spirit dies after 30...90 seconds.
3039.concise description: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...16 spirit (30...90 second lifespan). Heals party members in earshot for 3...10 each second.

3040.name: Anthem of Disruption (PvP)
3040.description: Chant. For 1...10 seconds, the next attack skill used by each ally within earshot also interrupts an action.
3040.concise description: Chant. (1...10 seconds.) Allies in earshot interrupt an action with their next attack skill.

3045.name: Comfort Animal (PvP)
3045.description: Skill. You heal your animal companion for 20...104 Health. If your companion is dead, it is resurrected with 10...58% Health.
3045.concise description: Skill. Your pet gains 20...104 Health. Resurrects your pet (10...58% Health.)

3047.name: Melandru's Assault (PvP)
3047.description: Pet Attack. Your animal companion attempts a Melandru's Assault that deals +5...20 damage. If that attack strikes a foe with an enchantment, that foe and all adjacent foes take +5...35 additional damage.
3047.concise description: Pet Attack. Deals +5...20 damage. Deals +5...35 more damage to target and foes adjacent to target if this foe is enchanted.

3048.name: Shroud of Distress (PvP)
3048.description: Enchantment Spell. For 30...60 seconds, if you are below 50% Health, you have a 75% chance to block attacks.
3048.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (30...60 seconds.) You have 75% chance to block. No effect unless your Health is below 50%.

3049.name: Unseen Fury (PvP)
3049.description: Stance. For 15...60 seconds, you cannot be blocked by Blinded foes.
3049.concise description: Stance. (15...60 seconds.) You cannot be blocked by Blinded foes.

3050.name: Predatory Bond (PvP)
3050.description: Shout. For 5...20 seconds, attacks by your animal companion heal you for 1...31 Health.
3050.concise description: Shout. (5...20 seconds.) You gain 1...31 Health whenever your pet makes a successful attack.

3051.name: Enraged Lunge (PvP)
3051.description: Elite Pet Attack. Your animal companion attempts an Enraged Lunge that deals +3...23 damage (maximum bonus 80) for each recharging Beast Mastery skill.
3051.concise description: Elite Pet Attack. Deals +3...23 damage (maximum 80) for each of your recharging Beast Mastery skills.

3053.name: Signet of Deadly Corruption (PvP)
3053.description: Signet. Must follow a dual attack. Target foe takes 5...35 damage for each condition on that foe (maximum 130 damage).
3053.concise description: Signet. Deals 5...35 damage (maximum 130) for each condition on target foe.

3054.name: Masochism (PvP)
3054.description: Enchantment Spell. For 30 seconds, you gain 1...3 Energy whenever you sacrifice Health.
3054.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) You gain 1...3 Energy whenever you sacrifice Health.

3058.name: Unholy Feast (PvP)
3058.description: Spell. Steal up to 10...65 Health from up to 1...4 foes [sic] in the area.
3058.concise description: Spell. Steals 10...65 Health from 1...4 foe[s] in the area around you.

3059.name: Signet of Agony (PvP)
3059.description: Signet. You suffer from Bleeding for 25 seconds. All nearby foes take 10...70 damage.
3059.concise description: Signet. Deals 10...70 damage to foes near you.

3060.name: Escape (PvP)
3060.description: Elite Stance. For 1...8 second[s], you move 33% faster and have a 75% chance to block attacks. Escape ends if you make a melee attack.
3060.concise description: Elite Stance. (1...8 second[s].) You move 33% faster and have 75% chance to block.

3061.name: Death Blossom (PvP)
3061.description: Dual Attack. Must follow an off-hand attack. If it hits, Death Blossom strikes target foe for +20...45 damage and all adjacent foes take 20...45 damage.
3061.concise description: Dual Attack. Deals +20...45 damage. Also affects foes adjacent to target foe.

3062.name: Finale of Restoration (PvP)
3062.description: Echo. For 10...35 seconds, the next 5 times that a chant or shout ends on target non-spirit ally, that ally is healed for 15...75 Health.
3062.concise description: Echo. (10...35 seconds.) Target ally gains [sic] 15...75 Health the next 5 times a shout or chant ends on that ally.

3063.name: Mantra of Resolve (PvP)
3063.description: Stance. For 5 seconds, you cannot be interrupted, but each time you would have been interrupted, you lose 10...4 Energy or Mantra of Resolve ends.
3063.concise description: Stance. (5 seconds.) Prevents interrupts against you.

3068.name: Charm Animal (Codex)
3068.description: Skill. Your animal companion will travel with you whenever you have Charm Animal equipped and have at least 8 points in Beast Mastery.
3068.concise description: Skill. Your animal companion will travel with you whenever you have Charm Animal equipped.

3070.name: Sugar Rush
3070.description: Stance. For 10 seconds, you run 50% faster.

3071.name: Sticky Ground
3071.description: Shout. For 10 seconds, target foe and all foes in earshot of target foe move 90% slower.
3071.concise description: Shout. Also hexes Should be 'affects', since this shout doesn't apply a hex [sic] foes in earshot of your target (10 seconds). These foes move 90% slower.

3072.name: Sugar Shock
3072.description: Shout. Knocks down target foe for 10 seconds.

3073.name: The Mad King's Influence
3073.description: Shout. For 20 seconds, all foes in spirit range capitulate to the Mad King's Influence.
3073.concise description: Shout. Foes in spirit range capitulate to the Mad King's Influence (20 seconds).

3074.name: Bone Spike
3074.description: Bow Attack. A Bone Spike shoots out, dealing 100 damage to target foe. The Bone Spike seems to penetrate all defenses.
3074.concise description: Bow Attack. A Bone Spike shoots out, dealing 100 damage to target foe. The Bone Spike seems to penetrate all defenses.

3075.name: Flurry of Splinters
3075.description: Bow Attack. A flurry of Bone Splinters shoots out, hitting target foe and up to 5 foes in longbow range for 35 damage per hit over 3 seconds. The Bone Splinters seem to penetrate all defenses.
3075.concise description: Bow Attack. A flurry of Bone Splinters shoots out, hitting target foe and up to 5 foes in longbow range for 35 damage per hit over 3 seconds. The Bone Splinters seem to penetrate all defenses.

3077.name: Weakened by Dhuum
3077.description: Skill. You are overcome by the energy coming off the Everlasting Mobstopper holding your newly captured Skeleton of Dhuum. You couldn't possibly handle capturing another while in this state.
3077.concise description: Skill. You are overcome by the energy coming off the Everlasting Mobstopper holding your newly captured Skeleton of Dhuum. You couldn't possibly handle capturing another while in this state.

3079.name: Dhuum's Rest
3079.description: Spell. Channel energy into putting Dhuum to Rest. Easily interrupted.

3081.name: Summon Champion
3081.description: Spell. Summon a Champion of Dhuum.
3081.concise description: Spell. Summon a Champion of Dhuum.

3083.name: Touch of Dhuum
3083.description: Skill. Steal 100 Health from target touched foe. That foe receives 15% Death Penalty. If Touch of Dhuum steals health from a foe with 60% Death Penalty, that foe dies.
3083.concise description: Touch Skill. Steal 100 Health from target foe. That foe receives 15% Death Penalty. If Touch of Dhuum steals health from a foe with 60% Death Penalty, that foe dies.

3084.name: Reaping of Dhuum
3084.description: Scythe Attack. Dhuum deals 200 damage to a new target with each strike. Dhuum only strikes a foe once in this way and will stop this attack after the fourth strike or when no eligible targets are within the area of his last strike. Dhuum is untargetable during this attack.
3084.concise description: Scythe Attack. Dhuum deals 200 damage to a new target with each strike. Dhuum only strikes a foe once in this way and will stop this attack after the fourth strike or when no eligible targets are within the area of his last strike. Dhuum is untargetable during this attack.

3085.name: Judgment of Dhuum
3085.description: Spell. For 4 seconds, Dhuum deals 75 damage each second to foes in spirit range.
3085.concise description: Spell. For 4 seconds, Dhuum deals 75 damage each second to foes in spirit range.

3086.name: Weight of Dhuum
3086.description: Hex Spell. For 5 seconds, target foe moves and attacks 90% slower, has tripled casting times, benefits 75% less from healing, and has -10 Health degeneration.

3087.name: Dhuum's Rest
3087.description: Spell. Channel energy towards putting Dhuum to Rest. Easily interrupted. Disables Ghostly Fury for 10 seconds.

3088.name: Spiritual Healing
3088.description: Spell. Heal target other ally for 250 Health.

3089.name: Encase Skeletal
3089.description: Spell. Target Skeletal is rendered harmless for 20 seconds.

3090.name: Reversal of Death
3090.description: Spell. Remove 5% Death Penalty from target other ally.

3091.name: Ghostly Fury
3091.description: Spell. Deals 250 damage. Disables Dhuum's Rest for 10 seconds.

3133.name: Weight of Dhuum
3133.description: Scythe Attack. For 5 seconds, target foe moves and attacks 90% slower, has tripled casting times, benefits 75% less from healing, and has -10 Health degeneration.
3133.concise description: Scythe Attack. (5 seconds.) Target foe moves and attacks 90% slower, has tripled casting times, benefits 75% less from healing, and has -10 Health degeneration.

3135.name: Spiritual Healing
3135.description: Spell. Heal target other ally for 125 Health.

3136.name: Ghostly Fury
3136.description: Spell. Deals 125 damage. Disables Dhuum's Rest for 10 seconds.

3141.name: Lightning Reflexes (PvP)
3141.description: Stance. For 5...11 seconds, you have a 75% chance to block melee and projectile attacks, and you attack 33% faster.
3141.concise description: Stance. (5...11 seconds.) You attack 33% faster and have 75% chance to block.

3143.name: Renewing Smash (PvP)
3143.description: Hammer Attack. If Renewing Smash hits, it deals +5...20 damage. If it hits a knocked-down foe, you gain 3 Energy and this attack recharges instantly.
3143.concise description: Hammer Attack. Deals +5...20 damage. You gain 3 energy and this attack recharges instantly if target foe was knocked down.

3144.name: Heal as One (PvP)
3144.description: Elite Skill. If you or your animal companion are below 75% Health, you are both healed for 25...145 Health. If your companion is dead, it is resurrected with 50% Health.
3144.concise description: Elite Skill. Heals you and your pet for 25...145. If your pet is dead, it is resurrected with 50% Health.

3145.name: Glass Arrows (PvP)
3145.description: Elite Preparation. For 10...35 seconds, your arrows strike for +5...12 damage if they hit and cause Bleeding for 10...20 seconds if they are blocked.
3145.concise description: Elite Preparation. (10...35 seconds.) Your arrows deal +5...12 damage. Inflicts Bleeding condition if blocked (10...20 seconds).

3147.name: Keen Arrow (PvP)
3147.description: Bow Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +1...5 damage. If you land a critical hit, you deal an additional +5...30 damage.
3147.concise description: Bow Attack. Deals +1...5 damage. Deals +5...30 more damage if you land a critical hit.

3148.name: Anthem of Envy (PvP)
3148.description: Chant. For 10 seconds, the next attack skill used by each ally within earshot deals +10...20 damage against foes with more than 50% Health.
3148.concise description: Chant. (10 seconds.) Allies in earshot do +10...20 damage with their next attack skill.

3149.name: Mending Refrain (PvP)
3149.description: Echo. For 15 seconds, you have +2...3 Health regeneration. This echo is reapplied every time a chant or shout ends on you.
3149.concise description: Echo. (15 seconds.) You have +2...3 Health regeneration. Renewal: whenever a chant or shout ends on you.

3151.name: Empathy (PvP)
3151.description: Hex Spell. For 5...15 seconds, whenever target foe attacks, that foe takes 15...45 damage.
3151.concise description: Hex Spell. (5...15 seconds.) Target foe takes 15...45 damage whenever it attacks.

3152.name: Crippling Anguish (PvP)
3152.description: Elite Hex Spell. For 5...20 seconds, target moves 50% slower and suffers 1...5 Health degeneration.
3152.concise description: Elite Hex Spell. (5...20 seconds.) Target foe moves 50% slower and has 1...5 Health degeneration.

3153.name: Pain
3153.description: Ranged Attack. If this attack hits, it deals 5...20 damage.

3156.name: Soldier's Stance (PvP)
3156.description: Elite Stance. For 4...10 seconds, you attack 33% faster while under the effects of a shout or chant.
3156.concise description: Elite Stance. (4...10 seconds.) You attack 33% faster while under the effects of a shout or chant.

3157.name: Destructive Was Glaive (PvP)
3157.description: Elite Item Spell. Hold Glaive's ashes for up to 30...60 seconds. While you hold her ashes, all Ritualist skills have 10% armor penetration. When you drop her ashes, all foes in the area are struck for 15...85 lightning damage.
3157.concise description: Elite Item Spell. (30...60 seconds.) Your Ritualist skills have 10% armor penetration. Drop effect: deals 15...85 lightning damage to all foes in the area.

3163.name: Keiran's Sniper Shot
3163.description: Bow Attack. Deals +50 damage to target foe and inflicts Bleeding for 25 seconds. Has a 25% chance of dealing +900 damage.
3163.concise description: Bow Attack. Deals +50 damage to target foe. Inflicts Bleeding (25 seconds). 25% chance of dealing +900 damage.

3164.name: Falken Punch
3164.description: Melee Attack. Deals +100 damage to target foe, knocks them down and sets that foe on fire for 5 seconds.
3164.concise description: Melee Attack. Target foe takes +100 damage, is knocked down, and on fire for 5 seconds.

3165.name: Golem Pilebunker
3165.description: Spell. Deals 100 damage to target foe and 50 damage to all adjacent foes. Foes struck by Golem Pilebunker are Dazed for 5 seconds.
3165.concise description: Spell. Deals 100 damage to target foe and 50 damage to adjacent foes. Inflicts Daze (5 seconds).

3166.name: Drunken Stumbling
3166.description: Stance. For 10 seconds, you attack 33% faster and cannot be knocked down. Whenever you would be knocked down, you gain 1 adrenaline and all adjacent foes take 50 damage.
3166.concise description: Stance. (10 seconds.) You attack 33% faster and cannot be knocked down.  If hit with a knockdown, you gain 1 adrenaline and adjacent foes take 50 damage.

3170.name: Koro's Gaze
3170.description: Spell. Target other ally is healed for 150 health and loses 1 hex. If a hex was removed, all adjacent foes take 80 damage.
3170.concise description: Spell. Heals target other ally for 150 health and removes a hex. Removal effect: 80 damage to adjacent foes.

3171.name: Ebon Vanguard Assassin Support
3171.description: Spell. Summon a level 20 Ebon Vanguard Assassin that has Iron Palm, Fox Fangs, and Nine Tail Strike. This summoned Assassin Shadow Steps to target foe and lives for 20 seconds.
3171.concise description: Spell. Summons a level 20 assassin that has Iron Palm, Fox Fangs, and Nine Tail Strike; it Shadow Steps to this foe. The assassin lives for 20 seconds.

3172.name: Ebon Vanguard Battle Standard of Power
3172.description: Ward Spell. You plant an Ebon Battle Standard of Power at your current location. For 20 seconds, non-spirit allies in this area strike for +15 damage and gain +24 armor.
3172.concise description: Ward Spell. (20 seconds.) Allies in this ward deal +15 damage and have +24 more armor. Spirits are unaffected.

3179.name: Mantra of Signets (PvP)
3179.description: Stance. For 10...40 seconds, whenever you use a signet, you gain 5...60 Health.
3179.concise description: Stance. (10...40 seconds.) You gain 5...60 Health each time you use a signet.

3180.name: Shatter Delusions (PvP)
3180.description: Spell. Remove one Mesmer hex from target foe. If a hex was removed, that foe and all adjacent foes takes 15...75 damage.
3180.concise description: Spell. Removes a Mesmer hex from target foe. Removal effect: 15...75 damage to target and all adjacent foes.

3181.name: Illusionary Weaponry (PvP)
3181.description: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 30 seconds, your melee attacks neither hit nor fail to hit. Instead, Illusionary Weaponry deals 8...40 damage to your targets for each melee attack.
3181.concise description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Deals 8...40 damage to foes in place of other damage or effects from melee attacks.

3183.name: Migraine (PvP)
3183.description: Elite Hex Spell. For 3...12 seconds, target foe suffers 1...8 Health degeneration and takes 100% longer to activate skills.
3183.concise description: Elite Hex Spell. (3...12 seconds.) Causes 1...8 Health degeneration and doubles skill activation time.

3184.name: Accumulated Pain (PvP)
3184.description: Spell. Target foe takes 10...35 damage. If target foe is suffering from 2 or more hexes, that foe suffers a Deep Wound for 5...20 seconds.
3184.concise description: Spell. Deals 10...35 damage. Inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...20 seconds) if target foe has 2 or more hexes.

3185.name: Psychic Instability (PvP)
3185.description: Elite Spell. Interrupts the target foe's action. If that action is a skill, that foe and all adjacent foes are knocked down for 2...3 seconds. (50% failure chance with Fast Casting 4 or less.)
3185.concise description: Elite Spell. Interrupts an action. Interruption effect: if the action is a skill, causes knockdown for 2...3 seconds on target foe and all adjacent foes.

3186.name: Shared Burden (PvP)
3186.description: Elite Hex Spell. For 5...20 seconds, target foe and all nearby foes attack, cast spells, and move 33% slower.
3186.concise description: Elite Hex Spell. Also hexes foes near your target (5...20 seconds). These foes attack, cast spells, and move 33% slower.

3187.name: Stolen Speed (PvP)
3187.description: Elite Hex Spell. For 1...10 second[s], spells cast by the target foe and all adjacent foes take 100% longer to cast. Spells you cast that target these foes take 50% less time to cast.
3187.concise description: Elite Hex Spell. Also hexes adjacent foes (1...10 second[s]). Doubles spell casting time. Spells you cast on hexed foes have -50% casting time.

3188.name: Unnatural Signet (PvP)
3188.description: Signet. Target foe takes 10...60 damage. If that foe is under the effects of a hex or enchantment, foes adjacent to your target take 10...60 damage. All your non-Mesmer skills except signets are disabled for 10 seconds.
3188.concise description: Signet. Deals 10...60 damage. Deals 10...60 damage to other adjacent foes if the target is hexed or enchanted.

3189.name: Spiritual Pain (PvP)
3189.description: Spell. Target foe takes 5...40 damage. All hostile summoned creatures in the area of that foe take 25...125 damage.
3189.concise description: Spell. Deals 5...40 damage. Deals 25...125 damage to hostile summoned creatures in the area of your target foe.

3190.name: Frustration (PvP)
3190.description: Hex Spell. For 5...20 seconds, target foe casts spells 50% slower and takes 5...50 damage whenever interrupted.
3190.concise description: Hex Spell. (5...20 seconds.) Causes 50% slower spell casting. Target foe takes 5...50 damage whenever interrupted.

3191.name: Mistrust (PvP)
3191.description: Hex Spell. For 6 seconds, the next spell that target foe casts on one of your allies fails and deals 10...75 damage to that foe and all nearby foes.
3191.concise description: Hex Spell. (6 seconds.) The next spell that target foe casts on one of your allies fails and deals 10...75 damage to target and nearby foes.

3192.name: Enchanter's Conundrum (PvP)
3192.description: Elite Hex Spell. For 10 seconds, target foe casts enchantments 100...200% slower. If target foe is not under the effects of an enchantment when this hex is applied, that foe and all adjacent foes take 10...100 damage.
3192.concise description: Elite Hex Spell. Causes 100...200% slower enchantment casting (10 seconds). Initial effect: deals 10...100 damage to target and adjacent foes if target foe is not enchanted.

3193.name: Signet of Clumsiness (PvP)
3193.description: Signet. If target foe is attacking, that foe and all adjacent foes are interrupted and take 15...60 damage. Any foes using attack skills are knocked down.
3193.concise description: Signet. Interrupts an attack for target foe and all adjacent foes. Interruption effect: deals 15...60 damage; knocks down foes using attack skills.

3194.name: Mirror of Disenchantment (PvP)
3194.description: Spell. Remove one enchantment from target foe. All of that foe's party members also lose that same enchantment.
3194.concise description: Spell. Removes one enchantment from target foe. That foe's party members also lose this enchantment.

3195.name: Wandering Eye (PvP)
3195.description: Hex Spell. For 4 seconds, the next time target foe attacks, that attack is interrupted and all nearby foes take 10...92 damage.
3195.concise description: Hex Spell. (4 seconds.) Interrupts target foe's next attack. Interruption effect: 10...92 damage to nearby foes.

3196.name: Calculated Risk (PvP)
3196.description: Hex Spell. For 3...12 seconds, target foe's attacks do +10 damage, but there is a 50% chance that the damage from each attack will be done to that foe instead. (Maximum 10...60 damage.)
3196.concise description: Hex Spell. Target foe does +10 damage with attacks (3...12 seconds). There is a 50% chance that the damage from each attack (maximum 10...60) will be done to that foe instead.

3198.name: Impending Dhuum
3198.description: Skill. No resurrection spell can save you now. Your account has been banned.
3198.concise description: Skill. No resurrection spell can save you now. Your account has been banned.

3199.name: Sacrifice Pawn
3199.description: Skill. Drains the life of target ally, killing them and healing the caster for an amount equal to that ally's current Health.
3199.concise description: Skill. Kills target ally. Caster gains Health equal to that ally's current Health.

3204.name: Defy Pain (PvP)
3204.description: Elite Stance. For 20 seconds you have an additional 90...300 Health and an additional 20 armor.
3204.concise description: Elite Stance. (20 seconds.) You have +90...300 maximum Health and +20 armor.

3205.name: Entourage
3205.description: Skill. For 15 second [sic], the Guild Lord is shielded by his guards. He takes no more than 30 damage from each attack or skill and takes 30 less damage each second. This skill can only be used if there are more defending NPCs than attackers.
3205.concise description: Skill. (15 second [sic].) The Guild Lord takes no more than 30 damage from each attack or skill and takes 30 less damage each second.

3206.name: Spectral Infusion
3206.description: Skill. For an undetermined time, you are protected from most of the effects of the Mursaat's vilest magic, reflecting some of its damage back on any Mursaat or Jade Construct within range.

3232.name: Heal Party (PvP)
3232.description: Spell. Heal entire party for 30...75 Health.

3233.name: Spoil Victor (PvP)
3233.description: Elite Hex Spell. For 3...15 seconds, whenever target foe attacks or casts a spell on a creature with less Health that foe loses 15...75 Health.
3233.concise description: Elite Hex Spell. (3...15 seconds.) Causes 15...75 Health loss whenever target foe attacks or casts spells on a creature with less Health.

3234.name: Visions of Regret (PvP)
3234.description: Elite Hex Spell. For 10 seconds, target foe and adjacent foes take 10...30 damage whenever they use a skill and 5...40 additional damage if not under the effects of another Mesmer hex.
3234.concise description: Elite Hex Spell. Also hexes foes adjacent to target (10 seconds). These foes take 10...30 damage whenever they use a skill and 5...40 additional damage if not under the effects of another Mesmer hex.

3251.name: Fox Fangs (PvP)
3251.description: Off-Hand Attack. Must follow a lead attack. Fox Fangs cannot be blocked and strikes for +10...25 damage if it hits.
3251.concise description: Off-Hand Attack. Deals +10...25 damage. Unblockable. <span style="color:grey;">Must follow a lead attack.</span>

3252.name: Wild Strike (PvP)
3252.description: Off-Hand Attack. Must follow a lead attack. If it hits, this attack strikes for +10...35 damage and any stance being used by target foe ends. This attack cannot be blocked.
3252.concise description: Off-Hand Attack. Deals +10...35 damage. Removes target foe's stance. Unblockable.

3254.name: Blizzard
3254.description: Spell. Create a blizzard at target foe's location that lasts for 10 seconds. Foes adjacent to the blizzard take 50 cold damage per second and are Crippled and Blinded for 5 seconds.
3254.concise description: Spell. Creates a blizzard. Deals 50 cold damage each second. Applies Cripple and Blind (5 seconds). Hits foes adjacent to target's initial location.

3263.name: Banishing Strike (PvP)
3263.description: Melee Attack. If it hits, this attack deals 10...60 holy damage. It deals double damage to summoned creatures.
3263.concise description: Melee Attack. Deals 10...60 holy damage. Deals double damage to summoned creatures.

3264.name: Twin Moon Sweep (PvP)
3264.description: Melee Attack. You lose 1 Dervish enchantment and gain 10...20 Health. If an enchantment is lost in this way, you cannot be blocked, you strike twice, with each strike doing 25% less damage than normal, and you gain an additional 10...30 Health.
3264.concise description: Melee Attack. Remove 1 of your Dervish enchantments. Gain 10...20 Health. Removal effect: Unblockable, attack twice, each strike doing 25% less damage, and gain 10...30 more Health.

3265.name: Irresistible Sweep (PvP)
3265.description: Scythe Attack. Deal +3...15 damage and lose 1 Dervish enchantment. If you lose an enchantment in this way, Irresistible Sweep cannot be blocked and removes a stance.
3265.concise description: Scythe Attack. Deals +3...15 damage.  Remove 1 of your Dervish enchantments.  Removal effect: unblockable, removes a stance.

3266.name: Pious Assault (PvP)
3266.description: Melee Attack. You remove 1 Dervish enchantment. If a Dervish enchantment was removed, this skill recharges 75% faster and adjacent foes take 10...30 damage.
3266.concise description: Melee Attack. Removes 1 of your Dervish enchantments. Removal effect: this skill recharges 75% faster and adjacent foes take 10...30 damage.

3269.name: Guiding Hands (PvP)
3269.description: Enchantment Spell. For 20 seconds, your next 0...3 attack[s] cannot be blocked. When activated, this skill removes the Blindness condition.
3269.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (20 seconds.) Your next 0...3 attack[s] cannot be blocked. Initial effect: removes Blindness.

3270.name: Avatar of Dwayna (PvP)
3270.description: Elite Form. For 10...90 seconds, your attacks deal holy damage. Whenever you use a Dervish attack skill, you lose 1 hex. Whenever you lose a Dervish enchantment, you are healed for 5...50 Health. This skill is disabled for 45 seconds.
3270.concise description: Elite Form. (10...90 seconds.) Deal holy damage. You lose 1 hex whenever you use a Dervish attack skill. Heal yourself for 5...50 Health whenever you lose a Dervish enchantment. This skill is disabled for 45 seconds.

3271.name: Avatar of Melandru (PvP)
3271.description: Elite Form. For 10...90 seconds, you have +100 Health, +30 elemental armor, and your attacks deal earth damage. Whenever you lose a Dervish enchantment you lose 2 conditions. This skill is disabled for 45 seconds.
3271.concise description: Elite Form. (10...90 seconds.) You have +100 maximum Health, +30 elemental armor, and your attacks deal earth damage. Cure 2 conditions from yourself whenever you lose a Dervish enchantment. This skill is disabled for 45 seconds.

3272.name: Mystic Healing (PvP)
3272.description: Spell. You are healed for 5...65 Health. Also heals all enchanted party members for 5...65 Health.
3272.concise description: Spell. Heals you for 5...65. Heals all enchanted party members for 5...65 Health.

3273.name: Signet of Pious Restraint (PvP)
3273.description: Signet. Lose 1 Dervish enchantment and Cripple target foe 5...15 seconds. If an enchantment was removed, this skill recharges 75% faster.
3273.concise description: Signet. (5...15 seconds.) Cripples target foe and removes 1 of your Dervish enchantments. Removal effect: recharges 75% faster.

3289.name: Fevered Dreams (PvP)
3289.description: Elite Hex Spell. For 5...15 seconds, whenever target foe suffers from a new condition, all foes in the area suffer from that condition as well.
3289.concise description: Elite Hex Spell. (5...15 seconds.) Foes in the area also have any new conditions that target foe acquires.

3298.name: "I'll Be Back!"
3298.description: Shout. For 15 seconds, the next time you would take damage that would be fatal, that damage is negated and you gain 500 Health.
3298.concise description: Shout. (15 seconds.) Negates the next fatal damage you take. Negation effect: you gain 500 Health.

3301.name: Annihilator Bash
3301.description: Melee Attack. Removes blind condition and ends target's current stance. Target foe is knocked down and struck for +50 damage.
3301.concise description: Melee Attack. Deals +50 damage. Knocks down foe. Initial Effect: Removes blind condition and ends target foe's stance.

3346.name: Aura of Thorns (PvP)
3346.description: Flash Enchantment Spell. All nearby foes begin Bleeding for 5...15 seconds. For 30 seconds, this enchantment does nothing. When this enchantment ends, all nearby foes are Crippled for 3...8 seconds.
3346.concise description: Flash Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Initial effect: inflicts Bleeding condition (5...15 seconds) on nearby foes. End effect: inflicts Crippled condition (3...8 seconds) on nearby foes.

3347.name: Dust Cloak (PvP)
3347.description: Flash Enchantment Spell. All adjacent foes are struck for 10...40 earth damage. For 30 seconds, your attacks deal earth damage. When this enchantment ends, all adjacent foes are Blinded for 1...4 second[s].
3347.concise description: Flash Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Your attacks deal earth damage. Initial effect: deals 10...40 earth damage to adjacent foes. End effect: inflicts Blindness condition (1...4 second[s]) on adjacent foes.

3348.name: Lyssa's Haste (PvP)
3348.description: Flash Enchantment Spell. For 3...15 seconds, your Dervish enchantments recharge 33% faster. When you activate this enchantment, all adjacent foes are interrupted. When this enchantment ends, all adjacent foes are interrupted. 50% failure chance unless Wind Prayers 5 or higher.
3348.concise description: Flash Enchantment Spell. (3...15 seconds.) Your Dervish enchantments recharge 33% faster. Initial Effect: interrupts all adjacent foes. End Effect: interrupts all adjacent foes.

3365.name: Onslaught (PvP)
3365.description: Elite Flash Enchantment Spell. For 2...8 seconds, you attack and gain adrenaline 25% faster.
3365.concise description: Elite Flash Enchantment Spell. (2...8 seconds.) You attack and gain adrenaline 25% faster.

3366.name: Heart of Fury (PvP)
3366.description: Stance. For 2...10 seconds, you attack 25% faster.

3367.name: Wounding Strike (PvP)
3367.description: Elite Scythe Attack. If this attack hits, target foe suffers from Bleeding for 5...20 seconds, and you lose 1 Dervish enchantment. If an enchantment is removed, target foe also suffers from a Deep Wound for 5...20 seconds.
3367.concise description: Elite Scythe Attack. Inflicts Bleeding condition (5...20 seconds). Removes 1 Dervish enchantment. Removal effect: inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...20 seconds).

3368.name: Pious Fury (PvP)
3368.description: Stance. Remove one Dervish enchantment. For 1...5 second[s], you attack 25% faster. If an enchantment was removed, this stance lasts twice as long.
3368.concise description: Stance. (1...5 second[s].)You No space between the closing bracket and 'You' [sic] attack 25% faster and remove 1 of your Dervish enchantments. Removal effect: this stance lasts twice as long.

3373.name: Illusion of Haste (PvP)
3373.description: Enchantment Spell. For 5...11 seconds, you move 33% faster. When Illusion of Haste ends, you become Crippled for 3 seconds.
3373.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (5...11 seconds.) You move 33% faster.

3374.name: Illusion of Pain (PvP)
3374.description: Hex Spell. For 8 seconds, target foe has 3...10 Health degeneration and takes 3...10 damage each second. When Illusion of Pain ends or is reapplied, that foe is healed for 36...120.
3374.concise description: Hex Spell. (8 seconds.) Causes 3...10 Health degeneration and target foe takes 3...10 damage each second. End effect: that foe is healed for 36...120.

3375.name: Aura of Restoration (PvP)
3375.description: Enchantment Spell. For 60 seconds, you gain 0...1 Energy and are healed for 200...400% of the Energy cost each time you cast a spell.
3375.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (60 seconds.) You gain 0...1 Energy and are healed for 200...400% of the Energy cost each time you cast a spell.

3378.name: Phase Shield
3378.description: Spell. A shield surrounds the golem for 20 seconds, preventing up to 250 damage to nearby allies. Removes Spectral Agony from shielded targets.
3378.concise description: Spell. (20 seconds.) A shield around the golem prevents up to 250 damage to nearby allies. Removes Spectral Agony from shielded targets.

3379.name: Reactor Burst
3379.description: Spell. Overload your reactor, removing a condition from yourself and dealing 150 damage to all adjacent foes. Foes struck by Reactor Burst are interrupted and set on fire for 3 seconds.
3379.concise description: Spell. Removes a condition. Deals 150 damage to adjacent foes and sets them on fire (3 seconds). Interrupts struck foes.

3380.name: "I'll Be Back!"
3380.description: Shout. For 10 seconds, the next time you would take fatal damage, that damage is negated and you gain 500 Health.
3380.concise description: Shout. (10 seconds) Negates the next fatal damage you take. Negation effect: you gain 500 Health.

3381.name: Annihilator Strike
3381.description: Attack. If this attack hits, it steals 75 Health. Steal twice as much Health if it strike Should be "strikes" [sic] Sarah.
3381.concise description: Attack. Steal 75 Health. If you strike Sarah, steal twice as much Health.

3382.name: Annihilator Beam
3382.description: Spell. Send out a beam that strikes all targets in a line for 300 damage.
3382.concise description: Spell. Deals 300 damage to all targets in a line.

3383.name: Annihilator Knuckle
3383.description: Attack. Strikes target and adjacent foes for +80 damage.
3383.concise description: Attack. Deals +80 damage to target and adjacent foes.

3384.name: Annihilator Toss
3384.description: Skill. Throw target touched foe into lava. Only works near a suitably hot lava pit.
3384.concise description: Touch Skill. Throw target into lava.

3386.name: Web of Disruption (PvP)
3386.description: Hex Spell. Interrupt target foe. For 10 seconds, target foe is hexed with Web of Disruption. When this hex ends, that foe is interrupted again.
3386.concise description: Hex Spell. (10 seconds.) Initial effect: interrupts a skill. End effect: interrupts a skill.

3396.name: Lightning Hammer (PvP)
3396.description: Spell. Target foe is struck for 10...100 lightning damage. Lightning Hammer has 25% armor penetration.
3396.concise description: Spell. Deals 10...100 lightning damage. 25% armor penetration.

3397.name: Elemental Flame (PvP)
3397.description: Enchantment Spell. For 5...20 seconds, whenever you apply an Elemental hex to a foe, that foe is set on fire for 1...2 second[s].
3397.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (5...20 seconds.) Inflicts Burning condition (1...2 second[s]) whenever you apply an Elemental hex to a target.

3398.name: Slippery Ground (PvP)
3398.description: Spell. If target foe is Blind or moving, that foe is knocked down. (50% failure chance with Water Magic 4 or less.)
3398.concise description: Spell. Causes knock-down if this foe is Blind or moving.

3422.name: Time Ward
3422.description: Elite Ward Spell. You create a Time Ward at your location. For (3...15) seconds, non-spirit allies in this area cast spells (15...20)% faster and recharge skills (15...20)% faster.
3422.concise description: Elite Ward Spell. (3...15 seconds.) Allies in this ward cast spells 15...20% faster and recharge skills 15...20% faster.

3423.name: Soul Taker
3423.description: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 3...30 seconds, your attacks sacrifice 15...20 health and deal 15...20 more damage.
3423.concise description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (3...30 seconds.) Attacks deal +15...20 damage and sacrifice 15...20 health.

3424.name: Over the Limit
3424.description: Elite Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, your spells cast 15...20% faster, and recharge 15...50% faster, but you continuously gain Overcast.
3424.concise description: Elite Enchantment Spell. Spells cast 15...20% faster and recharge 15...50% faster. Continuously gain Overcast while active.

3425.name: Judgment Strike
3425.description: Elite Melee Attack. Attack target and adjacent foes. Each attack that hits deals +13...30 Holy damage for most skills, the "h" of holy is lowercase [sic] and knocks down attacking foes.
3425.concise description: Elite Melee Attack. Attacks target and adjacent foes for +13...30 Holy damage. Causes knock down on attacking foes.

3426.name: Seven Weapons Stance
3426.description: Elite Stance. For 3...20 seconds, your weapon attributes are increased by +1...15 and you attack 33% faster.
3426.concise description: Elite Stance. (3...20 seconds.) Weapon attributes are increased by +1...15. You attack 33% faster.

3427.name: "Together as One!"
3427.description: Elite Shout. For 3...15 seconds, all party members near you or near your pet deal +5...15 additional damage with attacks and gain +1...7 Health regeneration.
3427.concise description: Elite Shout. (3...15 seconds.) All party members near you or your pet deal +5...15 damage Additional damage only applies to attacks [sic] and gain +1...7 Health regeneration.

3428.name: Shadow Theft
3428.description: Elite Skill. Shadow Step to target foe. For 5...20 seconds that foe's attributes are reduced by 1...5 and your attributes are increased by 1...5. This skill counts as a Lead Attack.
3428.concise description: Elite Skill. Shadow Step to target foe. For 5...20 seconds that foe's attributes are reduced by 1...5 and your attributes are increased by 1...5. Counts as a Lead Attack.

3429.name: Weapons of Three Forges
3429.description: Elite Weapon Spell. For 3...20 seconds, each non-spirit ally in earshot gains the effect of a random Weapon Spell.
3429.concise description: Elite Weapon Spell. (3...20 seconds.) Allies in earshot gain the effect of a random Weapon Spell.

3430.name: Vow of Revolution
3430.description: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 3...10 seconds, you have +1...5 energy regeneration. This skill reapplies itself every time you use a non-Dervish skill.
3430.concise description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (3...10 seconds.) Gain +1...5 energy regeneration. Renewal: whenever you use a non-Dervish skill.

3431.name: Heroic Refrain
3431.description: Elite Echo. For (3...15) seconds, target non-spirit ally gains +(1...3) to all attributes. This echo is reapplied every time a chant or shout ends on that ally.
3431.concise description: Elite Echo. (3...15 seconds.) Target ally gains +1...3 to all attributes. Renewal: every time a chant or shout ends on this ally.

2051&lt;!-- Luxon --&gt;, 2100&lt;!-- Ku.name: Summon Spirits
2051&lt;!-- Luxon --&gt;, 2100&lt;!-- Ku.description: Spell. All spirits you control Shadow Step to your location, and gain Health.
2051&lt;!-- Luxon --&gt;, 2100&lt;!-- Ku.concise description: Spell. Spirits you control Shadow Step to your location and gain Health.

1955&lt;!-- Luxon --&gt;, 2098&lt;!-- Ku.name: Aura of Holy Might
1955&lt;!-- Luxon --&gt;, 2098&lt;!-- Ku.description: Enchantment Spell. For 45 seconds, you deal holy damage to all adjacent foes whenever you lose a Dervish enchantment.
1955&lt;!-- Luxon --&gt;, 2098&lt;!-- Ku.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (45 seconds.) Whenever you lose a Dervish enchantment, adjacent foes take holy damage.

229, 562&lt;!-- monster only --&gt;.name: Lightning Orb
229, 562&lt;!-- monster only --&gt;.description: Spell. Send out a Lightning Orb that strikes target foe for 10...100 lightning damage. This spell has 25% armor penetration.
229, 562&lt;!-- monster only --&gt;.concise description: Spell. Projectile: deals 10...100 lightning damage. 25% armor penetration.

1951&lt;!-- Luxon --&gt;, 2094&lt;!-- Ku.name: Elemental Lord
1951&lt;!-- Luxon --&gt;, 2094&lt;!-- Ku.description: Enchantment Spell. For seconds, your elemental attributes are boosted by 1. Each time you cast a spell, you gain 1 Energy for every 10 ranks of Energy Storage and are healed for % of the spell's Energy cost.
1951&lt;!-- Luxon --&gt;, 2094&lt;!-- Ku.concise description: Enchantment Spell. ( seconds.) Your elemental attributes are boosted by 1. Each time you cast a spell, you gain 1 energy for every 10 ranks of Energy Storage and are healed for % of the spell's Energy cost.

1949&lt;!-- Luxon --&gt;, 2092&lt;!-- Ku.name: Ether Nightmare
1949&lt;!-- Luxon --&gt;, 2092&lt;!-- Ku.description: Hex Spell. Target foe loses Energy. For each point of Energy lost in this way, that foe and all foes in the area suffer -1 Health degeneration for 10 seconds.
1949&lt;!-- Luxon --&gt;, 2092&lt;!-- Ku.concise description: Hex spell. Causes Energy loss. Target and foes in the area have -1 Health degeneration for each point of Energy lost (10 seconds).

1948&lt;!-- Luxon --&gt;, 2091&lt;!-- Ku.name: Shadow Sanctuary
1948&lt;!-- Luxon --&gt;, 2091&lt;!-- Ku.description: Enchantment Spell. You are Blinded for 5 seconds. For 10 seconds, you gain + Health regeneration and +40 armor.
1948&lt;!-- Luxon --&gt;, 2091&lt;!-- Ku.concise description: Enchantment Spell. (10 seconds.) You gain + Health regeneration and +40 armor.

1950&lt;!-- Luxon --&gt;, 2093&lt;!-- Ku.name: Signet of Corruption
1950&lt;!-- Luxon --&gt;, 2093&lt;!-- Ku.description: Signet. Target foe and all nearby foes take damage. For each affected foe suffering from a condition or hex, you gain 2 Energy (maximum  Energy).
1950&lt;!-- Luxon --&gt;, 2093&lt;!-- Ku.concise description: Signet. Deals damage to target and nearby foes. You gain 2 Energy (maximum ) for each of these foes with a condition or hex.

3162‚Äé.name: "There's not enough time!!"
3162‚Äé.description: Shout. For 20 seconds, all creatures within earshot attack, move, and activate skills 100% faster.
3162‚Äé.concise description: Shout. (20 seconds.) Creatures in earshot attack, move, and activate skills 100% faster.

1952&lt;!-- Luxon --&gt;, 2095&lt;!-- Ku.name: Selfless Spirit
1952&lt;!-- Luxon --&gt;, 2095&lt;!-- Ku.description: Enchantment Spell. For seconds, spells you cast that target another ally cost 3 less energy.
1952&lt;!-- Luxon --&gt;, 2095&lt;!-- Ku.concise description: Enchantment Spell. ( seconds.) Spells you cast that target another ally cost 3 less Energy.

1957&lt;!-- Luxon --&gt;, 2099&lt;!-- Ku.name: Spear of Fury
1957&lt;!-- Luxon --&gt;, 2099&lt;!-- Ku.description: Spear Attack. This attack deals + damage. If this attack hits a foe suffering from a condition, you gain strikes of adrenaline.
1957&lt;!-- Luxon --&gt;, 2099&lt;!-- Ku.concise description: Spear Attack. Deals + damage. Gain strikes of adrenaline if you hit a foe with a condition.

1954&lt;!-- Luxon --&gt;, 2097&lt;!-- Ku.name: "Save Yourselves!"
1954&lt;!-- Luxon --&gt;, 2097&lt;!-- Ku.description: Shout. For seconds, all other party members gain +100 armor.
1954&lt;!-- Luxon --&gt;, 2097&lt;!-- Ku.concise description: Shout. ( seconds.) All other party members gain +100 armor.

1953&lt;!-- Luxon --&gt;, 2096&lt;!-- Ku.name: Triple Shot
1953&lt;!-- Luxon --&gt;, 2096&lt;!-- Ku.description: Bow Attack. Shoot 3 arrows simultaneously at target foe. These arrows deal % less damage.
1953&lt;!-- Luxon --&gt;, 2096&lt;!-- Ku.concise description: Bow Attack. Shoot 3 arrows simultaneously at target foe.

385, 1319&lt;!-- npc --&gt;.name: Final Thrust
385, 1319&lt;!-- npc --&gt;.description: Sword Attack. Lose all adrenaline. If Final Thrust hits, you deal 1...40 more damage. This damage is doubled if your target was below 50% Health.
385, 1319&lt;!-- npc --&gt;.concise description: Sword Attack. Deals +1...40 damage. Deals +1...40 more damage if target foe is below 50% Health.

1276, 1316.name: Meditation of the Reaper
1276, 1316.description: Skill. For 30 seconds, Shiro meditates and absorbs the next 500 damage. When this skill ends, Shiro steals 20 Health from all foes for each second this skill was active.
1276, 1316.concise description: Skill. (30 seconds.) Shiro meditates and absorbs the next 500 damage. When this skill ends, Shiro steals 20 Health from all foes for each second this skill was active.

516-523, 526, 527, 565.name: Claim Resource
516-523, 526, 527, 565.description: Skill. Will open doors and unlocks locked locks.

966, 967, 968, 969, 970.name: Spear of Archemorus
966, 967, 968, 969, 970.description: Spell. The Spear of Archemorus is powered by the souls of those dying within its radius. Dropping it will cause Archemorus to deal damage to any enemy within the spear's danger zone.
966, 967, 968, 969, 970.concise description: Spell. The Spear of Archemorus is powered by the souls of those dying within its radius. Dropping it will cause Archemorus to deal damage to any enemy within the spear's danger zone.

3253‚Äé, 3259‚Äé, 3260‚Äé, 3261‚Äé, 3262.name: Ultra Snowball
3253‚Äé, 3259‚Äé, 3260‚Äé, 3261‚Äé, 3262.description: Spell. You throw a slow moving snowball at target foe and gain 1 adrenaline. That foe takes 100 damage.
3253‚Äé, 3259‚Äé, 3260‚Äé, 3261‚Äé, 3262.concise description: Spell. Slow projectile: deals 100 damage.  You gain 1 strike of adrenaline.

501, 578.name: Siege Attack
501, 578.description: Attack. Deals damage to creatures at impact site.
501, 578.concise description: Attack. Damages creatures at the impact site.
